original: Namo tassa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa
analyzed: namaḥ tassa bhagavataḥ arahataḥ sammāsambuddhassa

original: Vinayapiṭake
analyzed: vinaya piṭake

original: Vimativinodanī-ṭīkā (paṭhamo bhāgo)
analyzed: vimativinodanī ṭīkā paṭhamaḥ bhāgo

original: Ganthārambhakathā
analyzed: gantha ārambha kathā

original: Karuṇāpuṇṇahadayaṃ, sugataṃ hitadāyakaṃ;
analyzed: karuṇā puṇṇa hadayam sugatam hita dāyakam

original: Natvā dhammañca vimalaṃ, saṅghañca guṇasampadaṃ.
analyzed: natvā dhammañca vimalam saṅghañca guṇa sampadam

original: Vaṇṇanā nipuṇāhesuṃ, vinayaṭṭhakathāya yā;
analyzed: vaṇṇanā nipuṇā ahesum vinaya ṭṭhakathāya yā

original: Pubbakehi katā nekā, nānānayasamākulā.
analyzed: pubbakehi katā nekā nānā naya samākulā

original: Tattha kāci suvitthiṇṇā, dukkhogāhā ca ganthato;
analyzed: tattha kāci su vitthiṇṇā dukkha ugāhā ca ganthataḥ

original: Viraddhā atthato cāpi, saddato cāpi katthaci.
analyzed: viraddhāḥ atthataḥ ca api saddataḥ ca api katthaci

original: Kāci katthaci apuṇṇā, kāci sammohakārinī;
analyzed: kāci katthaci apuṇṇā kāci sammoha kārinī

original: Tasmā tāhi samādāya, sāraṃ saṅkheparūpato.
analyzed: samādāya sāram saṅkhepa rūpataḥ

original: Līnatthañca pakāsento, viraddhañca visodhayaṃ;
analyzed: līna attham ca pakāsentaḥ viraddham ca visodhayan

original: Upaṭṭhitanayañcāpi, tattha tattha pakāsayaṃ.
analyzed: upaṭṭhita nayam ca api tattha tattha pakāsayan

original: Vinaye vimatiṃ chetuṃ, bhikkhūnaṃ lahuvuttinaṃ;
analyzed: vinaye vimatim chetum bhikkhūnam lahu vuttinam

original: Saṅkhepena likhissāmi, tassā līnatthavaṇṇanaṃ.
analyzed: saṅkhepena likhissāmi tassāḥ līna ttha vaṇṇanam

original: Ganthārambhakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: gantha ārambha kathā vaṇṇanā

original: Vinayasaṃvaṇṇanārambhe ratanattayaṃ namassitukāmo tassa visiṭṭhaguṇayogasandassanatthaṃ
analyzed: vinaya saṃvaṇṇana ārambhe ratanattayam namassitu kāmo tassa visiṭṭha guṇa yoga sandassana attham

original: yo kappakoṭīhipītiādimāha. Visiṭṭhaguṇayogena hi vandanārahabhāvo, vandanārahe ca
analyzed: yaḥ kappa koṭī hipi iti ādim āha visiṭṭha guṇa yogena hi vandanāraha bhāvaḥ vandanārahe ca

original: katā vandanā yathādhippetamatthaṃ sādheti. Ettha ca saṃvaṇṇanārambhe ratanattayapaṇāmakaraṇappayojanaṃ
analyzed: katā vandanā yathā adhippetam attham sādha iti ettha ca saṃvaṇṇanā ārambhe

original: tattha tattha bahudhā papañcenti ācariyā, mayaṃ pana idhādhippetameva payojanaṃ dassayissāma.
analyzed: tattha tattha bahudhā papañcenti ācariyāḥ mayam pana idha adhippetam eva payojanam dassayissāma

original: Tasmā saṃvaṇṇanārambhe ratanattayapaṇāmakaraṇaṃ yathāpaṭiññātasaṃvaṇṇanāya anantarāyena
analyzed: saṃvaṇṇanā ārambhe yathā paṭiññāta saṃvaṇṇanāya anantarāyena

original: parisamāpanatthanti veditabbaṃ. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “tassānubhāvena hatantarāyo”ti. Ratanattayapaṇāmakaraṇena
analyzed: parisamāpana attham ti veditabbam tathā hi vuttam tassa anubhāvena hata antarāyaḥ iti

original: hi rāgādidosavigamato paññādiguṇapāṭavato āyuādivaḍḍhanato puññātisayabhāvādito ca
analyzed: hi rāga ādi dosa vigamataḥ paññā ādi guṇa pāṭavataḥ āyu ādi vaḍḍhanataḥ puñña atisaya bhāva āditaḥ ca

original: hoteva yathāpaṭiññātasaṃvaṇṇanāya anantarāyena parisamāpanaṃ.
analyzed: hotā iva yathā paṭiññāta saṃvaṇṇanāya anantarāyena parisamāpanam

original: Tattha paṭhamaṃ tāva bhagavato vandanaṃ kattukāmo “yo kappakoṭīhipi…pe… tassā”ti
analyzed: tattha paṭhamam tāva bhagavataḥ vandanam kattu kāmaḥ yaḥ tassa ati

original: āha. Imissā pana vinayadesanāya karuṇāppadhānañāṇasamuṭṭhitatāya karuṇāppadhānameva
analyzed: āha imissā pana vinaya desanāya karuṇā ppadhāna ñāṇa samuṭṭhita tāya karuṇā ppadhānam eva

original: thomanaṃ āraddhaṃ. Esā hi ācariyassa pakati, yadidaṃ ārambhānurūpathomanā. Karuṇāggahaṇena
analyzed: thomanam āraddham esā hi ācariyassa pakati yat idam ārambha anurūpa thomanā karuṇā ggahaṇena

original: cettha aparimeyyappabhāvā sabbepi buddhaguṇā nayato saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbā taṃmūlakattā
analyzed: ca ittha aparimeyya ppabhāvā sabbe pi buddha guṇāḥ nayataḥ saṅgahitā ati daṭṭhabbā tad mūlaka ttā

original: sesabuddhaguṇānaṃ. Tattha yoti imassa aniyamavacanassa nāthoti iminā sambandho. Kappakoṭīhipi
analyzed: sesa buddha guṇānam tattha yaḥ ti imassa aniyama vacanassa nātho ti iminā sambandhaḥ

original: appameyyaṃ kālanti kappakoṭigaṇanāvasenapi “ettakā kappakoṭiyo”ti pametuṃ asakkuṇeyyaṃ
analyzed: appameyyam kālanti kappa koṭi gaṇanā vasena api ettakā kappa koṭiyo ti pametum a sakkuṇeyyam

original: kālaṃ. Api-saddena pageva vassagaṇanāyāti dasseti. Appameyyaṃ kālanti ca accantasaṃyoge
analyzed: kālam api saddena pagā iva vassa gaṇanāya ati dasseti appameyyam kālanti ca ac canta saṃyoge

original: upayogavacanaṃ, tena kappakoṭigaṇanāvasena paricchinditumasakkuṇeyyamapi, asaṅkhyeyyavasena
analyzed: upayoga vacanam tena kappa koṭi gaṇanā vasena paricchinditum asakkuṇeyyam api asaṅkhyeyya vasena

original: pana paricchinditabbato salakkhaṃ caturasaṅkhyeyyakappakālaṃ accantameva nirantaraṃ
analyzed: pana paricchinditabbataḥ salakkham catur asaṅkhyeyya kappa kālam accantam eva nirantaram

original: pañcamahāpaaccāgādiatidukkarāni karonto khedaṃ kāyikaṃ parissamaṃ pattoti dasseti.
analyzed: karonto khedam kāyikam parissamam patto ti dasseti

original: Lokahitāyāti sattalokassa hitāya. Nāthatīti nātho, veneyyānaṃ hitasukhaṃ āsīsatīti
analyzed: loka hitāya ati satta lokassa hitāya nāthati iti nāthaḥ veneyyānam hita sukham āsīsati iti

original: attho. Atha vā nāthati veneyyagate kilese upatāpeti, nāthati vā yācati veneyye attano
analyzed: attho atha vā nāthati veneyya gate kilese upatāpeti nāthati vā yācati veneyye attano

original: hitakaraṇe yācitvāpi niyojetīti nātho, lokapaṭisaraṇo lokasāmī lokanāyakoti vuttaṃ
analyzed: hita karaṇe yācitvā api niyojeti iti nāthaḥ loka paṭisaraṇaḥ loka sāmī loka nāyako ti vuttam

original: hoti. Mahākāruṇikassāti yo karuṇāya kampitahadayattā lokahitatthaṃ atidukkarakiriyāya
analyzed: hoti mahā kāruṇikassa ati yaḥ karuṇāya kampita hadaya ttā loka hita attham ati dukkara kiriyāya

original: anekappakāraṃ tādisaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhavitvā āgato, tassa mahākāruṇikassāti attho. Tattha
analyzed: aneka ppakāram tādisam dukkham anubhavitvā āgataḥ tassa mahā kāruṇikassa ati atthaḥ tattha

original: kiratīti karuṇā, paradukkhaṃ vikkhipati apanetīti attho. Dukkhitesu vā kiriyati pasāriyatīti
analyzed: kirati iti karuṇā para dukkham vikkhipati apaneti iti atthaḥ dukkhitesu vā

original: karuṇā. Atha vā kiṇātīti karuṇā, paradukkhe sati kāruṇikaṃ hiṃsati vibādheti, vināseti
analyzed: karuṇā atha vā kiṇāti iti karuṇā para dukkhe sati kāruṇikam hiṃsati vibādheti vināseti

original: vā parassa dukkhanti attho. Paradukkhe sati sādhūnaṃ kampanaṃ hadayakhedaṃ karotīti
analyzed: vā parassa dukkhanti attho para dukkhe sati sādhūnam kampanam hadaya khedam karoti iti

original: vā karuṇā. Atha vā kamiti sukhaṃ, taṃ rundhatīti karuṇā. Esā hi paradukkhāpanayanakāmatālakkhaṇā
analyzed: vā karuṇā atha vā kam iti sukham tam rundhati iti karuṇā esā hi para dukkha apanayana kāma tā lakkhaṇā

original: attasukhanirapekkhatāya kāruṇikānaṃ sukhaṃ rundhati vibādheti. Karuṇāya niyutto kāruṇiko,
analyzed: atta sukha nirapekkha tāya kāruṇikānam sukham rundhati vibādheti karuṇāya niyuttaḥ kāruṇikaḥ

original: mahanto kāruṇiko mahākāruṇiko, tassa namo atthūti pāṭhaseso.
analyzed: mahantaḥ kāruṇikaḥ mahā kāruṇikaḥ tassa namaḥ atthu iti pāṭha sesaḥ

original: Evaṃ karuṇāmukhena saṅkhepato sakalasabbaññuguṇehi bhagavantaṃ thometvā idāni saddhammaṃ
analyzed: evam karuṇā mukhena saṅkhepataḥ sakala sabbaññu guṇehi bhagavantam thometvā idāni saddhammam

original: thometuṃ asambudhantiādimāha. Tattha buddhanisevitaṃ yaṃ asambudhaṃ jīvaloko bhavā
analyzed: thometum asambudha iti ādim āha tattha buddha nisevitam yam asambudham jīva lokaḥ

original: bhavaṃ gacchati, tassa dhammavarassa namoti sambandho. Tattha asambudhanti asambujjhanto,
analyzed: bhavam gacchati tassa dhammavarassa namaḥ ti sambandhaḥ tattha asambudhanti asambujjhanto

original: yathāsabhāvaṃ appaṭivijjhanatoti vuttaṃ hoti. Hetuattho hettha antapaccayo. Yanti
analyzed: yathā sabhāvam a paṭivijjhanato ti vuttam hoti hetu atthaḥ ha ittha anta paccayaḥ yanti

original: aniyamato sapariyattiko navalokuttaradhammo kammabhāvena niddiṭṭho. Buddhanisevitanti
analyzed: aniyamataḥ sa pariyattikaḥ nava lokuttara dhammo kamma bhāvena niddiṭṭhaḥ buddha nisevitanti

original: tasseva visesanaṃ, sammāsambuddhena, paccekabuddhasāvakabuddhehipi vā gocarāsevanabhāvanāsevanāhi
analyzed: tassa iva visesanam sammāsambuddhena paccekabuddha sāvakabuddhehi pi vā gocara āsevana bhāvanā sevanāhi

original: yathārahaṃ nisevitaṃ, ajahitanti attho. Tattha pariyattiphalanibbānāni gocarāsevanavaseneva
analyzed: yathāraham nisevitam a jahitanti attho tattha pariyatti phala nibbānāni gocara āsevana vasena iva

original: nisevitāni, maggo pana bhāvanāsevanavasenāpi paccavekkhaṇañāṇādivasena gocarāsevanavasenāpi
analyzed: nisevitāni maggo pana bhāvanā sevana vasena api paccavekkhaṇa ñāṇa ādi vasena gocara āsevana vasena api

original: nisevito. Bhavābhavanti bhavato bhavaṃ. Atha vā hīnapaṇītādivasena khuddakaṃ mahantañca
analyzed: nisevitaḥ bhava abhavanti bhavataḥ bhavam atha vā hīna paṇīta ādi vasena khuddakam mahantam ca

original: bhavanti attho. Vuḍḍhatthopi hi a-kāro dissati asekkhā dhammātiādīsu viya. Atha vā
analyzed: bhavanti atthaḥ vuḍḍha tthaḥ api hi akāraḥ dissati asekkhāḥ dhammā ti ādīsu viya atha vā

original: bhavoti vuḍḍhi, abhavoti hāni. Bhavoti vā sassatadiṭṭhi, abhavoti ucchedadiṭṭhi.
analyzed: bhavoti vuḍḍhi abhavoti hāni bhavoti vā sassata diṭṭhi abhavoti uccheda diṭṭhi

original: Vuttappakāro bhavo ca abhavo ca bhavābhavo, taṃ bhavābhavaṃ. Gacchatīti upagacchati.
analyzed: vutta ppakāraḥ bhavaḥ ca abhavaḥ ca bhava abhavaḥ tam bhava abhavam gacchati iti upagacchati

original: Jīvalokoti sattaloko. Avijjādikilesajālaviddhaṃsinoti dhammavisesanaṃ. Tattha na
analyzed: jīvaloko ti satta loko avijjā ādi kilesa jāla viddhaṃsino ti dhamma visesanam tattha na

original: vidati dhammānaṃ yathāsabhāvaṃ na vijānātīti avijjā, aññāṇaṃ. Sā ādi yesaṃ taṇhādīnaṃ,
analyzed: vidati dhammānam yathā sabhāvam na vijānāti iti avijjā aññāṇam sā ādi yesam taṇhā ādīnam

original: teyeva kilissanti etehi sattāti kilesā, teyeva ca sattānaṃ vibādhanaṭṭhena jālasadisāti
analyzed: te yeva kilissanti etehi sattā ati kilesā teyā iva ca sattānam vibādhana ṭṭhena jāla sadisā ti

original: jālaṃ, taṃ viddhaṃseti sabbaso vināseti sīlenāti avijjādikilesajālaviddhaṃsī, tassa.
analyzed: jālam tam viddhaṃseti sabbasas vināseti sīlena ati avijja ādi kilesa jāla viddhaṃsī tassa

original: Nanu cettha sapariyattiko navalokuttaradhammo adhippeto, tattha ca maggoyeva kilese
analyzed: nanu ca ittha sa pariyattikaḥ nava lokuttara dhammo adhippeto tattha ca kilese

original: viddhaṃseti, netareti ce? Vuccate – maggassāpi nibbānamāgamma kilesaviddhaṃsanato
analyzed: viddhaṃseti na itarā iti ce vuccate maggassa api nibbānam āgamma kilesa viddhaṃsanato

original: nibbānampi kilese viddhaṃseti nāma, maggassa kilesaviddhaṃsanakiccaṃ phalena niṭṭhitanti
analyzed: nibbānam pi kilese viddhaṃseti nāma maggassa kilesa viddhaṃsana kiccam phalena niṭṭhitanti

original: phalampi “kilesaviddhaṃsī”ti vuccati, pariyattidhammopi kilesaviddhaṃsanassa upanissayapaccayattā
analyzed: phalam pi kilesa viddhaṃsī ti vuccati pariyatti dhammaḥ api kilesa viddhaṃsanassa upanissaya paccaya ttā

original: “kilesaviddhaṃsī”ti vattuṃ arahatīti na koci doso. Dhammavarassa tassāti pubbe aniyamitassa
analyzed: kilesa vid haṃsī iti vattum arahati iti na koci dosaḥ dhamma varassa tassa ati pubbe aniyamitassa

original: niyāmakavacanaṃ. Tattha yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāne catūsu apāyesu saṃsāradukkhe
analyzed: niyāmaka vacanam tattha yathānusiṭṭham paṭipajjamāne catūsu apāyesu saṃsāra dukkhe

original: ca apatamāne dhāretīti dhammo. Vuttappakāro dhammo eva attano uttaritarābhāvena varo
analyzed: ca a patamāne dhāreti iti dhammaḥ vutta ppakāraḥ dhammaḥ eva attanaḥ uttaritara abhāvena varaḥ

original: pavaro anuttaroti dhammavaro, tassa dhammavarassa namo atthūti attho.
analyzed: pavaro anuttaro ti dhamma varo tassa dhamma varassa namaḥ atthu uti attho

original: Evaṃ saṅkhepanayeneva sabbadhammaguṇehi saddhammaṃ thometvā idāni ariyasaṅghaṃ thometuṃ
analyzed: evam saṅkhepa nayena iva sabba dhamma guṇehi saddhammam thometvā idāni ariya saṅgham thometum

original: guṇehītiādimāha. Tattha guṇehi yo yutto, tamariyasaṅghaṃ namāmīti sambandho. Sīlādayo
analyzed: guṇehi iti ādim āha tattha guṇehi yaḥ yuttaḥ tam ariya saṅgham namāmi iti sambandhaḥ sīla ādayaḥ

original: guṇā cettha lokiyalokuttarā adhippetā. “Vimuttivimuttiñāṇa”nti vattabbe ekadesasarūpekasesanayena
analyzed: guṇā ca ittha lokiya lokuttarāḥ adhippetāḥ vimutti vimutti ñāṇan ti vattabbe eka desa sarūpa ika sesa nayena

original: “vimuttiñāṇa”nti vuttaṃ, ādisaddapariyāyena pabhutisaddena vā vimuttiggahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: vimutti ñāṇan ti vuttam ādi sadda pariyāyena pabhuti saddena vā vimutti ggahaṇam veditabbam

original: Tattha vimuttīti phalaṃ. Vimuttiñāṇanti paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ. Pabhuti-saddena chaḷabhiññācatupaṭisambhidādayo
analyzed: tattha vimutti iti phalam vimutti ñāṇam ti paccavekkhaṇa ñāṇam pabhuti saddena chaṭṭha abhiññā catu paṭisambhidā ādayaḥ

original: guṇā saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbā. Kusalatthikānaṃ janānaṃ puññātisayavuḍḍhiyā khettasadisattā
analyzed: guṇā saṅgahitā ati daṭṭhabbā kusalatthikānam janānam puñña atisaya vuḍḍhiyā khetta sadisa ttā

original: khettanti āha “khettaṃ janānaṃ kusalatthikāna”nti. Khittaṃ bījaṃ mahapphalabhāvakaraṇena
analyzed: khettanti āha khettam janānam kusalatthikānam ti khittam bījam mahat phala bhāva karaṇena

original: tāyatīti hi khettaṃ. Ariyasaṅghanti ettha ārakattā kilesehi, anaye na iriyanato,
analyzed: tāyati iti hi khettam ettha ārakattā kilesehi anaye na

original: aye ca iriyanato, sadevakena lokena “saraṇa”nti araṇīyato upagantabbato, upagatānañca
analyzed: ca iriyanataḥ sa devakena lokena araṇīyataḥ upagantabbataḥ upagatānam ca

original: tadatthasiddhito ariyā, aṭṭha ariyapuggalā, ariyānaṃ saṅgho samūhoti ariyasaṅgho, taṃ ariyasaṅghaṃ.
analyzed: tad attha siddhitaḥ ariyāḥ aṭṭha ariya puggalāḥ ariyānam saṅgho samūho ti ariya saṅghaḥ tam ariya saṅgham

original: Idāni ratanattayapaṇāmajanitaṃ kusalābhisandaṃ yathādhippete payojane niyojetvā attanā
analyzed: idāni kusala abhisandam yathā adhippete payojane niyojetvā

original: saṃvaṇṇiyamānassa vinayassa sakalasāsanamūlabhāvadassanamukhena saṃvaṇṇanākaraṇassāpi
analyzed: saṃvaṇṇiyamānassa vinayassa sakala sāsana mūla bhāva dassana mukhena saṃvaṇṇanā karaṇassa api

original: sāsanamūlataṃ dassetuṃ iccevamiccādigāthādvayamāha. Puññābhisandanti puññoghaṃ, puññappavāhaṃ
analyzed: sāsana mūla tam dassetum icca ivam iccādi gāthā dvayam āha puñña abhisandanti puñña ogham puñña ppavāham

original: puññarāsinti attho. Tassānubhāvenāti tassa yathāvuttassa puññappavāhassa ānubhāvena
analyzed: puñña rāsinti attho tassa anubhāvena ati tassa yathāvuttassa puññappavāhassa ānubhāvena

original: balena hatantarāyo vinayaṃ vaṇṇayissanti sambandho.
analyzed: balena hata antarāyaḥ vinayam vaṇṇayissanti sambandho

original: Aṭṭhitassa susaṇṭhitassa bhagavato sāsanaṃ yasmiṃ ṭhite patiṭṭhitaṃ hotīti yojetabbaṃ.
analyzed: aṭṭhitassa su saṇṭhitassa bhagavato sāsanam yasmin ṭhite patiṭṭhitam hoti iti yojetabbam

original: Tattha yasminti yasmiṃ vinayapiṭake. Ṭhiteti pāḷito ca atthato ca anūnaṃ hutvā lajjīpuggalesu
analyzed: tattha yasmin ti yasmin vinaya piṭake ṭhitā iti ca atthataḥ ca anūnam hutvā lajjī puggalesu

original: pavattanaṭṭhena ṭhite. Sāsananti sikkhattayasaṅgahitaṃ sāsanaṃ. Aṭṭhitassāti kāmasukhallikattakilamathānuyogasaṅkhāte
analyzed: pavattana ṭṭhena ṭhite sāsananti sikkhattaya saṅgahitam sāsanam aṭṭhitassa āti kāma sukhalli katta kilamatha anuyoga saṅkhāte

original: antadvaye aṭṭhitassa, “parinibbutassapi bhagavato”tipi vadanti. Susaṇṭhitassāti antadvayavirahitāya
analyzed: anta dvaye aṭṭhitassa parinibbutassa api bhagavato tipi vadanti su saṇṭhitassa ati anta dvaya virahitāya

original: majjhimāya paṭipadāya suṭṭhu ṭhitassa. Amissanti bhāvanapuṃsakaniddeso, nikāyantaraladdhīhi
analyzed: majjhimāya paṭipadāya suṭṭhu ṭhitassa bhāva napuṃsaka niddesaḥ nikāya antara laddhīhi

original: Suttantikānaṃ vacanānamatthanti verañjakaṇḍādīsu āgatānaṃ jhānakathādīnaṃ suttantavacanānaṃ

original: sīhaḷaṭṭhakathāsu “suttantikānaṃ bhāro”ti vatvā avaṇṇitabbaṭṭhānaṃ atthaṃ taṃtaṃsuttānurūpaṃ
analyzed: sīhaḷaṭṭhakathāsu suttantikānam bhāro ti vatvā avaṇṇitabba ṭṭhānam attham taṃ taṃ sutta anurūpam

original: sabbaso paridīpayissāmāti adhippāyo. Hessatīti bhavissati, karīyissatīti vā attho.
analyzed: sabbaso paridīpayissāma ati adhippāyaḥ hessati iti bhavissati karīyissati iti vā atthaḥ

original: Ettha ca paṭhamasmiṃ atthavikappe “bhāsantarapariccāgādikaṃ catubbidhaṃ kiccaṃ nipphādetvā
analyzed: ettha ca paṭhamasmin attha vikappe bhāsa antara pariccāga ādikam catubbidham kiccam nipphādetvā

original: suttantikānaṃ vacanānamatthaṃ paridīpayantī ayaṃ vaṇṇanā bhavissatī”ti vaṇṇanāvasena

analyzed: samāna kattuka tā veditabbā pacchimasmin attha vikappe pana heṭṭhā vutta bhāsa antara pariccāga ādikam

original: katvā suttantikānaṃ vacanānamatthaṃ paridīpayantī ayaṃ vaṇṇanā amhehi karīyissatī”ti
analyzed: katvā suttantikānam vacanānam attham paridīpayantī ayam vaṇṇanā amhehi karīyissati iti

original: evaṃ ācariyavasena samānakattukatā veditabbā.
analyzed: evam ācariya vasena samāna kattuka tā veditabbā

original: Ganthārambhakathāvaṇṇanānayo niṭṭhito.
Bāhiranidānakathā
analyzed: bāhira nidāna kathā

original: Idāni saṃvaravinayapahānavinayādīsu bahūsu vinayesu attanā “taṃ vaṇṇayissaṃ vinaya”nti

original: yathāvuttāsu gāthāsu. Tāva-saddo paṭhamanti imasmiṃ atthe daṭṭhabbo, tena paṭhamaṃ

analyzed: vinayam vavatthapetvā pacchā tassa vaṇṇanam karissāma ati dīpeti vavatthapetabbaḥ ti

analyzed: jananī ṭhāne ṭhita ttā mātā viyāti mātikā iti vuccati

original: Idāni saṃvaṇṇetabbamatthaṃ mātikaṃ paṭṭhapetvā dassento āha vuttaṃ yenātiādi. Idaṃ
analyzed: idāni saṃvaṇṇetabbam attham mātikam paṭṭhapetvā dassentaḥ āha vuttam yena itiādi idam

original: Ettha ca vuttaṃ yena yadā yasmāti idaṃ vacanaṃ tena samayena buddho bhagavātiādinidānavacanamattaṃ

analyzed: pariyosāna kalyāṇanti vacanataḥ nidāna nigamanāni pi satthu desanāya

original: sambandhamupagacchati.
analyzed: sambandham upagacchati

original: Idāni pana taṃ visuṃ nīharitvā dassento tattha vuttaṃ yenātiādimāha. Tatthāti tesu

original: mātikāpadesu. Idanti tena samayenātiādinidānavacanaṃ. Hi-saddo yasmāti attho daṭṭhabbo,
analyzed: mātikā padesu idam ti tena samayena ati ādi nidāna vacanam hi saddaḥ yasmā ati atthaḥ daṭṭhabbo

original: yasmā buddhassa bhagavato attapaccakkhavacanaṃ na hoti, tasmāti vuttaṃ hoti. Attapaccakkhavacanaṃ
analyzed: yasmā buddhassa bhagavataḥ atta paccakkha vacanam na hoti tasmā ati vuttam hoti atta paccakkha vacanam

original: na hotīti attanā paccakkhaṃ katvā vuttavacanaṃ na hoti. Atha vā attano paccakkhakāle
analyzed: na hoti iti attanā paccakkham katvā vutta vacanam na hoti atha vā attano paccakkha kāle

original: dharamānakāle vuttavacanaṃ na hoti. Tadubhayenāpi bhagavato vuttavacanaṃ na hotīti attho.
analyzed: dharamāna kāle vutta vacanam na hoti tad ubhayena api bhagavataḥ vutta vacanam na hoti iti attho

original: Paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikathāvaṇṇanā
Paṭhamamahāsaṅgīti nāma cesāti ettha ca-saddo vattabbasampiṇḍanattho, upaññāsattho
analyzed: paṭhama mahāsaṅgī iti nāma ca isā ati ettha ca saddaḥ vattabba sampiṇḍana attho upaññāsa atthaḥ

original: vatvā puna aparaṃ vattumārabhantānaṃ ca-saddappayogo. Yathāpaccayaṃ tattha tattha

original: desitattā vippakiṇṇānaṃ dhammavinayānaṃ sabhāgatthavasena saṅgahetvā gāyanaṃ kathanaṃ

analyzed: cesā paṭhama mahā saṅgītī iti vuttā nidadāti desanam desa kāla ādi vasena aviditam viditam

original: katvā nidassetīti nidānaṃ, tattha kosallatthaṃ.
analyzed: katvā nidasseti iti nidānam tattha kosalla attham

original: Veneyyānaṃ maggaphaluppattihetubhūtāva kiriyā nippariyāyena buddhakiccanti āha “dhammacakkappavattanañhi
analyzed: veneyyānam magga phala uppatti hetu bhūtā ava kiriyā nippariyāyena buddha kiccan ti āha dhamma cakka ppavattanam hi

original: ādiṃ katvā”ti. Tattha satipaṭṭhānādidhammo eva pavattanaṭṭhena cakkanti dhammacakkaṃ,
analyzed: ādim katvā ti tattha sati paṭṭhāna ādi dhammaḥ eva pavattana ṭṭhena cakkanti dhammacakkam

original: cakkanti vā āṇā, taṃ dhammato anapetattā dhammacakkaṃ, dhammena ñāyena cakkantipi
analyzed: cakkanti vai āṇā tam dhammataḥ an apeta ttā dhammacakkam dhammena ñāyena cakkanti pi

original: dhammacakkaṃ. Katabuddhakicceti niṭṭhitabuddhakicce bhagavati lokanātheti sambandho.
analyzed: dhammacakkam kata buddha kiccā iti niṭṭhita buddha kicce bhagavati lokanātha iti sambandhaḥ

original: Kusinārāyanti samīpatthe etaṃ bhummavacanaṃ. Upavattane mallānaṃ sālavaneti tassa

analyzed: nagarassa upavattana bhūtam malla rājūnam sālavanuyyānam dasseti tattha nagaram pavisantā

original: ca majjhe sālavanaṃ vuccati. Kusinārāya hi dakkhiṇapacchimadisāya taṃ uyyānaṃ hoti,
analyzed: ca majjhe sālavanam vuccati kusinārāya hi dakkhiṇa pacchima disāya tam uyyānam hoti

original: vuccati. Tattha kira upavattane aññamaññasaṃsaṭṭhaviṭapānaṃ sampannachāyānaṃ sālapantīnamantare

analyzed: bhagavataḥ parinibbāna mañcaḥ paññatto tam sandhāya vuttam yamaka sālānam antare ti

original: Upādīyati kammakilesehīti upādi, vipākakkhandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ. Tadeva kammakilesehi

original: tasmiṃ ṭhāne sannipatitānanti attho. Saṅghassa thero jeṭṭho saṅghatthero. Ettha ca

original: saṅghasaddassa bhikkhusatasahassasaddasāpekkhattepi gamakattā therasaddena samāso
analyzed: saṅgha saddassa gamaka ttā thera saddena samāsaḥ

analyzed: ussāham janesi iti sambandhaḥ

original: Tathā ussāhaṃ jananassa kāraṇamāha sattāhaparinibbutetiādi. Satta ahāni samāhaṭāni

original: dasseti. Tattha alanti paṭikkhepavacanaṃ. Tena mahāsamaṇenāti nissakke karaṇavacanaṃ,

original: homāti vā atītatthe vattamānavacanaṃ, ahumhāti attho. Ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ vijjatīti

original: vijjateva, no na vijjatīti attho. Kiṃ taṃ kāraṇanti? Āha yaṃ pāpabhikkhūtiādi. Ettha
analyzed: vijjatā iva no na vijjati iti atthaḥ kim tam kāraṇan ti āha yam pāpa bhikkhu itiādi ettha

analyzed: vijjati iti atthaḥ atītaḥ atikkantaḥ satthā ettha etassa ati vā atītasatthukam pā vacanam

original: Padhānaṃ vacanaṃ pāvacanaṃ, dhammavinayanti vuttaṃ hoti. Pakkhaṃ labhitvāti alajjīpakkhaṃ
analyzed: padhānam vacanam pāvacanam dhamma vinayanti vuttam hoti pakkham labhitvā ati alajjī pakkham

original: labhitvā. Na cirassevāti na cireneva. Yāva ca dhammavinayo tiṭṭhatīti yattakaṃ kālaṃ
analyzed: labhitvā na cirassa iva ati na cirena iva yāva ca dhamma vinayo tiṭṭhati iti yattakam kālam

original: dhammo ca vinayo ca lajjīpuggalesu tiṭṭhati.
analyzed: dhammo ca vinayo ca lajjī puggalesu tiṭṭhati

original: Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatāti parinibbānamañce nipannena bhagavatā vuttanti attho. Desito
analyzed: vuttam ha etam bhagavatā iti parinibbāna mañce nipannena bhagavatā vuttanti atthaḥ desito

original: paññattoti suttābhidhammapiṭakasaṅgahitassa dhammassa ceva vinayapiṭakasaṅgahitassa

original: vinayassa ca atisajjanaṃ pabodhanaṃ desanā. Tasseva pakārato ñāpanaṃ asaṅkarato ṭhapanaṃ

original: paññāpanaṃ. So vo mamaccayena satthāti so dhammavinayo tumhākaṃ mamaccayena satthā

original: mayi parinibbute satthukiccaṃ sādhessati. Sāsananti pariyattipaṭipattipaṭivedhavasena

original: tividhaṃ sāsanaṃ, nippariyāyato pana sattattiṃsa bodhipakkhiyadhammā. Addhaniyanti

original: addhānakkhamaṃ, tadeva ciraṭṭhitikaṃ assa bhaveyyāti sambandho.
analyzed: addhānakkhamam tat eva cira ṭṭhitikam assa bhaveyya iti sambandhaḥ

original: Idāni sammāsambuddhena attano kataṃ anuggahavisesaṃ vibhāvento āha yañcāhaṃ bhagavatātiādi.
analyzed: idāni sammāsambuddhena attano katam anuggaha visesam vibhāventaḥ āha yat ca aham bhagavatā atiādi

original: Tattha yañcāhanti etassa anuggahitoti etena sambandho. Tattha yanti yasmā, yena kāraṇenāti
analyzed: tattha etassa anuggahito ti etena sambandhaḥ tattha yanti yasmai yena kāraṇena ati

original: vuttaṃ hoti. Kiriyāparāmasanaṃ vā etaṃ, tena anuggahitoti ettha anuggahaṇaṃ parāmasati.
analyzed: vuttam hoti kiriyā parāmasanam vā etam tena anuggahito ti ettha anuggahaṇam parāmasati

original: Dhāressasītiādikaṃ bhagavatā mahākassapattherena saddhiṃ cīvaraparivattanaṃ kātukāmena
analyzed: dhāressasi iti ādikam bhagavatā mahākassapa ttherena saddhim cīvara parivattanam kātu kāmena

original: vuttavacanaṃ. Dhāressasi pana me tvaṃ kassapāti “kassapa, tvaṃ imāni paribhogajiṇṇāni
analyzed: vutta vacanam dhāressasi pana me tvam kassapa ati kassapa tvam imāni paribhoga jiṇṇāni

original: paṃsukūlāni pārupituṃ sakkhissasī”ti vadati, tañca kho na kāyabalaṃ sandhāya, paṭipattipūraṇaṃ
analyzed: paṃsukūlāni pārupitum sakkhissasi iti vadati tat ca kho na kāya balam sandhāya paṭipatti pūraṇam

original: pana sandhāya evamāha. Sāṇāni paṃsukūlānīti matakaḷevaraṃ paliveṭhetvā chaḍḍitāni
analyzed: pana sandhāya evam āha sāṇāni paṃsu kūlāni iti mata kaḷevaram paliveṭhetvā chaḍḍitāni

original: tumbamatte kimayo papphoṭetvā gahitāni sāṇavākamayāni paṃsukūlacīvarāni. Rathikādīnaṃ
analyzed: tumba matte papphoṭetvā gahitāni sāṇavāka mayāni paṃsukūla cīvarāni rathika ādīnam

original: yattha katthaci paṃsūnaṃ upari ṭhitattā abbhuggataṭṭhena tesu kūlamivāti paṃsukūlaṃ.
analyzed: yattha katthaci paṃsūnam upari ṭhita ttā abbhuggata ṭṭhena tesu kūlam iva ati paṃsukūlam

original: Atha vā paṃsu viya kucchitabhāvaṃ ulati gacchatīti paṃsukūlanti paṃsukūlasaddassa
analyzed: atha vā paṃsu viya kucchita bhāvam ulati gacchati iti paṃsukūlanti paṃsukūla saddassa

original: attho daṭṭhabbo. Nibbasanānīti niṭṭhitavasanakiccāni, paribhogajiṇṇānīti attho. Ekameva
analyzed: atthaḥ daṭṭhabbaḥ nibbasanāni iti niṭṭhita vasana kiccāni paribhoga jiṇṇāni iti atthaḥ ekam eva

original: taṃ cīvaraṃ anekāvayavattā bahuvacanaṃ kataṃ. Sādhāraṇaparibhogenāti attanā samānaparibhogena,
analyzed: tam cīvaram aneka avayava tā bahuvacanam katam sādhāraṇa paribhogena ati attanā samāna paribhogena

original: sādhāraṇaparibhogena ca samasamaṭṭhapanena ca anuggahitoti sambandho.
analyzed: sādhāraṇa paribhogena ca sama sama ṭṭhapanena ca anuggahitaḥ iti sambandho

original: Idāni navānupubbavihārachaḷabhiññāppabhede uttarimanussadhamme attanā samasamaṭṭhapanatthāya
analyzed: idāni nava anupubba vihāra chaṭṭha abhiññā appabhede uttari manussa dhamme attanā sama sama ṭṭhapana tthāya

original: bhagavatā vuttaṃ kassapasaṃyutte āgataṃ pāḷiṃ peyyālamukhena ādiggahaṇena ca saṅkhipitvā
analyzed: bhagavatā vuttam kassapasaṃyutte āgatam pāḷim peyyāla mukhena ādi gahaṇena ca saṅkhipitvā

original: dassento āha ahaṃ, bhikkhavetiādi. Tattha yāvade ākaṅkhāmīti yāvadeva ākaṅkhāmi,
analyzed: dassentaḥ āha aham bhikkhava itiādi tattha yāvade ākaṅkhāmi iti yāvadeva ākaṅkhāmi

original: yattakaṃ kālaṃ icchāmīti attho, “yāvadevā”tipi pāṭho. Navānupubbavihārachaḷabhiññāppabhedeti
analyzed: yattakam kālam icchāmi iti atthaḥ yāvat eva atipi pāṭhaḥ nava anupubba vihāra chaṭṭha abhiññā appabhede ti

original: ettha navānupubbavihāro nāma anupaṭipāṭiyā samāpajjitabbabhāvato evaṃsaññitā nirodhasamāpattiyā
analyzed: ettha navānupubbavihāraḥ nāma anupaṭipāṭiyā samāpajjitabba bhāvataḥ evaṃsaññi tā nirodha samāpattiyā

original: saha aṭṭha rūpārūpasamāpattiyo. Chaḷabhiññā nāma āsavakkhayañāṇena saddhiṃ pañcābhiññāyo.
analyzed: saha aṭṭha rūpa arūpa samāpattiyaḥ chaḍabhiññāḥ nāma āsava kkhaya ñāṇena saddhim pañca abhiññāyaḥ

original: Attanā samasamaṭṭhapanenāti “ahaṃ yattakaṃ kālaṃ yattake samāpattivihāre abhiññāyo
analyzed: attanā sama sama ṭhapanena ati aham yattakam kālam yattake samāpatti vihāre abhiññāyo

original: ca vaḷañjemi, tathā kassapopī”ti evaṃ yathāvuttauttarimanussadhamme attanā samasamaṃ
analyzed: ca vaḷañjemi tathā kassapopī iti evam yathā vutta auttari manussa dhamme attanā samasamam

original: katvā ṭhapanena, idañca uttarimanussadhammasāmaññena therassa pasaṃsāmattena vuttaṃ,
analyzed: katvā ṭhapanena idam ca uttari manussa dhamma sāmaññena therassa pasaṃsā mattena vuttam

original: na bhagavatā saddhiṃ sabbathā samatāya. Bhagavato hi guṇavisesaṃ upādāya sāvakā paccekabuddhā
analyzed: na bhagavatā saddhim sabbathā samatāya bhagavataḥ hi guṇa visesam upādāya sāvakāḥ paccekabuddhāḥ

original: ca kalampi kalabhāgampi na upenti, tassa kimaññaṃ āṇaṇyaṃ bhavissati aññatra dhammavinayasaṅgāyanāti
analyzed: ca kalam pi kala bhāgam pi na upenti tassa kimaññam āṇaṇyam bhavissati aññatra

original: adhippāyo. Tattha tassāti tassa anuggahassa, tassa meti vā attho gahetabbo. Potthakesu
analyzed: adhippāyaḥ tattha tassa ati tassa anuggahassa tassa mā iti vā atthaḥ gahetabbo potthakesu

original: hi kesuci “tassa me”ti pāṭho dissati. Āṇaṇyaṃ aṇaṇabhāvo. Sakakavacaissariyānuppadānenāti
analyzed: hi kesuci tassa mā iti pāṭhaḥ dissati āṇaṇyam saka kavaca aissariya an uppadānena ati

original: ettha cīvarassa nidassanavasena kavacasseva gahaṇaṃ kataṃ, samāpattiyā nidassanavasena issariyaṃ gahitaṃ.
analyzed: ettha cīvarassa nidassana vasena kavacassa iva gahaṇam katam samāpattiyā nidassana vasena issariyam gahitam

original: Idāni yathāvuttamatthaṃ pāḷiyā vibhāvento āha yathāhātiādi. Tattha ekamidāhanti ettha
analyzed: idāni ettha

original: idanti nipātamattaṃ. Ekaṃ samayanti ekasmiṃ samayeti attho. Pāvāyāti pāvānagarato.
analyzed: idam ti nipāta mattam ekam ekasmin samaye iti attho pāvāya ati pāvā nagarataḥ

original: Addhānamaggappaṭipannoti dīghamaggappaṭipanno. Dīghapariyāyo hettha addhānasaddo.
analyzed: addhāna magga ppaṭipannaḥ ti dīgha magga ppaṭipannaḥ dīgha pariyāyaḥ ha ittha addhāna saddo

original: Sabbaṃ subhaddakaṇḍaṃ vitthārato veditabbanti pañcasatikakkhandhake āgataṃ subhaddakaṇḍaṃ
analyzed: sabbam subhadda kaṇḍam vitthārataḥ veditabbanti pañcasatika khandhake āgatam subhadda kaṇḍam

original: idha ānetvā vitthāretabbaṃ.
analyzed: idhaḥ ānetvā vitthāretabbam

original: Tato paranti subhaddakaṇḍato paraṃ. Sabbaṃ subhaddakaṇḍaṃ vitthārato veditabbanti
analyzed: tatas paranti subhaddakaṇḍato param sabbam subhaddakaṇḍam vitthārataḥ veditabbanti

original: iminā “yaṃ na icchissāma, na taṃ karissāmā”ti etaṃ pariyantaṃ subhaddakaṇḍapāḷiṃ
analyzed: iminā yam naḥ icchissāma na tam karissāma ati etam pariyantam su bhadda kaṇḍa pāḷim

original: dassetvā idāni avasesaṃ ussāhajananappakārappavattaṃ pāḷimeva dassento handa mayaṃ
analyzed: dassetvā idāni avasesam ussāha janana pakāra ppavattam pāḷim eva dassentaḥ handa mayam

original: āvusotiādimāha. Tattha pure adhammo dippatīti ettha “adhammo nāma dasakusalakammapathapaṭipakkhabhūto
analyzed: āvuso tiādim āha tattha pure adhammo dippati iti ettha adhammo nāma dasa kusala kammapatha paṭipakkha bhūto

original: adhammo”ti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ. Dhammasaṅgahaṇatthaṃ ussāhajananappasaṅgattā
analyzed: adhammo ti sāra ttha dīpaniyam vuttam dhamma saṅgahaṇa attham ussāha janana ppasaṅga ttā

original: pana dhammavinayānaṃ asaṅgāyanahetudosagaṇo sambhavati, so eva ettha adhammo dippati
analyzed: pana dhamma vinayānam asaṅgāyana hetu dosa gaṇaḥ sambhavati saḥ eva ettha adhammaḥ dippati

original: tappaṭipakkho dhammo ca paṭibāhīyatīti vattabbaṃ. Api ca “adhammavādino balavanto
analyzed: tad paṭipakkhaḥ dhammaḥ ca paṭibāhīyati iti vattabbam api ca adhamma vādinaḥ balavanto

original: honti dhammavādino dubbalā hontī”ti vuccamānattā yena adhammena te subhaddavajjiputtakādayo
analyzed: honti dhamma vādinaḥ dubbalāḥ honti iti vuccamāna ttāḥ yena adhammena te subhadda vajjiputtaka ādayo

original: adhammavādino, yena ca dhammena itare dhammavādinova honti. Teyeva idha “adhammo”
analyzed: adhamma vādinaḥ yena ca dhammena itare dhamma vādinaḥ uva honti idha adhammaḥ

original: “dhammo”ti ca vattabbā. Tasmā sīlavipattiādihetuko pāpicchatādidosagaṇo adhammo,
analyzed: dhammaḥ ti ca vattabbā tasmā sīla vipatti ādi hetukaḥ pāpa icchā tā ādi dosa gaṇaḥ adhammaḥ

original: tappaṭipakkho sīlasampadādihetuko appicchatādiguṇasamūho dhammoti ca gahetabbaṃ.
analyzed: tad paṭipakkhaḥ sīla sampad ādi hetukaḥ appiccha tā ādi guṇa samūhaḥ dhammaḥ ti ca gahetabbam

original: Pure dippatīti api nāma dippati. Atha vā yāva adhammo dhammaṃ paṭibāhituṃ samattho
analyzed: pure dippati iti api nāma dippati atha vā yāva adhammaḥ dhammam paṭibāhitum samatthaḥ

original: hoti, tato puretaramevāti attho. Dippatīti dippissati. Puresaddayogena hi anāgatatthe
analyzed: hoti tatas puretaram eva ati atthaḥ dippati iti pure sadda yogena hi anāgata tthe

original: ayaṃ vattamānappayogo, yathā purā vassati devoti. Avinayoti pahānavinayādīnaṃ paṭipakkhabhūto avinayo.
analyzed: ayam vattamāna ppayogaḥ yathā purā vassati devaḥ ti avinayaḥ ti pahāna vinaya ādīnam paṭipakkha bhūtaḥ avinayaḥ

original: Tena hīti uyyojanatthe nipāto. Sakalanavaṅgasatthusāsanapariyattidhareti sakalaṃ
analyzed: tena hi iti uyyojana atthe nipātaḥ sakala navaṅga satthu sāsana pariyatti dharā iti sakalam

original: suttageyyādinavaṅgaṃ ettha, etassa vā atthīti sakalanavaṅgaṃ, satthusāsanaṃ. Atthakāmena
analyzed: sutta geyya ādi navaṅgam ettha etassa vā atthi iti sakala navaṅgam satthu sāsanam attha kāmena

original: pariyāpuṇitabbato diṭṭhadhammikādipurisatthapariyattibhāvato ca “pariyattī”ti tīṇi
analyzed: pariyāpuṇitabbataḥ diṭṭhadhammika ādi purisattha pariyatti bhāvataḥ ca pariyattī iti tīṇi

original: piṭakāni vuccanti, taṃ sakalanavaṅgasatthusāsanasaṅkhātaṃ pariyattiṃ dhārentīti sakalanavaṅgasatthusāsanapaayattidharā,
analyzed: piṭakāni vuccanti tam sakala navaṅga satthu sāsana saṅkhātam pariyattim dhārenti iti sakala navaṅga satthu sāsana paayatti dharā

original: tādiseti attho. Samathabhāvanāsinehābhāvena sukkhā lūkhā asiniddhā vipassanā etesanti
analyzed: tādisā iti attho samatha bhāvanā sineha abhāvena sukkhā lūkhā asi niddhā vipassanā etesan ti

original: sukkhavipassakā. Tipiṭakasabbapariyattippabhedadhareti tiṇṇaṃ piṭakānaṃ samāhāro
analyzed: sukkha vipassakā ti piṭaka sabba pariyatti pabheda dharā iti tiṇṇam piṭakānam samāhāraḥ

original: tipiṭakaṃ, tadeva navaṅgādivasena anekabhedabhinnaṃ sabbaṃ pariyattippabhedaṃ dhārentīti
analyzed: ti piṭakam tat eva navaṅga ādi vasena aneka bheda bhinnam sabbam pariyat tippa bhedam dhārenti iti

original: tipiṭakasabbapariyattippabhedadharā.
Kissa panāti kasmā pana. Sikkhatīti sekkho. Tamevāha “sakaraṇīyo”ti. Uparimaggattayakiccassa
analyzed: kissa pana ati kasmai pana sikkhati iti sekkho tam eva āha sa karaṇīyaḥ ti upari magga ttaya kiccassa

original: apariyositattā sakiccoti attho. Assāti anena. Bahukārattāti bahupakārattā. Assāti
analyzed: a pariyosita ttā sa kiccā uti atthaḥ assa ati anena bahu kāra ttā ati bahu pakāra ttā assa ati

original: bhaveyya. Ativiya vissatthoti ativiya vissāsiko. Nanti ānandattheraṃ ovadatīti sambandho.
analyzed: bhaveyya ativiya vissatthaḥ ti ativiya vissāsikaḥ ānandattheram ovadati iti sambandhaḥ

original: Ānandattherassa kadāci asaññatāya navakāya saddhivihārikaparisāya janapadacārikācaraṇaṃ,
analyzed: ānanda ttherassa kadāci asañña tāya navakāya saddhivihārika parisāya janapada cārikā caraṇam

original: tesañca saddhivihārikānaṃ ekakkhaṇe uppabbajjanañca paṭicca mahākassapatthero taṃ
analyzed: tesam ca saddhivihārikānam eka khaṇe uppabbajjanam ca paṭicca mahākassapa theraḥ tam

original: niggaṇhanto evamāha “na vāyaṃ kumārako mattamaññāsī”ti. Ettha ca vā-saddo padapūraṇo,
analyzed: niggaṇhantaḥ evam āha na vā ayam kumārakaḥ mattam aññāsi iti ettha ca vā saddo pada pūraṇaḥ

original: ayaṃ kumāro attano pamāṇaṃ na paṭijānātīti theraṃ tajjento āha. Tatrāti evaṃ sati.
analyzed: ayam kumāraḥ pamāṇam na paṭijānāti iti theram āha tatra ati evam sati

original: Kiñcāpi sekkhoti idaṃ na sekkhānaṃ agatigamanasabbhāvena vuttaṃ, asekkhānaññeva pana
analyzed: kiñcā api sekkho ti idam na sekkhānam agati gamana sabbhāvena vuttam asekkha anaññā iva pana

original: uccinitvā gahitattāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tasmā “kiñcāpi sekkho, tathāpi thero āyasmantampi
analyzed: uccinitvā gahita ttā ti daṭṭhabbam tasmā kiñcā api sekkhaḥ tathā api theraḥ āyasmantam pi

original: ānandaṃ uccinatū”ti evamettha sambandho veditabbo, na pana kiñcāpi sekkho, tathāpi
analyzed: ānandam uccinatu iti evam ettha sambandhaḥ veditabbaḥ na pana kiñcā api sekkho tathā api

original: abhabbo agatiṃ gantunti yojetabbaṃ. Abhabbotiādi panassa sabhāvakathanaṃ. Tattha
analyzed: abhabbaḥ agatim gantunti yojetabbam abhabba utiādi panassa sabhāva kathanam tattha

original: chandāti chandena sinehena. Agatiṃ gantunti akattabbaṃ kātuṃ. Pariyattoti adhīto uggahito.
analyzed: chandā ati chandena sinehena agatim gantum ti a kattabbam kātum pariyattaḥ iti adhītaḥ uggahitaḥ

original: Rājagahaṃ kho mahāgocaranti ettha gāvo caranti etthāti gocaro, gunnaṃ gocaraṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: rājagaham kho mahā gocaranti ettha gāvaḥ caranti ettha ati gocaraḥ gunnam gocara ṭṭhānam

original: Gocaro viyāti gocaro, bhikkhācaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ. So mahanto assāti mahāgocaraṃ, rājagahaṃ.
analyzed: gocaraḥ viyā ti gocaraḥ bhikkhā caraṇa ṭhānam saḥ mahantaḥ assa ati mahā gocaram rājagaham

original: Ukkoṭeyyāti nivāreyya.
analyzed: ukkoṭeyya ati nivāreyya

original: Sattasu sādhukīḷanadivasesūti ettha saṃvegavatthuṃ kittetvā kittetvā sādhukaṃ eva
analyzed: sattasu sādhu kīḷana divasesu iti ettha saṃvega vatthum kittetvā kittetvā sādhukam eva

original: pūjāvasena kīḷanato sādhukīḷanaṃ. Upakaṭṭhāti āsannā. Vassaṃ upaneti upagacchati
analyzed: pūjā vasena kīḷanataḥ sādhu kīḷanam āsannā vassam upaneti upagacchati

original: etthāti vassūpanāyikā.
analyzed: ettha ati vassūpanāyikā

original: Tatra sudanti tassaṃ sāvatthiyaṃ, sudanti nipātamattaṃ. Ussannadhātukanti upacitapittasemhādidhātukaṃ.
analyzed: tatra sudanti tassam sāvatthiyam sudanti nipāta mattam ussanna dhātukanti upacita pitta semha ādi dhātukam

original: Samassāsetunti santappetuṃ. Dutiyadivaseti jetavanavihāraṃ paviṭṭhadivasato dutiyadivaseti
analyzed: samassāsetum ti santappetum dutiya divasā iti jetavana vihāram paviṭṭha divasataḥ dutiya divasā iti

original: vadanti. Viriccati etenāti virecanaṃ. Osadhaparibhāvitaṃ khīrameva virecananti khīravirecanaṃ.
analyzed: vadanti etena ati virecanam osadha paribhāvitam khīram eva khīra virecanam

original: Yaṃ sandhāyāti yaṃ bhesajjapānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Bhesajjamattāti appamattakaṃ bhesajjaṃ.
analyzed: yam sandhāya iti yam bhesajja pānam sandhāya vuttam bhesajja mattā ati appa mattakam bhesajjam

original: Appattho hi ayaṃ mattā-saddo mattā sukhapariccāgātiādīsu viya.
analyzed: appatthaḥ hi ayam mattā saddaḥ mattā sukha pariccāgāti ādīsu viya

original: Khaṇḍaphullappaṭisaṅkharaṇanti ettha khaṇḍanti chinnaṃ, phullanti bhinnaṃ, tesaṃ paṭisaṅkharaṇaṃ abhinavakaraṇaṃ.
analyzed: ettha khaṇḍa phulla paṭisaṅkharaṇanti ettha khaṇḍanti chinnam phullanti bhinnam tesam paṭisaṅkharaṇam abhinava karaṇam

original: Paricchedavasena vediyati dissatīti pariveṇaṃ. Tatthāti tesu vihāresu khaṇḍaphullappaṭisaṅkharaṇanti
analyzed: pariccheda vasena vediyati dissati iti pariveṇam tattha ati tesu vihāresu khaṇḍa phulla paṭisaṅkharaṇam ti

original: sambandho. Paṭhamaṃ māsanti vassānassa paṭhamaṃ māsaṃ, accantasaṃyoge cetaṃ upayogavacanaṃ.
analyzed: sambandhaḥ paṭhamam vassānassa paṭhamam māsam upayoga vacanam

original: Senāsanavattānaṃ bahūnaṃ paññattattā, senāsanakkhandhake senāsanapaṭibaddhānaṃ bahūnaṃ
analyzed: senāsana vattānam bahūnam paññatta ttā senāsana kkhandhake senāsana paṭibaddhānam bahūnam

original: kammānaṃ vihitattā “bhagavatā…pe… vaṇṇita”nti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: kammānam vihita ttā bhagavatā āpe vaṇṇitan ti vuttam

original: Dutiyadivaseti “khaṇḍaphullappaṭisaṅkharaṇaṃ karomā”ti cintitadivasato dutiyadivase.
analyzed: dutiya divasa iti khaṇḍa phulla ppaṭisaṅkharaṇam karoma ati cintita divasataḥ dutiya divase

original: Vassūpanāyikadivaseyeva te evaṃ cintesuṃ. Siriyā niketanamivāti siriyā nivāsanaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: vassūpanāyika divaseya iva te evam cintesum siriyā niketanam iva ati siriyā nivāsana ṭṭhānam

original: viya. Ekasmiṃ pānīyatitthe sannipatantā pakkhino viya sabbesaṃ janānaṃ cakkhūni maṇḍapeyeva
analyzed: viya ekasmim pānīya titthe sannipatantā pakkhinaḥ viya sabbesam janānam cakkhūni

original: nipatantīti vuttaṃ ‘ekanipātatitthamiva ca devamanussanayanavihaṅgāna”nti. Lokarāmaṇeyyakanti
analyzed: nipatanti iti vuttam eka nipāta tittham iva ca deva manussa nayana vihaṅga ānanti loka rāmaṇeyyakanti

original: loke ramaṇīyabhāvaṃ, ramaṇaṃ arahatīti vā lokarāmaṇeyyakaṃ. Daṭṭhabbasāramaṇḍanti
analyzed: loke ramaṇīya bhāvam ramaṇam arahati iti vā loka rāmaṇeyyakam daṭṭhabba sāram aṇḍanti

original: daṭṭhabbesu sāraṃ daṭṭhabbasāraṃ, tato vippasannanti daṭṭhabbasāramaṇḍaṃ. Atha vā
analyzed: daṭṭhabbesu sāram daṭṭhabba sāram tatas vippasannanti daṭṭhabba sāra maṇḍam atha vā

original: daṭṭhabbo sārabhūto visiṭṭhataro maṇḍo maṇḍanaṃ alaṅkāro etassāti daṭṭhabbasāramaṇḍo,
analyzed: daṭṭhabbaḥ sāra bhūtaḥ visiṭṭhataraḥ maṇḍaḥ maṇḍanam alaṅkāraḥ etassa ati daṭṭhabba sāra maṇḍaḥ

original: maṇḍapo. Maṇḍaṃ sūriyarasmiṃ pāti nivāretīti maṇḍapo. Vividhāni kusumadāmāni ceva
analyzed: maṇḍapaḥ maṇḍam pāti nivāreti iti maṇḍapaḥ vividhāni kusuma dāmāni ca iva

original: muttolambakāni ca viniggalantaṃ vamentaṃ nikkhāmentamiva cāru sobhanaṃ vitānaṃ etthāti
analyzed: mutta ulambakāni ca viniggalantam vamentam nikkhāmentam iva cāru sobhanam vitānam ettha ati

original: vividhakusumadāmolambakaviniggalantacāruvitāno. Nānāpupphūpahāravicittasupariniṭṭhitabhūmikammattā
analyzed: vividha kusuma dāma ulambaka viniggalanta cāru vitānaḥ nānā puppha upahāra vicitta su pariniṭṭhita bhūmi kammattā

original: eva “ratanavicittamaṇikoṭṭimatalamivā”ti vuttaṃ. Ettha ca maṇiyo koṭṭetvā katatalaṃ
analyzed: eva ratana vicitta maṇi koṭṭima talam iva ati vuttam ettha ca maṇiyaḥ koṭṭetvā kata talam

original: maṇikoṭṭimatalaṃ nāma, tamivāti vuttaṃ hoti. Āsanārahanti nisīdanārahaṃ. Dantakhacitanti dantehi khacitaṃ.
analyzed: maṇikoṭṭimatalam nāma tam iva ati vuttam hoti āsana araham ti nisīdana araham danta khacitam iti dantehi khacitam

original: Āvajjesīti upanāmesi. Anupādāyāti taṇhādiṭṭhivasena kañci dhammaṃ aggahetvā. Kathādosoti kathāya asaccaṃ nāma natthi.
analyzed: āvajjesi iti upanāmesi an upādāya ati taṇhā diṭṭhi vasena kañci dhammam aggahetvā kathā doso ti kathāya asaccam nāma natthi

original: Yathāvuḍḍhanti vuḍḍhapaṭipāṭiṃ anatikkamitvā. Eketi majjhimabhāṇakānaṃyeva eke. Pubbe
analyzed: yathāvuḍḍham ti vuḍḍha paṭipāṭim an atikkamitvā eke iti majjhima bhāṇakānam yeva eke pubbe

original: vuttampi hi sabbaṃ majjhimabhāṇakā vadantiyevāti veditabbaṃ. Dīghabhāṇakā pana “padasāva
analyzed: vuttam api hi sabbam majjhima bhāṇakāḥ vadantiyā iva ati veditabbam dīgha bhāṇakāḥ pana

original: thero sannipātamāgato”ti vadanti. Tesu keci “ākāsenā”ti, “te sabbepi tathā tathā
analyzed: thero sannipātam āgataḥ ti vadanti tesu keci ākāsena ati te sabbe pi tathā tathā

original: āgatadivasānampi atthitāya ekamekaṃ gahetvā tathā tathā vadiṃsū”ti vadanti.
analyzed: āgata divasānam pi ekam ekam gahetvā tathā tathā vadiṃsu iti vadanti

original: Kaṃ dhuraṃ katvāti kaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā. Bījaniṃ gahetvāti ettha bījanīgahaṇaṃ parisāya
analyzed: kam dhuram katvā ati kam jeṭṭhakam katvā bījanim gahetvā ati ettha bījanī gahaṇam parisāya

original: dhammakathikānaṃ hatthakukkuccavinodanamukhavikārapaṭicchādanatthaṃ dhammatāvasena
analyzed: dhamma kathikānam hattha kukkucca vinodana mukha vikāra paṭicchādana ttham dhamma tā vasena

original: āciṇṇanti veditabbaṃ. Teneva hi accantasaññatappattā buddhāpi sāvakāpi dhammakathikānaṃ
analyzed: āciṇṇam ti veditabbam tena iva hi accanta saññata ppattāḥ buddhāḥ api sāvakāḥ api dhamma kathikānam

original: dhammatādassanatthameva cittabījaniṃ gaṇhanti. Paṭhamaṃ, āvuso upāli, pārājikaṃ kattha
analyzed: dhamma tā dassana tham eva citta bījanim gaṇhanti paṭhamam āvuso upāli pārājikam kattha

original: paññattanti ettha kathaṃ saṅgītiyā pubbe paṭhamabhāvo siddhoti? Pātimokkhuddesānukkamādinā
analyzed: paññattanti ettha katham saṅgītiyā pubbe paṭhama bhāvaḥ siddho ti pātimokkha uddesa anukkama ādinā

original: pubbe paṭhamabhāvassa siddhattā. Yebhuyyena hi tīṇi piṭakāni bhagavato dharamānakāleyeva
analyzed: pubbe paṭhama bhāvassa siddha ttā yebhuyyena hi tīṇi piṭakāni bhagavataḥ dharamāna kāleya iva

original: iminā anukkamena sajjhāyitāni, teneva kamena pacchāpi saṅgītāni visesato vinayābhidhammapiṭakānīti
analyzed: iminā anukkamena tena iva kamena pacchā api saṅgītāni visesataḥ vinaya abhidhamma piṭakāni iti

original: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kismiṃ vatthusminti nimittatthe bhummaṃ. Antarā ca, bhante, rājagahaṃ
analyzed: daṭṭhabbam kismin vatthusmin ti nimitta atthe bhummam antarā ca bhante rājagaham

original: antarā ca nāḷandanti rājagahassa ca nāḷandāya ca antarā, vivare majjheti attho. Antarā-saddena
analyzed: antarā ca nāḷandanti rājagahassa ca nāḷandāya ca antarā vivare majjhe iti atthaḥ antarāsaddena

original: pana yuttattā upayogavacanaṃ kataṃ. Rājāgāraketi rañño kīḷanatthāya kate agārake.
analyzed: pana yutta ttā upayoga vacanam katam rāja āgāraka iti rañño kīḷana atthāya kate agārake

original: Ambalaṭṭhikāyanti rañño evaṃnāmakaṃ uyyānaṃ. Kena saddhinti idha kasmā vuttanti?
analyzed: raññaḥ evaṃnāmakam uyyānam kena saddhinti idha kasmā vuttanti

original: Yasmā panetaṃ na bhagavatā eva vuttaṃ, raññāpi kiñci kiñci vuttamatthi, tasmā “kamārabbhā”ti
analyzed: yasmai pana itam na bhagavatā eva vuttam raññā api kiñci kiñci vuttam atthi tasmai kam ārabbha ati

original: avatvā evaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Vedehiputtenāti ayaṃ kosalarañño dhītāya putto,
analyzed: a vatvā evam vuttanti daṭṭhabbam vedehi puttena āti ayam kosala raññaḥ dhītāya putto

original: na videharañño dhītāya. Yasmā mātā panassa paṇḍitā, tasmā sā vedena ñāṇena īhati
analyzed: na videha raññaḥ dhītāya yasmā mātā panassa paṇḍitā tasmā sā vedena ñāṇena īhati

original: ghaṭati vāyamatīti “vedehī”ti pākaṭanāmā jātāti veditabbā.
analyzed: ghaṭati vāyamati iti vedehī iti pākaṭa nāmā jātā iti veditabbā

original: Evaṃ nimittapayojanakāladesadesakakārakakaraṇappakārehi paṭhamamahāsaṅgītiṃ dassetvā
analyzed: evam nimitta payojana kāla desa desaka kāraka karaṇa ppakārehi paṭhama mahāsaṅgītim dassetvā

original: idāni tattha vavatthāpitesu dhammavinayesu nānappakārakosallatthaṃ ekavidhādibhede
analyzed: idāni tattha vavatthāpitesu dhamma vinayesu ekavidha ādi bhede

original: dassetuṃ tadetaṃ sabbampītiādimāha. Tattha anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhinti ettha anāvaraṇañāṇapadaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: dassetum tat etam sabbam pi iti ādim āha tattha anuttaram sammāsambodhim ti ettha anāvaraṇa ñāṇa padaṭṭhānam

original: maggañāṇaṃ, maggañāṇapadaṭṭhānañca anāvaraṇañāṇaṃ “sammāsambodhī”ti vuccati. Paccavekkhantena
analyzed: magga ñāṇam magga ñāṇa padaṭṭhānam ca anāvaraṇa ñāṇam sammāsambodhi iti vuccati paccavekkhantena

original: vāti udānādivasena pavattadhammaṃ sandhāyāha. Vimuttirasanti arahattaphalassādaṃ,
analyzed: vāti udāna ādi vasena pavatta dhammam sandhāya āha

original: vimuttisampattikaṃ vā aggaphalanipphādanato, vimuttikiccaṃ vā kilesānaṃ accantavimuttisampādanato.

original: Avasesaṃ buddhavacanaṃ dhammoti ettha yadipi dhammo eva vinayopi pariyattiyādibhāvato,
analyzed: avasesam buddha vacanam dhammaḥ ti ettha yadi api dhammaḥ eva vinayaḥ api

original: tathāpi vinayasaddasannidhānena bhinnādhikaraṇabhāvena payutto dhamma-saddo vinayatantivirahitaṃ

original: tantiṃ dīpeti, yathā puññañāṇasambhāro gobalibaddantiādi.
analyzed: tantim dīpeti yathā puññañāṇa sambhāraḥ go bali bat danti ādi

original: Anekajātisaṃsāranti imissā gāthāya ayaṃ saṅkhepattho – ahaṃ imassa attabhāvagehassa
analyzed: imissā gāthāya ayam saṅkhepa atthaḥ aham imassa atta bhāva gehassa

original: kārakaṃ taṇhāvaḍḍhakiṃ gavesanto yena ñāṇena taṃ daṭṭhuṃ sakkā, taṃ bodhiñāṇaṃ anibbisaṃ
analyzed: kārakam taṇhā vaḍḍhakim gavesantaḥ yena ñāṇena tam daṭṭhum sakkā tam bodhi ñāṇam a nibbisam

original: alabhanto eva abhinīhārato pabhuti ettakaṃ kālaṃ anekajātisatasahassasaṅkhyaṃ imaṃ
analyzed: a labhantaḥ eva abhinīhārataḥ pabhuti ettakam kālam aneka jāti sata sahassa saṅkhyam imam

analyzed: saṃsāra vaṭṭam sandhāvissam saṃsarim yasmai jarā byādhi maraṇa missatāya jāti nāma esā

analyzed: punappunam upagantum dukkhā na ca sā tasmin a diṭṭhe nivattati tasmā tam gavesanto

analyzed: asi puna gehanti puna imam atta bhāva saṅkhātam mama geham na na karissasi

original: Kāraṇamāha sabbā tetiādi. Tava sabbā avasesakilesaphāsukā mayā bhaggā. Imassa tayā
analyzed: kāraṇam āha sabbā te tiādi tava sabbā avasesa kilesa phāsukā mayā bhaggā imassa tayā

analyzed: arahatta magga phalam ajjhagā pattosmi iti keci pana visaṅkhāra gatam cittam eva

original: taṇhānaṃ khayaṃ ajjhagā”ti evampi atthaṃ vadanti.
analyzed: taṇhānam khayam ajjhagāti evam pi attham vadanti

original: Kecīti khandhakabhāṇakā. Pāṭipadadivaseti idaṃ paccavekkhantassa uppannāti etena
analyzed: keci iti khandhaka bhāṇakā pāṭipada divasā iti idam paccavekkhantassa uppannā ati etena

analyzed: sambandhitabbam na sabbaññu bhāva ppattassa ati etena somanassa maya ñāṇena ati somanassa sampayutta ñāṇena

original: Āmantayāmīti nivedayāmi, bodhemīti attho. Antareti antarāḷe, vemajjheti attho.
analyzed: āmantayāmi iti nivedayāmi bodhemi iti attho antareti antarāḷe vemajjhā iti attho

original: Suttantapiṭakanti yathā kammameva kammantaṃ, evaṃ suttameva suttantanti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: suttanta piṭakanti yathā kammam eva kammantam evam suttam eva suttantanti veditabbam

original: Asaṅgītanti saṅgītikkhandhaka kathāvatthuppakaraṇādikaṃ. Soḷasahi vārehi upalakkhitattā

original: Daḷhīkammasithilakaraṇappayojanāti idaṃ lokavajjapaṇṇattivajjesu yathākkamaṃ yojetabbaṃ.

analyzed: saññama velam abhibhavitvā pavattaḥ ācāraḥ ajjhācāraḥ vītikkamo tena ati vividha naya ttā ādi hetunā

original: Etanti vividhavisesanayattātiādigāthāvacanaṃ. Etassāti vinayassa.
analyzed: etat ti vividha visesana yattā ati ādi gāthā vacanam etassa ati vinayassa

original: Itaraṃ panāti suttaṃ. Attatthaparatthādibhedeti ettha ādi-saddena diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikatthe

original: lokiyalokuttarādiatthe ca saṅgaṇhāti. Veneyajjhāsayānulomena vuttattāti vinayaṃ viya
analyzed: lokiya lokuttara ādi atthe ca saṅgaṇhāti vinayam viya

original: issarabhāvato āṇāpatiṭṭhāpanavasena adesetvā veneyyānaṃ ajjhāsayānulomena caritānurūpaṃ

analyzed: vutta ttā anupubba sikkhā ādi vasena a desetvā veneyyānam kāla antare abhinibbattim dassento

original: āha “sassamiva phala”nti. Upāyasamaṅgīnaṃyeva nippajjanabhāvaṃ dassento “dhenu viya
analyzed: āha sassam iva phalanti nippajjana bhāvam dassentaḥ dhenu viya

original: khīra”nti āha. Na hi dhenuṃ visāṇādīsu, akāle vā avijātaṃ vā dohanto khīraṃ paṭilabhati.
analyzed: āha na hi dhenum visāṇa ādīsu akāle vā avijātam vā dohantaḥ khīram paṭilabhati

original: Yanti yasmā. Etthāti abhidhamme. Abhidhammeti supinantena sukkavissaṭṭhiyā anāpattibhāvepi
analyzed: yanti yasmai ettha ati abhidhamme abhidhamme iti supin antena sukka vissaṭṭhiyāḥ anāpatti bhāve pi

original: akusalacetanā upalabbhatītiādinā vinayapaññattiyā saṅkaravirahite dhamme, “pubbāparavirodhābhāvato
analyzed: akusala cetanā upalabbhati iti ādinā vinaya paññattiyā saṅkara virahite dhamme pubba apara virodha abhāvato

original: saṅkaravirahite dhamme”tipi vadanti. Ārammaṇādīhīti ārammaṇasampayuttakammadvārapaṭipadādīhi.
analyzed: saṅkara virahite vadanti ārammaṇa ādīhi iti ārammaṇa sampayutta kamma dvāra paṭipada ādīhi

original: Lakkhaṇīyattāti sañjānitabbattā. Yaṃ panettha avisiṭṭhanti ettha vinayapiṭakantiādīsu
analyzed: lakkhaṇīya ttā ti sañjānitabba ttā yam pana ittha ettha vinaya piṭakam ti ādīsu

original: tīsu saddesu yaṃ avisiṭṭhaṃ samānaṃ, taṃ piṭakasaddanti attho. Mā piṭakasampadānenāti
analyzed: tīsu saddesu yam a visiṭṭham samānam tam piṭaka saddam ti atthaḥ mā piṭaka sampadānena ati

original: pāḷisampadānavasena mā gaṇhitthāti vuttaṃ hoti. Yathāvuttenāti evaṃ duvidhatthenātiādinā vuttappakārena.
analyzed: pāḷisampadāna vasena mā gaṇhittha ati vuttam hoti yathā vuttena ati evam duvidha tthena ati ādinā vutta ppakārena

original: Desanāsāsanakathābhedanti ettha desanābhedaṃ sāsanabhedaṃ kathābhedanti bhedasaddo
analyzed: desanā sāsana kathā bhedanti ettha desanā bhedam sāsana bhedam kathā bhedanti bheda saddaḥ

original: paccekaṃ yojetabbo. Bhedanti ca nānattanti attho. Tesūti piṭakesu. Sikkhā ca pahānāni
analyzed: paccekam yojetabbaḥ bhedam ti ca nānattanti atthaḥ tesu iti piṭakesu sikkhā ca pahānāni

original: ca gambhīrabhāvo ca sikkhāpahānagambhīrabhāvo, tañca yathārahaṃ paridīpayeti attho.
analyzed: ca gambhīra bhāvo ca sikkhā apahāna gambhīra bhāvo tat ca yathāraham paridīpaya iti attho

original: Pariyattibhedanti pariyāpuṇanabhedaṃ vibhāvayeti sambandho. Yahiṃ yasmiṃ vinayādike
analyzed: pariyatti bhedanti pariyāpuṇana bhedam vibhāvaya iti sambandhaḥ yahim yasmin vinaya ādike

original: yaṃ sampattiñca vipattiñca yathā pāpuṇāti, tampi sabbaṃ vibhāvayeti sambandho. Atha
analyzed: yam sampattim ca vipattim ca yathā pāpuṇāti tam pi sabbam vibhāvaya iti sambandhaḥ atha

original: vā yaṃ pariyattibhedaṃ sampattiṃ vipattiñca yahiṃ yathā pāpuṇāti, tampi sabbaṃ vibhāvayeti
analyzed: vā yam pariyatti bhedam sampattim vipattim ca yahim yathā pāpuṇāti tam pi sabbam vibhāvaya iti

original: yojetabbaṃ. Paridīpanā vibhāvanā cāti heṭṭhā gāthāsu vuttassa anurūpato vuttaṃ, atthato pana ekameva.
analyzed: yojetabbam paridīpanā vibhāvanā ca ati heṭṭhā gāthāsu vuttassa anurūpataḥ vuttam atthato pana ekam eva

original: Āṇārahenāti āṇaṃ paṇetuṃ arahatīti āṇāraho, bhagavā sammāsambuddhattā. So hi mahākāruṇikatāya
analyzed: āṇārahena ati āṇam paṇetum arahati iti āṇārahaḥ bhagavā sammāsambuddha ttā saḥ hi mahā kāruṇika tāya

original: ca aviparītato desakabhāvena pamāṇavacanattā ca āṇaṃ paṇetuṃ arahati. Vohāraparamatthānampi
analyzed: ca aviparītataḥ desaka bhāvena pamāṇa vacana ttā ca āṇam paṇetum arahati vohāra parama tthānam pi

original: sambhavato āha “āṇābāhullato”ti. Ito paresupi eseva nayo. Paṭhamanti vinayapiṭakaṃ.
analyzed: sambhavataḥ āha vinaya piṭakam

original: Pacurāparādhā seyyasakattherādayo. Te hi dosabāhullato “pacurāparādhā”ti vuttā. Pacuro
analyzed: te hi dosa bāhullato vuttā

original: bahuko bahulo aparādho doso vītikkamo yesante pacurāparādhā. Anekajjhāsayātiādīsu
analyzed: bahukaḥ bahulaḥ aparādhaḥ dosaḥ vītikkamaḥ yesante pacura aparādhāḥ

original: āsayova ajjhāsayo, so ca atthato diṭṭhi ñāṇañca. Cariyāti rāgacariyādikā cha mūlacariyā.
analyzed: āsayo uva ajjhāsayo so ca atthataḥ diṭṭhi ñāṇam ca cariyā ati rāga cariyā ādikā mūla cariyā

original: Atha vā cariyāti caritaṃ, taṃ sucaritaduccaritavasena duvidhaṃ. Adhimutti nāma sattānaṃ
analyzed: atha vā caritam tam su carita duccarita vasena duvidham nāma sattānam

original: pubbaparicayavasena abhiruci, sā duvidhā hīnapaṇītabhedena. Yathānulomanti ajjhāsayādīnaṃ
analyzed: pubba paricaya vasena abhiruci sā duvidhā hīna paṇīta bhedena yathā anulomanti ajjhāsaya ādīnam

original: anurūpaṃ. Yathādhammanti dhammasabhāvānurūpaṃ.
analyzed: anurūpam yathādhammam ti dhamma sabhāva anurūpam

original: Saṃvarāsaṃvaroti ettha khuddako mahanto ca saṃvaroti attho. Vuḍḍhiattho hettha a-kāro.
analyzed: saṃvara asaṃvaraḥ ti ettha khuddakaḥ mahantaḥ ca saṃvaro ti atthaḥ vuḍḍhi atthaḥ ha ittha akāro

original: Diṭṭhiviniveṭhanāti diṭṭhiyā vimocanaṃ. Suttantapāḷiyaṃ vivicceva kāmehītiādinā samādhidesanābāhullato
analyzed: diṭṭhi viniveṭhanā ti diṭṭhiyāḥ vimocanam suttantapāḷiyam vivicca iva kāmehi itiādinā samādhi desanā bāhullato

original: suttantapiṭake “adhicittasikkhā”ti vuttaṃ. Vītikkamappahānaṃ kilesānanti saṃkilesadhammānaṃ,
analyzed: suttanta piṭake adhi citta sikkhā ti vuttam vītikkama ppahānam kilesānam ti saṃkilesa dhammānam

original: kammakilesānaṃ vā yo kāyavacīdvārehi vītikkamo, tassa pahānaṃ. Anusayavasena santānamanuvattantā

original: kilesā pariyuṭṭhitāpi sīlabhedavasena vītikkamituṃ na labhantīti āha “vītikkamapaṭipakkhattā
analyzed: kilesā pariyuṭṭhitā api sīlabheda vasena vītikkamitum na labhanti iti āha vītikkama paṭipakkha ttā

original: sīlassā”ti. Pariyuṭṭhānappahānanti okāsadānavasena citte kusalappavattiṃ pariyādiyitvā
analyzed: sīlassa ati pariyuṭṭhāna pahānam ti okāsa dāna vasena citte kusala ppavattim

analyzed: samuppatti vasena ṭhānam pariyuṭṭhānam tassa pahānam anusaya ppahānam ti ariya maggena

original: appahīnabhāvena santāne kāraṇalābhe uppajjanārahā thāmagatā kāmarāgādayo satta kilesā
analyzed: appahīna bhāvena santāne kāraṇa lābhe uppajjana arahā kāma rāga ādayo satta kilesā

original: santāne anu anu sayanato anusayā nāma, tesaṃ pahānaṃ.
analyzed: santāne anu anu sayanataḥ anusayāḥ nāma tesam pahānam

original: Tadaṅgappahānanti tena tena dānasīlādikusalaṅgena tassa tassa akusalaṅgassa pahānaṃ
analyzed: tad aṅga pahānam ti tena tena dāna sīla ādi kusalaṅgena tassa tassa akusalaṅgassa pahānam

analyzed: tad aṅga pahānam duccarita saṃkilesassa pahānam ti kāya vacī duccaritam eva yattha uppajjati

original: taṃ santānaṃ sammā kileseti upatāpetīti saṃkileso, tassa tadaṅgavasena pahānaṃ. Samādhissa
analyzed: tam santānam sammā kileseti upatāpeti iti saṃkilesaḥ tassa tad aṅga vasena pahānam samādhissa

analyzed: kāma chanda paṭipakkha ttā suttanta piṭake taṇhā saṃkilesassa pahānam vuttam attā ādi suñña sabhāva dhamma ppakāsanato

original: abhidhammapiṭake diṭṭhisaṃkilesassa pahānaṃ vuttaṃ.
analyzed: abhidhammapiṭake diṭṭhi saṃkilesassa pahānam vuttaṃ

original: Ekamekasmiñcetthāti ettha etesu tīsu piṭakesu ekekasmiṃ piṭaketi attho. Dhammoti
analyzed: ekam ekasmin ca itthā ati ettha etesu tīsu piṭakesu eka ekasmin piṭaka iti atthaḥ dhammaḥ ti

original: pāḷīti ettha dhammassa sīlādivisiṭṭhatthayogato, buddhānaṃ sabhāvaniruttibhāvato
analyzed: ettha dhammassa sīla ādi visiṭṭha attha yogataḥ buddhānam sabhāva nirutti bhāvataḥ

original: ca pakaṭṭhānaṃ ukkaṭṭhānaṃ vacanappabandhānaṃ āḷi pantīti pāḷi, pariyattidhammo.

original: Sammutiparamatthabhedassa atthassa anurūpavācakabhāvena paramatthasaddesu ekantena

original: ca ko visesoti ce? Yathāvuttanayena manasā vavatthāpitadhammassa paresaṃ bodhanabhāvena
analyzed: ca kaḥ visesaḥ ti ce yathā vutta nayena manasā vavatthāpita dhammassa paresam bodhana bhāvena

original: atisajjanā vācāya pakāsanā “desanā”ti veditabbā. Tenāha – “desanāti tassā manasā
analyzed: atisajjanā vācāya pakāsanā desanā ati veditabbā tena āha desanā ati tassā manasā

original: vavatthāpitāya pāḷiyā desanā”ti. Tadubhayampi pana paramatthato saddo eva paramatthavinimuttāya
analyzed: vavatthāpitāya pāḷiyā desanā ati tat ubhayam pi pana paramatthato saddo eva paramattha vinimuttāya

original: sammutiyā abhāvā. Imameva nayaṃ gahetvā keci ācariyā “dhammo ca desanā ca paramatthato
analyzed: sammutiyāḥ abhāvā imam eva nayam gahetvā keci ācariyāḥ ca desanā ca paramatthato

original: vuccanti, evaṃsampadamidaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Na hi “kāmāvacarapaṭisandhivipākā nibbattitaparamatthavisayāyevā”ti

original: sakkā vattuṃ itthipurisādiākāraparivitakkapubbakānaṃ rāgādiakusalānaṃ mettādikusalānañca
analyzed: sakkā vattum itthi purisa ādi ākāra parivitakka pubbakānam rāga ādi akusalānam mettā ādi kusalānam ca

original: ārammaṇaṃ gahetvāpi samuppajjanato. Paramatthadhammamūlakattā panassa parikappassa
analyzed: ārammaṇam gahetvā api samuppajjanato paramattha dhamma mūlaka ttā panassa parikappassa

original: paramatthavisayatā sakkā paññapetuṃ, evamidhāpīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tīsupi cetesu ete dhammatthadesanāpaṭivedhā

original: gambhīrāti sambandho. Ettha ca piṭakāvayavānaṃ dhammādīnaṃ vuccamāno gambhīrabhāvo
analyzed: gambhīrā ati sambandhaḥ ettha ca piṭaka avayavānam dhamma ādīnam vuccamānaḥ gambhīra bhāvaḥ

original: cetaṃ bhummavacanaṃ.
analyzed: ca itam bhumma vacanam

original: Hetuno phalaṃ hetuphalaṃ. Dhammābhilāpoti atthabyañjanako aviparītābhilāpo. Visayato

original: iminā sambandho. Lokiyo hi dhammatthādiṃ ālambitvāva pavattanato visayato avabodhoti

analyzed: paññatti pathaḥ tassa anurūpam paññattīsu iti atthaḥ

original: Dhammajātanti kāraṇappabhedo kāraṇameva vā. Atthajātanti kāriyappabhedo, kāriyameva

analyzed: attho ettha ati etesu tīsu piṭakesu

analyzed: vattabbe alagaddo ti vuccati

original: Vaṭṭato nissaraṇaṃ attho payojanaṃ etissāti nissaraṇatthā. Bhaṇḍāgāriko viyāti bhaṇḍāgāriko,
analyzed: vaṭṭataḥ nissaraṇam atthaḥ payojanam etissa ati nissaraṇa atthā bhaṇḍāgārikaḥ viyā ti bhaṇḍāgārikaḥ

original: Idāni tīsu piṭakesu yathārahaṃ sampattivipattiyo niddhāretvā dassento āha vinaye

original: Katthaci pana “satta suttasahassāni, satta suttasatāni cā”ti pāṭho. Pubbe nidassitāti
analyzed: katthaci pana satta sutta sahassāni satta sutta satāni ca ati pāṭhaḥ pubbe nidassitā ati

original: suttantapiṭakaniddese nidassitā.

analyzed: vedanti ñāṇam tuṭṭhim ti pītim dhammakkhandha vasena ati dhamma rāsi vasena dvāsīti sahassāni

original: santikā tehiyeva desitāni dve sahassāni gaṇhiṃ. Meti mama hadaye, iti ānandatthero

original: attānaṃ niddisati. Ye dhammā mama hadaye pavattino, te caturāsītisahassānīti yojanā.

original: Idañca bhagavato dharamānakāle uggahitadhammakkhandhavasena vuttaṃ, parinibbute pana

original: caturāsītisahassatopi adhikatā veditabbā.

original: Ekānusandhikaṃ suttanti satipaṭṭhānādi. Anekānusandhikanti parinibbānasuttādi. Tañhi

original: nānāṭhānesu nānādhammadesanānaṃ vasena pavattaṃ. Tikadukabhājanaṃ dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṃ
analyzed: nānā ṭhānesu nānā dhamma desanānam vasena pavattam tika duka bhājanam dhammasaṅgaṇiyam

original: nikkhepakaṇḍa aṭṭhakathākaṇḍavasena gahetabbaṃ. Cittavārabhājananti idaṃ cittuppādakaṇḍavasena
analyzed: nikkhepa kaṇḍa aṭṭhakathā kaṇḍa vasena gahetabbam citta vāra bhājanan ti idam cittuppāda kaṇḍa vasena

original: vuttaṃ. Atthi vatthūtiādīsu vatthu nāma sudinnakaṇḍādi. Mātikāti sikkhāpadaṃ. Antarāpattīti
analyzed: vuttam atthi vatthu uti ādīsu vatthu nāma sudinna kaṇḍa ādi mātikā ati sikkhāpadam antarāpatti iti

original: sikkhāpadantaresu aññasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattā āpatti. Tikacchedoti tikapācittiyāditikaparicchedo.
analyzed: sikkhāpada antaresu aññasmin vatthusmin paññattā āpatti tika chedo ti tika pācittiyāt itika paricchedo

original: Buddhavacanaṃ saṅgahitanti sambandho. Assāti buddhavacanassa. Saṅgītipariyosāne sādhukāraṃ
analyzed: buddha vacanam saṅgahitanti sambandhaḥ assa ati buddha vacanassa saṅgīti pariyosāne sādhukāram

original: dadamānā viyāti sambandho. Accharaṃ paharituṃ yuttāni acchariyāni, pupphavassacelukkhepādīni.
analyzed: dadamānā viyā iti sambandhaḥ accharam paharitum yuttāni acchariyāni puppha vassa celu khepa ādīni

original: Yā “pañcasatā”ti ca “therikā”ti ca pavuccati, ayaṃ paṭhamamahāsaṅgīti nāmāti sambandho.
analyzed: yā pañca satā ati ca therikā ati ca pavuccati ayam paṭhama mahāsaṅgī iti nāma ati sambandho

original: Iti samantapāsādikāya vinayaṭṭhakathāya vimativinodaniyaṃ
analyzed: iti samantapāsādikāya vinaya ṭṭhakathāya

original: Paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikathāvaṇṇanānayo niṭṭhito.
Dutiyasaṅgītikathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: dutiya saṅgīti kathā vaṇṇanā

original: Evaṃ paṭhamamahāsaṅgītiṃ dassetvā yadatthaṃ sā idha dassitā, taṃ nigamanavasena dassento
analyzed: evam paṭhama mahā saṅgītim dassetvā yadattham sā idha dassitā tam nigamana vasena dassento

original: imissātiādimāha. Tatrāyaṃ ācariyaparamparāti tasmiṃ jambudīpe ayaṃ ācariyānaṃ paveṇī
analyzed: āha tatra ayam ācariya paramparā ti tasmin jambudīpe ayam paveṇī

original: paṭipāṭi. Vijitāvinoti vijitasabbakilesapaṭipakkhattā vijitavanto. Jambusirivhayeti
analyzed: vijitāvino ti vijita sabba kilesa paṭipakkha ttāḥ vijitavantaḥ jambu siri vhaya iti

original: jambusadiso sirimanto avhayo nāmaṃ yassa dīpassa, tasmiṃ jambudīpeti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: jambu sadisaḥ sirimantaḥ avhayaḥ nāmam yassa dīpassa tasmim jambudīpa iti vuttam hoti

original: Mahantena hi jamburukkhena abhilakkhitattā dīpopi “jambū”ti vuccati. Acchijjamānaṃ
analyzed: mahantena hi jambu rukkhena abhilakkhita ttā dīpaḥ api jambu iti vuccati acchijjamānam

original: avinassamānaṃ katvā. Vinayavaṃsantiādīhi tīhi vinayapāḷiyeva kathitā pariyāyavacanattā
analyzed: a vinassamānam katvā vinaya vaṃsanti ādīhi tīhi vinaya pāḷiyā iva kathitā pariyāya vacana ttā

original: tesaṃ. Pakataññutanti veyyattiyaṃ, paṭubhāvanti vuttaṃ hoti. Dhuraggāhoti padhānaggāhī,
analyzed: tesam pakataññutanti veyyattiyam paṭu bhāvanti vuttam hoti dhura ggāho ti padhāna ggāhī

original: sabbesaṃ pāmokkho hutvā gaṇhīti vuttaṃ hoti. Bhikkhūnaṃ samudāyo samūho bhikkhusamudāyo.
analyzed: sabbesam pāmokkhaḥ hutvā gaṇhi iti vuttam hoti bhikkhūnam samudāyaḥ samūhaḥ bhikkhu samudāyo

original: Yadāti nibbāyiṃsūti sambandho. Jotayitvā ca sabbadhīti tameva saddhammaṃ sabbattha
analyzed: yadā ati nibbāyiṃsu iti sambandhaḥ jotayitvā ca sabbadhi iti tam eva saddhammam sabbattha

original: pakāsayitvā. Jutimantoti paññājutiyā yuttā, tejavanto vā, mahānubhāvāti attho. Nibbāyiṃsūti
analyzed: pakāsayitvā jutimantaḥ ti paññā jutiyā yuttā tejavantaḥ vā mahā anubhāvā ti atthaḥ nibbāyiṃsu iti

original: anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā nibbāyiṃsu. Anālayāti asaṅgā.
analyzed: an upādisesāya nibbāna dhātuyā nibbāyiṃsu an ālayā ati asaṅgā

original: Athāti pacchā, yadā parinibbāyiṃsu, tato paranti attho. Kappati siṅgīloṇakappoti
analyzed: atha ati pacchā yadā parinibbāyiṃsu tatas paranti attho kappati siṅgīloṇa kappo ti

original: ettha kappa-saddo vikappattho, tena siṅgīloṇavikappopi kappati. Idampi pakkhantaraṃ
analyzed: ettha kappa saddaḥ vikappa atthaḥ tena siṅgīloṇa vikappaḥ api kappati idam pi pakkhantaram

original: kappatīti attho, evaṃ sabbattha. Tattha siṅgena loṇaṃ pariharitvā aloṇakapiṇḍapātena
analyzed: kappati iti atthaḥ evam sabbattha tattha siṅgena loṇam pariharitvā a loṇaka piṇḍapātena

original: saddhiṃ bhuñjituṃ kappati, sannidhiṃ na karotīti adhippāyo. Kappati dvaṅgulakappoti
analyzed: saddhim bhuñjitum kappati sannidhim na karoti iti adhippāyo kappati dvi aṅgula kappo ti

original: dvaṅgulaṃ atikkantāya chāyāya vikāle bhojanaṃ bhuñjituṃ kappatīti attho. Kappati
analyzed: dvaṅgulam atikkantāya chāyāya vikāle bhojanam bhuñjitum kappati iti attho kappati

original: gāmantarakappoti “gāmantaraṃ gamissāmī”ti pavāritena anatirittabhojanaṃ bhuñjituṃ
analyzed: gāmantara kappo ti gāmantaram gamissāmi iti pavāritena an atiritta bhojanam bhuñjitum

original: kappatīti attho. Kappati āvāsakappoti ekasīmāya nānāsenāsanesu visuṃ visuṃ uposathādīni
analyzed: kappati iti kappati āvāsa kappo ti eka sīmāya nānā senāsanesu visum visum uposatha ādīni

original: saṅghakammāni kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti attho. Kappati anumatikappoti “anāgatānaṃ āgatakāle
analyzed: saṅgha kammāni kātum vaṭṭati iti attho kappati anumati kappo ti anāgatānam āgata kāle

original: anumatiṃ gahessāmā”ti tesu anāgatesuyeva vaggena saṅghena kammaṃ katvā pacchā anumatiṃ
analyzed: anumatim gahessāma ati tesu vaggena saṅghena kammam katvā pacchā anumatim

original: gahetuṃ kappati, vaggakammaṃ na hotīti adhippāyo. Kappati āciṇṇakappoti ācariyupajjhāyehi
analyzed: gahetum kappati vagga kammam na hoti iti adhippāyaḥ kappati āciṇṇa kappo ti ācariya upajjhāyehi

original: āciṇṇo kappatīti attho. So pana ekacco kappati dhammiko, ekacco na kappati adhammikoti
analyzed: āciṇṇaḥ kappati iti attho so pana ekaccaḥ kappati dhammikaḥ ekaccaḥ na kappati adhammikaḥ ti

original: veditabbo. Kappati amathitakappoti yaṃ khīraṃ khīrabhāvaṃ vijahitaṃ dadhibhāvaṃ asampattaṃ,
analyzed: veditabbo kappati a mathita kappo ti yam khīram khīra bhāvam vijahitam dadhi bhāvam a sampattam

original: taṃ bhuttāvinā pavāritena anatirittaṃ bhuñjituṃ kappatīti attho. Kappati jaḷogiṃ
analyzed: tam bhuttāvinā pavāritena an atirittam bhuñjitum kappati iti kappati jaḷogiṃ

original: pātunti ettha jaḷogīti taruṇasurā, yaṃ majjasambhāraṃ ekato kataṃ majjabhāvamasampattaṃ,
analyzed: ettha taruṇa surā yam majja sambhāram katam

original: taṃ pātuṃ vaṭṭatīti adhippāyo. Jātarūparajatanti ettha sarasato vikāraṃ anāpajjitvā
analyzed: tam pātum vaṭṭati iti adhippāyaḥ ettha sarasataḥ vikāram an āpajjitvā

original: sabbadā jātarūpameva hotīti jātaṃ rūpaṃ etassāti jātarūpaṃ, suvaṇṇaṃ. Dhavalasabhāvatāya
analyzed: sabbadā jātarūpam eva hoti iti jātam rūpam etassa ati jātarūpam suvaṇṇam dhavala sabhāva tāya

original: rājatīti rajataṃ, rūpiyaṃ. Susunāgaputtoti susunāgassa putto. Kākaṇḍakaputtoti kākaṇḍakassa
analyzed: rājati iti rajatam rūpiyam susunāga putto ti susunāgassa putto kākaṇḍaka putto ti kākaṇḍakassa

original: brāhmaṇassa putto. Vajjīsūti janapadanāmattā bahuvacanaṃ kataṃ.
analyzed: brāhmaṇassa puttaḥ vajjīsu iti janapada nāmattā bahuvacanam katam

original: Tadahuposatheti ettha tadahūti tasmiṃ ahani. Upavasanti etthāti uposatho, upavasantīti
analyzed: tat ahu uposatha iti ettha tat ahu uti tasmin ahani upavasanti ettha ati uposathaḥ upavasanti iti

original: ca sīlasamādānena vā anasanādinā vā upetā hutvā vasantīti attho. Kaṃsapātinti suvaṇṇapātiṃ.
analyzed: ca sīla samādānena vā anasana ādinā vā upetāḥ hutvā vasanti iti attho kaṃsapātinti suvaṇṇa pātim

original: Māsakarūpanti māsako eva. Sabbaṃ tāva vattabbanti iminā sattasatikakkhandhake āgatā
analyzed: māsaka rūpam ti māsakaḥ eva sabbam tāva vattabbam ti iminā sattasatika khandhake āgatā

original: sabbāpi pāḷi idha ānetvā vattabbāti dasseti. Saṅgāyitasadisameva saṅgāyiṃsūti sambandho.
analyzed: sabbā api idha ānetvā vattabbā ati dasseti saṅgāyita sadisam eva saṅgāyiṃsu iti sambandhaḥ

original: Sā panāyaṃ saṅgītīti sambandho. Tesūti tesu saṅgītikārakesu theresu. Vissutā ete
analyzed: sā pana ayam saṅgītī iti sambandho tesu iti tesu saṅgīti kārakesu theresu vissutāḥ ete

original: saddhivihārikā ñeyyāti sambandho. Sāṇasambhūtoti sāṇadesavāsī sambhūtatthero. Dutiyo
analyzed: saddhivihārikā ñeyyā ati sambandho sāṇa sambhūtaḥ ti sāṇa desa vāsī sambhūta ttheraḥ dutiyaḥ

original: saṅgahoti sambandhitabbaṃ. Pannabhārāti patitakkhandhabhārā.
analyzed: saṅgahaḥ ti sambandhitabbam panna bhārā ati patita kkhandha bhārā

original: Abbudanti upaddavaṃ vadanti. “Bhagavato vacanaṃ thenetvā attano vacanassa dīpanato
analyzed: abbudanti upaddavam vadanti bhagavataḥ vacanam thenetvā attanaḥ vacanassa dīpanato

original: abbudanti corakamma”nti eke. Idanti vakkhamānanidassanaṃ. Sandissamānā mukhā sammukhā.
analyzed: cora kammanti eke idam ti vakkhamāna nidassanam sandissamānāḥ mukhā sammukhā

original: Bhāvitamagganti uppāditajjhānaṃ. Sādhu sappurisāti ettha sādhūti āyācanatthe nipāto,
analyzed: bhāvita maggam ti uppādita jhānam sādhu sappurisa ati ettha sādhu iti āyācana atthe nipātaḥ

original: taṃ yācāmīti attho. Haṭṭhapahaṭṭhoti punappunaṃ santuṭṭho. Udaggudaggoti sarīravikāruppādanapītivasena
analyzed: tam yācāmi iti attho haṭṭha pahaṭṭhaḥ iti punappunam santuṭṭhaḥ udagga udaggaḥ iti sarīra vikāra uppādana pīti vasena

original: udaggudaggo, pītimā hi puggalo kāyacittānaṃ uggatattā “udaggudaggo”ti vuccati.
analyzed: udaggu udaggo pītimā hi puggalo kāya cittānaṃ uggata ttā udaggu udaggo ti vuccati

original: Tena kho pana samayenāti yasmiṃ samaye dutiyaṃ saṅgītiṃ akariṃsu, tasmiṃ samayeti
analyzed: tena khalu pana samayena ati yasmin samaye dutiyam saṅgītim akariṃsu tasmin samaye iti

original: attho. Taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ na sampāpuṇiṃsūti taṃ vajjiputtakehi uppāditaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ
analyzed: atthaḥ tam adhikaraṇam na sampāpuṇiṃsu iti tam vajji puttakehi uppāditam adhikaraṇam

original: vinicchinituṃ na sampāpuṇiṃsu nāgamiṃsu. No ahuvatthāti sambandho. Yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā
analyzed: vinicchinitum na sampāpuṇiṃsu na āgamiṃsu na u ahuvattha iti sambandhaḥ yāvatā āyukam ṭhatvā

original: parinibbutāti sambandho. Kiṃ pana katvā therā parinibbutāti? Āha dutiyaṃ saṅgahaṃ
analyzed: parinibbutā iti sambandhaḥ kim pana katvā therā parinibbutā iti āha dutiyam saṅgaham

original: katvātiādi. Aniccatāvasanti aniccatādhīnataṃ. Jamminti lāmakaṃ. Durabhisambhavaṃ
analyzed: katvā ati ādi lāmakam durabhisambhavam

original: anabhibhavanīyaṃ atikkamituṃ asakkuṇeyyaṃ aniccataṃ evaṃ ñatvāti sambandho.
analyzed: an abhibhavanīyam atikkamitum a sakkuṇeyyam aniccatam evam ñatvā iti sambandhaḥ

original: Dutiyasaṅgītikathāvaṇṇanānayo niṭṭhito.
Tatiyasaṅgītikathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: tatiya saṅgīti kathā vaṇṇanā

original: Satta vassānīti accantasaṃyoge upayogavacanaṃ. Aticchathāti atikkamitvā icchatha,
analyzed: satta vassāni iti accanta saṃyoge upayoga vacanam aticchatha ati atikkamitvā icchatha

original: ito aññattha gantvā bhikkhaṃ pariyesathāti attho. Bhattavissaggakaraṇatthāyāti bhattassa
analyzed: itas aññattha gantvā bhikkham pariyesatha ati atthaḥ bhatta vissagga karaṇa tthāya ati bhattassa

original: ajjhoharaṇakiccatthāya, bhuñjanatthāyāti attho. “Soḷasavasso”ti uddeso kathanaṃ assa
analyzed: ajjhoharaṇa kicca atthāya bhuñjana tthāya ati attho soḷasa vassaḥ ti uddeso kathanam assa

original: atthīti soḷasavassuddesiko, “soḷasavassiko”ti attho.
analyzed: atthi iti soḷasa vassuddesiko soḷasa vassikaḥ ti attho

original: Tīsu vedesūtiādīsu iruvedayajuvedasāmavedasaṅkhātesu tīsu vedesu. Tayo eva kira vedā
analyzed: tīsu vedesu iti ādīsu iruveda yajuveda sāmaveda saṅkhātesu tīsu vedesu tayoḥ eva kira vedā

original: aṭṭhakādīhi dhammikehi isīhi lokassa saggamaggavibhāvanatthāya katā. Teneva hi te
analyzed: aṭṭhaka ādīhi dhammikehi isīhi lokassa sagga magga vibhāvana tthāya katā tena iva hi te

original: tehi vuccanti. Āthabbaṇavedo pana pacchā adhammikehi brāhmaṇehi pāṇavadhādiatthāya
analyzed: tehi vuccanti āthabbaṇa vedaḥ pana pacchā adhammikehi brāhmaṇehi pāṇa vadha ādi atthāya

original: kato. Purimesu ca tīsu vedesu teheva dhammikasākhāyo apanetvā yāgavadhādidīpikā adhammikasākhā
analyzed: kataḥ purimesu ca tīsu vedesu tehi iva dhammika sākhāyaḥ apanetvā yāga vadha ādi dīpikāḥ adhammika sākhā

original: pakkhittāti veditabbā. Nighaṇḍūti rukkhādīnaṃ vevacanappakāsakaṃ pariyāyanāmānurūpaṃ
analyzed: pakkhittā ati veditabbā nighaṇḍū ti rukkha ādīnam vevacana pakāsakam pariyāya nāma anurūpam

original: satthaṃ. Tañhi loke “nighaṇḍū”ti vuccati. Keṭubhanti kiṭati gameti kiriyādivibhāganti
analyzed: sattham tat hi loke nighaṇḍu iti vuccati keṭubhanti gameti kiriyā ādi vibhāganti

original: keṭubhaṃ, kiriyākappavikappo kavīnaṃ upakārasatthaṃ. Ettha ca kiriyākappavikappoti
analyzed: keṭubham kiriyā kappa vikappo kavīnam upakāra sattham ettha ca kiriyā kappa vikappo ti

original: vacībhedādilakkhaṇā kiriyā kappīyati vikappīyati etenāti kiriyākappo, so pana vaṇṇapadabandhapadatthādivibhāgato
analyzed: vacībheda ādi lakkhaṇā kiriyā kappīyati vikappīyati etena ati kiriyākappo so pana vaṇṇa pada bandha padattha ādi vibhāgato

original: bahuvikappoti “kiriyākappavikappo”ti vuccati. Idañca mūlakiriyākappaganthaṃ sandhāya
analyzed: bahu vikappo ti kiriyā kappa vikappo ti vuccati idam ca mūla kiriyā kappa gantham sandhāya

original: vuttaṃ. Saha nighaṇḍunā keṭubhena ca sanighaṇḍukeṭubhā, tayo vedā, tesu sanighaṇḍukeṭubhesu.
analyzed: vuttam saha nighaṇḍunā keṭubhena ca sa nighaṇḍu keṭubhā tayaḥ vedā tesu sa nighaṇḍu keṭubhesu

original: Ṭhānakaraṇādivibhāgato ca nibbacanavibhāgato ca akkharā pabhedīyanti etenāti akkharappabhedo,
analyzed: ṭhāna karaṇa ādi vibhāgataḥ ca nibbacana vibhāgataḥ ca akkharā etena ati akkharappabhedo

original: sikkhā ca nirutti ca. Saha akkharappabhedenāti sākkharappabhedā, tesu sākkharappabhedesu.
analyzed: sikkhā ca nirutti ca saha akkhara ppabhedena ati sākkhara ppabhedā tesu sākkhara ppabhedesu

original: Āthabbaṇavedaṃ catutthaṃ katvā “itiha āsa itiha āsā”ti īdisavacanapaṭisaṃyutto porāṇakathāsaṅkhāto
analyzed: āthabbaṇa vedam catuttham katvā iti ha āsa iti ha āsa ati īdisa vacana paṭisaṃyuttaḥ porāṇa kathā saṅkhāto

original: itihāso pañcamo etesanti itihāsapañcamā, tayo vedā, tesu itihāsapañcamesu.
analyzed: itihāsaḥ pañcamaḥ itihāsa pañcamā tayaḥ vedā tesu itihāsa pañcamesu

original: Yassa cittantiādi pañhadvayaṃ khīṇāsavānaṃ cuticittassa uppādakkhaṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
analyzed: yassa citta ntiādi pañha dvayam khīṇāsavānam cuti cittassa uppāda kkhaṇam sandhāya vuttam

original: Tattha paṭhamapañhe uppajjatīti uppādakkhaṇasamaṅgitāya uppajjati. Na nirujjhatīti
analyzed: tattha paṭhama pañhe uppajjati iti uppāda khaṇa samaṅgi tāya uppajjati na nirujjhati iti

original: nirodhakkhaṇaṃ appattatāya na nirujjhati. Tassa cittanti tassa puggalassa taṃ cittaṃ
analyzed: nirodha kkhaṇam appatta tāya na nirujjhati tassa cittam ti tassa puggalassa tam cittam

original: kiṃ nirujjhissati āyatiñca nuppajjissatīti pucchā, tassā ca vibhajjabyākaraṇīyatāya
analyzed: kim nirujjhissati āyatim ca nu pajjissati iti pucchā tassā ca vibhajja byākaraṇīya tāya

original: evamettha vissajjanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Arahato pacchimacittassa uppādakkhaṇe tassa cittaṃ
analyzed: evam ettha vissajjanam veditabbam arahataḥ pacchima cittassa uppāda kkhaṇe tassa cittam

original: uppajjati, na nirujjhati, āyatiñca nuppajjissati, avassameva nirodhakkhaṇaṃ patvā
analyzed: uppajjati na nirujjhati āyatim ca na uppajjissati avassam eva nirodha kkhaṇam patvā

original: nirujjhissati, tato appaṭisandhikattā aññaṃ nuppajjissati. Ṭhapetvā pana pacchimacittasamaṅgiṃ
analyzed: nirujjhissati tatas appaṭisandhika ttā aññam nuppajjissati ṭhapetvā pana pacchimacitta samaṅgiṃ

original: khīṇāsavaṃ itaresaṃ uppādakkhaṇasamaṅgicittaṃ uppādakkhaṇasamaṅgitāya uppajjati bhaṅgaṃ
analyzed: khīṇāsavam itaresam uppāda khaṇa samaṅgi cittam uppāda khaṇa samaṅgi tāya uppajjati bhaṅgam

original: appattatāya na nirujjhati, bhaṅgaṃ pana patvā nirujjhissateva, aññaṃ pana tasmiṃ

original: bahubhāvato āha “ārakkhaṃ saṃvidhāyā”ti. Yanti yasmā. Abbāhiṃsūti ākaḍḍhiṃsu. Bāhiratoti
