original: raṃsiyo cā”ti ajjhāharitabbaṃ, “channaṃ vaṇṇānaṃ udakadhārā cā”ti evampettha sambandhaṃ
analyzed: raṃsiyaḥ ca ati ajjhāharitabbam channam vaṇṇānam udaka dhārā ca ati evam pi ittha sambandham

original: vadanti. Parinibbutepi bhagavati tassānubhāvena evarūpaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ ahosi evāti
analyzed: vadanti parinibbute api bhagavati tassa anubhāvena evarūpam pāṭihāriyam ahosi eva ati

original: dassetuṃ evaṃ acintiyātiādigāthamāha. Rakkhaṃ karontoti attanā upāyena palāpitānaṃ
analyzed: dassetum evam acintiyā ti ādi gātham āha rakkham karontaḥ ti attanā upāyena palāpitānam

original: yakkhānaṃ puna appavisanatthāya parittānaṃ karonto. Āvijjīti pariyāyi.
analyzed: yakkhānam puna a pavisana thāya parittānam karontaḥ āvijji iti pariyāyi

original: Rañño bhātāti rañño kaniṭṭhabhātā. Anuḷādevī nāma rañño jeṭṭhabhātu jāyā. Sarasaraṃsijālavissajjanakenāti
analyzed: raññaḥ bhātā ati raññaḥ kaniṭṭha bhātā anuḷādevī nāma raññaḥ jeṭṭha bhātu jāyā sarasa raṃsi jāla vissajjanakena ati

original: siniddhatāya rasavantaṃ ojavantaṃ raṃsijālaṃ vissajjentena. Ekadivasena agamāsīti
analyzed: sinidh hatāya rasavantam ojavantam raṃsi jālam vissajjentena eka divasena agamāsi iti

original: sambandho. Appesīti lekhasāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi. Udikkhatīti apekkhati pattheti. Bhāriyanti
analyzed: sambandhaḥ appesi iti lekha sāsanam patiṭṭhāpesi udikkhati iti apekkhati pattheti bhāriyanti

original: garukaṃ, anatikkamanīyanti attho. Maṃ paṭimānetīti maṃ udikkhati. Kammāravaṇṇanti
analyzed: garukam an atikkamanīyanti atthaḥ mam paṭimāneti iti mam udikkhati kammāravaṇṇanti

original: rañño pakatisuvaṇṇakāravaṇṇaṃ. Tihatthavikkhambhanti tihatthavitthāraṃ. Sakalajambudīparajjenāti
analyzed: raññaḥ pakati suvaṇṇa kāravaṇṇam ti hattha vikkhambhanti ti hattha vitthāram sakala jambudīpa rajjena ati

original: ettha rañño idanti rajjaṃ, sakalajambudīpato uppajjanakaāyo ceva āṇādayo ca, tena
analyzed: ettha rañño idam ti rajjam sakala jambudīpataḥ uppajjana ka āyo ca iva āṇa ādayaḥ ca tena

original: pūjemīti attho, na sakalapathavīpāsādādivatthunā tassa sattāhaṃ demītiādinā kālaparicchedaṃ
analyzed: pūjemi iti atthaḥ na sakala pathavī pāsāda ādi vatthunā tassa sattā aham demi iti ādinā kāla paricchedam

original: katvā dātuṃ ayuttattā. Evañhi dento tāvakālikaṃ deti nāma vatthupariccāgalakkhaṇattā
analyzed: katvā dātum ayutta ttā evam hi dentaḥ tāvakālikam deti nāma vatthu pariccāga lakkhaṇa ttā

original: dānassa, pathavādivatthupariccāgena ca puna gahaṇassa ayuttattā. Niyamitakāle pana
analyzed: dānassa pathavā ādi vatthu pariccāgena ca puna gahaṇassa ayutta ttā niyamita kāle pana

original: āyādayo pariccattā evāti tato paraṃ apariccattattā gahetuṃ vaṭṭati. Tasmā vuttanayenettha
analyzed: āya ādayo pariccattāḥ eva ati tato param a pariccatta tā gahetum vaṭṭati tasmā vutta nayena ittha

original: ito parampi āyādidānavaseneva rajjadānaṃ veditabbaṃ. Pupphuḷakā hutvāti ketakīpārohaṅkurā
analyzed: itas param pi āya ādi dāna vasena iva rajja dānam veditabbam pupphuḷakāḥ hutvā ati ketakī pārohaṅkurā

original: viya udakapupphuḷakākārā hutvā. Gavakkhajālasadisanti bhāvanapuṃsakaṃ, vātapānesu
analyzed: viya udaka pupphuḷaka ākārāḥ hutvā gavakkha jāla sadisanti bhāva napuṃsakam vāta pānesu

original: jālākārena ṭhapitadārupaṭasadisanti attho, gavakkhena ca suttādimayajālena ca sadisanti vā attho.
analyzed: jāla ākārena ṭhapita dāru paṭa sadisanti attho gavakkhena ca sutta ādi maya jālena ca sadisanti vā

original: Devadundubhiyoti ettha devoti megho, tassa acchasukkhatāya ākāsamiva khāyamānassa
analyzed: deva dundubhiyā iti ettha devo ti megho tassa accha sukkha tāya ākāsam iva khāyamānassa

original: animittagajjitaṃ devadundubhi nāma, yaṃ “ākāsadundubhī”tipi vadanti. Phaliṃsūti thaniṃsu.
analyzed: devadundubhi nāma yam vadanti

original: Pabbatānaṃ naccehīti pathavīkampena ito cito ca bhamantānaṃ pabbatānaṃ naccehi. Vimhayajātā
analyzed: pabbatānam naccehi iti pathavī kampena itas citas ca bhamantānam pabbatānam naccehi vimhaya jātā

original: yakkhā “hi”ntisaddaṃ nicchārentīti āha “yakkhānaṃ hiṅkārehī”ti. Sakasakapaṭibhānehīti
analyzed: yakkhāḥ hinti saddam nicchārenti iti āha yakkhānam hiṅkārehi iti saka saka paṭibhānehi iti

original: attano attano sippakosallehi. Abhisekaṃ datvāti anotattadahodakena abhisekaṃ datvā.
analyzed: attanaḥ attanaḥ sippa kosallehi abhisekam datvā ati anotatta daha udakena abhisekam datvā

original: Devatākulānīti mahābodhiṃ parivāretvā ṭhitanāgayakkhādidevatākulāni datvāti sambandho.
analyzed: devatā kulāni iti mahā bodhim parivāretvā ṭhita nāga yakkha ādi devatā kulāni da tvā iti sambandhaḥ

original: Gopakarājakammino tathā “taracchā”ti vadanti. Iminā parivārenāti sahatthe karaṇavacanaṃ,
analyzed: tathā vadanti iminā parivārena ati sahatthe karaṇa vacanam

original: iminā parivārena sahāti attho. Tāmalittinti evaṃnāmakaṃ samuddatīre paṭṭanaṃ. Idamassa
analyzed: iminā parivārena saha ati evaṃnāmakam samudda tīre paṭṭanam idam assa

original: tatiyanti suvaṇṇakaṭāhe patiṭṭhitasākhābodhiyā rajjasampadānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tato
analyzed: tatiyam ti suvaṇṇa kaṭāhe patiṭṭhita sākhābodhiyā rajja sampadānam sandhāya vuttam tatas

original: pana pubbe ekavāraṃ rajjasampadānaṃ acchinnāya sākhāya mahābodhiyā eva kataṃ, tena
analyzed: pana pubbe eka vāram rajja sampadānam acchinnāya sākhāya mahābodhiyai eva katam tena

original: saddhiṃ catukkhattuṃ rājā rajjena pūjesi. Rajjena pūjitadivasesu kira sakaladīpato
analyzed: saddhim catukkhattum rājā rajjena pūjesi rajjena pūjita divasesu kira sakala dīpataḥ

original: uppannaṃ āyaṃ gahetvā mahābodhimeva pūjesi.
analyzed: uppannam āyam gahetvā mahā bodhim eva pūjesi

original: Paṭhamapāṭipadadivaseti sukkapakkhapāṭipadadivase. Tañhi kaṇhapakkhapāṭipadadivasaṃ
analyzed: paṭhama pāṭipada divase ti sukka pakkha pāṭipada divase tat hi kaṇha pakkha pāṭipada divasam

original: apekkhitvā “paṭhamapāṭipadadivasa”nti vuttaṃ, idañca tasmiṃ tambapaṇṇidīpe vohāraṃ
analyzed: apekkhitvā paṭhama pāṭipada divasan ti vuttam idam ca tasmin tamba paṇṇi dīpe vohāram

original: gahetvā vuttaṃ, idha pana puṇṇamito paṭṭhāya yāva aparā puṇṇamī, tāva eko māsoti
analyzed: gahetvā vuttam idha pana puṇṇamitaḥ paṭṭhāya yāva aparā puṇṇamī tāva ekaḥ māso ti

original: vohāro. Tasmā iminā vohārena “dutiyapāṭipadadivase”ti vattabbaṃ siyā kaṇhapakkhapāṭipadassa
analyzed: vohāro tasmai iminā vohārena dutiya pāṭipada divase ti vattabbam siyā kaṇha pakkha pāṭipadassa

original: idha paṭhamapāṭipadattā. Gacchati vatareti ettha areti khede. Samantāyojananti accantasaṃyoge
analyzed: gacchati gacchati ettha ara iti khede

original: upayogavacanaṃ, yojanappamāṇe padese sabbatthāti attho. Supaṇṇarūpenāti mahābodhiṃ
analyzed: upayoga vacanam yojana ppamāṇe padese sabbattha ati attho su paṇṇa rūpena ati mahā bodhim

original: balakkārena gahetvā nāgabhavanaṃ netukāmāni nāgarājakulāni iddhiyā gahitena garuḷarūpena
analyzed: balakkārena gahetvā nāga bhavanam netu kāmāni nāga rāja kulāni iddhiyā gahitena garuḷa rūpena

original: santāseti. Taṃ vibhūtiṃ passitvāti devatādīhi karīyamānaṃ pūjāmahattaṃ, mahābodhiyā
analyzed: santāseti tam vibhūtim passitvā iti devatā ādīhi karīyamānam pūjā mahattam mahā bodhiyā

original: ca ānubhāvamahattaṃ disvā sayampi tathā pūjetukāmā theriṃ yācitvāti yojanā. Samuddasālavatthusminti
analyzed: ca ānubhāva mahattam disvā sayam pi tathā pūjetu kāmā therim yācitvā iti yojanā samudda sāla vatthusmin ti

original: yasmiṃ padese ṭhatvā rājā samudde āgacchantaṃ bodhiṃ therānubhāvena addasa, yattha
analyzed: yasmin padese ṭhatvā rājā samudde āgacchantam bodhim thera anubhāvena addasa yattha

original: ca pacchā samuddassa diṭṭhaṭṭhānanti pakāsetuṃ samuddasālaṃ nāma sālaṃ akaṃsu, tasmiṃ

original: samuddasālāya vatthubhūte padese. Therassāti mahāmahindattherassa. Pupphaagghiyānīti
analyzed: samudda sālāya vatthu bhūte padese therassa ati mahā mahinda therassa puppha agghiyāni iti

original: kūṭāgārasadisāni pupphacetiyāni. Āgato vatareti ettha areti pamode. Aṭṭhahi amaccakulehi
analyzed: kūṭāgāra sadisāni puppha cetiyāni āgataḥ vatare ti ettha are ti pamode aṭṭhahi amacca kulehi

original: aṭṭhahi brāhmaṇakulehi cāti soḷasahi jātisampannakulehi. Rajjaṃ vicāresīti rajjaṃ
analyzed: aṭṭhahi brāhmaṇa kulehi ca ati soḷasahi jāti sampanna kulehi rajjam vicāresi iti rajjam

original: vicāretuṃ vissajjesi. Rājavatthudvārakoṭṭhakaṭṭhāneti rājuyyānassa dvārakoṭṭhakaṭṭhāne.
analyzed: vicāretum vissajjesi rāja vatthu dvāra koṭṭhaka ṭṭhāne iti rāja uyyānassa dvāra koṭṭhaka ṭṭhāne

original: Anupubbavipassananti udayabbayādianupubbavipassanaṃ. “Saha bodhipatiṭṭhānenā”ti karaṇavacanena
analyzed: anupubba vipassanam ti udaya bbaya ādi anupubba vipassanam saha bodhi patiṭṭhānena ati karaṇavacanena

original: vattabbe vibhattipariṇāmena “saha bodhipatiṭṭhānā”ti nissakkavacanaṃ kataṃ. Sati
analyzed: vattabbe vibhatti pariṇāmena saha bodhi patiṭṭhānā iti nissakka vacanam katam sati

original: hi sahasaddappayoge karaṇavacaneneva bhavitabbaṃ. Dassiṃsūti paññāyiṃsu. Mahāāsanaṭṭhāneti
analyzed: hi saha sadda payoge karaṇa vacanena iva bhavitabbam dassiṃsu iti paññāyiṃsu mahā āsana ṭṭhāne iti

original: pubbapasse mahāsilāsanena patiṭṭhitaṭṭhāne. Pūjetvā vandīti āgāminaṃ mahācetiyaṃ
analyzed: pubba passe mahā silāsanena patiṭṭhita ṭṭhāne pūjetvā vandīti āgāminam mahācetiyam

original: vandi. Purime pana mahāvihāraṭṭhāne pūjāmattasseva katattā anāgate saṅghassapi navakatā
analyzed: purime pana mahā vihāra ṭṭhāne pūjā mattassa iva kata ttā anāgate saṅghassa api

original: avanditabbatā ca pakāsitāti veditabbā. Anāgate pana metteyyādibuddhā paccekabuddhā
analyzed: a vanditabba tā ca pakāsitā ati veditabbā anāgate pana metteyya ādi buddhā paccekabuddhā

original: ca buddhabhāvakkhaṇaṃ uddissa vanditabbāva sabhāvena visiṭṭhapuggalattāti gahetabbaṃ.
analyzed: ca buddha bhāva kkhaṇam uddissa vanditabbā ava sabhāvena visiṭṭha puggala ttā ati gahetabbam

original: Mahāariṭṭhoti pañcapaññāsāya bhātukehi saddhiṃ cetiyagirimhi pabbajitaṃ sandhāya
analyzed: mahāariṭṭho ti pañcapaññāsāya bhātukehi saddhim cetiyagirimhi pabbajitam sandhāya

original: vuttaṃ. Meghavaṇṇābhayaamaccassa pariveṇaṭṭhāneti meghavaṇṇaabhayassa rañño amaccena
analyzed: vuttam meghavaṇṇa abhaya amaccassa pariveṇa ṭṭhāne iti meghavaṇṇa abhayassa raññaḥ amaccena

original: kattabbassa pariveṇassa vatthubhūte ṭhāne. Maṅgalanimittabhāvena ākāse samuppanno
analyzed: kattabbassa pariveṇassa vatthu bhūte ṭhāne maṅgala nimitta bhāvena ākāse samuppanno

original: manoharasaddo ākāsassa ravo viya hotīti vuttaṃ “ākāsaṃ mahāviravaṃ ravī”ti. Na hi
analyzed: manohara saddaḥ ākāsassa ravaḥ viya hoti iti vuttam ākāsam mahā viravam ravīti na hi

original: ākāso nāma koci dhammo atthi, yo saddaṃ samuṭṭhāpeyya, ākāsagatautuvisesasamuṭṭhitova
analyzed: ākāsaḥ nāma koci dhammaḥ atthi yaḥ saddam samuṭṭhāpeyya ākāsa gata otu visesa samuṭṭhitaḥ va

original: so saddoti gahetabbo. Paṭhamakattikapavāraṇadivase…pe… vinayapiṭakaṃ pakāsesīti idaṃ
analyzed: so saddo ti gahetabbo vinaya piṭakam pakāsesi iti idam

original: vinayaṃ vācetuṃ āraddhadivasaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Anusiṭṭhikarānanti anusāsanīkarānaṃ.
analyzed: vinayam vācetum āraddha divasam sandhāya vuttam

original: Rājinoti upayogatthe sāmivacanaṃ, devānaṃpiyatissarājānanti attho. Aññepīti mahindādīhi
analyzed: rājino ti upayoga atthe sāmi vacanam atthaḥ aññe pi iti mahinda ādīhi

original: aṭṭhasaṭṭhimahātherehi aññepi, tesaṃ sarūpaṃ dassento āha tesaṃ therānantiādi. Tattha
analyzed: aṭṭha saṭṭhi mahātherehi aññe pi tesam sarūpam dassentaḥ āha tesam therānaṃ anti ādi tattha

original: tesaṃ therānaṃ antevāsikāti mahindattherādīnaṃ aṭṭhasaṭṭhimahātherānaṃ ariṭṭhādayo
analyzed: tesam therānam antevāsika ati mahinda thera ādīnam aṭṭha saṭṭhi mahā therānam ariṭṭha ādayaḥ

original: antevāsikā ca mahāariṭṭhattherassa antevāsikā tissadattakāḷasumanādayo cāti yojetabbaṃ.
analyzed: antevāsikā ca mahāariṭṭha therassa antevāsikā tissadatta kāḷasumana ādayo ca ati yojetabbam

original: Antevāsikānaṃ antevāsikāti ubhayattha vuttaantevāsikānaṃ antevāsikaparamparā cāti
analyzed: antevāsikānam antevāsikā iti ubhayattha vutta antevāsikānam antevāsika paramparā ca ati

original: attho. Pubbe vuttappakārāti mahindo iṭṭiyo uttiyotiādigāthāhi pakāsitā ācariyaparamparā.
analyzed: atthaḥ pubbe vutta ppakārā ti mahindaḥ iṭṭiyaḥ uttiyaḥ ti ādi gāthāhi pakāsitā ācariya paramparā

original: Na paggharatīti na gaḷati, na pamussatīti attho. Satigatidhitimantesūti ettha satīti
analyzed: na paggharati iti na gaḷati na pamussati iti attho sati gati dhiti mantesu ti ettha satī iti

original: uggahadhāraṇe sati. Gatīti saddatthavibhāgaggahaṇe ñāṇaṃ. Dhitīti uggahapariharaṇādīsu
analyzed: uggaha dhāraṇe sati gatī iti saddattha vibhāga ggahaṇe ñāṇam dhitī iti uggaha pariharaṇa ādīsu

original: vīriyaṃ. Kukkuccakesūti “kappati na kappatī”ti vīmaṃsakukkuccakārīsu. Mātāpituṭṭhāniyoti
analyzed: vīriyam kukkuccakesu iti kappati na kappati iti vīmaṃsa kukkuccakārīsu mātā pitu ṭṭhāniyā ti

original: vatvā tamevatthaṃ samatthetuṃ āha tadāyattāhītiādi. Vinayapariyattiṃ nissāyāti vinayapiṭakapariyāpuṇanaṃ
analyzed: vatvā tam evattham samatthetum āha vinaya pariyattim nissāya ati vinaya piṭaka pariyāpuṇanam

original: nissāya. Attano sīlakkhandho suguttoti lajjino vinayadhāraṇassa alajjiaññāṇatādīhi
analyzed: nissāya attano sīlakkhandho su gutto ti lajjinaḥ vinaya dhāraṇassa a lajji aññāṇa tā ādīhi

original: chahi ākārehi āpattiyā anāpajjanato attano sīlakkhandho khaṇḍādidosavirahito sugutto
analyzed: chahi ākārehi āpattiyāḥ an āpajjanataḥ attano sīla kkhandho khaṇḍa ādi dosa virahitaḥ su gutto

original: surakkhito hoti. Kukkuccapakatānanti kappiyākappiyaṃ nissāya uppannena kukkuccena
analyzed: su rakkhitaḥ hoti kukkucca pakatānanti kappiya akappiyam nissāya uppannena kukkuccena

original: pakatānaṃ upaddutānaṃ abhibhūtānaṃ yathāvinayaṃ kukkuccaṃ vinodetvā suddhante patiṭṭhāpanena
analyzed: pakatānam upaddutānam abhibhūtānam yathāvinayam kukkuccam vinodetvā suddhante patiṭṭhāpanena

original: paṭisaraṇaṃ hoti. Vigato sārado bhayametassāti visārado. “Evaṃ kathentassa doso evaṃ
analyzed: paṭisaraṇam hoti vigataḥ sāradaḥ bhayam etassa ati visāradaḥ evam kathentassa doso evam

original: na doso”ti ñatvāva kathanato nibbhayova saṅghamajjhe voharati. Paccatthiketi attapaccatthike
analyzed: na doso ti ñatvā ava kathanataḥ nibbhayaḥ uva saṅgha majjhe voharati paccatthike iti atta paccatthike

original: ceva vajjiputtakādisāsanapaccatthike ca. Sahadhammenāti sakāraṇena vacanena sikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: ca iva vajji puttaka ādi sāsana paccatthike ca sahadhammena ati sa kāraṇena vacanena sikkhāpadam

original: dassetvā yathā te asaddhammaṃ patiṭṭhāpetuṃ na sakkonti, evaṃ suniggahitaṃ katvā
analyzed: dassetvā yathā te asat dhammam patiṭṭhāpetum na sakkonti evam su niggahitam katvā

original: niggaṇhāti. Saddhammaṭṭhitiyāti pariyattipaṭipattipaṭivedhasaṅkhātassa tividhassāpi
analyzed: niggaṇhāti saddhamma ṭṭhitiyā ti pariyatti paṭipatti paṭivedha saṅkhātassa tividhassa api

original: saddhammassa ṭhitiyā, pavattiyāti attho.
analyzed: saddhammassa ṭhitiyā pavattiyā ati attho

original: Vinayo saṃvaratthāyātiādīsu vinayapariyāpuṇanaṃ vinayo, vinayapaññatti vā kāyavacīdvārasaṃvaratthāya.
analyzed: vinayaḥ saṃvara tthāya ati ādīsu vinaya pariyāpuṇanam vinayaḥ vinaya paññatti vā kāya vacī dvāra saṃvara tthāya

original: Avippaṭisāroti katākataṃ nissāya vippaṭisārābhāvo santāpābhāvo. Pāmojjaṃ taruṇapīti.
analyzed: a vippaṭisāro ti kata akatam nissāya vippaṭisāra abhāvo santāpa abhāvo pāmojjam

original: Pīti nāma balavapīti. Passaddhīti kāyacittapassaddhi. Yathābhūtañāṇadassananti sappaccayanāmarūpapariggaho.
analyzed: nāma balava pīti passaddhī iti kāya citta passaddhi yathā bhūta ñāṇa dassanan ti sappaccaya nāma rūpa pariggaho

original: Nibbidāti vipassanā. Virāgoti ariyamaggo. Vimuttīti aggaphalaṃ. Vimuttiñāṇadassananti
analyzed: nibbidā ati vipassanā virāgaḥ oti ariya maggo vimutti iti agga phalam vimutti ñāṇa dassananti

original: paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ. Anupādāti kañci dhammaṃ anupādiyitvā pariccajitvā. Parinibbānatthāyāti
analyzed: paccavekkhaṇa ñāṇam an upādāti kañci dhammam an upādiyitvā pariccajitvā parinibbāna tthāya ati

original: paccavekkhaṇañāṇe anuppanne antarā parinibbānābhāvena taṃparinibbānatthāyāti paccayattena
analyzed: paccavekkhaṇa ñāṇe anuppanne antarā parinibbāna abhāvena tad parinibbāna atthāya ati paccayattena

original: vuttaṃ anantarādipaccayattā. Etadatthā kathāti ayaṃ vinayakathā nāma etassa anupādāparinibbānassa
analyzed: vuttam anantara ādi paccaya ttā etad atthā kathā ati ayam vinaya kathā nāma etassa anupādā parinibbānassa

original: atthāyāti attho. Mantanāti vinayamantanāyeva, bhikkhūnaṃ “evaṃ karissāma, evaṃ na
analyzed: atthāya ati atthaḥ mantanā ati vinaya mantanāya iva bhikkhūnam evam karissāma evam na

original: karissāmā”ti vinayapaṭibaddhamantanā. Upanisāti upanisīdati ettha phalanti upanisā,
analyzed: karissāma ati vinaya paṭibaddha mantanā upanisā ti upanisīdati ettha phalanti upanisā

original: kāraṇaṃ. Vinayo saṃvaratthāyātiādikāraṇaparamparāpi etadatthāti attho. Sotāvadhānanti
analyzed: kāraṇam vinayaḥ saṃvara tthāya ati ādi kāraṇa paramparā api

original: imissā paramparapaccayakathāya attānaṃ samanatthāya sotāvadhānaṃ, tampi etamatthaṃ.
analyzed: imissā parampara paccaya kathāya attānam samana tthāya sotāvadhānam tam pi etam attham

original: Yadidanti nipāto. Yo ayaṃ catūhi upādānehi anupādiyitvā cittassa arahattamaggasaṅkhāto,
analyzed: yat idam ti nipātaḥ yaḥ ayam catūhi upādānehi an upādiyitvā cittassa arahatta magga saṅkhāto

original: tapphalasaṅkhāto vā vimokkho, sopi etadatthāya anupādāparinibbānatthāya. Atha vā
analyzed: tad phala saṅkhātaḥ vā vimokkhaḥ saḥ api etad atthāya anupādā parinibbāna tthāya atha vā

original: yo ayaṃ kañci dhammaṃ anupādācittassa vimokkho vimuccanaṃ vigamo parinibbānaṃ etadatthā
analyzed: yaḥ ayam kañci dhammam an upādā cittassa vimokkhaḥ vimuccanam vigamaḥ parinibbānam etad atthā

original: kathāti evaṃ upasaṃharaṇavasena yojetumpi vaṭṭati maggaphalavimokkhassa pubbe vuttattā.
analyzed: kathā iti evam upasaṃharaṇa vasena yojetum pi vaṭṭati magga phala vimokkhassa pubbe vutta ttā

original: Āyogoti uggahaṇādivasena punappunaṃ abhiyogo.
analyzed: āyogaḥ ti uggahaṇa ādi vasena punappunam abhiyogaḥ

original: Ācariyaparamparakathāvaṇṇanānayo niṭṭhito.
analyzed: ācariya parampara kathā vaṇṇanā nayaḥ niṭṭhito

original: Iti samantapāsādikāya vinayaṭṭhakathāya vimativinodaniyaṃ
analyzed: iti samantapāsādikāya vinaya ṭṭhakathāya

original: Bāhiranidānakathāvaṇṇanānayo niṭṭhito.
Verañjakaṇḍavaṇṇanā
analyzed: verañja kaṇḍa vaṇṇanā

original: Seyyathidanti taṃ katamaṃ, taṃ kathanti vā attho. Aniyamaniddesavacananti attano
analyzed: tam katamam tam kathanti vā atthaḥ aniyama niddesa vacananti attanaḥ

original: atthaṃ sarūpena niyametvā niddisatīti niyamaniddeso, na niyamaniddeso aniyamaniddeso.
analyzed: attham sarūpena niyametvā niddisati iti niyama niddesaḥ na niyama niddesaḥ a niddesaḥ

original: Sova vuccate anenāti vacananti aniyamaniddesavacanaṃ. Tassāti tenātipadassa. Parivitakkoti
analyzed: so uva vuccate anena ati vacanan ti aniyama niddesa vacanam tassa ati tena ati padassa parivitakkoti

original: “katamesānaṃ kho buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ brahmacariyaṃ na ciraṭṭhitikaṃ ahosī”tiādinā
analyzed: katamesānam kho buddhānam bhagavantānam brahmacariyam na cira ṭṭhitikam ahosi itiādinā

original: pavatto. Pubbe vā pacchā vāti tenātipadato heṭṭhā vuttapāṭhe vā upari vakkhamānapāṭhe
analyzed: pavattaḥ pubbe vā pacchā vā ti tena atipadataḥ heṭṭhā vutta pāṭhe vā upari vakkhamāna pāṭhe

original: vāti attho. Atthato siddhenāti sāmatthiyato siddhena. Tatridaṃ mukhamattanidassananti
analyzed: vā ti atthaḥ atthataḥ siddhena ati sāmatthiyataḥ siddhena tatra idam mukha matta nidassanan ti

original: tassā yathāvuttayuttiyā paridīpane idaṃ upāyamattanidassanaṃ. Mukhaṃ dvāraṃ upāyoti hi atthato ekaṃ.
analyzed: tassāḥ yathā vutta yuttiyā paridīpane idam upāya matta nidassanam mukham dvāram upāyo ti hi atthataḥ ekam

original: Samayasaddo dissatīti sambandho. Assāti samayasaddassa samavāyo atthoti sambandho.
analyzed: samaya saddaḥ dissati iti sambandhaḥ assa ati samaya saddassa samavāyaḥ attho ti sambandhaḥ

original: Kālañca samayañca upādāyāti ettha kālo nāma upasaṅkamanassa yuttakālo, samayo nāma
analyzed: kālañca samayañca upādāya ati ettha kālaḥ nāma upasaṅkamanassa yutta kālaḥ samayaḥ nāma

original: sarīrabalādikāraṇasamavāyo, te upādāya paṭiccāti attho. Khaṇoti okāso. Buddhuppādādayo
analyzed: sarīra bala ādi kāraṇa samavāyaḥ te upādāya paṭicca ati attho khaṇoti okāsaḥ buddhuppāda ādayo

original: hi maggabrahmacariyassa okāso. So eva samayo. Teneva “ekovā”ti vuttaṃ. Mahāsamayoti
analyzed: hi magga brahmacariyassa okāso saḥ eva samayo tena iva ekaḥ uva ati vuttam mahāsamayo ti

original: mahāsamūho. Pavanasminti vanasaṇḍe. Samayopi kho te bhaddālīti ettha samayoti sikkhāpadāvilaṅghanassa
analyzed: mahā samūhaḥ pavanasmin ti vana saṇḍe samayaḥ api kho te bhaddāli iti ettha samayaḥ ti sikkhāpada avilaṅghanassa

original: hetu, ko so? Attano vippaṭipattiyā bhagavato jānanaṃ, so samayasaṅkhāto hetu tassā
analyzed: hetu kaḥ so attanaḥ vippaṭipattiyā bhagavataḥ jānanaṃ so samaya saṅkhātaḥ hetu tassā

original: appaṭividdhoti attho. Bhagavātiādi tassa paṭivijjhanākāradassanaṃ. Uggahamānoti kiñci
analyzed: appaṭividdhaḥ ti atthaḥ bhagavā itiādi tassa paṭivijjhana ākāra dassanam uggahamānaḥ iti kiñci

original: kiñci uggahetuṃ samatthatāya uggahamāno, sumanaparibbājakassevetaṃ nāmaṃ. Samayaṃ
analyzed: kiñci uggahetum samattha tāya uggahamānaḥ sumana paribbājakassa iva etam nāmam samayam

original: diṭṭhiṃ pavadanti etthāti samayappavādako, mallikāya ārāmo. Sveva tindukācīrasaṅkhātāya
analyzed: diṭṭhim pavadanti ettha ati samaya ppavādakaḥ mallikāya ārāmaḥ su eva tindukā cīra saṅkhātāya

original: timbarurukkhapantiyā parikkhittattā “tindukācīra”nti ca, ekāva nivāsā sālā etthāti
analyzed: ca ekā ava nivāsā sālā ettha ati

original: “ekasālako”ti ca vuccati. Atthābhisamayāti yathāvuttassa diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikassa
analyzed: eka sālakaḥ ti ca vuccati attha abhisamayā ti yathā vuttassa diṭṭhadhammika samparāyikassa

original: atthassa hitassa paṭilābhato. Mānābhisamayāti mānappahānā. Pīḷanaṭṭhoti pīḷanaṃ taṃsamaṅgino
analyzed: atthassa hitassa paṭilābhataḥ māna abhisamayā ati māna ppahānā pīḷana ṭṭhā ti pīḷanam tad samaṅginaḥ

original: hiṃsanaṃ, avipphārikatākaraṇaṃ, pīḷanameva attho pīḷanaṭṭho. Santāpoti dukkhadukkhatādivasena
analyzed: hiṃsanam avipphārika tā karaṇam pīḷanam eva attho pīḷanaṭṭho santāpo ti dukkha dukkha tā ādi vasena

original: santāpanaṃ. Vipariṇāmoti jarāya maraṇena cāti dvidhā vipariṇāmetabbatā abhisametabbo
analyzed: santāpanam vipariṇāmaḥ ti jarāya maraṇena ca ati dvidhā vipariṇāmetabba tā abhisametabbaḥ

original: paṭivijjhitabboti abhisamayo, sova abhisamayaṭṭho, pīḷanādīni.
analyzed: paṭivijjhitabbaḥ ti abhisamayaḥ saḥ uva abhisamaya ṭṭho pīḷana ādīni

original: Ettha ca upasaggānaṃ jotakamattattā samayasaddassa atthuddhārepi saupasaggo abhisamayasaddo
analyzed: ettha ca upasaggānam jotaka matta ttā samaya saddassa attha uddhāre pi sa upasaggaḥ abhisamaya saddo

original: uddhaṭo. Tattha saṅgamavasena paccayānaṃ phaluppādanaṃ paṭi ayanaṃ ekato pavatti
analyzed: uddhaṭaḥ tattha saṅgama vasena paccayānam phala uppādanam paṭi ayanam ekatas pavatti

original: etthāti samayo, samavāyo. Vivaṭṭūpanissayasaṅgame sati enti ettha sattā pavattantīti
analyzed: ettha ati samayaḥ samavāyaḥ vivaṭṭu upanissaya saṅgame sati enti ettha sattā pavattanti iti

original: samayo, khaṇo. Sameti ettha saṅkhatadhammo, sayaṃ vā eti āgacchati vigacchati cāti
analyzed: samayaḥ khaṇo sameti ettha saṅkhata dhammo sayam vā eti āgacchati vigacchati ca ati

original: samayo, kālo. Samenti avayavā etasmiṃ, sayaṃ vā tesūti samayo, samūho. Paccayantarasaṅgame
analyzed: samayaḥ kālaḥ samenti avayavāḥ etasmin sayam vā tesu iti samayaḥ samūhaḥ paccaya antara saṅgame

original: eti āgacchati etasmā phalanti samayo, hetu. Saññāvasena vipallāsato dhammesu eti
analyzed: eti āgacchati etasmā phalanti samayaḥ hetu saññā vasena vipallāsataḥ dhammesu eti

original: abhinivisatīti samayo, diṭṭhi. Samīpaṃ ayanaṃ upagamanaṃ samayo, paṭilābho. Sammadeva
analyzed: abhinivisati iti samayaḥ diṭṭhi samīpam ayanam upagamanam samayaḥ paṭilābho sammat eva

original: sahitānaṃ vācānaṃ ayanaṃ vigamoti samayo, pahānaṃ. Sammadeva, sahitānaṃ vā saccānaṃ
analyzed: sahitānam vācānam ayanam vigamaḥ iti samayaḥ u pahānam sammad eva sahitānam vā

original: ayanaṃ jānananti samayo, paṭivedho. Evaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ atthe samayasaddassa pavatti veditabbā.
analyzed: ayanam jānananti samayaḥ paṭivedhaḥ evam tasmin tasmin atthe samaya saddassa pavatti veditabbā

original: Ettha ca samayasaddassa sāmaññena anekatthatā vuttā. Na hi ekasmiṃ atthavisese vattamāno
analyzed: ettha ca samaya saddassa sāmaññena aneka attha tā vuttā na hi ekasmin attha visese vattamāno

original: saddo tadaññepi vattati. Tasmā atthā viya taṃtaṃvācakā samayasaddāpi bhinnā evāti
analyzed: saddo tad aññe pi vattati tasmā atthāḥ viya samaya saddāḥ api bhinnāḥ eva ati

original: gahetabbā. Evaṃ sabbattha atthuddhāresu.
analyzed: gahetabbāḥ evam sabbattha attha uddhāresu

original: Tattha tathāti tesu suttābhidhammesu upayogabhummavacanehi. Idhāti vinaye, aññathāti
analyzed: tattha tathā ati tesu sutta abhidhammesu upayoga bhumma vacanehi idha ati vinaye aññathā ati

original: karaṇavacanena. Accantamevāti nirantarameva. Bhāvo nāma kiriyā, kiriyāya kiriyantarūpalakkhaṇaṃ
analyzed: karaṇa vacanena accantam eva ati nirantaram eva bhāvaḥ nāma kiriyā kiriyāya

original: bhāvenabhāvalakkhaṇaṃ, yathā udaye sati cande jāto rājaputtoti. Adhikaraṇañhītiādi
analyzed: bhāvena bhāva lakkhaṇam yathā udaye sati cande jātaḥ rāja putto ti adhikaraṇam hi itiādi

original: abhidhamme samayasaddo kālasamūhakhaṇasamavāyahetusaṅkhātesu pañcasu atthesu vattati,
analyzed: abhidhamme samaya saddaḥ kāla samūha khaṇa samavāya hetu saṅkhātesu pañcasu atthesu vattati

original: na vinaye viya kāle eva, tesu ca kālasamūhatthā dve tattha vuttānaṃ phassādidhammānaṃ
analyzed: na vinaye viya kāle eva tesu ca kāla samūha atthā dve tattha vuttānam phassa ādi dhammānam

original: adhikaraṇabhāvena niddisituṃ yuttā. Khaṇasamavāyahetuatthā pana tayopi attano bhāvena
analyzed: adhikaraṇa bhāvena niddisitum yuttā khaṇa samavāya hetu atthā pana bhāvena

original: phassādīnaṃ bhāvassa upalakkhaṇabhāvena niddisituṃ yuttāti vibhāvanamukhena yathāvuttamatthaṃ
analyzed: phassa ādīnam bhāvassa upalakkhaṇa bhāvena niddisitum yuttā ati vibhāvana mukhena yathāvuttam attham

original: samatthetuṃ vuttaṃ. Tattha yasmiñhi kāle, dhammasamūhe vā samaye adhikaraṇabhūte
analyzed: samatthetum vuttam tattha yasmin hi kāle dhamma samūhe vā samaye adhikaraṇa bhūte

original: kusalaṃ uppannaṃ, tasmiññeva kāle, dhammasamūhe vā samaye phassādayo hontīti evaṃ
analyzed: kusalam uppannam tasmin ñeva kāle dhamma samūhe vā samaye phassa ādayaḥ honti iti evam

original: adhikaraṇatthayojanā, yasmiṃ pana khaṇe, samavāye hetumhi vā samaye sati vijjamāne
analyzed: adhikaraṇa attha yojanā yasmin pana khaṇe samavāye hetumhi vā samaye sati vijjamāne

original: kusalaṃ uppannaṃ, tasmiññeva khaṇādimhi samayepi vijjamāne phassādayo hontīti bhāvenabhāvalakkhaṇatthayojanā ca veditabbā.
analyzed: kusalam uppannam tasmin ñeva khaṇa ādimhi samaye pi vijjamāne phassa ādayaḥ honti iti bhāvenabhāva lakkhaṇa attha yojanā ca veditabbā

original: Hoti cetthāti ettha yathāvuttaatthavisaye saṅgahagāthā hoti. Aññatrāti suttābhidhammesu. Abhilāpamattabhedoti desanāvilāsato saddamatteneva bhedo, na atthato.
analyzed: hoti ca itthā ati ettha yathā vutta attha visaye saṅgaha gāthā hoti aññatra ati sutta abhidhammesu abhilāpa matta bhedo ti desanā vilāsato sadda mattena iva bhedaḥ na atthato

original: Avisesenāti sāmaññena. Iriyāpathotiādīsu iriyāya sabbadvārikakiriyāya patho pavattanaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: avisesena āti sāmaññena iriyāpatho tiādīsu iriyāya sabba dvārika kiriyāya patho pavattana ṭṭhānam

original: tabbinimuttakammassa abhāvāti ṭhānādayo iriyāpatho, sova vihāro. Brahmabhūtā seṭṭhabhūtā
analyzed: tad vinimutta kammassa abhāvāti ṭhāna ādayaḥ iriyāpatho saḥ uva vihāraḥ brahma bhūtā seṭṭha bhūtā

original: parahitacittādivasappavattito mettādayo brahmavihāro nāma. Tadavasesā pana mahaggatā
sabbanīvaraṇavigamanādisiddhena jotanādiatthena dibbavihāro nāma. Brahmavihārabhāvena
analyzed: sabba nīvaraṇa vigamana ādi siddhena jotana ādi atthena dibbavihāraḥ nāma brahmavihāra bhāvena

original: visuṃ gahitattā mettādayo idha asaṅgahitā. Ariyānameva vihāroti phalasamāpattiyo ariyavihāro nāma.
analyzed: visum metta ādayaḥ asaṅgahitāḥ

original: Rukkhādimūleyeva mūlasaddassa niruḷhabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ aparena mūlasaddena visesetvā
analyzed: rukkha ādi mūle iva iva mūla saddassa niruḷha bhāvam dassetum aparena mūla saddena visesetvā

original: “mūlamūle”ti vuttaṃ, yathā dukkhadukkhanti. Lobhādīnaṃ dosamūlādicittāsādhāraṇattā
analyzed: mūla mūla iti vuttam yathā dukkha dukkhanti lobha ādīnam dosa mūla ādi citta asādhāraṇa ttā

original: “asādhāraṇahetumhī”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: asādhāraṇa hetumhi iti vuttam

original: Tattha siyāti tattha verañjāyantiādīsu padesu kassaci codanā siyāti attho. Ubhayathā
analyzed: tattha siyā ti tattha verañjāyanti ādīsu padesu kassaci codanā siyā ti atthaḥ ubhayathā

original: nidānakittanassa pana kiṃ payojananti? Āha gocaragāmanidassanatthantiādi. Tattha assāti bhagavato.
analyzed: nidāna kittanassa pana kim payojanan ti āha gocara gāma nidassana attha ntiādi tattha assa ati bhagavataḥ

original: Kilamova kilamatho, attano attabhāvassa kilamatho attakilamatho, tassa anu anu yogo
analyzed: kilamaḥ uva kilamathaḥ attano atta bhāvassa kilamathaḥ atta kilamatho tassa anu anu yogaḥ

original: punappunaṃ pavattanaṃ attakilamathānuyogo. Vatthukāmārammaṇe sukhe sampayogavasena
analyzed: punappunam pavattanam atta kilamatha anuyogaḥ vatthu kāma ārammaṇe sukhe sampayoga vasena

original: līnā yuttā, kāmataṇhā, taṃsahacarite kāme sukhe vā ārammaṇabhūte allīnā pavattatīti
analyzed: līnā yuttā kāma taṇhā tad sahacarite kāme sukhe vā ārammaṇa bhūte allīnā pavattati iti

original: kāmasukhallikā taṇhā, tassā kāmasukhallikāya anu anu yogo kāmasukhallikānuyogo. Loke
analyzed: kāma sukhallikā taṇhā tassā kāma sukhallikāya anu anu yogaḥ kāma sukhallikā anuyogaḥ loke

original: saṃvaḍḍhabhāvanti āmisopabhogena saṃvaḍḍhitabhāvaṃ. Uppajjamāno bahujanahitādiatthāyeva uppajjatīti yojanā.
analyzed: saṃvaḍḍha bhāvanti āmisa upabhogena saṃvaḍḍhita bhāvam uppajjamānaḥ bahu jana hita ādi atthāya iva uppajjati iti yojanā

original: Diṭṭhisīlasāmaññena saṃhatattā saṅghoti imamatthaṃ vibhāvento āha diṭṭhītiādi. Ettha
analyzed: diṭṭhi sīla sāmaññena saṃhata ttā saṅghaḥ ti imam attham vibhāventaḥ āha diṭṭhi itiādi ettha

original: ca “yāyaṃ diṭṭhi ariyā niyyānikā niyyāti takkarassa sammā dukkhakkhayāya, tathārūpāya
analyzed: ca yā ayam diṭṭhi ariyā niyyānikā niyyāti takkarassa sammā dukkha kkhayāya tathārūpāya

original: diṭṭhiyā diṭṭhisāmaññagato viharatī”ti evaṃ vuttāya diṭṭhiyā. “Yāni tāni sīlāni akhaṇḍāni…pe…
analyzed: diṭṭhiyā diṭṭhi sāmañña gataḥ viharati iti evam vuttāya diṭṭhiyā yāni tāni sīlāni

original: samādhisaṃvattanikāni, tathārūpesu sīlesu sīlasāmaññagato viharatī”ti evaṃ vuttānañca
analyzed: samādhi saṃvattanikāni tathārūpesu sīlesu sīla sāmañña gataḥ viharati iti evam vuttānam ca

original: sīlānaṃ sāmaññasaṅkhātena saṅghāto saṅghaṭito samaṇagaṇo, tenāti attho. “Diṭṭhisīlasāmaññasaṅghātasaṅghātenā”ti

original: vā pāṭhenettha bhavitabbaṃ, tassa diṭṭhisīlasāmaññabhūtena saṃhananena saṅghāto samaṇagaṇo,

analyzed: na abhāva mattam tassa avatthu ttā sappaccaya ttā ādi aneka bhedā sabba saṅgahitā nirodha ppajānanā ti

original: sacchikiriyābhisamayavasena nirodhassa paṭivijjhanā. Ekekapaduddhārenāpīti cakkhu
analyzed: sacchikiriyā abhisamaya vasena nirodhassa paṭivijjhanā ekeka paduddhārena api iti cakkhu

original: cakkhusamudayotiādinā ekekakoṭṭhāsaniddhāraṇenāpi, na dukkhasaccādisāmaññato evāti

original: adhippāyo. Taṇhāyapi saṅkhāradukkhapariyāpannatāya pariññeyyattā dukkhasaccabhāvaṃ
analyzed: adhippāyaḥ saṅkhāra dukkha pariyāpanna tāya pariññeyya ttā dukkha sacca bhāvam

analyzed: jhānāni kesa ādayaḥ tad ārammaṇa jhānāni ca nava kāma bhava ādayaḥ

original: ārammaṇavisesaṃ anapekkhitvā sāmaññato cattāri jhānāni vuttāni. Vipākakiriyānampi

analyzed: taṇhā anulomato ti ettha avijjā dukkha saccam tad samuṭṭhāpikā purima taṇhā āsavā samudaya saccanti

analyzed: yojetabbam saṅkhāra ādīsu pana avijjā ādayo uva samudaya sacca bhāvena yojetabbā tena ati tasmā

original: kāyaṃ abhinimminātī”ti vuttattā sarīrabbhantarajhānamanena aññassa sarīrassa nibbattivasena
analyzed: kāyam abhinimmināti iti vutta ttā aññassa sarīrassa nibbatti vasena

original: pavattā manomayiddhi nāma, sā atthato jhānasampayuttā paññāyeva. Satta saddhammā

analyzed: nāma saddhā hirī ottappam bāhusaccam vīriyam sati paññā ca gacchati amatam disanti

original: dukkhanittharaṇatthikehi daṭṭhabbato amataṃ nibbānameva disaṃ gacchati, iminā ca
analyzed: dukkha nittharaṇa atthikehi daṭṭhabbataḥ amatam nibbānam eva disam gacchati iminā ca

original: caraṇānaṃ sikkhattayasaṅgahitaariyamaggabhāvato nibbānatthikehi ekaṃsena icchitabbataṃ
analyzed: caraṇānam sikkhattaya saṅgahita ariya magga bhāvataḥ nibbāna atthikehi ekaṃsena icchitabba tam

analyzed: dasseti idānissā vijjā caraṇa sampadāya sāvaka ādi asādhāraṇa tam dassetum tattha vijjā sampadā tiādi

analyzed: vuttam tattha āsava kkhaya vijjā vasena sabbaññu tā sijjhati caraṇa dhamma bhūtesu jhānesu

original: mahākāruṇikata”nti. Yathā tanti ettha tanti nipātamattaṃ, yathā aññopi vijjācaraṇasampanno
analyzed: mahā kāruṇika tanti yathā tanti ettha tanti nipāta mattam yathā aññaḥ api vijjā caraṇa sampanno

original: buddho niyojeti, tathā ayampīti attho. Tenāti anatthaparivajjanaatthaniyojanena.
analyzed: buddhaḥ tathā ayam pi iti tena ati anattha parivajjana attha niyojanena

original: Attantapādayoti ādi-saddena parantapaubhayantapā gahitā. Asajjamāno bhavesu apaccāgacchantoti
analyzed: ādi saddena parantapa aubhayantapāḥ gahitāḥ a sajjamānaḥ bhavesu a paccāgacchanto ti

original: pahīnānaṃ punānuppattito na puna upagacchanto.
analyzed: pahīnānam punar anuppattitaḥ na punar upagacchantaḥ

original: Tatrāti yuttavācābhāsane sādhetabbe cetaṃ bhummaṃ. Abhūtanti abhūtatthaṃ. Atacchanti
analyzed: tatra ati yutta vācā bhāsane sādhetabbe ca itam bhummam a bhūta attham a tacchanti

analyzed: tassa iva vevacanam anattha saṃhitanti pisuṇa ādi dosa yuttam sammā gadattā ati sundara vacanattā

original: gadanaṃ gado, kathananti attho. Sundaro gado vacanamassāti “sugado”ti vattabbe niruttinayena
analyzed: gadanam gado kathananti attho sundaraḥ gadaḥ vacanam assa ati su gadaḥ ti vattabbe nirutti nayena

original: da-kārassa ta-kāraṃ katvā “sugato”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: dakārassa takāram katvā sugataḥ ti vuttam

original: Sabhāvatoti dukkhasabhāvato. Lokanti khandhādilokaṃ. Yathāvuttamatthaṃ suttato āha
analyzed: sabhāvataḥ ti dukkha sabhāvataḥ lokanti khandha ādi lokam yathāvuttam attham suttataḥ āha

analyzed: yattha atiādi tattha yattha ati yasmin lokanta saṅkhāte nibbāne okāsa loke

original: kāyagamanena ñātabbaṃ pattabbanti nāhaṃ vadāmīti yojanā. Idañca rohitadevaputtena
analyzed: kāya gamanena ñātabbam pattabbanti na aham vadāmi iti yojanā idam ca rohitadevaputtena

original: lokassa kāyagativasena antagamanassa pucchitattā vuttaṃ. Appatvā lokassantanti khandhādilokaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
analyzed: lokassa kāya gati vasena anta gamanassa pucchita ttā vuttam ap patvā khandha ādi lokam sandhāya vuttam

original: Kinte padasā okāsalokaparibbhamanena, parimitaṭṭhāne eva taṃ ñāṇagamanena gacchantānaṃ
analyzed: kinte okāsa loka paribbhamanena parimita ṭṭhāne eva tam ñāṇa gamanena gacchantānam

original: dassemīti dassento api cātiādimāha. Tattha byāmamatte kaḷevareti sarīre. Tena rūpakkhandhaṃ
analyzed: dassemi iti dassentaḥ api ca ati ādim āha tattha byāma matte kaḷevarā iti sarīre tena rūpa kkhandham

original: dasseti. Sasaññimhīti saññāsīsena vedanādayo tayo khandhe. Samanaketi viññāṇakkhandhaṃ.
analyzed: dasseti sa saññimhi iti saññā sīsena vedanā ādayo tayo khandhe samanake iti viññāṇa kkhandham

original: Lokanti khandhādilokaṃ, dukkhanti attho. Lokanirodhanti nibbānena lokassa nirujjhanaṃ,

original: nibbānameva vā. Adesampi hi nibbānaṃ yesaṃ nirodhāya hoti, upacārato tannissitaṃ
analyzed: nibbānam eva vā adesam pi hi nibbānam yesam nirodhāya hoti upacārato tat nissitam

analyzed: viya hoti iti byāma matte kaḷevare loka nirodham pi paññapemi iti vuttam cakkhu loke

original: piyarūpaṃ, sātarūpaṃ, etthesā taṇhā nirujjhamānā nirujjhatītiādīsu viya. Kudācananti
analyzed: piya rūpam sāta rūpam etthā isā taṇhā nirujjhamānā nirujjhati itiādīsu kudācana anti

original: kadācipi. Appatvāti aggamaggena anadhigantvā. Tasmāti yasmā taṃ gamanena pattuṃ na
analyzed: kadācipi ap patvā iti agga maggena an adhigantvā tasmā iti yasmā tam gamanena pattum na

analyzed: sakkā tasmai hava iti nipāta mattam vā khandha ādi jānanakaḥ

original: Catusaccadhammānaṃ abhisamitattā samitāvī, samitakilesoti vā attho. Nāsīsati na pattheti appaṭisandhikattā.
analyzed: catu sacca dhammānam abhisamita ttā samitāvī samita kilesaḥ ti vā atthaḥ na āsīsati na pattheti appaṭisandhika ttā

original: Evaṃ saṅkhepato lokaṃ dassetvā idāni vitthārato taṃ dassetuṃ api ca tayo lokātiādi
analyzed: evam saṅkhepataḥ lokam dassetvā idāni vitthārato tam dassetum api ca tayaḥ loka ati ādi

original: vuttaṃ. Tattha indriyabaddhānaṃ khandhānaṃ samūhasantānabhūto sattaloko. So hi rūpādīsu

analyzed: satta visatta tāya satto ti ca lokiyanti ettha kamma kilesā tad bipākā ca ati

original: ca vuccati. Anindriyabaddhānaṃ utujarūpānaṃ samūhasantānabhūto okāsaloko. So hi sattasaṅkhārānaṃ

original: ādhārato “okāso”ti ca, lokiyanti ettha tassādhārā ca ādheyyabhūtāti “loko”ti ca pavuccati.
analyzed: ādhārato okāso ti ca ettha ca pavuccati

original: Indriyānindriyabaddhā pana sabbeva upādānakkhandhā paccayehi saṅkhataṭṭhena lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena
analyzed: indriya anindriya baddhāḥ pana sabbe eva upādāna kkhandhāḥ paccayehi saṅkhata ṭṭhena lujjana palujjana ṭṭhena

original: ca “saṅkhāraloko”ti ca vuccati. Āharati attano phalanti āhāro, paccayo. Tena tiṭṭhanasīlā

analyzed: sattā ti ca iminā api veneyya anurūpato puggala adhiṭṭhāna ttā desanāya gahitā

original: Yāvatā candimasūriyā pariharantīti yattake ṭhāne candimasūriyā parivattanti pavattanti.
analyzed: yāvatā candima sūriyā pariharanti iti yattake ṭhāne candima sūriyā parivattanti pavattanti

original: Virocanāti tesaṃ virocanahetu obhāsanahetūti hetumhi nissakkavacanaṃ. Disā bhantīti
analyzed: virocanā ati tesam virocana hetu obhāsana hetu uti hetumhi nissakka vacanam disāḥ bhanti iti

original: sabbā disā yāvatā vigatandhakārā paññāyanti. Atha vā disāti upayogabahuvacanaṃ. Tasmā
analyzed: sabbāḥ disāḥ yāvatā vigata andhakārā paññāyanti atha vā disā iti upayoga bahuvacanam tasmā

original: virocamānā candimasūriyā yattakā disā bhanti obhāsentīti attho. Tāva sahassadhā lokoti
analyzed: virocamānā candima sūriyā yattakā disā bhanti obhāsenti iti attho tāva sahassadhā loko ti

original: tattakena pamāṇena sahassappakāro okāsaloko, sahassacakkavāḷānīti attho. Etthāti
analyzed: tattakena pamāṇena sahassa ppakāraḥ okāsa lokaḥ sahassa cakkavāḷāni iti atthaḥ ettha ati

original: sahassacakkavāḷe. Vasoti iddhisaṅkhāto vaso vattatīti attho.
analyzed: sahassa cakkavāḷe vaso ti iddhi saṅkhātaḥ vaso vattati iti attho

original: Tampīti tividhampi lokaṃ. Assāti anena bhagavatā saṅkhāralokopi sabbathā viditoti
analyzed: tam pi iti tividham pi lokam assa ati anena bhagavatā saṅkhāra lokaḥ api sabbathā viditaḥ ti

original: sambandho. Eko lokoti yvāyaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayena sabbasaṅkhatānaṃ paccayāyattavuttito
analyzed: sambandhaḥ ekaḥ loko ti yvā ayam heṭṭhā vutta nayena sabba saṅkhatānam paccaya āyatta vuttito

original: tena sāmaññena saṅkhāraloko eko ekavidho, esa nayo sesesupi. Sabbatthāpi lokiyadhammāva
analyzed: tena sāmaññena saṅkhāra lokaḥ ekaḥ ekavidhaḥ esa nayo sesesu pi sabbattha api lokiya dhammā ava

original: lokoti adhippetā lokuttarānaṃ pariññeyyattābhāvā. Upādānānaṃ ārammaṇabhūtā khandhā
analyzed: loko ti adhippetāḥ lokuttarānam upādānānam ārammaṇa bhūtā khandhāḥ

original: upādānakkhandhā. Satta viññāṇaṭṭhitiyoti tathā tathā samuppannā pajāyeva vuccanti.
analyzed: upādānakkhandhāḥ satta viññāṇa ṭṭhitiyaḥ ti tathā tathā samuppannā pajāyā iva vuccanti

original: Nānattakāyā nānattasaññino, nānattakāyā ekattasaññino, ekattakāyā nānattasaññino,
analyzed: nānatta kāyāḥ nānatta saññinaḥ nānatta kāyāḥ ekatta saññinaḥ ekatta kāyāḥ nānatta saññinaḥ

original: ekattakāyā ekattasaññino, heṭṭhimā ca tayo āruppāti imā sattavidhā pajāyeva viññāṇaṃ

original: tiṭṭhati etthāti viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo nāma. Tattha nānattaṃ kāyo etesamatthīti nānattakāyā.
analyzed: tiṭṭhati ettha ati viññāṇa ṭṭhitiyaḥ nāma tattha nānattam kāyaḥ etesam atthi iti nānatta kāyā

original: Nānattaṃ saññā etesanti nānattasaññino. Saññāsīsenettha paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ gahitaṃ, esa nayo sesesupi.
analyzed: nānattam saññā etesan ti nānatta saññinaḥ saññā sīsena ittha paṭisandhi viññāṇam gahitam esa nayo sesesu pi

original: Tattha sabbamanussā ca cha kāmāvacaradevā ca nānattakāyā nānattasaññino nāma. Tesañhi
analyzed: tattha sabba manussā ca cha kāmāvacara devā ca nānatta kāyā nānatta saññinaḥ nāma tesañhi

original: aññamaññaṃ visadisatāya nānā kāyo, paṭisandhisaññā ca navavidhatāya nānā. Tīsu paṭhamajjhānabhūmīsu

original: brahmakāyikā ceva catūsu apāyesu sattā ca nānattakāyā ekattasaññino nāma. Tesu hi
analyzed: ca iva catūsu apāyesu sattā ca nānatta kāyāḥ ekatta saññinaḥ nāma tesu hi

original: brahmapārisajjādīnaṃ tiṇṇampi sarīraṃ aññamaññaṃ visadisaṃ, paṭisandhisaññā pana
analyzed: brahma pārisajja ādīnam tiṇṇam pi sarīram aññam aññam visadisam paṭisandhi saññā pana

original: paṭhamajjhānavipākavasena ekāva, tathā āpāyikānampi, tesaṃ pana sabbesaṃ akusalavipākāhetukāva
analyzed: paṭhama jhāna vipāka vasena ekā ava tathā āpāyikānam pi tesam pana sabbesam akusala vipāka ahetukā ava

original: paṭisandhisaññā. Dutiyajjhānabhūmikā ca parittābha appamāṇābha ābhassarā ekattakāyā
analyzed: paṭisandhi saññā dutiya jhāna bhūmikā ca paritta ābha appamāṇa ābha ābhassarāḥ ekatta kāyā

original: nānattasaññino nāma. Tesañhi sabbesaṃ ekappamāṇova kāyo, paṭisandhisaññā pana dutiyatatiyajjhānavipākavasena
analyzed: nānatta saññinaḥ nāma tesam hi sabbesam eka ppamāṇaḥ uva kāyo paṭisandhi saññā pana dutiya tatiya jhāna vipāka vasena

original: nānā hoti. Tatiyajjhānabhūmiyaṃ parittasubhādayo tayo, catutthajjhānabhūmiyaṃ asaññasattavajjitā
analyzed: nānā hoti tatiya jhāna bhūmiyam paritta subha ādayo tayo catuttha jhāna bhūmiyam asañña satta vajjitā

original: vehapphalā, pañca ca suddhāvāsāti navasu bhūmīsu sattā ekattakāyā ekattasaññino nāma.
analyzed: vehapphalā pañca ca suddhāvāsā ati navasu bhūmīsu sattāḥ ekatta kāyāḥ ekatta saññinaḥ nāma

original: Ābhānānattena pana sabbattha kāyanānattaṃ na gayhati, saṇṭhānanānatteneva gayhatīti.
analyzed: ābhā nānattena pana sabbattha kāya nānattam na gayhati saṇṭhāna nānattena iva gayhati iti

original: Asaññasattā viññāṇābhāvena viññāṇaṭṭhitisaṅkhyaṃ na gacchanti. Nevasaññā nāsaññāyatanaṃ

original: pana yathā saññāya, evaṃ viññāṇassāpi sukhumattā nevaviññāṇaṃ nāviññāṇaṃ, tasmā paribyattaviññāṇakiccavantesu
analyzed: pana yathā saññāyaḥ evam viññāṇassa api sukhuma tā na iva viññāṇam na aviññāṇam tasmā paribyatta viññāṇa kiccavantesu

original: viññāṇaṭṭhitīsu na gayhati. Tasmā sesāni ākāsānañcāyatanādīni tīṇiyeva gahitāni,
analyzed: viññāṇa ṭṭhitīsu na gayhati tasmā sesāni ākāsa anañcāyatana ādīni gahitāni

original: tehi saddhiṃ imā satta viññāṇaṭṭhitiyoti veditabbā.
analyzed: tehi saddhim imāḥ satta viññāṇa ṭṭhitiyaḥ ti veditabbā

original: Aṭṭha lokadhammāti lābho alābho yaso ayaso nindā pasaṃsā sukhaṃ dukkhanti ime aṭṭha
analyzed: aṭṭha loka dhammā ati lābhaḥ alābhaḥ yasaḥ ayasaḥ nindā pasaṃsā sukham dukkhanti ime aṭṭha

original: lokassa sabhāvattā lokadhammā. Lābhālābhādipaccayā uppajjanakā panettha anurodhavirodhā
analyzed: lokassa sabhāvattā loka dhammā lābha alābha ādi paccayā uppajjanakā pana ittha anurodha virodhā

original: vā lābhādisaddehi vuttāti veditabbā. Nava sattāvāsāti heṭṭhā vuttā satta viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo
analyzed: vā lābha ādi saddehi vuttā ati veditabbā nava sattāvāsā ati heṭṭhā vuttā satta viññāṇa ṭṭhitiyaḥ

original: eva asaññasattacatutthāruppehi saddhiṃ “nava sattāvāsā”ti vuccanti. Sattā āvasanti
analyzed: eva asañña satta catuttha āruppehi saddhim nava sattāvāsā ti vuccanti sattāḥ āvasanti

original: etthāti sattāvāsā, sattanikāyo, atthato tathā pavattā pajā eva idha saṅkhāralokabhāvena
analyzed: ettha ati satta āvāsā satta nikāyo atthato tathā pavattā pajā eva idha saṅkhāra loka bhāvena

original: gayhantīti veditabbā. Dasāyatanānīti dhammāyatanamanāyatanavajjitāni dasa.
analyzed: gayhanti iti veditabbāḥ dasa āyatanāni iti dhammāyatana manāyatana vajjitāni dasa

original: Ettha ca tīsu bhavesu assādadassanavasena tisso vedanāva lokabhāvena vuttā, tathā
analyzed: ettha ca tīsu bhavesu assāda dassana vasena tisso loka bhāvena vuttā tathā

original: paccayadassanavasena cattārova āhārā. Attaggāhanimittadassanavasena cha ajjhattikāneva
analyzed: paccaya dassana vasena cattāro va āhārāḥ attaggāha nimitta dassana vasena cha ajjhattikāna eva

original: āyatanāni. Thūlasaññībhavadassanavasena satta viññāṇaṭṭhitiyova, anurodhavirodhadassanavasena
analyzed: āyatanāni thūla saññībhava dassana vasena satta viññāṇa ṭṭhitiyo va anurodha virodha dassana vasena

original: aṭṭha lokadhammā vā, thūlāyatanadassanavasena dasāyatanāneva lokabhāvena vuttāni.
analyzed: aṭṭha loka dhammā vā thūlāyatana dassana vasena loka bhāvena vuttāni

original: Tesaṃ gahaṇeneva tannissayatappaṭibaddhā tadārammaṇā sabbe tebhūmakā nāmarūpadhammā
analyzed: tesam gahaṇena iva tad nissaya tad paṭibaddhā tad ārammaṇā sabbe tebhūmakāḥ nāma rūpa dhammāḥ

original: atthato gahitā eva honti. Sesehi pana ekavidhādikoṭṭhāsehi sarūpeneva te gahitāti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: atthataḥ gahitāḥ eva honti sesehi pana ekavidha ādi koṭṭhāsehi sarūpena iva te gahitā ti veditabbam

original: Āsayaṃ jānātītiādīsu āhacca cittaṃ ettha setīti āsayo, aññasmiṃ visaye pavattitvāpi
analyzed: āsayam jānāti itiādīsu cittam ettha seti iti āsayaḥ aññasmin visaye

original: cittaṃ yattha sarasena pavisitvā tiṭṭhati, so vaṭṭāsayo vivaṭṭāsayoti duvidho. Tattha
analyzed: cittam yattha sa rasena pavisitvā tiṭṭhati so vaṭṭāsayaḥ vivaṭṭāsayaḥ ti duvidhaḥ tattha

original: vaṭṭāsayopi sassatucchedadiṭṭhivasena duvidho. Vivaṭṭāsayo pana vipassanāsaṅkhātā
analyzed: vaṭṭa āsayaḥ api sassatu cheda diṭṭhi vasena duvidhaḥ vivaṭṭa āsayaḥ pana vipassanā saṅkhātā

original: anulomikā khanti, maggasaṅkhātaṃ yathābhūtañāṇañcāti duvidho. Yathāha –
analyzed: anulomikā khanti magga saṅkhātam yathā bhūta ñāṇam ca ati duvidhaḥ yathā āha

original: “Sassatucchedadiṭṭhi ca, khanti cevānulomikaṃ;
analyzed: ca khanti ca iva ānulomikam

original: Yathābhūtañca yaṃ ñāṇaṃ, etaṃ āsayasaddita”nti. ;
analyzed: yathābhūtam ca yam etam

original: Etaṃ duvidhampi āsayaṃ sattānaṃ appavattikkhaṇeyeva bhagavā sabbathā jānāti. Anusayanti
analyzed: etam duvidham pi āsayam sattānam appavatti khaṇeya iva bhagavā sabbathā jānāti anusayanti

original: kāmarāgānusayādivasena sattavidhaṃ anusayaṃ. Caritanti “sucaritaduccarita”nti niddese
analyzed: kāma rāga anusaya ādi vasena sattavidham anusayam niddese

original: vuttaṃ. Atha vā caritanti cariyā, te rāgādayo cha mūlacariyā, saṃsaggasannipātavasena
analyzed: vuttam atha vā caritanti cariyā te rāga ādayaḥ mūla cariyā saṃsagga sannipāta vasena

original: anekavidhā honti. Adhimuttinti ajjhāsayadhātuṃ, tattha tattha cittassa abhirucivasena
analyzed: anekavidhāḥ honti adhimuttin ti ajjhāsaya dhātum tattha tattha cittassa abhiruci vasena

original: ninnatā, sā duvidhā hīnādhimutti paṇītādhimuttīti. Yāya dussīlādike hīnādhimuttike
analyzed: ninna tā sā duvidhā hīna adhimutti paṇīta adhimutti iti dussīla ādike hīna adhimuttike

original: sevanti, sā hīnādhimutti. Yāya paṇītādhimuttike sevanti, sā paṇītādhimutti. Taṃ duvidhampi
analyzed: sevanti sā hīna adhimutti paṇīta adhimuttike sevanti sā paṇīta adhimutti tam duvidham pi

original: adhimuttiṃ bhagavā sabbākārato jānāti. Appaṃ rāgādirajaṃ etesanti apparajakkhā, anussadarāgādidosā.
analyzed: adhimuttim bhagavā sabba ākārataḥ jānāti appam rāga ādi rajam etesanti appa rajakkhāḥ anussada rāga ādi dosā

original: Ussadarāgādidosā mahārajakkhā. Upanissayabhūtehi tikkhehi saddhādiindriyehi mudukehi
analyzed: ussada rāga ādi dosāḥ mahārajakkhāḥ upanissaya bhūtehi tikkhehi saddhā ādi indriyehi mudukehi

original: ca samannāgatā tikkhindriyā mudindriyā ca. Heṭṭhā vuttehi āsayādīhi sundarehi asundarehi
analyzed: ca samannāgatā tikkha indriyā mud indriyā ca heṭṭhā vuttehi āsaya ādīhi sundarehi asundarehi

original: ca samannāgatā svākārā dvākārā ca veditabbā. Sammattaniyāmaṃ viññāpetuṃ sukarā suviññāpayā,
analyzed: ca samannāgatā su ākārā dvi ākārā ca veditabbā sammatta niyāmam viññāpetum sukarā su viññāpayā

original: viparītā duviññāpayā. Maggaphalapaṭivedhāya upanissayasampannā bhabbā, viparītā abhabbā.
analyzed: viparītā duviññāpayā magga phala paṭivedhāya upanissaya sampannā bhabbā viparītā abhabbā

original: Evaṃ sattasantānagatadhammavisesajānaneneva sattalokopi vidito dhammavinimuttassa
analyzed: evam satta santāna gata dhamma visesa jānanena iva satta lokaḥ api viditaḥ dhamma vinimuttassa

original: sattassa abhāvāti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: sattassa abhāvā ti veditabbam

original: Ekaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ…pe… paññāsañca yojanānīti ettha hotīti seso. Parikkhepato pamāṇaṃ
analyzed: ekam paññāsañca yojanāni iti ettha hoti iti sesaḥ parikkhepato pamāṇam

original: vuccatīti seso. Cakkavāḷassa sabbaṃ parimaṇḍalaṃ chattiṃsa satasahassāni…pe… satāni
analyzed: vuccati iti sesaḥ cakkavāḷassa sabbam parimaṇḍalam chattiṃsa sata sahassāni pe satāni

original: ca hontīti yojetabbaṃ. Tatthāti cakkavāḷe, dve satasahassāni cattāri nahutāni ca
analyzed: ca honti iti yojetabbam tattha ati cakkavāḷe dve sata sahassāni cattāri nahutāni ca

original: yojanāni yāni ettakaṃ ettakappamāṇaṃ bahalattena ayaṃ vasundharā saṅkhātāti yojanā.
analyzed: yojanāni yāni ettakam ettaka ppamāṇam bahala ttena ayam vasundharā saṅkhātā ati yojanā

original: Tattha ettakanti kiriyāvisesanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sandhārakaṃ jalaṃ ettakaṃ ettakappamāṇaṃ
analyzed: tattha ettakam ti kiriyā visesanam daṭṭhabbam sandhārakam jalam ettakam ettaka ppamāṇam

original: hutvā patiṭṭhitanti yojanā. Etthāti cakkavāḷe. Ajjhogāḷhuggatāti ajjhogāḷhā ca uggatā
analyzed: hutvā patiṭṭhitanti yojanā ettha ati cakkavāḷe ajjhogāḷha uggatā ati ajjhogāḷhā ca uggatā

original: ca. Brahāti mahantā. Yojanānaṃ satānucco, himavā pañcāti yojanānaṃ pañcasatāni ucco
analyzed: ca mahantā yojanānam satān uccaḥ himavā pañca ati yojanānam pañca satāni uccaḥ

original: ubbedho. Tipañcayojanakkhandhaparikkhepāti pannarasayojanappamāṇakkhandhapariṇāhā.
analyzed: ubbedhaḥ ti pañca yojana khandha parikkhepā ati pannarasa yojana ppamāṇa kkhandha pariṇāhā

original: Nagavhayāti rukkhābhidhānā jambūti yojanā. Samantatoti sabbasobhāgena, āyāmato ca
analyzed: nagavhayā ati rukkha abhidhānā jambu iti yojanā samantataḥ ti sabba sobhāgena āyāmato ca

original: vitthārato ca satayojanavitthārāti attho. Yassānubhāvenāti yassā mahantatākappaṭṭhāyikādippakārena
analyzed: vitthārato ca sata yojana vitthārā ti atthaḥ yassa anubhāvena ati yassā mahanta tāka ppaṭṭhāyika ādi ppakārena

original: pabhāvena. Parikkhipitvā taṃ sabbaṃ, lokadhātumayaṃ ṭhitoti heṭṭhā vuttaṃ sabbampi
analyzed: pabhāvena parikkhipitvā tam sabbam lokadhātu mayam ṭhitaḥ ti heṭṭhā vuttam sabbam pi

original: taṃ parikkhipitvā cakkavāḷasiluccayo ṭhito, ayaṃ ekā lokadhātu nāmāti attho, ma-kāro
analyzed: tam parikkhipitvā cakkavāḷa siluccayaḥ ṭhitaḥ ayam ekā lokadhātu nāma ati atthaḥ makāraḥ

original: padasandhivasena vutto. Atha vā taṃ sabbaṃ lokadhātuṃ parikkhipitvā ayaṃ cakkavāḷasiluccayo ṭhitoti yojetabbaṃ.
analyzed: pada sandhi vasena vuttaḥ atha vā tam sabbam lokadhātum parikkhipitvā ayam cakkavāḷa siluccayaḥ ṭhitaḥ iti yojetabbam

original: Tatthāti tassaṃ lokadhātuyaṃ. Tāvatiṃsabhavananti tidasapuraṃ. Asurabhavananti asurapuraṃ.
analyzed: tattha ati tassam lokadhātuyam tāvatiṃsa bhavananti tidasapuram asura bhavananti asurapuram

original: Avīcimahānirayo ca tathā dasasahassayojano, so pana catunnaṃ lohabhittīnamantarā
analyzed: avīci mahānirayo ca tathā dasa sahassa yojano saḥ pana catunnam loha bhittīnam antarā

original: yojanasatāyāmavitthāropi samantā soḷasahi ussadanirayehi saddhiṃ dasasahassayojano
analyzed: samantā soḷasahi ussada nirayehi saddhim dasa sahassa yojanaḥ

original: vuttoti veditabbo. Tadanantaresūti tesaṃ cakkavāḷānaṃ antaresu. Lokānaṃ cakkavāḷānaṃ
analyzed: vuttaḥ iti veditabbaḥ tad anantaresu ti tesam cakkavāḷānam antaresu lokānam cakkavāḷānam

original: antare vivare bhavattā lokantarikā. Tiṇṇañhi sakaṭacakkānaṃ pattānaṃ vā āsannaṭṭhapitānaṃ
analyzed: antare vivare bhavattā lokantarikā tiṇṇam hi sakaṭa cakkānam pattānam vā āsanna ṭṭhapitānam

original: antarasadise tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ cakkavāḷānaṃ antaresu ekeko lokantarikanirayo aṭṭhayojanasahassappamāṇo
analyzed: antara sadise tiṇṇam tiṇṇam cakkavāḷānam antaresu ekekaḥ lokantarika nirayaḥ aṭṭha yojana sahassa ppamāṇo

original: sītanarako sattānaṃ akusalavipākena nibbattati. Anantānīti tiriyaṃ aṭṭhasu disāsu
analyzed: sīta narakaḥ sattānam akusala vipākena nibbattati anantāni iti tiriyam aṭṭhasu disāsu

original: cakkavāḷāni ākāso viya anantāni. Uddhaṃ pana adho ca antāneva. Anantena buddhañāṇenāti
analyzed: cakkavāḷāni ākāsaḥ viya anantāni uddham pana adho ca antān eva anantena buddha ñāṇena ati

original: ettha anantañeyyapaṭivedhasāmatthiyayogatova ñāṇaṃ “ananta”nti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: ettha ananta ñeyya paṭivedha sāmatthiya yogataḥ va ñāṇam anantan ti veditabbam

original: Attanoti nissakke sāmivacanametaṃ, attatoti attho. Guṇehi attano visiṭṭhatarassāti
analyzed: attanaḥ iti nissakke sāmi vacanam etam attataḥ iti atthaḥ guṇehi attanaḥ visiṭṭhatarassa ati

original: sambandho, taraggahaṇañcettha anuttaroti padassa atthaniddesavasena kataṃ, na visiṭṭhassa
analyzed: sambandhaḥ tara gahaṇam ca ittha anuttarā ti padassa attha niddesa vasena katam na visiṭṭhassa

original: kassaci atthitāya. Sadevake hi loke sadisakappopi nāma koci tathāgatassa natthi,
analyzed: kassaci atthitāya sa devake hi loke sadisa kappaḥ api nāma koci tathāgatassa natthi

original: kuto sadiso, tenāha sīlaguṇenāpi asamotiādi. Tattha asamehi sammāsambuddhehi samo
analyzed: kutas sadisaḥ tena āha sīla guṇena api asamaḥ tiādi tattha asamehi sammāsambuddhehi samaḥ

original: asamasamo. Natthi paṭimā etassāti appaṭimo. Esa nayo sesesupi. Tattha upamāmattaṃ
analyzed: asamasamaḥ natthi paṭimā etassa ati appaṭimaḥ esa nayo sesesu pi tattha upamā mattam

original: paṭimā, sadisūpamā paṭibhāgo. Yugaggāhavasena ṭhito paṭimo puggaloti veditabbo. Attanāti
analyzed: paṭimā sadisūpamā paṭibhāgaḥ yuga ggāha vasena ṭhitaḥ paṭimaḥ puggalo ti veditabbo attanā ati

original: attato. Purisadammetiādīsu damitabbā dammā, “dammapurisā”ti vattabbe visesanassa

original: paranipātaṃ katvā “purisadammā”ti vuttaṃ, purisaggahaṇañcettha ukkaṭṭhavasena itthīnampi

original: dametabbato. Nibbisā katā dosavisassa vinodanena. Atthapadanti atthābhibyañjanakaṃ

original: padaṃ, vākyanti attho. Ekapadabhāvena ca anaññasādhāraṇo satthu purisadammasārathibhāvo
analyzed: padam vākyanti atthaḥ eka pada bhāvena ca anañña sādhāraṇaḥ satthu purisa damma sārathi bhāvo

original: dassito hoti, tenāha bhagavā hītiādi. Aṭṭha disāti aṭṭha samāpattiyo. Asajjamānāti
analyzed: dassitaḥ hoti tena āha bhagavā hi itiādi aṭṭha disā ati aṭṭha samāpattiyaḥ a sajjamānā ati

original: vasībhāvappattiyā nissaṅgacārā.
analyzed: vasībhāva ppattiyā nissaṅga cārā

original: Diṭṭhadhammo vuccati paccakkho attabhāvo, tattha niyuttoti diṭṭhadhammiko, idhalokattho.
analyzed: diṭṭhadhammo vuccati paccakkhaḥ attabhāvo tattha niyuttaḥ ti diṭṭhadhammikaḥ idhaloka attho

original: Kammakilesavasena samparetabbato samāgantabbato samparāyo, paraloko, tattha niyuttoti
analyzed: kamma kilesa vasena samparetabbato samāgantabbato samparāyo para loko tattha niyutto ti

original: samparāyiko, paralokattho. Paramo uttamo attho paramattho, nibbānaṃ. Saha atthena
analyzed: samparāyiko para loka attho paramaḥ uttamaḥ attho parama atthaḥ nibbānam saha atthena

original: vattatīti sattho, bhaṇḍamūlena vāṇijjāya desantaraṃ gacchanto janasamūho. So assa
analyzed: vattati iti satthaḥ bhaṇḍa mūlena vāṇijjāya desantaram gacchantaḥ jana samūhaḥ saḥ assa

original: atthīti satthā, satthavāhoti niruttinayena. So viya bhagavāti āha “satthā, bhagavā
analyzed: atthi iti satthā satthavāhaḥ iti nirutti nayena saḥ viya bhagavā ati āha satthā bhagavā

original: satthavāho”ti. Idāni tamatthaṃ niddesapāḷinayena dassetuṃ yathā satthavāhotiādi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: satthavāho ti idāni tam attham niddesa pāḷi nayena dassetum yathā satthavāhaḥ tiādi vuttam

original: Tattha sattheti satthike jane. Kaṃ udakaṃ tārenti etthāti kantāro, nirudako araññappadeso.
analyzed: tattha sattha iti satthike jane kam udakam tārenti ettha ati kantāraḥ nirudakaḥ arañña ppadeso

original: Corādīhi adhiṭṭhitaaraññappadesāpi duggamanaṭṭhena taṃsadisatāya kantārātveva niruḷhāti
analyzed: cora ādīhi adhiṭṭhita arañña ppadesā api duggamana aṭṭhena taṃsa disa tāya niruḷhā ati

original: sāmaññato “kantāraṃ tāretī”ti vatvā taṃ vivaranto corakantārantiādimāha.
analyzed: kantāram tāreti iti vatvā tam corakantāranti ādim āha

original: Bhagavatoti nissakke sāmivacanaṃ, bhagavantato dhammassavanenāti attho. Yathā “upajjhāyato
analyzed: bhagavataḥ ti nissakke sāmi vacanam bhagavantataḥ dhammassavanena ati atthaḥ yathā upajjhāyato

original: ajjhetī”ti, bhagavato santiketi vā attho. Sare nimittaṃ aggahesīti pubbabuddhuppādesu
analyzed: ajjheti iti bhagavato santike iti vā atthaḥ sare nimittam aggahesi iti pubba buddhuppādesu

original: saddhammassavanaparicayena “dhammo eso vuccatī”ti sare ākāraṃ gaṇhi. Pubbābhiyogavaseneva
analyzed: saddhamma ssavana paricayena dhammo eso vuccati iti sare ākāram pubba abhiyoga vasena iva

original: hi īdisānaṃ tiracchānānaṃ dhammassavanādīsu pasādo uppajjati vagguliādīnaṃ viya.
analyzed: hi īdisānam tiracchānānam dhamma ssavana ādīsu pasādaḥ uppajjati vagguli ādīnam viya

original: Itarathā sabbatiracchānānampi tathā pasāduppattippasaṅgato. Yadi hi uppajjeyya, bhagavā
analyzed: itarathā sabba tiracchānānam pi tathā pasāda uppatti pasaṅgataḥ yadi hi uppajjeyya bhagavā

original: anantacakkavāḷesu sabbasattānampi ekakkhaṇe sappāṭihāriyadhammaṃ sāvetuṃ sakkotīti
analyzed: ananta cakkavāḷesu sabba sattānam pi eka khaṇe sappāṭihāriya dhammam sāvetum sakkoti iti

original: sabbasattānampi ito pubbeva vimuttippasaṅgo siyā. Ye pana devamanussanāgasupaṇṇādayo
analyzed: sabba sattānam pi itas pubbā iva vimutti ppasaṅgo siyā ye pana deva manussa nāga supaṇṇa ādayo

original: pakatiyāva kammassakataññāṇādiyuttā honti, teyeva pubbe anupanissayāpi bhagavato
analyzed: pakatiyā va kammassa kata ññāṇa ādi yuttāḥ honti te yeva pubbe an upanissayā api bhagavataḥ

original: saddhammassavanādinā paṭhamaṃ vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ pasādaṃ uppādetuṃ sakkonti, na itareti
analyzed: saddhamma ssavana ādinā paṭhamam vivaṭṭu upanissayam pasādam uppādetum sakkonti na itare iti

original: gahetabbaṃ. Are ahampi nāmāti ettha “kutohaṃ idha nibbattoti oloketvā maṇḍūkabhāvatoti
analyzed: gahetabbam are aham pi nāma ati ettha kutas ham idha nibbattaḥ iti oloketvā maṇḍūka bhāvato ti

original: ñatvā”ti idaṃ ettakampi are ahampi nāmāti vimhayavacaneneva sijjhatīti avuttanti
analyzed: ñatvā iti idam ettakam pi are aham pi nāma ati vimhaya vacanena iva sijjhati iti a vuttam ti

original: veditabbaṃ. Jalanti jalanto vijjotamāno. Maṇḍūkohanti gāthāya udaketi sañjātaṭṭhānadassanaṃ,
analyzed: veditabbam jalanti jalantaḥ vijjotamānaḥ gāthāya udaka iti sañjāta ṭṭhāna dassanam

original: tena thalamaṇḍūkatā nivattanaṃ kataṃ hoti. Udake jātānampi kacchapādīnaṃ thalagocaratāpi
analyzed: tena thala maṇḍūka tā nivattanam katam hoti udake jātānam pi kacchapa ādīnam thala gocara tā api

original: atthīti taṃ nivattanatthaṃ “vārigocaro”ti vuttaṃ, udakasañcārīti attho.
analyzed: atthi iti tam nivattana attham vāri gocaraḥ iti vuttam udaka sañcārī iti attho

original: Vimokkhantikañāṇavasenāti ettha sabbaso kilesehi vimuccatīti vimokkho, aggamaggo,
analyzed: vimokkha antika ñāṇa vasena āti ettha sabbaso kilesehi vimuccati iti vimokkhaḥ aggamaggaḥ

original: tassa anto, aggaphalaṃ, tattha bhavaṃ vimokkhantikaṃ, sabbaññutaññāṇena saddhiṃ sabbampi
analyzed: tassa antaḥ agga phalam tattha bhavam vimokkha antikam sabbaññuta ññāṇena saddhim sabbam pi

original: buddhañāṇaṃ. Idāni sammāsambuddhapadato buddhapadassa visesaṃ dassetuṃ yasmā vātiādi
analyzed: buddha ñāṇam idāni sammāsambuddha padataḥ buddha padassa visesam dassetum yasmā vā ati ādi

original: vuttaṃ. Sammāsambuddhapadena hi satthu paṭivedhañāṇānubhāvo vutto, iminā pana buddhapadena
analyzed: vuttam sammāsambuddha padena hi satthu paṭivedha ñāṇa anubhāvaḥ vuttaḥ iminā pana buddha padena

original: desanāñāṇānubhāvopi, tenāha aññepi satte bodhesītiādi.
analyzed: desanā ñāṇa anubhāvaḥ api tena āha aññe pi satte bodhesi itiādi

original: Guṇavisiṭṭhasattuttamagarugāravādhivacananti sabbehi sīlādiguṇehi visiṭṭhassa tato
analyzed: guṇa visiṭṭha sattuttama garu gārava adhivacananti sabbehi sīla ādi guṇehi visiṭṭhassa tatas

original: eva sabbasattehi uttamassa garuno gāravavasena vuccamānavacanamidaṃ bhagavāti. Seṭṭhanti
analyzed: eva sabba sattehi uttamassa garunaḥ gārava vasena vuccamāna vacanam idam bhagavā ati seṭṭham ti

original: seṭṭhavācakaṃ vacanaṃ seṭṭhaguṇasahacaraṇato. Atha vā vuccatīti vacanaṃ, attho, so
analyzed: seṭṭha vācakam vacanam seṭṭha guṇa sahacaraṇataḥ atha vā vuccati iti vacanam attho so

original: seṭṭhoti attho. Uttamanti etthāpi eseva nayo. Garugāravayuttoti ettha garubhāvo gāravaṃ,
analyzed: seṭṭhaḥ ti attho uttamanti ettha api esa iva nayaḥ garu gārava yutto ti ettha garu bhāvaḥ gāravam

original: garuguṇayogato garukaraṇaṃ vā gāravaṃ, tena sāvakādīnaṃ asādhāraṇatāya garubhūtena
analyzed: garu guṇa yogataḥ garu karaṇam vā gāravam tena asādhāraṇatāya garu bhūtena

original: mahantena gāravena yuttoti garugāravayutto. Atha vā garu ca sabbalokassa sikkhakattā
analyzed: mahantena gāravena yuttaḥ ti garu gārava yuttaḥ atha vā garu ca sabba lokassa sikkha kattā

original: teneva gāravayutto cātipi yojetabbaṃ.
analyzed: tena iva yojetabbam

original: Avatthāya viditaṃ āvatthikaṃ. Evaṃ liṅgikaṃ. Nimittato āgataṃ nemittikaṃ. Adhicca
analyzed: avatthāya viditam āvatthikam evam liṅgikam nimittataḥ āgatam nemittikam adhicca

original: yaṃkiñci nimittaṃ adhivacanavasena anapekkhitvā pavattaṃ adhiccasamuppannaṃ, tenāha
analyzed: yaṃ kiñci nimittam adhivacana vasena an apekkhitvā pavattam adhicca samuppannam tena āha

original: “vacanatthamanapekkhitvā”ti. Yadicchāya āgataṃ yādicchakaṃ. Ettha ca bāhiraṃ daṇḍādi
analyzed: vacana attham an apekkhitvā iti yad icchāyaḥ āgatam yādicchakam ettha ca bāhiram daṇḍa ādi

original: liṅgaṃ, abbhantaraṃ tevijjādi nimittaṃ. Pacurajanavisayaṃ vā dissamānaṃ liṅgaṃ, tabbiparītaṃ
analyzed: liṅgam abbhantaram tevijja ādi nimittam pacura jana visayam vā dissamānam liṅgam tad biparītam

original: nimittanti veditabbaṃ. Sacchikāpaññattīti sabbadhammānaṃ sacchikiriyānimittā paññatti.
analyzed: nimittam ti veditabbam sacchikā paññatti iti sabba dhammānam sacchikiriyā nimittā paññatti

original: Atha vā sacchikāpaññattīti paccakkhasiddhā paññatti. Yaṃguṇanimittā hi sā, te guṇā
analyzed: atha vā sacchikā paññatti iti paccakkha siddhā paññatti yaṃguṇa nimittā hi sā te guṇā

original: satthu paccakkhabhūtāti guṇā viya sāpi sacchikatā eva nāma hoti, na paresaṃ, vohāramattenāti
analyzed: satthu paccakkha bhūtā ati guṇāḥ viya sā api sacchikatā eva nāma hoti na paresam vohāra mattena ati

original: adhippāyo. Yaṃguṇanemittikanti yehi guṇehi nimittabhūtehi etaṃ nāmaṃ nemittikañca
analyzed: adhippāyaḥ yaṃguṇa nemittikam ti yehi guṇehi nimitta bhūtehi etam nāmam nemittikam ca

original: jātaṃ. Vadantīti dhammasenāpatissa garubhāvato bahuvacanenāha, saṅgītikārehi vā katamanuvādaṃ sandhāya.
analyzed: jātam vadanti iti dhammasenāpatissa garu bhāvataḥ bahuvacanena āha saṅgīti kārehi vā katamanuvādam sandhāya

original: Issariyādibhedo bhago assa atthīti bhagī. Maggaphalādiariyaguṇaṃ araññādivivekaṭṭhānañca
analyzed: issariya ādi bhedaḥ bhagaḥ assa atthi iti bhagī magga phala ādi ariya guṇam arañña ādi viveka ṭṭhānam ca

original: bhaji sevi sīlenāti bhajī. Cīvarādipaccayānaṃ attharasādīnañca sīlādiguṇānañca bhāgī,
analyzed: bhaji sevi sīlena ati bhajī cīvara ādi paccayānam attha rasa ādīnam ca sīla ādi guṇānam ca bhāgī

original: dāyādoti attho. Vibhaji uddesaniddesādippakārehi dhammaratanaṃ pavibhajīti vibhattavā.
analyzed: dāyādaḥ ti atthaḥ vibhaji uddesa niddesa ādi ppakārehi dhamma ratanam pavibhaji iti vibhattavā

original: Rāgādipāpadhammaṃ bhaggaṃ akāsīti bhagavāti vuccatīti sabbattha sambandho. Garupi
analyzed: rāga ādi pāpa dhammam bhaggam akāsi iti bhagavā ati vuccati iti sabbattha sambandhaḥ

original: loke bhagavāti vuccatīti āha “garū”ti, yasmā garu, tasmāpi bhagavāti attho. Pāramitāsaṅkhātaṃ
analyzed: loke bhagavā iti vuccati iti āha garu iti yasmai tasmai api bhagavā iti pāramitā saṅkhātam

original: bhagyamassa atthīti bhagyavā. Bahūhi ñāyehīti kāyabhāvanādikehi anekehi bhāvanākkamehi.
analyzed: bhagyam assa atthi iti bhagyavā bahūhi ñāyehi iti kāya bhāvanā ādikehi anekehi bhāvanā kkamehi

original: Subhāvitattanoti paccatte etaṃ sāmivacanaṃ, tena subhāvitasabhāvoti attho. Bhavānaṃ
analyzed: su bhāvita ttano ti paccatte etam sāmi vacanam tena su bhāvita sabhāvaḥ ti atthaḥ bhavānam

original: antaṃ nibbānaṃ gatoti bhavantago. Tattha tattha bhagavāti saddasiddhi niruttinayeneva veditabbā.
analyzed: antam nibbānam gataḥ ti bhavantago tattha tattha bhagavā iti sadda siddhi nirutti nayena iva veditabbā

original: Idāni bhagī bhajīti niddesagāthāya navahi padehi dassitamatthaṃ bhagyavāti gāthāya
analyzed: idāni bhagī bhajī iti niddesa gāthāya navahi padehi dassitam attham bhagī avāti gāthāya

original: chahi padehi saṅgahetvā padasiddhiṃ atthayojanānayabhedehi saddhiṃ dassetuṃ ayaṃ
analyzed: chahi padehi saṅgahetvā pada siddhim attha yojana anaya bhedehi saddhim dassetum ayam

original: pana aparo nayotiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha vaṇṇavipariyayoti ettha iti-saddo ādiattho, teneva
analyzed: pana aparaḥ naya uti ādi vuttam tattha vaṇṇa vipariyayo ti ettha iti saddo ādi attho tena iva

original: vaṇṇavikāro vaṇṇalopo dhātuatthena niyojanañcāti imaṃ tividhaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
analyzed: vaṇṇa vikāraḥ vaṇṇa lopaḥ dhātu atthena niyojanam ca ati imam tividham lakkhaṇam saṅgaṇhāti

original: Saddanayenāti saddalakkhaṇanayena. Pisodarādīnaṃ saddānaṃ ākatigaṇabhāvato vuttaṃ
analyzed: sadda nayena ati sadda lakkhaṇa nayena pisodara ādīnam saddānam ākati gaṇa bhāvataḥ vuttam

original: “pisodarādipakkhepalakkhaṇaṃ gahetvā”ti. Pakkhipanameva lakkhaṇaṃ. Tappariyāpannatākaraṇañhi
analyzed: pisodara ādi pakkhepa lakkhaṇam gahetvā iti pakkhipanam eva lakkhaṇam tad pariyāpanna tā karaṇam hi

original: pakkhipanaṃ. Bhagyanti kusalaṃ.
analyzed: pakkhipanam kusalam

original: Lobhādayo cattāro dosā ekakavasena gahitā. Ahirikādayo dukavasena. Akkocchimantiādinā
analyzed: lobha ādayaḥ cattāraḥ dosāḥ ekaka vasena gahitāḥ ahirika ādayaḥ duka vasena

original: punappunaṃ kujjhanavasena cittapariyonandhano kodhova upanāho. Paresaṃ pubbakāritālakkhaṇassa
analyzed: punappunam kujjhana vasena citta pariyonandhanaḥ kodhaḥ uva upanāhaḥ paresam pubba kāri tā lakkhaṇassa

original: guṇassa nipuñchano makkho nāma. Bahussutādīhi saddhiṃ yugaggāho attano samakaraṇaṃ
analyzed: guṇassa nipuñchanaḥ makkhaḥ nāma bahu ssuta ādīhi saddhim yuga ggāhaḥ attanaḥ sama karaṇam

original: palāso. Attano vijjamānadosapaṭicchādanā māyā. Avijjamānaguṇappakāsanaṃ sāṭheyyaṃ.
analyzed: palāsaḥ attanaḥ vijjamāna dosa paṭicchādanā māyā a vijjamāna guṇa ppakāsanam sāṭheyyam

original: Garūsupi thaddhatā anonatatā thambho. Taduttarikaraṇalakkhaṇo sārambho. Jātiādiṃ
analyzed: thaddha tā an ona ta tā thambho tad uttari karaṇa lakkhaṇo sa ārambhaḥ jāti ādiṃ

original: nissāya unnatilakkhaṇo māno. Abbhunnatilakkhaṇo atimāno. Jātiādiṃ nissāya majjanākārappatto
analyzed: nissāya unnati lakkhaṇaḥ mānaḥ abbhunnati lakkhaṇaḥ atimānaḥ jāti ādim nissāya majjana ākāra ppatto

original: mānova mado nāma. So sattavīsatividho. Kāmaguṇesu cittassa vossaggo pamādo. Kāyaduccaritādīni
analyzed: mānaḥ uva madaḥ nāma so sattavīsatividho kāma guṇesu cittassa vossaggo pamādaḥ kāya duccarita ādīni

original: tividhaduccaritāni. Taṇhādiṭṭhiduccaritavasena tividhasaṃkilesā. Rāgadosamohāva malāni.
analyzed: tividha duccaritāni taṇhā diṭṭhi duccarita vasena tividha saṃkilesāḥ malāni

original: Teyeva kāyaduccaritādayo ca tividhavisamāni. Kāmabyāpādavihiṃsāsaññā tividhasaññā
analyzed: teyeva kāya duccarita ādayo ca tividha visamāni kāma byāpāda vihiṃsā saññā tividha saññā

original: nāma. Teyeva vitakkā. Taṇhādiṭṭhimānā papañcā. Subhasukhaniccaattavipariyesā catubbidhavipariyesā.
analyzed: nāma teyeva vitakkā taṇhā diṭṭhi mānā papañcā subha sukha nicca atta vipariyesā catubbidha vipariyesā

original: Chandādayo agati. Cīvarādīsu paccayesu lobhā cattāro taṇhupādā. Buddhadhammasaṅghasikkhāsu
analyzed: chanda ādayaḥ cīvara ādīsu paccayesu lobhā cattāro taṇhu pādā buddha dhamma saṅgha sikkhāsu

original: kaṅkhā, sabrahmacārīsu kopo ca pañca cetokhīlā. Kāme kāye rūpe ca avītarāgatā, yāvadatthaṃ
analyzed: kaṅkhā sabrahmacārīsu ca pañca cetokhīlā kāme kāye rūpe ca avīta rāga tā yāvadattham

original: bhuñjitvā seyyasukhādianuyogo, aññataraṃ devanikāyaṃ paṇidhāya brahmacariyacaraṇañca
analyzed: bhuñjitvā seyya sukha ādi anuyogaḥ aññataram devanikāyam paṇidhāya brahmacariya caraṇañca

original: pañca cetovinibandhā. Rūpābhinandanādayo pañca abhinandanā. Kodhamakkhaissāsāṭheyyapāpicchatāsandiṭṭhiparāmāsā
analyzed: pañca cetaḥ vinibandhāḥ rūpa abhinandana ādayaḥ pañca abhinandanā

original: cha vivādamūlāni. Rūpataṇhādayo cha taṇhākāyā. Micchādiṭṭhiādayo aṭṭhamaggaṅgapaṭipakkhā
analyzed: cha vivāda mūlāni rūpa taṇhā ādayaḥ cha taṇhā kāyāḥ micchādiṭṭhi ādayo aṭṭha magga aṅga paṭipakkhā

original: micchattā. Taṇhaṃ paṭicca pariyesanā, pariyesanaṃ paṭicca lābho, lābhaṃ paṭicca vinicchayo,
analyzed: micchattā taṇham paṭicca pariyesanā pariyesanam paṭicca lābhaḥ lābham paṭicca vinicchayaḥ

original: taṃ paṭicca chandarāgo, taṃ paṭicca ajjhosānaṃ, taṃ paṭicca pariggaho, taṃ paṭicca
analyzed: tam paṭicca chanda rāgaḥ tam paṭicca ajjhosānam tam paṭicca pariggahaḥ tam paṭicca

original: macchariyaṃ, taṃ paṭicca ārakkhā, ārakkhādhikaraṇaṃ daṇḍādānādianekākusalarāsīti
analyzed: tam paṭicca ārakkhā ārakkha adhikaraṇam daṇḍa ādāna ādi aneka akusala rāsi iti

original: nava taṇhāmūlakā dhammā. Pāṇātipātādayo dasa akusalakammapathā. Cattāro sassatavādā
analyzed: nava taṇhā mūlakā dhammā pāṇātipāta ādayaḥ dasa akusala kammapathā cattāro sassatavādā

original: tathā ekaccasassatavādā antānantikā amarāvikkhepikā dve adhiccasamuppannikā soḷasa
analyzed: tathā ekaccasassatavādā antānantikā amarāvikkhepikā dve adhiccasamuppannikā soḷasa

original: saññīvādā aṭṭha asaññīvādā aṭṭha nevasaññīnāsaññīvādā satta ucchedavādā pañca diṭṭhadhammanibbānavādāti
analyzed: saññī vādāḥ aṭṭha asaññī vādāḥ aṭṭha nevasaññīnāsaññīvādā satta uccheda vādā pañca diṭṭhadhamma nibbāna vādā ati

original: etāni dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhigatāni. Rūpataṇhādichataṇhā eva paccekaṃ kāmataṇhābhavataṇhāvibhavataṇhāvasena
analyzed: etāni dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhi gatāni rūpa taṇhā ādi cha taṇhāḥ eva paccekam kāma taṇhā bhava taṇhā vibhava taṇhā vasena

original: aṭṭhārasa honti, tā ajjhattabahiddharūpādīsu pavattivasena chattiṃsa, puna kālattayavasena
analyzed: aṭṭhārasa honti tāḥ ajjhatta bahiddha rūpa ādīsu pavatti vasena chattiṃsa puna kāla ttaya vasena

original: aṭṭhasatataṇhāvicaritāni honti. Pabheda-saddaṃ paccekaṃ sambandhitvā lobhappabhedotiādinā
analyzed: aṭṭha sata taṇhā vicaritāni honti pabheda saddam paccekam sambandhitvā lobha ppabheda uti ādinā

original: yojetabbaṃ. Sabbadarathapariḷāhakilesasatasahassānīti sabbāni sattānaṃ darathasaṅkhātapariḷāhakarāni
analyzed: yojetabbam sabba daratha pariḷāha kilesa sata sahassāni iti sabbāni sattānam daratha saṅkhāta pariḷāha karāni

original: kilesānaṃ anekāni satasahassāni, ārammaṇādivibhāgato pavattiākāravibhāgato ca nesaṃ
analyzed: kilesānam anekāni sata sahassāni ārammaṇa ādi vibhāgato pavatti ākāra vibhāgato ca nesam

original: evaṃ pabhedo veditabbo. Pañca māre abhañjīti sambandho. Parissayānanti upaddavānaṃ.
analyzed: evam pabhedaḥ veditabbo pañca māre abhañji iti sambandho parissayānam ti upaddavānam

original: Evaṃ bhagyavā bhaggavāti dvinnaṃ padānaṃ atthaṃ vibhajitvā idāni tehi dvīhi gahitamatthaṃ
analyzed: evam bhagyavā bhaggavā ati dvinnam padānam attham vibhajitvā idāni tehi dvīhi gahitam attham

original: dassetuṃ bhagyavantatāya cassātiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha satapuññajalakkhaṇadharassāti
analyzed: dassetum bhagyavanta tāya cassa atiādi vuttam tattha sata puñña ja lakkhaṇa dharassa ati

original: anekasatapuññanibbattamahāpurisalakkhaṇadharassa bhagavato. Sakacitte issariyaṃ nāma
analyzed: aneka sata puñña nibbatta mahā purisa lakkhaṇa dharassa bhagavato saka citte issariyam nāma

original: paṭikkūlādīsu appaṭikkūlasaññitādivasappavattiyā ceva cetosamādhivasena ca attano
analyzed: paṭikkūla ādīsu appaṭikkūla saññita ādi vasa ppavattiyā ca iva cetosamādhi vasena ca attano

original: cittassa vasībhāvāpādanameva. Aṇimā laghimādikanti ādi-saddena mahimā patti pākammaṃ
analyzed: cittassa vasībhāva āpādanam eva aṇimā laghima ādikan ti ādi saddena mahimā patti pākammam

original: īsitā vasitā yatthakāmāvasāyitāti ime chapi saṅgahitā. Tattha kāyassa aṇubhāvakaraṇaṃ
analyzed: īsitā vasitā yattha kāmāvasāyitā ati ime cha pi saṅgahitā tattha kāyassa aṇu bhāva karaṇam

original: aṇimā. Ākāse padasā gamanādiarahabhāvena lahubhāvo laghimā. Kāyassa mahantatāpādanaṃ
analyzed: aṇimā ākāse lahu bhāvaḥ laghimā kāyassa mahanta tā āpādanam

original: mahimā. Iṭṭhadesassa pāpuṇanaṃ patti. Adhiṭṭhānādivasena icchitatthanipphādanaṃ pākammaṃ.
analyzed: mahimā iṭṭha desassa pāpuṇanam patti adhiṭṭhāna ādi vasena icchita attha nipphādanam pākammam

original: Sayaṃvasitā issarabhāvo īsitā. Iddhividhe vasībhāvo vasitā. Ākāsena vā gacchato,
analyzed: sayaṃvasitā issara bhāvaḥ īsitā iddhividhe vasībhāvaḥ vasitā ākāsena vā gacchato

original: aññaṃ vā kiñci karoto yattha katthaci vosānappatti yatthakāmāvasāyitā, “kumārakarūpādidassana”ntipi
analyzed: aññam vā kiñci karotaḥ yattha katthaci vosāna ppatti yattha kāmāvasāyi tā

original: vadanti. Sabbaṅgapaccaṅgasirīti sabbesaṃ aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ sobhā. Atthīti anuvattati.

original: byañjanasampattiyā sabyañjana”nti. Tattha yaṃ atthaṃ sutvā tathā paṭipajjantā sabbadukkhakkhayaṃ

original: pāpuṇanti, tassa tādisasampatti atthasampatti nāma, sampannatthatāti attho. Byañjanasampatti
analyzed: pāpuṇanti tassa tādisa sampatti attha sampatti nāma sampanna ttha tā ati atthaḥ byañjana sampatti

original: nāma sithiladhanitādibyañjanaparipuṇṇāya māgadhikāya sabhāvaniruttiyā gambhīrampi
analyzed: nāma sithila dhanitā ādi byañjana paripuṇṇāya māgadhikāya sabhā va niruttiyā gambhīram pi

original: atthaṃ uttānaṃ katvā dassanasamatthatā sampannabyañjanatāti attho.
analyzed: attham uttānam katvā dassana samattha tā sampanna byañjana tā ati attho

original: Idāni nettippakaraṇanayenāpi (netti 4 dvādasapada) atthaṃ dassetuṃ saṅkāsanātiādi
analyzed: idāni netti pakaraṇa nayena api netti dvādasa pada attham dassetum saṅkāsana atiādi

original: vuttaṃ. Tattha saṅkhepato kāsīyati dīpīyatīti saṅkāsananti kammasādhanavasena attho
analyzed: vuttam tattha saṅkhepato kāsīyati dīpīyati iti saṅkāsanam ti kamma sādhana vasena attho

original: daṭṭhabbo, evaṃ sesesupi. Paṭhamaṃ kāsanaṃ pakāsanaṃ. Ubhayampetaṃ uddesatthavacanasaṅkhātassa
analyzed: daṭṭhabbaḥ evam sesesu pi paṭhamam kāsanam pakāsanam ubhayam petam uddesa ttha vacana saṅkhātassa

original: vitthāravacanaṃ. Sakiṃ vuttassa puna vacanañca vivaraṇavibhajanāni. Ubhayampetaṃ
analyzed: vitthāra vacanam sakim vuttassa puna vacanam ca vivaraṇa vibhajanāni

original: niddesatthavacanaṃ. Vivaṭassa vitthāratarābhidhānaṃ vibhattassa ca pakārehi ñāpanaṃ
analyzed: niddesa attha vacanam vivaṭassa vitthāratara abhidhānam vibhattassa ca pakārehi ñāpanam

original: uttānīkaraṇapaññattiyo. Ubhayampetaṃ paṭiniddesatthavacanasaṅkhātassa vitthāravacanaṃ.
analyzed: uttānīkaraṇa paññattiyaḥ ubhayam petam paṭiniddesa atthavacana saṅkhātassa vitthāra vacanam

original: Atthapadasamāyogatoti yathāvuttāni eva cha padāni pariyattiyā atthavibhāgattā atthapadāni,
analyzed: attha pada samāyogato ti yathā vuttāni eva cha padāni pariyattiyā attha vibhāgattā attha padāni

original: tehi sahitatāya atthakoṭṭhāsayuttattāti attho. Apariyosite pade ādimajjhagatavaṇṇo

original: akkharaṃ, ekakkharaṃ, padaṃ vā akkharaṃ. Vibhattiyantaṃ padaṃ. Padābhihitaṃ atthaṃ

original: byañjetīti byañjanaṃ, vākyaṃ. Kathitassevatthassa anekavidhena vibhāgakaraṇaṃ ākāro

original: nāma. Ākārābhihitassa nibbacanaṃ nirutti. Nibbacanatthavitthāro niddeso. Atha vā

analyzed: akkharehi saṅkāseti padehi pakāseti byañjanehi vivarati ākārehi vibhajati niruttīhi

original: Te panete atthādayo yasmā sasādīhi viya mahāsamuddo mandabuddhīhi dukkhogāhā alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭhā

original: sayaṃ byañjanarūpattā vuttaṃ “dhammagambhīratādesanāgambhīratāhi sabyañjana”nti.

original: Yathāvuttaatthādīsu pabhedagatāni ñāṇāni atthapaṭisambhidādayo. Tattha niruttīti

original: tantipadānaṃ niddhāretvā vacanaṃ, nibbacananti attho. Tīsu paṭisambhidāsu ñāṇaṃ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā.
analyzed: tanti padānam niddhāretvā vacanam nibbacananti atthaḥ tīsu paṭisambhidāsu ñāṇam paṭibhāna paṭisambhidā

original: Lokiyā saddheyyavacanamukheneva atthesu pasīdanti, na atthamukhenāti āha saddheyyatotiādi.

analyzed: kevala saddo sakala adhivacananti āha sakala paripuṇṇa bhāvena ati brahmacariya saddo

original: Yathāvuttamevatthaṃ aparenāpi pariyāyena dassetuṃ api cātiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha sanidānanti

original: Tatrāyaṃ pāḷiyojanākkamo – “verañjo brāhmaṇo samaṇo khalu bho…pe… viharatī”ti ca,
analyzed: tatra ayam verañjaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ samaṇaḥ khalu bhope viharati iti ca

original: “taṃ kho pana bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ ‘itipi so…pe… pavedetī’ti evaṃ kalyāṇo kittisaddo

original: ca assosi, sutvā ca atha kho verañjo brāhmaṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamīti.
analyzed: ca assosi sutvā ca atha kho verañjaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkamī iti

original: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana kiñcāpi “dassanamattampi sādhu hotīti evaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ katvā atha

original: dassanamattampi sādhu hotīti evaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ katvātiādi vuttanti gahetabbaṃ.

analyzed: sakkuṇeyyam roga abhāvena appa ābādham dukkha jīvita abhāvena appa ātaṅkam taṃ taṃ kicca karaṇa tthāya

original: 4. Sandhāya bhāsitamatthanti yaṃ atthaṃ sandhāya brāhmaṇo nibbhogo bhavaṃ gotamotiādimāha, bhagavā ca yaṃ sandhāya nibbhogatādiṃ attani anujānāti, taṃ sandhāya bhāsitamatthaṃ.

original: 5. Kulasamudācārakammanti kulācārakammaṃ. Kāyato kāyadvārato pavattaṃ duccaritaṃ kāyaduccaritaṃ. Anekavihitāti anekappakārā.

analyzed: upari jhāna aṅgānam paccanīka paṭipakkha bhāvassa dassanato ti pi pāṭhaḥ tattha upari vuccamāna jhāna aṅgānam

original: gahaṇavasena sesadhutaṅgānipi gahitāneva hontīti veditabbaṃ. Vajjīnanti vajjīrājūnaṃ.

original: 32. Udakakañjiyanti pānīyaparibhojanīyaudakañca yāgu ca. Tathāti samuccayatthe.Anokappanaṃ asaddahanaṃ, amarisanaṃ asahanaṃ.

original: 35. Attanāti sayaṃ. Sapatino dhanasāmino idaṃ sāpateyyaṃ, dhanaṃ. Tadeva vibhavo.

original: 50. Na ramāmīti pabbajjāya dukkhabahulatāya sukhābhāvaṃ dasseti. Nābhiramāmīti pabbajjāya vijjamānepi anavajjasukhe attano abhiratiabhāvaṃ dasseti.
