original: 51. Teneva vacībhedenāti vacībhedaṃ katvāpi aññena kāyappayogena viññāpanaṃ nivatteti.
analyzed: tena iva vacībhedena ati vacībhedam katvā api aññena kāya ppayogena viññāpanam nivatteti

original: Ayaṃ sāsanaṃ jahitukāmotiādinā bhāsākosallābhāvena sabbaso padatthāvabodhābhāvepi
analyzed: ayam sāsanam jahitu kāmaḥ ti ādinā bhāsa ākosalla abhāvena sabbaso padattha avabodha abhāve pi

original: “ayaṃ attano pabbajitabhāvaṃ jahitukāmo imaṃ vākyabhedaṃ karotī”ti ettakaṃ adhippetatthamattaṃ
analyzed: ayam attanaḥ pabbajita bhāvam jahitu kāmaḥ imam vākya bhedam karoti iti ettakam

original: cepi so tāva jānāti, paccakkhānameva hotīti dasseti. Tenāha “ettakamattampi jānātī”ti.
analyzed: ce pi saḥ tāva jānāti paccakkhānam eva hoti iti dasseti tena āha ettaka mattam pi jānāti iti

original: Padapacchābhaṭṭhanti padaparāvatti, māgadhabhāsato avasiṭṭhā sabbāpi bhāsā “milakkhabhāsā”ti
analyzed: pada pacchābhaṭṭhanti pada parāvatti māgadha bhāsataḥ avasiṭṭhā sabbā api bhāsā milakkha bhāsā ati

original: veditabbā. Khettameva otiṇṇanti sikkhāpaccakkhānassa ruhanaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ khettameva otiṇṇaṃ.
analyzed: veditabbā khettam eva otiṇṇam ti sikkhā paccakkhānassa ruhana ṭṭhāna bhūtam khettam eva otiṇṇam

original: Dūtanti mukhasāsanaṃ. Sāsananti paṇṇasāsanaṃ, bhittithambhādīsu akkharaṃ vā chinditvā
analyzed: dūta nti mukha sāsanam sāsana nti paṇṇa sāsanam bhitti thambha ādīsu akkharam vā chinditvā

original: dasseti. Paccakkhātukāmatācitte dharanteyeva vacībhedasamuppattiṃ sandhāya “cittasampayutta”nti
analyzed: dasseti paccakkhātu kāma tā citte vacī bheda samuppattim sandhāya citta sampayuttan ti

original: vuttaṃ, cittasamuṭṭhānanti attho. Niyamitāniyamitavasena vijānanabhedaṃ dassetumāha
analyzed: vuttam citta samuṭṭhānanti atthaḥ niyamita aniyamita vasena vijānana bhedam dassetum āha

original: yadi ayameva jānātūtiādi. Ayañca vibhāgo vadati viññāpetīti ettha yassa vadati, tasseva
analyzed: yadi ayam eva jānātu utiādi ayam ca vibhāgaḥ vadati viññāpeti iti ettha yassa vadati tassa iva

original: vijānanaṃ adhippetanti iminā vuttanayena laddhoti daṭṭhabbaṃ, na hettha ekassa vadati
analyzed: vijānanam adhippetanti iminā vutta nayena laddhaḥ ti daṭṭhabbam na ha ittha ekassa vadati

original: aññassa viññāpetīti ayamattho sambhavati. “Tesu ekasmiṃ jānantepī”ti vuttattā “dveyeva
analyzed: aññassa viññāpeti iti ayam attho sambhavati tesu ekasmin jānante api iti vutta ttā dveyā iva

original: jānantu eko mā jānātū”ti evaṃ dvinnampi janānaṃ niyametvā ārocitepi tesu ekasmimpi
analyzed: jānantu ekaḥ mā jānātu uti evam dvinnam pi janānam niyametvā ārocite pi tesu ekasmin pi

original: jānante paccakkhānaṃ hotiyevāti gahetabbaṃ. Parisaṅkamānoti “vāressantī”ti āsaṅkamāno.
analyzed: jānante paccakkhānam hotiyā iva ati gahetabbam parisaṅkamānaḥ iti vāressanti iti āsaṅkamānaḥ

original: Samayaññūti sāsanasaṅketaññū, idha pana adhippāyamattajānanenāpi samayaññū nāma hoti,
analyzed: samayaññū ti sāsana saṅketa ññū idha pana adhippāya matta jānanena api samayaññū nāma hoti

original: tenāha ukkaṇṭhitotiādi. Tasmā buddhaṃ paccakkhāmītiādikhettapadānaṃ sabbaso atthaṃ

original: ñatvāpi sace “bhikkhubhāvato cavitukāmatāya esa vadatī”ti adhippāyaṃ na jānāti, appaccakkhātāva
analyzed: ñatvā api sace bhikkhu bhāvataḥ cavitu kāma tāya esa vadati iti adhippāyam na jānāti appaccakkhātā ava

original: hoti sikkhā. Atthaṃ pana ajānitvāpi “ukkaṇṭhito vadatī”ti taṃ jānāti, paccakkhātāva
analyzed: hoti sikkhā attham pana a jānitvā api ukkaṇṭhitaḥ vadati iti tam jānāti paccakkhātā ava

original: hoti sikkhā. Sotaviññāṇavīthiyā saddamattaggahaṇameva, atthaggahaṇaṃ pana manoviññāṇavīthiparamparāyāti
analyzed: hoti sikkhā sota viññāṇa vīthiyā sadda matta ggahaṇam eva attha ggahaṇam pana manaḥ viññāṇa vīthi paramparāya ati

original: āha taṅkhaṇaññevātiādi.
analyzed: āha

original: 53. Vaṇṇapaṭṭhānanti satthuguṇavaṇṇappakāsakaṃ pakaraṇaṃ. Upāligāthāsūti upālisutte

analyzed: upāli gahapatinā dhīrassa vigata mohassa ati ādinā vutta gāthāsu yathārutam ti pāḷiyam

original: vuttamevāti attho. Anantabuddhītiādīni vaṇṇapaṭṭhāne āgatanāmāni. Dhīrantiādīni pana

original: bodhipaññāṇo. Svākkhātaṃ dhammantiādīsu dhamma-saddo svākkhātādipadānaṃ dhammavevacanabhāvaṃ
analyzed: bodhi paññāṇaḥ svākkhātam dhamman ti ādīsu dhamma saddaḥ svākkhāta ādi padānam dhamma vevacana bhāvam

analyzed: dassetum vuttaḥ tasmā su ākkhātam paccakkhāmi iti ādinā vuttā iya iva vevacanena paccakkhānam

analyzed: nāma hoti dhamma saddena saha yojetvā vutte pana yathāruta vasena paccakkhānanti

original: veditabbaṃ. Suppaṭipannaṃ saṅghantiādīsupi eseva nayo. Kusalaṃ dhammantiādīnipi kusalā

original: dhammā akusalā dhammātiādidhammameva sandhāya vuttanāmāni, itarathā akusaladhammapaccakkhāne
analyzed: dhammāḥ akusalāḥ dhamma ati ādi dhammam eva sandhāya vutta nāmāni itarathā akusala dhamma paccakkhāne

original: dosābhāvappasaṅgatoti, tenāha caturāsītidhammakkhandhasahassesūtiādi. Paṭhamapārājikantiādinā
analyzed: dosa abhāva ppasaṅgataḥ ti tena āha catur āsīti dhammakkhandha sahassesu itiādi paṭhama pārājika nti ādinā

analyzed: sikkhāpadānam yeva gahaṇam veditabbam na āpattīnam

original: Yassa mūlenāti yassa santike. Ācariyavevacanesu yo upajjhaṃ adatvā ācariyova hutvā
analyzed: yassa mūlena ati yassa santike ācariya vevacanesu yaḥ upajjham a datvā ācariyā uva hutvā

analyzed: pabbājesi tam sandhāya yaḥ mam pabbājesi iti vuttam tassa mūlena ati tassa santike

original: Okallakoti khuppipāsādidukkhāturānaṃ kisalūkhasarīravesānaṃ gahaṭṭhamanussānaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
analyzed: okallakaḥ ti khudh pipāsā ādi dukkha āturānam kisa lūkha sarīra vesānam gahaṭṭha manussānam adhivacanaṃ

original: Moḷibaddhoti baddhakesakalāpo gahaṭṭho. Kumārakoti kumārāvattho ativiya daharo sāmaṇero.
analyzed: moḷibaddho ti baddha kesa kalāpaḥ gahaṭṭho kumārako ti kumārāvattho ativiya daharaḥ sāmaṇero

original: Cellakoti tato kiñci mahanto. Ceṭakoti majjhimo. Moḷigalloti mahāsāmaṇero. Samaṇuddesoti
analyzed: cellako ti tatas kiñci mahantaḥ ceṭako ti majjhimaḥ moḷigallo ti mahā sāmaṇero samaṇuddeso ti

original: jānanti nu kho, na nu kho”ti attanā, “asukena nu kho idaṃ kata”nti parehi ca saṅkāya
analyzed: jānanti nu kho na nu khoti attanā asukena nu kho idam parehi ca saṅkāya

original: saritabbena anussaritabbena samācārena yutto. Sañjātarāgādikacavarattā kasambujāto.
analyzed: saritabbena anussaritabbena samācārena yuttaḥ sañjāta rāga ādika cavara ttā

original: Koṇṭhoti dussīlādhivacanametaṃ.
analyzed: dussīla adhivacanam etam

analyzed: tattha asambhavato sabhāgassa ati purisassa visabhāgassa ati mātu gāmassa potthaka rūpa sadisassa ati

analyzed: dandha gatika tāya garu paññassa manda paññassa ati vuttam hoti

analyzed: evam vinicchayaḥ veditabbaḥ tattha hi sāmaññā cavitu kāmaḥ ti ādīhi padehi citta niyamam

analyzed: dasseti buddha nti ādīhi padehi khetta niyamam paccakkhāmi dhāreti iti etena kāla niyamam

analyzed: vattamāna kāla vacanam yāni ca alam me buddhena kim nu me buddhena na mamatthaḥ

original: Bhāraṭṭhakathāvaṇṇanā

analyzed: puthujjana bhikkhū ṭhapetvā tad avasese ca puthujjana bhikkhū sabbe ca ariye ayam jīvitā

original: voropesīti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: voropesi iti veditabbam

original: 164. Ekībhāvatoti pavivekato. Uddesaṃ paripucchaṃ gaṇhantīti attano attano ācariyānaṃ
analyzed: ekībhāvataḥ ti uddesam paripuccham gaṇhanti iti attanaḥ attanaḥ

original: santike gaṇhanti, gahetvā ca ācariyehi saddhiṃ bhagavantaṃ upaṭṭhahanti. Tadā pana
analyzed: santike gaṇhanti gahetvā ca ācariyehi saddhim bhagavantam upaṭṭhahanti tadā pana

original: uddesādidāyakā tanubhūtehi bhikkhūhi bhagavantaṃ upagatā, taṃ sandhāya bhagavā pucchati.

original: Ānāpānassatisamādhikathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: āna apāna ssati samādhi kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 165. Dasānussatīsu antogadhāpi ānāpānassati tadā bhikkhūnaṃ bahūnaṃ sappāyataṃ dassetuṃ
analyzed: dasa anussatīsu tadā bhikkhūnam bahūnam sappāyatam dassetuṃ

original: puna gahitā. Tathā hi taṃ bhagavā tesaṃ desesi. Āhāre paṭikkūlasaññā asubhakammaṭṭhānasadisā,
analyzed: puna gahitā tathā hi tam bhagavā tesam desesi āhāre paṭikkūla saññā asubha kammaṭṭhāna sadisā

original: cattāro pana āruppā ādikammikānaṃ ananurūpāti tesaṃ idha aggahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Aññaṃ

original: pariyāyanti arahattādhigamatthāya aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ. Atthayojanākkamanti atthañca yojanākkamañca.
analyzed: pariyāyanti arahatta adhigama tthāya aññam kāraṇam attha yojana ākkamanti attham ca yojana ākkaman ca

original: Assāsavasenāti assāsaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Upaṭṭhānaṃ satīti appamussanatāya
analyzed: assāsa vasena āti assāsam ārammaṇam katvā iti vuttam hoti upaṭṭhānam satī iti appamussana tāya

original: tameva assāsaṃ passāsañca upagantvā ṭhānaṃ, tathā tiṭṭhanakadhammo sati nāmāti attho.
analyzed: tam eva assāsam passāsam ca upagantvā ṭhānam tathā tiṭṭhanaka dhammaḥ sati nāma ati attho

original: Idāni sativaseneva puggalaṃ niddisitukāmena yo assasatītiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha yo assasati,
analyzed: idāni sati vasena iva puggalam niddisitu kāmena yaḥ assasati itiādi vuttam tattha yaḥ assasati

original: tassa sati assāsaṃ upagantvā tiṭṭhatītiādinā attho gahetabbo. Akosallasambhūteti

original: avijjāsambhūte. Khaṇenevāti attano pavattikkhaṇeneva. Ariyamaggassa pādakabhūto ayaṃ
analyzed: avijjā sambhūte khaṇena iva ati attanaḥ pavatti kkhaṇena iva ariya maggassa pādaka bhūtaḥ ayaṃ

original: Opammanidassananti ettha upamāva opammaṃ, tassa nidassanaṃ.
analyzed: opamma nidassanam ti ettha opammam tassa nidassanam

original: Bāhirakā ānāpānassatiṃ jānantā ādito catuppakārameva jānanti, na sabbaṃ soḷasappakāranti

analyzed: āha sabba ppakāra eccādi evam assa etam senāsananti ettha evam ti bhāvanā satiyā yathā vutta nayena

original: ārammaṇe cittassa nibandhane satiyeva, nāsatīti attho, tena muṭṭhassatissa araññavāso
analyzed: ārammaṇe cittassa nibandhane satiyā iva na asatī ti attho tena muṭṭha satissa arañña vāso

original: niratthako ananurūpoti dasseti. Avasesasattavidhasenāsananti “pabbataṃ kandaraṃ giriguhaṃ

original: susānaṃ vanapatthaṃ abbhokāsaṃ palālapuñja”nti evaṃ vuttaṃ. Ututtayānukūlaṃ dhātucariyānukūlanti

original: gimhānādiututtayassa semhādidhātuttayassa mohādicariyattayassa ca anukūlaṃ. Nisajjāya

original: ujukaṃ ṭhapanena, ārammaṇapariggahūpāyaṃ parimukhaṃ satiyā ṭhapanena upadisanto.
analyzed: ujukam ṭhapanena ārammaṇa pariggaha upāyam parimukham satiyā ṭhapanena upadisanto

original: Na paṇamantīti na oṇamanti. Pariggahitaniyyānaṃ satinti sabbathā gahitaṃ sammosapaṭipakkhato
analyzed: na paṇamanti iti na oṇamanti pariggahita niyyānam satim ti sabbathā gahitam sammosa paṭipakkhato

original: niggamanasaṅkhātaṃ satiṃ katvā, paramaṃ satinepakkaṃ upaṭṭhapetvāti attho.
analyzed: niggamana saṅkhātam satim katvā paramam sati nepakkam upaṭṭhapetvā ti attho

original: Satovāti satiyā samannāgato eva. Bāttiṃsāya ākārehīti catūsu catukkesu āgatāni dīgharassādīni
analyzed: satovāti satiyā samannāgataḥ eva vāttiṃsāya ākārehi iti catūsu catukkesu āgatāni dīgha rassa ādīni

analyzed: soḷasa padāni assāsa passāsa vasena dvidhā vibhajitvā vuttehi dvattiṃsa ākārehi dīgha assāsa vasena ati

original: dīghaassāsavasena, vibhattialopaṃ katvā niddeso, dīghanti vā bhagavatā vuttaassāsavasena.
analyzed: dīgha assāsa vasena vibhatti a lopam katvā niddesaḥ dīghan ti vā bhagavatā vutta assāsa vasena

original: Cittassa ekaggataṃ avikkhepanti vikkhepapaṭipakkhabhāvato “avikkhepo”ti laddhanāmaṃ
analyzed: cittassa ekagga tam a vikkhepanti vikkhepa paṭipakkha bhāvataḥ avikkhepaḥ ti laddha nāmam

analyzed: cittassa ekagga bhāvam pajānataḥ paṭinissagga anupassī assāsa vasena ati paṭinissagga anupassī

original: hutvā assāsavasena, “paṭinissaggānupassiassāsanavasenā”ti vā pāṭho, tassa paṭinissaggānupassino

original: Tatthāti bahinikkhamanaantopavisanavātesu, tassa ca paṭhamaṃ abbhantaravāto nikkhamatīti
analyzed: tattha ati bahi nikkhamana antopavisana vātesu tassa ca paṭhamam abbhantara vātaḥ nikkhamati iti

analyzed: iminā sambandhaḥ sabbesam pi gabbhaseyyakānam ti ādinā dārakānam pavatti kkamena

analyzed: bahi nikkhamana vāto ti gahetabbanti dīpeti iti keci vadanti suttanayaḥ eva ca ittha assa āsa ādi majjha pariyosānam

analyzed: satiyā anugacchataḥ ajjhattam vikkhepa gatena cittena kāyaḥ api cittam pi sāraddhā ca honti

analyzed: iñjitā ca phanditā ca passa āsa ādi majjha pariyosānam satiyāḥ anugacchataḥ bahiddhā vikkhepa gatena

original: cittena kāyopi cittampi sāraddhā ca honti iñjitā ca phanditā cā”ti imāya pāḷiyā sametīti
analyzed: cittena kāyaḥ api cittam pi sāraddhā ca honti iñjitā ca phanditā ca ati imāya pāḷiyā sameti iti

original: gahetabbaṃ. Addhānavasenāti kāladdhānavasena. Ayañhi addhāna-saddo kālassa desassa
analyzed: gahetabbam addhāna vasena ati kāla ddhāna vasena ayam hi addhāna saddo kālassa desassa

original: ca vācako. Tattha yathā hītiādinā desaddhānaṃ upamāvasena dassitaṃ. Idāni tabbisiṭṭhakāladdhānavasena
analyzed: ca tattha yathā hi iti ādinā desa ddhānam upamā vasena dassitam idāni

original: assāsapassāsānaṃ dīgharassataṃ upameyyavasena vibhāvetuṃ evantiādi vuttaṃ. Cuṇṇavicuṇṇā
analyzed: assāsa passāsānam upameyya vasena vibhāvetum eva nti ādi vuttam cuṇṇa vicuṇṇā

original: anekakalāpabhāvena. Ettha ca hatthiādisarīre sunakhādisarīre ca assāsapassāsānaṃ
analyzed: aneka kalāpa bhāvena ettha ca hatthi ādi sarīre sunakha ādi sarīre ca assāsa passāsānam

original: desaddhānavisiṭṭhakāladdhānavaseneva dīgharassatā vuttāti veditabbā attabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ

analyzed: dīgham sa ṇikam pūretvā iti ādi vacanataḥ tesanti sattānam te iti assāsa passāsā

original: Ittaramaddhānanti appakaṃ kālaṃ. Navahākārehīti bhāvanamanuyuñjantassa pubbenāparaṃ

analyzed: a laddha visesassa kevalam addhāna vasena āditaḥ vuttā tayo ākārā te ca kassaci

original: kassaci passāsova, kassaci tadubhayampi upaṭṭhātīti tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ vasena vuttā,

analyzed: dīgham assa āsa ādīsu ekena akārena

analyzed: addhāna saṅkhātā iti dīghe okāsaddhāna saṅkhāte atta bhāve kāladdhāne api vā evam upari

analyzed: pamodaḥ khuddaka ādi bhedā taruṇā pīti uppajjati cittam vivattati iti paṭibhāga nimitte

original: uppanne pakatiassāsapassāsato cittaṃ nivattati. Upekkhā saṇṭhātīti tasmiṃ paṭibhāganimitte
analyzed: uppanne pakati assāsa passāsato cittam nivattati upekkhā saṇṭhāti iti tasmim paṭibhāga nimitte

original: tannissayabhūte karajakāye ca kāyasseva anupassanā niccādibhāvaṃ vā itthipurisasattajīvādibhāvaṃ

original: Ittaravasenāti parittakālavasena. Tādisoti dīgho rasso ca. Vaṇṇāti dīghādiākārā.
analyzed: ittara vasena ati paritta kāla vasena tādisaḥ iti dīghaḥ rassaḥ ca vaṇṇā ati dīgha ādi ākārā

original: Nāsikaggeva bhikkhunoti nāsikagge vā, vā-saddena uttaroṭṭhe vāti attho. Tasmāti yasmā
analyzed: nāsikā aggā iva bhikkhuno ti nāsikā agge vā vā saddena uttaroṭṭhe vā ti attho tasmā iti yasmā

original: “ādimajjhapariyosānavasena sabbaṃ assāsapassāsakāyaṃ viditaṃ pākaṭaṃ karissāmī”ti
analyzed: ādi majjha pariyosāna vasena sabbam assāsa passāsa kāyam viditam pākaṭam karissāmi iti

original: pubbe pavattaābhogavasena pacchā tathā samuppannena ñāṇasampayuttacittena taṃ assāsapassāsakāyaṃ
analyzed: pubbe pavatta ābhoga vasena pacchā tathā samuppannena ñāṇa sampayutta cittena tam assāsa passāsa kāyam

original: evaṃ viditaṃ pākaṭaṃ karonto assasati ceva passasati ca, tasmā evaṃbhūto sabbakāyapaṭisaṃvedī

original: assasissāmi passasissāmīti sikkhati nāma, na pana “anāgate evaṃ karissāmī”ti cintanamattena
analyzed: assasissāmi passasissāmi iti sikkhati nāma na pana anāgate evam karissāmi iti cintana mattena

analyzed: saḥ evam vuccati iti adhippāyaḥ tathābhūtassa ati ādi majjha pariyosānam viditam karontassa

original: Saṃvaroti sati vīriyampi vā. Na aññaṃ kiñcīti sabbakāyaṃ viditaṃ karissāmītiādikaṃ
analyzed: saṃvaroti sati vīriyam pi vā na aññam kiñci iti sabba kāyam viditam karissāmi iti ādikam

original: pubbābhogaṃ sandhāya vadati. Ñāṇuppādanādīsūti ādi-saddena kāyasaṅkhārapassambhanapītipaṭisaṃvedanādiṃ
analyzed: pubba ābhogam sandhāya vadati ñāṇa uppādana ādīsu iti ādi saddena kāya saṅkhāra passambhana pīti paṭisaṃvedana ādim

original: saṅgaṇhāti. Kāyasaṅkhāranti assāsapassāsaṃ. So hi cittasamuṭṭhānopi samāno karajakāyapaṭibaddhavuttitāya
analyzed: saṅgaṇhāti kāya saṅkhāran ti assāsa passāsam saḥ hi citta samuṭṭhānaḥ api samānaḥ karaja kāya paṭibaddha vutti tāya

original: tena saṅkharīyatīti kāyasaṅkhāroti vuccati. Apariggahitakāleti kammaṭṭhānassa anāraddhakāle,
analyzed: tena saṅkharīyati iti kāya saṅkhāraḥ ti vuccati a pariggahita kāle ti kammaṭṭhānassa anāraddha kāle

original: tadārambhatthāya kāyacittānampi apariggahitakāleti attho. Nisīdati pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā
analyzed: tad ārambha tthāya kāya cittānam pi a pariggahita kāle iti atthaḥ nisīdati pallaṅkam ābhujitvā

original: ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāyāti hi iminā kāyapariggaho, parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvāti iminā
analyzed: ujum kāyam paṇidhāya ati hi iminā kāya pariggahaḥ parimukham satim upaṭṭhapetvā ati iminā

original: cittapariggaho vutto. Adhimattanti balavaṃ oḷārikaṃ, liṅgavipallāsena vuttaṃ. Kāyasaṅkhāro
analyzed: citta pariggahaḥ vuttaḥ adhimatta nti balavam oḷārikam liṅga vipallāsena vuttam kāya saṅkhāro

original: hi adhippeto. Adhimattaṃ hutvā pavattatīti kiriyāvisesanaṃ vā etaṃ. Sabbesaṃyevāti ubhayesampi.
analyzed: hi adhippetaḥ adhimattam hutvā pavattati iti kiriyā visesanam vā etam sabbesam yeva ati ubhayesam pi

original: Mahābhūtapariggahe sukhumoti catudhātumukhena vipassanābhinivesaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
analyzed: mahābhūta pariggahe sukhumaḥ ti catu dhātu mukhena vipassanā abhinivesam sandhāya vuttam

original: Lakkhaṇārammaṇikavipassanāyāti kalāpasammasanamāha. Nibbidānupassanato paṭṭhāya balavavipassanā,
analyzed: lakkhaṇa ārammaṇika vipassanāya iti kalāpa sammasanam āha nibbida anupassanataḥ paṭṭhāya balava vipassanā

original: tato oraṃ dubbalavipassanā. Pubbe vuttanayenāti apariggahitakāletiādinā samathanaye vuttanayena.
analyzed: tatas oram dubbala vipassanā pubbe vutta nayena ati a pariggahita kāla iti ādinā samatha naye vutta nayena

original: Codanāsodhanāhīti anuyogaparihārehi. Kathantiādi paṭisambhidāpāḷi, tattha kathaṃ
analyzed: anuyoga parihārehi tattha kathaṃ

original: sikkhatīti sambandho. Iti kirātiādi codakavacanaṃ. Iti kirāti evañceti attho. Assāsapassāso
analyzed: sikkhati iti sambandhaḥ iti kirāti ādi codaka vacanam iti kirāti evañca iti atthaḥ assāsa passāso

original: sabbathā abhāvaṃ upaneti ceti codakassa adhippāyo. Vātūpaladdhiyāti assāsapassāsavātassa
analyzed: sabbathā abhāvam upaneti ca iti codakassa adhippāyaḥ vātu upaladdhiyā ati assāsa passāsa vātassa

original: abhāvena tabbisayāya upaladdhiyā bhāvanācittassa uppādo vaḍḍhi ca na hotīti attho.
analyzed: abhāvena tad visayāya upaladdhiyāḥ bhāvanā cittassa uppādaḥ vaḍḍhi ca na hoti iti attho

original: Na ca nanti ettha nanti nipātamattaṃ. Puna iti kirātiādi yathāvuttāya codanāya vissajjanā,
analyzed: na ca ettha nanti nipāta mattam punar iti kirāti ādi yathāvuttāya codanāya vissajjanā

original: tattha iti kira sikkhatīti mayā vuttākārena yadi sikkhatīti attho. Pabhāvanā hotīti
analyzed: tattha iti kira sikkhati iti mayā vutta ākārena yadi sikkhati iti atthaḥ pabhāvanā hoti iti

original: yadipi oḷārikā kāyasaṅkhārā paṭippassambhanti, sukhumā pana atthevāti bhāvanāyapi
analyzed: yadi pi oḷārikā kāya saṅkhārā sukhumā pana

original: vaḍḍhi hotevāti adhippāyo. Kaṃseti kaṃsabhājane. Nimittanti nimittassa, tesaṃ saddānaṃ
analyzed: vaḍḍhi hotā iva āti adhippāyaḥ kaṃse ti kaṃsa bhājane nimittam ti nimittassa tesam saddānam

original: pavattiākārassāti attho. Sukhumakā saddāti anurave āha. Sukhumasaddanimittārammaṇatāpīti
analyzed: pavatti ākārassa ti attho sukhumakā saddā ti anurave āha sukhuma sadda nimitta ārammaṇa tā api iti

original: sukhumo saddova nimittaṃ tadārammaṇatāyapi.
analyzed: sukhumaḥ saddaḥ iva nimittam

original: Ābhisamācārikasīlanti ettha abhisamācāroti uttamasamācāro, tadeva ābhisamācārikaṃ
analyzed: ābhisamācārika sīlanti ettha abhisamācāro ti uttama samācāraḥ tat eva ābhisamācārikam

analyzed: sīlam khandhaka vatta pariyāpannassa sīlassa itam adhivacanaṃ aham sīlam rakkhāmi iti

original: ubhatovibhaṅgapariyāpannaṃ sīlaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Āvāsoti āvāsapalibodho. Kulantiādīsupi

original: eseva nayo. Kammanti navakammaṃ. Iddhīti pothujjanikā iddhi, sā vipassanāya palibodho.
analyzed: esa iva nayo kammanti nava kammam iddhi iti pothujjanikā iddhi sā vipassanāya palibodhaḥ

original: So upacchinditabboti visuddhimagge vuttena tassa tassa palibodhassa upacchedappakārena
analyzed: so upacchinditabbo ti visuddhi magge vuttena tassa tassa palibodhassa upaccheda ppakārena

original: upacchinditabbo. Yogānuyogoti yogassa bhāvanāya anuyuñjanaṃ. Aṭṭhatiṃsārammaṇesūti

original: ālokākāsakasiṇadvayaṃ vajjetvā pāḷiyaṃ āgatānaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ kasiṇānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ,

original: cattārīsaññeva pana kammaṭṭhānāni. Yathāvutteneva nayenāti yogānuyogakammassa padaṭṭhānattāti
analyzed: pana kammaṭṭhānāni yathā vuttena iva nayena ati yoga anuyoga kammassa padaṭṭhāna ttā ti

original: imamatthaṃ atidisati. Imināva kammaṭṭhānenāti iminā ānāpānassatikammaṭṭhānena. Mahāhatthipathaṃ

analyzed: nīharantaḥ viya ati kammaṭṭhāna vīthim mahā hatthi maggam katvā dassentaḥ viya

original: Vuttappakāramācariyanti “imināva kammaṭṭhānena catutthajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā vipassanaṃ

original: vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pattassā”tiādinā heṭṭhā vuttappakāraṃ ācariyaṃ. “Piyo garu bhāvanīyo”tiādinā
analyzed: vaḍḍhetvā arahattam pattassa atiādinā heṭṭhā vutta ppakāram ācariyam piyaḥ garu bhāvanīyaḥ iti ādinā

original: visuddhimagge vuttappakāramācariyantipi vadanti. Pañcasandhikanti pañcapabbaṃ, pañcabhāganti
analyzed: visuddhi magge vutta ppakāram ācariyanti pi vadanti pañca sandhikam ti pañca pabbam pañca bhāgam ti

original: sallakkhaṇaṃ, tenāha “kammaṭṭhānasabhāvūpadhāraṇanti vuttaṃ hotī”ti.
analyzed: sat lakkhaṇam tena āha kammaṭṭhāna sabhāva upadhāraṇam ti vuttam hoti iti

original: Aṭṭhārasasenāsanadosavivajjitanti mahattaṃ navattaṃ jiṇṇattaṃ panthanissitattaṃ soṇḍipaṇṇapupphaphalayuttatā
analyzed: aṭṭhārasa senāsana dosa vivajjitanti mahattam navattam jiṇṇattam pantha nissitattam soṇḍi paṇṇa puppha phala yutta tā

original: patthanīyatā nagaradārukhettasannissitatā visabhāgānaṃ puggalānaṃ atthitā paṭṭanasannissitatā

analyzed: pañcaṅga samannāgatam hoti iti

analyzed: ekam divā appa ākiṇṇa tā ādi ekam appaḍaṃsa ādi tā ekam cīvara ādi lābhaḥ ekam therānam bhikkhūnam

analyzed: nivāsaḥ ekam ti evam pañcaṅgāni veditabbāni

original: Upacchinnakhuddakapalibodhenāti dīghānaṃ kesādīnaṃ haraṇena pattacīvarādīnaṃ pacanatunnakaraṇarajanādikaraṇehi

analyzed: tatas eka padam pi iti eka koṭṭhāsam pi

original: ca phusanāya ca ṭhapanāya ca manasikarotīti vuccatī”ti ettakameva vuttanti gahetabbaṃ.

original: Yā accantāya na minoti na vinicchanati, sā mānassa samīpeti upamānaṃ siddhasādisena
analyzed: yā accantāya na minoti na sā mānassa samīpā iti upamānam siddhasādisena

original: sādhyasādhanaṃ yathā go viya gavayoti. Paṅguḷoti pīṭhasappī. Dolāti peṅkholo. Kīḷatanti
analyzed: sādhya sādhanam yathā go paṅguḷa iti pīṭhasappī

original: kīḷantānaṃ. Upanibandhanatthambhamūleti nāsikaggaṃ mukhanimittañca sandhāya vuttaṃ.
analyzed: upanibandhana thambha mūlā iti nāsikaggam mukha nimittam ca sandhāya vuttam

original: Ādito pabhutīti upameyyatthadassanato paṭṭhāya. Nimittanti upanibandhananimittaṃ
analyzed: āditas pabhuti iti upameyyattha dassanato paṭṭhāya nimittam ti upanibandhana nimittam

original: nāsikaggaṃ, mukhanimittaṃ vā. Anārammaṇamekacittassāti assāsapassāsānaṃ ekakkhaṇe
analyzed: nāsikaggam mukha nimittam vā anārammaṇam eka cittassa ati assāsa passāsānam eka khaṇe

original: appavattanato ekassa cittassa tayopi ārammaṇaṃ na honti, nimittena saha assāso passāso
analyzed: appavattanato ekassa cittassa tayaḥ api ārammaṇam na honti nimittena saha assāsaḥ passāsaḥ

original: vāti dveyeva ekakkhaṇe ārammaṇaṃ hontīti attho. Ajānato ca tayo dhammeti nimittaṃ
analyzed: vā ti dveye iva eka kkhaṇe ārammaṇam honti iti attho a jānataḥ ca tayo dhamme iti nimittam

original: assāso passāsoti ime tayo dhamme ārammaṇakaraṇavasena avindantassa, ca-saddo byatireko,
analyzed: assāso passāso ti ime tayaḥ dhamme ārammaṇa karaṇa vasena avindantassa casaddaḥ byatirekaḥ

original: tena evañca sati ayaṃ aniṭṭhappasaṅgoti byatirekaṃ dasseti. Bhāvanāti ānāpānassatibhāvanā.
analyzed: tena evam ca sati ayam aniṭṭha ppasaṅgo ti byatirekam dasseti bhāvanā ti āna apāna ssati bhāvanā

original: Kathaṃ ime…pe… visesamadhigacchatīti idaṃ parihāragāthāya vuttamevatthaṃ kakacopamāya
analyzed: katham visesam adhigacchati iti idam parihāra gāthāya vuttam evattham kakaca upamāya

original: vivarituṃ pucchāṭhapanaṃ. Tattha kathaṃ-saddo paccekaṃ yojetabbo “kathamime aviditā…pe…
analyzed: vivaritum pucchā ṭhapanam tattha kathaṃsaddaḥ paccekam yojetabbo katham ime a vidita āpe

original: kathaṃ visesamadhigacchatī”ti. Padhānanti bhāvanānipphādakaṃ vīriyaṃ. Payoganti nīvaraṇavikkhambhakaṃ
analyzed: katham visesam adhigacchati iti padhānam ati bhāvanā nipphādakam vīriyam payogam ati nīvaraṇa vikkhambhakam

original: bhāvanānuyogaṃ. Visesanti arahattapariyosānavisesaṃ. Padhānanti rukkhassa chedanavīriyaṃ.
analyzed: bhāvanā anuyogam arahatta pariyosāna visesam padhānanti rukkhassa chedana vīriyam

original: Payoganti tasseva chedanakakiriyaṃ. Kiñcāpettha “visesamadhigacchatī”ti upamāyaṃ
analyzed: tassa iva chedanaka kiriyam kiñca apa ittha visesam adhigacchati iti upamāyam

original: na vuttaṃ, tathāpi atthato yojetabbameva. Yathā rukkhotiādi upamāsaṃsandanaṃ. Nāsikagge
analyzed: na vuttam tathā api atthataḥ yojetabbam eva yathā rukkha uti ādi upamā saṃsandanam nāsikagge

original: vā mukhanimitte vāti dīghanāsiko nāsikagge, itaro mukhaṃ nimiyati chādiyati etenāti
analyzed: vā mukha nimitte vāti dīgha nāsikaḥ nāsikagge itaraḥ mukham etena ati

original: mukhanimittanti laddhanāme uttaroṭṭhe.
analyzed: mukha nimittanti laddha nāme uttara uṭṭhe

original: Idaṃ padhānanti yena vīriyārambhena kāyopi cittampi bhāvanākammassa arahaṃ idha padhānanti
analyzed: idam padhānam ti yena vīriya ārambhena kāyaḥ api cittam pi bhāvanā kammassa araham idha padhānam ti

original: phalena hetuṃ dasseti. Upakkilesāti nīvaraṇā. Vitakkāti kāmavitakkādimicchāvitakkā,
analyzed: phalena hetum dasseti upakkilesā ati nīvaraṇā vitakkā ati kāma vitakka ādim icchā vitakkā

original: nīvaraṇappahānena vā paṭhamajjhānādhigamaṃ dassetvā vitakkūpasamāpadesena dutiyajjhānādīnamadhigamamāha.
analyzed: nīvaraṇa ppahānena vā paṭhama jhāna adhigamam dassetvā vitakka upasama apadesena dutiya jhāna ādīnam adhigamam āha

original: Ayaṃ payogoti ayaṃ jhānādhigamassa hetubhūto kammaṭṭhānānuyogasaṅkhāto payogo. Saṃyojanā
analyzed: ayam payogo ti ayam jhāna adhigamassa hetu bhūto kammaṭṭhāna anuyoga saṅkhāto payogo saṃyojanā

original: pahīyantīti dasapi saṃyojanāni maggapaapāṭiyā samucchedavasena pahīyanti. Byantī
analyzed: pahīyanti iti saṃyojanāni magga paapāṭiyā samuccheda vasena pahīyanti

original: hontīti tathā sattapi anusayā bhaṅgamattassapi anavasesato vigatantā honti. Ayaṃ
analyzed: honti iti tathā satta pi anusayāḥ bhaṅga mattassa pi anavasesataḥ vigata antāḥ honti ayam

original: visesoti imaṃ samādhiṃ nissāya anukkamena labbhamāno ayaṃ saṃyojanappahānādiko imassa
analyzed: visesaḥ ti imam samādhim nissāya anukkamena labbhamānaḥ ayam saṃyojana pahāna ādiko imassa

original: samādhissa visesoti attho. Evaṃ ime tayo dhammātiādi nigamanavacanaṃ. Paripuṇṇāti
analyzed: samādhissa visesaḥ ti atthaḥ evam ime tayo dhammā ti ādi nigamana vacanam paripuṇṇāti

original: soḷasannaṃ vatthūnaṃ pāripūriyā sabbaso puṇṇā. Anupubbanti anukkamena. Paricitāti
analyzed: soḷasannam vatthūnam pāripūriyā sabbaso puṇṇā anupubbanti anukkamena paricitā ati

original: pariciṇṇā. Imaṃ lokanti khandhādilokaṃ paññāpabhāsena pabhāseti.
analyzed: pariciṇṇāḥ imam lokam ti khandha ādi lokam paññā pabhāsena pabhāseti

original: Idhāti imasmiṃ ṭhāne. Assāti upamābhūtassa kakacassa. Ānayane payojananti yojetabbaṃ.
analyzed: idha ati imasmin ṭhāne assa ati upamā bhūtassa kakacassa ānayane payojanam ti yojetabbam

original: Nimittanti paṭibhāganimittaṃ. Avasesajhānaṅgapaṭimaṇḍitāti vitakkādiavasesajhānaṅgapaṭimaṇḍitāti
analyzed: nimittam ti paṭibhāga nimittam avasesa jhān aṅga paṭimaṇḍitā ati vitakka ādi avasesa jhān aṅga paṭimaṇḍitā ati

original: vadanti. Vicārādīhīti pana vattabbaṃ nippariyāyena vitakkassa appanābhāvato. So hi
analyzed: vadanti vicāra ādīhi iti pana vattabbam nippariyāyena vitakkassa appanā bhāvato so hi

original: “appanā byappanā”ti niddiṭṭho. Evañhi sati avasesa-saddo upapanno hoti, vitakkasampayogato
analyzed: appanā byappanā iti niddiṭṭhaḥ evam hi sati avasesa saddaḥ upapannaḥ hoti vitakka sampayogato

original: vā jhānaṅgesu padhānabhūto samādhi appanāti katvā “avasesajhānaṅgapaṭimaṇḍitā appanāsaṅkhātā
analyzed: vā jhāna aṅgesu padhāna bhūto samādhi appanā ati katvā avasesa jhāna aṅga paṭimaṇḍitā appanā saṅkhātā

original: ṭhapanā ca sampajjatī”ti vuttaṃ. Kassaci pana gaṇanāvaseneva manasikārakālato pabhutīti
analyzed: ṭhapanā ca sampajjati iti vuttam kassaci pana gaṇanā vasena iva manasikāra kālato pabhuti iti

original: ettha “anukkamato…pe… pattaṃ viya hotī”ti upari vakkhamāno gantho purāṇapotthakesu

original: dissati, tasmā ayaṃ pāṭho etthāpi likhitabbo, lekhakānaṃ pana dosena gaḷitoti veditabbo.

original: Oḷārike assāsapassāse niruddhetiādi heṭṭhā vuttanayampi vicetabbākārappattassa kāyasaṅkhārassa

original: vicayanavidhiṃ dassetuṃ ānītaṃ. Desatoti pubbe phusanavasena gahitaṭṭhānato. Nimittaṃ
analyzed: vicayana vidhim dassetum ānītam desataḥ ti pubbe phusana vasena gahita ṭṭhānataḥ nimittam

analyzed: paṭṭhapetabbanti pubbe gahita ākāra nimitta ggāhikā saññā phusana ṭṭhāne paṭṭhapetabbā

original: Imameva hi atthavasanti imaṃ anupaṭṭhahantassa ārammaṇassa upaṭṭhānavidhisaṅkhātaṃ
analyzed: imam eva hi atthavasanti imam an upaṭṭhahantassa ārammaṇassa upaṭṭhāna vidhi saṅkhātam

analyzed: kāraṇam paṭicca itas ti āna apāna kammaṭṭhānataḥ garuka tā ca bhāvanā dukkara tāya ati āha

analyzed: vā ubhayam pi hi idha ekajjham vuttam tathā hi tūla picu ādi upamattayam uggahe yujjati sesam ubhayattha

original: Tārakarūpaṃ viyāti tārakāya sarūpaṃ viya. Saññānānatāyāti nimittupaṭṭhānato pubbe
analyzed: tāraka rūpam viyāti tārakāya sarūpam viya saññā nānatāya ati nimitta upaṭṭhānato pubbe

analyzed: pavatta saññānam nānatāya saññajanti bhāvanā saññāya parikappitam na uppāditam a vijjamāna ttā

analyzed: tena āha nānatas upaṭṭhāti iti evam hoti iti bhāvanam anuyuttassa evam upaṭṭhāti evam ti

original: evaṃ sati, yathāvuttanayena nimitte eva cittassa ṭhapane satīti attho. Ito pabhutīti
analyzed: evam sati yathā vutta nayena nimitte eva cittassa ṭhapane sati iti attho itas pabhuti iti

analyzed: cittam ṭhapantaḥ nānā ākāranti cattāraḥ evam vuttam nānā ākāram vibhāvayanti

analyzed: vibhāventaḥ antaradhāpentaḥ nimitta uppattitaḥ paṭṭhāya hi te ākārāḥ a manasikaroto antarahitā

original: viya honti. Assāsapassāseti assāse passāse ca yo nānākāro, taṃ vibhāvayaṃ assāsapassāsasambhūte
analyzed: viya honti assāsa passāse iti assāse passāse ca yaḥ nānā ākāraḥ tam vibhāvayan assāsa passāsa sambhūte

original: yujjeyya. Ayañhettha attho – assāsapassāse nānākāraṃ vibhāvento pajānanto tattha
analyzed: yujjeyya ayam ha ittha atthaḥ assāsa passāse nānākāram vibhāventaḥ pajānantaḥ tattha

original: yaṃ laddhaṃ nimittaṃ, tasmiṃ cittaṃ ṭhapento anukkamena sakaṃ cittaṃ nibandhati appetīti.
analyzed: yam laddham nimittam tasmin cittam ṭhapentaḥ anukkamena sakam cittam nibandhati appeti iti

original: Kilesāti avasesakilesā. Sannisinnāyevāti aladdhanīvaraṇasahāyā olīnāyeva. Upacārabhūmiyanti
analyzed: kilesā ati avasesa kilesā sannisinnāya iva ati a laddha nīvaraṇa sahāyā olīnāya iva upacāra bhūmiyanti

analyzed: upacārau attha ayam lakkhaṇato ti vikkhambhana ādi sabhāvataḥ vā anicca ādi sabhāvataḥ vā gocaraḥ ti

original: bhikkhācāragāmo. Yattha dullabhā sappāyabhikkhā, so asappāyo, itaro sappāyo. Bhassanti
analyzed: bhikkhā cāra gāmaḥ yattha dullabhā sappāya bhikkhā so asappāyaḥ itaro sappāyo

original: dasakathāvatthunissitaṃ bhassaṃ, taṃ sappāyaṃ, itaramasappāyaṃ. Sesesu āvāsādīsu

original: gahetabbaṃ. Yassa pana evaṃ sattavidhaṃ asappāyaṃ vajjetvā sappāyameva sevantassapi

original: Tattha vatthuvisadakiriyā nāma kesanakhacchedanādīhi ajjhattikassa sarīravatthussa,

original: cīvarasenāsanādidhovanaparikammādīhi bāhiravatthussa ca visadabhāvakaraṇaṃ. Evañhi
analyzed: cīvara senāsana ādi dhovana parikamma ādīhi bāhira vatthussa ca visada bhāva karaṇam evam hi

original: ñāṇampi visadakiccanipphattikaraṃ hoti. Indriyasamattapaṭipādanatā nāma saddhādīnaṃ

original: indriyānaṃ samabhāvakaraṇaṃ. Nimittakusalatā nāma bhāvanāya laddhanimittassa rakkhaṇakosallaṃ.

original: Yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ niggahetabbantiādīsu yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ accāraddhatādīhi kāraṇehi

original: uddhatatāya niggahetabbaṃ, tadā dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādayo tayo abhāvetvā passaddhādīnaṃ

analyzed: līna tāya paggahetabbam tadā passaddhi sambojjhaṅga ādayaḥ tayaḥ a bhāvetvā dhammavicaya ādīnam

original: tiṇṇaṃ bhāvanena cittassa paggaṇhanaṃ hoti. Yadāssa paññāpayogamandatādīhi nirassādaṃ
analyzed: tiṇṇam bhāvanena cittassa paggaṇhanam hoti paññā apayoga manda tā ādīhi

original: samappavattaṃ samathavīthipaṭipannañca cittaṃ hoti, tadā tassa paggahaniggahasampahaṃsanesu

original: abyāpāratāsamāpajjanena ajjhupekkhanā hoti.
analyzed: abyāpāra tā samāpajjanena ajjhupekkhanā hoti

original: Tadadhimuttatā nāma samādhiadhimuttatā, samādhininnapoṇapabbhāratāti attho. Etthāti etissaṃ kāyānupassanāyaṃ.
analyzed: tad adhimutta tā nāma samādhi adhimutta tā samādhi ninna poṇa pabbhāratā ati attho ettha ati etissam kāya anupassanā ayam

original: Pārisuddhiṃ pattukāmoti phalaṃ adhigantukāmo samāpajjitukāmo ca. Tattha sallakkhaṇāvivaṭṭanāvasena

original: samāpajjitukāmopīti evamattho gahetabbo. Āvajjanasamāpajjana…pe… vasippattanti ettha

original: bhavaṅgantaritāni yadā nirantaraṃ pavattanti, athassa āvajjanavasī siddhā hoti. Taṃ
analyzed: bhavaṅga antaritāni yadā nirantaram pavattanti athassa āvajjana vasī siddhā hoti tam

original: pana jhānaṃ samāpajjitukāmatānantaraṃ sīghaṃ samāpajjanasamatthatā samāpajjanavasī

original: nāma. Accharāmattaṃ vā dasaccharāmattaṃ vā khaṇaṃ jhānaṃ ṭhapetuṃ samatthatā adhiṭṭhānavasī

analyzed: nāma tathā iva lahum khaṇam jhāna samaṅgī hutvā jhānataḥ bhavaṅga uppatti vasena vuṭṭhātum

analyzed: samattha tā vuṭṭhāna vasī nāma ettakam eva khaṇam samāpajjissāmi iti ettakam eva khaṇam

original: jhānasamaṅgī hutvā jhānato vuṭṭhahissāmī”ti ca pavattapubbaparikammabhedenettha adhiṭṭhānavuṭṭhānavasiyo
analyzed: jhāna samaṅgī hutvā jhānataḥ vuṭṭhahissāmi iti ca pavatta pubba parikamma bhedena ittha adhiṭṭhāna vuṭṭhāna vasiyaḥ

original: bhinnā, na sarūpabhedena, yā “samāpattikusalatā, vuṭṭhānakusalatā”ti vuccanti. Paccavekkhaṇavasī

original: pana āvajjanavasiyā eva vuttā. Paccavekkhaṇavīthiyañhi sīghaṃ āvajjanuppattiyā āvajjanavasī

analyzed: tad anantarānam javanānam samuppattiyā paccavekkhaṇa vasī iti āvajjana vasī siddhiyā ava

analyzed: bhūtānam nissayam idam ca karaja kāyassa vatthu dasakassa bhūta nissaya ttā suttanta nayena

original: vuttaṃ, na paṭṭhānanayena. Na hi kalāpantaragatāni bhūtāni kalāpantaragatānaṃ bhūtānaṃ

original: Taṃnissitarūpānīti upādārūpāni. Yathāpariggahitarūpavatthudvārārammaṇaṃ vāti ettha

original: upaṭṭhitacakkhādidvārañca sasampayuttadhammaviññāṇaṃ vāti yojetabbaṃ. Kammāragaggarīti

original: kammārānaṃ aggidhamanabhastā. Tajjanti tadanurūpaṃ. Tassāti nāmarūpassa. Taṃ disvāti
analyzed: aggi dhamana bhastā tajjanti tad anurūpam tassa ati nāma rūpassa tam disvā iti

original: avijjātaṇhādipaccayaṃ disvā. Kaṅkhaṃ vitaratīti ahosiṃ nu kho ahaṃ atītamaddhānantiādinayappavattaṃ

analyzed: kalāpa sammasanam tassa vasena pubba bhāge ti paṭipadā ñāṇa dassana visuddhi pariyāpannāya

original: udayabbayānupassanāya pubbabhāge. Obhāsādayoti obhāso ñāṇaṃ pīti passaddhi sukhaṃ
analyzed: udaya bbaya anupassanāya pubba bhāge obhāsa ādayo ti obhāsaḥ ñāṇam pīti passaddhi sukham

original: adhimokkho paggaho upekkhā upaṭṭhānaṃ nikanti ca. Tattha adhimokkhoti saddhā. Upaṭṭhānanti
analyzed: adhimokkhaḥ paggahaḥ upekkhā upaṭṭhānam nikanti ca tattha adhimokkhaḥ ti saddhā upaṭṭhānanti

original: sati. Upekkhāti tatramajjhattatā. Ettha ca obhāsādayo nava nikantisaṅkhātataṇhupakkilesavatthutāya

original: upakkilesā vuttā, nikanti pana upakkilesatāya tabbatthutāya ca. Nibbindanto ādīnavānupassanāpubbaṅgamāya

original: nibbidānupassanāya nibbindanto. Muñcitukamyatāpaṭisaṅkhānupassanāsaṅkhārupekkhānulomañāṇānaṃ

analyzed: ciṇṇa pariyante uppanna gotra bhuñāṇa anantaram uppannena magga ñāṇena sabba saṅkhāresu

original: virajjanto vimuccanto. Phalakkhaṇe hi vimutto nāma vuccati, maggakkhaṇe vimuccantoti.
analyzed: virajjantaḥ vimuccantaḥ phala kkhaṇe hi vimuttaḥ nāma vuccati magga kkhaṇe vimuccantaḥ ti

original: Ekūnavīsatibhedassāti catunnaṃ maggavīthīnaṃ anantaraṃ paccekaṃ uppajjantassa maggaphalanibbānapahīnāvasiṭṭhakilesānaṃ

original: ekūnavīsatitā. Assāti ānāpānakammaṭṭhānikassa.
analyzed: ekūnavīsati tā assa āti āna apāna kammaṭṭhānikassa

original: Sappītike dve jhāneti pītisahagatāni catukkanaye dve paṭhamadutiyajjhānāni. Tassāti
analyzed: sappītike dve jhāne iti pīti sahagatāni catukka naye dve paṭhama dutiya jhānāni tassa āti

original: cittacetasikā dhammā sayaṃ attano paṭisaṃviditā nāma hoti salakkhaṇato sāmaññalakkhaṇato

original: Evaṃ pītiṃ aniccādivasena gahaṇameva asammohato pītipaṭisaṃvedanaṃ nāma.
analyzed: evam pītim anicca ādi vasena gahaṇam eva asammohato pīti paṭisaṃvedanam nāma

original: Dīghaṃ assāsavasenāti dīghassa assāsassa ārammaṇabhūtassa vasena, pajānato sā pīti
analyzed: dīgham assāsa vasena ati dīghassa assāsassa ārammaṇa bhūtassa vasena pajānato sā pi iti

original: paṭisaṃviditā hotīti sambandho. Cittassa ekaggataṃ avikkhepaṃ pajānatoti jhānapariyāpannaṃ

analyzed: ārammaṇe upaṭṭhitā tad ārammaṇa jhāne pi upaṭṭhitā nāma hoti iti dīgham passāsa vasena ati ādīsu pi

analyzed: iminā ava nayena atthaḥ veditabbaḥ evam dassitam pīti paṭisaṃvedanam ārammaṇataḥ a sammohato

original: Sā pītīti sā jhānapariyāpannā pīti. Jānatoti samāpannakkhaṇe ārammaṇamukhena jānato,

original: Adhimuccatoti saddahantassa, samathavipassanāvasenāti adhippāyo. Vīriyaṃ paggaṇhatotiādīsupi

analyzed: citta saṅkhāra paṭisaṃvedī iti padāni

original: Soti passambhanapariyāyena vutto nirodho. Vuttanayenāti imassa hi bhikkhuno pubbe
analyzed: saḥ ti passambhana pariyāyena vuttaḥ nirodhaḥ vutta nayena ati imassa hi bhikkhuno pubbe

original: Saññāsampayuttā vedanāti vedanānupassanābhāvato vuttaṃ. Cittapaṭisaṃveditā veditabbāti

original: Vipassanākkhaṇetiādinā vuttabhaṅgānupassanakkhaṇe.
analyzed: vipassanā khaṇa iti ādinā vutta bhaṅga anupassana khaṇe

original: Ānāpānassatisamādhikathāvaṇṇanānayo niṭṭhito.
analyzed: āna apāna ssati samādhi kathā vaṇṇanā nayaḥ niṭṭhito

original: Padabhājanīyavaṇṇanā
172. Byañjane ādaraṃ akatvāti jānitvā sañjānitvātiādinā byañjanānurūpaṃ avuttattā
analyzed: byañjane ādaram a katvā ati jānitvā sañjānitvā ati ādinā byañjana anurūpam

original: vuttaṃ. Pāṇoti jānantoti idaṃ manussoti ajānitvāpi kevalaṃ sattasaññāya eva pārājikabhāvadassanatthaṃ

analyzed: vuttam vadhaka cetanā vasena cetetvā ati imam māremi iti vadhaka cetanāya cintetvā pakappetvā ati

original: tenāha “nirāsaṅkacittaṃ pesetvā”ti. Sikhāppatto atthoti sañciccāti pubbakālakiriyāvasena
analyzed: tena āha nirāsaṅka cittam pesetvā iti sikhāppattaḥ attho ti sañcicca āti pubba kāla kiriyā vasena

original: avigatattā. Manussabhūtaṃ mātaraṃ vā pitaraṃ vā api parivattaliṅgaṃ jīvitā voropentassa
analyzed: a vigata ttā manussa bhūtam mātaram vā pitaram vā api parivatta liṅgam jīvitā voropentassa

original: kammaṃ ānantariya”nti hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Yena pana sabhāvena sattā jāyanti,
analyzed: kammam ānantariyanti hi aṭṭhakathāyam vuttam yena pana sabhāvena sattāḥ jāyanti

original: teneva maranti, sova tesaṃ rūpantaraggahaṇepi sabhāvoti “maraṇarūpameva pamāṇaṃ,
analyzed: tena iva maranti tesam maraṇa rūpam eva pamāṇam

original: tasmā pācittiya”nti vutto. Pacchimo vādo pamāṇaṃ, evaṃ sante pāḷiyaṃ “yakkho vā peto
analyzed: tasmā pācittiyanti vutto pacchimaḥ vādaḥ pamāṇam evam sante pāḷiyam yakkhaḥ vā peto

original: vā tiracchānagatamanussaviggaho vā tasmiṃ patati, āpatti dukkaṭassa. Patite dukkhā

original: vedanā uppajjati, āpatti dukkaṭassa. Marati, āpatti thullaccayassā”ti kasmā vuttanti
analyzed: vedanā uppajjati āpatti dukkaṭassa marati āpatti thullaccayassa ati kasmā vuttan ti

original: ce? Nāyaṃ doso. “Yakkho vā peto vā”ti hi paṭhamaṃ sakarūpaṃ dassetvā rūpantaraṃ gahetvāpi
analyzed: ce na ayam dosaḥ yakkhaḥ vā petaḥ vā ati hi paṭhamam saka rūpam dassetvā rūpa antaram gahetvā api

original: ṭhiteyeva yakkhapete dassetuṃ “tiracchānagatamanussaviggaho vā”ti vuttaṃ. Tasmā tiracchānagataviggaho
analyzed: ṭhite iya iva yakkhapete dassetum tiracchāna gata manussa viggahaḥ vā ati vuttam tasmā tiracchāna gata viggahaḥ

analyzed: manussa viggahaḥ vā yakkhaḥ vā petaḥ vā ti evam ettha yojanā kātabbā keci pana manussa viggahena

original: ṭhitatiracchānagatānaṃ āveṇikaṃ katvā thullaccayaṃ vuttaṃ viya dissatī”ti vadanti,
analyzed: ṭhita tiracchāna gatānam āveṇikam katvā thullaccayam vuttam viya dissati iti vadanti

original: taṃ na yuttaṃ tiracchāno vā manussaviggahoti vattabbato, aṭṭhakathāsu ca imassa visesassa

original: avuttattā. Yakkhapetarūpena matepi eseva nayoti iminā maraṇarūpasseva pamāṇattā thullaccayaṃ atidisati.
analyzed: a vutta ttā yakkhapeta rūpena mate pi esā iva iminā maraṇa rūpassa iva pamāṇa ttā thullaccayam atidisati

original: Mudhāti amūlena. So niddosoti tena tattha katapayogassa abhāvato, yadi pana sopi
analyzed: mudhā ti amūlena saḥ niddoso ti tena tattha kata payogassa abhāvataḥ yadi pana saḥ api

original: tattha kiñci karoti, na muccati evāti dassento evaṃ patitātiādimāha. Tattha evanti
analyzed: tattha kiñci karoti na muccati eva ati dassentaḥ evam patitā atiādim āha tattha evam ti

original: evaṃ mayā kateti attho. Na nassissantīti adassanaṃ na gamissanti, na palāyissantīti
analyzed: evam mayā katā iti atthaḥ na nassissanti iti adassanam na gamissanti na palāyissanti iti

original: Uttāne kate opāte sīghaṃ amhehi gahetvā māretuṃ suuddharā bhavissantīti adhippāyo.
analyzed: uttāne kate opāte sīgham amhehi gahetvā māretum su uddharāḥ bhavissanti iti adhippāyaḥ

original: Vippaṭisāre uppanneti mūlaṭṭhaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Yadi pana pacchimopi labhitvā tattha
analyzed: vippaṭisāre uppannā iti mūla ṭṭham sandhāya vuttam yadi pana pacchimaḥ api labhitvā tattha

original: vuttappakāraṃ kiñci katvā puna vippaṭisāre uppanne evaṃ karoti, tassāpi eseva nayo.
analyzed: vutta ppakāram kiñci katvā puna vippaṭisāre uppanne evam karoti tassa api esa iva nayo

original: Jātapathavī jātāti īdise puna aññena opāte khate tadā muccatīti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ,
analyzed: jāta pathavī jātā ati īdise puna aññena opāte khate tadā muccati iti dassana ttham vuttam

original: jātapathavīsadisaṃ katvā puna suṭṭhu koṭṭetvā daḷhataraṃ pūritepi muccatiyevāti gahetabbaṃ.
analyzed: jāta pathavī sadisam katvā puna suṭṭhu koṭṭetvā daḷhataram pūrite pi muccatiyā iva ati gahetabbam

original: Thaddhataranti thirakaraṇatthaṃ aparāparāya pāsayaṭṭhiyā saddhiṃ bandhitvā vā tameva

original: vā sithilabhūtapāsaṃ thaddhataraṃ bandhitvā ṭhapeti. Khāṇukanti pāsayaṭṭhibandhanakhāṇukaṃ.

original: Tatthajātakayaṭṭhiṃ chinditvā muccatīti idaṃ araññe yathāṭhitameva daṇḍaṃ mūle acchinditvā
analyzed: chinditvā muccati iti idam araññe yathā ṭhitam eva daṇḍam mūle a chinditvā

original: pāsabandhanayoggaṃ katvā ṭhapitattā tattha aññopi koci pāsaṃ bandheyya, mūlaṭṭho
analyzed: pāsa bandhana yoggam katvā ṭhapita ttā tattha aññaḥ api koci pāsam bandheyya mūla ṭṭhaḥ

original: na muccati, taṃ pana mūlepi chinditvā khaṇḍākhaṇḍaṃ katvā muccatīti dassanatthaṃ

original: vuttaṃ. Rajjuketi vākehi ekavāraṃ vaṭṭitarajjuke. Sayaṃ vaṭṭitanti tanukavaṭṭitaṃ
analyzed: vuttam rajjuka iti vākehi eka vāram vaṭṭita rajjuke sayam vaṭṭitam ti tanuka vaṭṭitam

original: diguṇatiguṇatāpādanena attanā vaṭṭitaṃ. Ubbaṭṭetvāti pākatikaṃ katvā. Gopentopīti
analyzed: diguṇa tiguṇa tā āpādanena attanā vaṭṭitam ubbaṭṭetvā ati pākatikam katvā gopentaḥ api iti

analyzed: hīram hīram katvā gopentaḥ upi

original: 177. Ālambanarukkho vāti tatthajātakaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tadatthameva katvāti māraṇatthameva
analyzed: ālambana rukkhaḥ vā ti tattha jātakam sandhāya vuttam tad attham eva katvā iti māraṇa attham eva

analyzed: mañca pīṭha ādīsu ālittam visa maṇḍalam

analyzed: vatvā asim upanikkhipati iti ettha mukhena a vatvā manasā ava cintetvā upanikkhipane pi

original: eseva nayo. Purimanayenāti yesaṃ hatthato mūlaṃ gahitantiādinā. Visabhāgarogo nāma

analyzed: kuṭṭha ādi virūpa bhāvataḥ gaṇḍa pīḷaka ādi vā jīvita ppavattiyā paccanīka ttā

original: 178. Manāpiyepi eseva nayoti etena manāpiyaṃ rūpaṃ upasaṃharatīti ettha yaṃ vā manāparūpaṃ,
analyzed: manāpiye pi etena manāpiyam rūpam upasaṃharati iti ettha yam vā manāpa rūpam

analyzed: sandhāya vuttam dukkaṭāḥ na muccanato

analyzed: āha maraṇam an icchantassa atiādi anuppabandha abhāvā ti domanassa vīthīnam nirantara ppavatti abhāvā

original: Padabhājanīyavaṇṇanānayo niṭṭhito.
Vinītavatthuvaṇṇanā
analyzed: vinīta vatthu vaṇṇanā

original: 180. Vohāravasenāti pubbabhāgavohāravasena, maraṇādhippāyassa sanniṭṭhāpakacetanākkhaṇe

analyzed: ānītam dāru bhaṇḍam paribandhanti bhojana paribandham bhojana antarāyanti vuttam hoti

original: 181. Aggakārikanti ettha kārika-saddassa bhāvavacanattā “aggakiriya”nti atthaṃ vatvāpi
analyzed: aggakārikanti ettha kārika saddassa bhāva vacana ttā agga kiriyanti attham vatvā api

original: idha upacārayuttiyā aggakiriyāti gahetabbanti āha paṭhamaṃ laddhapiṇḍapātantiādi.
analyzed: idha upacāra yuttiyā agga kiriyā ti gahetabbanti āha paṭhamam laddha piṇḍapāta ntiādi

original: 182-3. Daṇḍamuggaranikhādanavemādīnaṃ vasenāti ettha daṇḍo nāma dīghadaṇḍo. Muggaro

original: nāma rasso. Vemaṃ nāma tantavāyānaṃ vatthavāyanaupakaraṇaṃ, yena vītaṃ tantaṃ ghaṭṭenti.
analyzed: nāma rassaḥ vemam nāma tantavāyānam vatthavāyana upakaraṇam yena vītam tantam ghaṭṭenti

original: Vibhattibyattayenāti vibhattivipariṇāmena. Visesādhigamoti samādhi vipassanā ca.
analyzed: vibhatti byattayena ati vibhatti vipariṇāmena visesa adhigamaḥ ti samādhi vipassanā ca

original: Visesādhigamanti lokuttaradhammapaṭilābhaṃ. Byākaritvāti ārocetvā, idañca visesassa
analyzed: visesa adhigamanti lokuttara dhamma paṭilābham byākaritvā ati ārocetvā idam ca visesassa

original: adhigatabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Adhigatavisesā hi diṭṭhānugatiāpajjanatthaṃ lajjībhikkhūnaṃ
analyzed: adhigata bhāva dassana ttham vuttam adhigata visesāḥ hi diṭṭha anugati āpajjana ttham lajjī bhikkhūnam

original: avassaṃ adhigamaṃ byākaronti, adhigatavisesena pana abyākaritvāpi āhāraṃ upacchindituṃ
analyzed: a vassam adhigamam byākaronti adhigata visesena pana a byākaritvā api āhāram upacchinditum

original: na vaṭṭati, adhigamantarāyavinodanatthameva āhārūpacchedassa anuññātattā tadadhigame
analyzed: na vaṭṭati adhigama antarāya vinodana attham eva āhāra upacchedassa anuññāta ttā tad adhigame

analyzed: saḥ na kātabbā uva kim pana adhigamam ārocetum vaṭṭati iti āha bhaṇḍakam

original: vā dhovantāti cīvaraṃ vā dhovantā. Dhovanadaṇḍakanti cīvaradhovanadaṇḍaṃ.
analyzed: vā dhovantā ati cīvaram vā dhovantā dhovana daṇḍakanti cīvara dhovana daṇḍam

original: 185. Maddāpetvā pāteti, visaṅketoti yathāṇattiyā akatattā vuttaṃ, yadi pana āṇāpako

original: maddanampi maddāpanampi sandhāya vohāravasena “madditvā pātehī”ti vadati, visaṅketo
analyzed: maddanam pi maddāpanam pi sandhāya vohāra vasena madditvā pātehi iti vadati visaṅketaḥ

original: natthīti veditabbaṃ. “Maraṇavaṇṇaṃ vā saṃvaṇṇeyyā”ti vuttattā āha “pariyāyo nāma
analyzed: na atthi iti veditabbam maraṇa vaṇṇam vā saṃvaṇṇeyya iti vutta ttā āha pariyāyaḥ nāma

original: natthī”ti, pariyāyena āpattimokkho na hotīti adhippāyo. Avijāyanatthāya gabbhaggahaṇato

analyzed: puretaram eva bhesajjam dentassa kucchiyam uppajjitvā gabbhaḥ vinassati iti iminā adhippāyena

original: dinne tathāmarantānaṃ vasena kammabaddho, kucchiyaṃ na uppajjissatīti iminā adhippāyena
analyzed: dinne tathā a marantānam vasena kamma baddhaḥ kucchiyam na uppajjissati iti iminā adhippāyena

original: dinne uppajjitvā maratu vā mā vā, nevatthi kammabaddho.
analyzed: dinne uppajjitvā maratu vā mā vā na iva atthi kamma baddhaḥ

original: Sahadhammikānanti ekassa satthu sāsane sahasikkhamānadhammānaṃ, sahadhamme vā sikkhāpade
analyzed: sahadhammikānam ti ekassa satthu sāsane saha sikkhamāna dhammānam saha dhamme vā sikkhāpade

original: sikkhanabhāvena niyuttānaṃ. Samasīlasaddhānantiādinā dussīlānaṃ bhinnaladdhikānañca
analyzed: sikkhana bhāvena niyuttānam sama sīla saddhānam ti ādinā dussīlānam bhinna laddhikānam ca

original: akātumpi labbhatīti dasseti. Ñātakapavāritaṭṭhānatoti attano tesaṃ vā ñātakapavāritaṭṭhānato.
analyzed: a kātum pi labbhati iti dasseti ñātaka pavārita ṭṭhānato ti attanaḥ tesam vā ñātaka pavārita ṭṭhānato

original: Ariyehi akatā ayuttavasena akatapubbā viññatti akataviññatti.
analyzed: ariyehi akatā ayutta vasena akata pubbā viññatti akata viññatti

original: Paṭiyādiyatīti sampādiyati. Akātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti ettha dukkaṭaṃ vadanti, ayuttatāvaseneva

original: panettha akaraṇapaṭikkhepo yutto, na āpattivasenāti gahetabbaṃ. Yāva ñātakā passantīti
analyzed: pana ittha akaraṇa paṭikkhepaḥ yuttaḥ na āpatti vasena ati gahetabbam yāva ñātakā passanti iti

original: yāva tassa ñātakā passanti.
analyzed: yāva tassa ñātakā passanti

original: Pitubhaginī pitucchā. Mātubhātā mātulo. Nappahontīti kātuṃ na sakkonti. Na yācantīti

analyzed: lajjāya na yācanti ābhogam katvā iti vutta ttā aññathā dentassa āpattiyā iva keci

original: mārite natthi pārājikanti vadanti, evaṃ dve eva purisātiādīsupi. Pubbe katasīsacchedapayogato

original: upacchijjatīti “sīsacchedakassā”ti vuttaṃ, yaṃ pana sāratthadīpaniyaṃ “jīvitindriyassa
analyzed: upacchijjati iti sīsa chedakassa ati vuttam yam pana sārattha dīpaniyam jīvita indriyassa

original: nikkhipanādinopi hetubhūtāti sakkā vattuṃ vicchinditvā pavattanato. Pubbe anāhitavegāpi
analyzed: nikkhipana ādinaḥ api hetu bhūtā ati sakkā vattum vicchinditvā pavattanataḥ pubbe an āhita vegā api

analyzed: kāya viññāṇa dukkham uppajjamānam viya upaṭṭhāti evaṃsampadam idam daṭṭhabbam tatas

original: Nanu narakādīsu ekābaddhe sarīre sabbattha pariyāyena kāyaviññāṇasamuppatti yuttā
analyzed: nanu naraka ādīsu eka ābaddhe sarīre sabbattha pariyāyena kāya viññāṇa samuppatti yuttā

original: hotu, dvidhā hutvā vicchinne pana bhāgadvaye kathanti? Nāyaṃ doso. Sarīre hi ekābaddhatā

original: vibhinnānampi kammādiekakāraṇānaṃ puñjāyattatā na vigacchati, yāva sā na vigacchati,

original: Tasmā kabandhassapi dhāvakkhaṇe saviññāṇajīvitindriyaṃ attheva, tañca sīsacchedakappayogeneva

original: Imassa vatthussāti āghātanavatthussa. Atthadīpaneti ekena purisena payogena vā māritatāsaṅkhātassa atthassa dīpane.

original: 192. Pānaparibhogena vaṭṭatīti sambandho. Evaṃ pana vuttattā “loṇasovīrakaṃ yāmakālika”nti
analyzed: pāna paribhogena vaṭṭati iti sambandhaḥ evam pana vutta ttā loṇa sovīrakam yāma kālikam ti

analyzed: iti samantapāsādikāya vinaya ṭṭhakathāya

original: Tatiyapārājikavaṇṇanānayo niṭṭhito.
analyzed: tatiya pārājika vaṇṇanā nayaḥ niṭṭhito

original: 4. Catutthapārājikaṃ
analyzed: catuttha pārājikam

original: Vaggumudātīriyabhikkhuvatthuvaṇṇanā
analyzed: vaggumudātīriya bhikkhuvatthu vaṇṇanā

original: 193. Adhiṭṭhemāti saṃvidahāma. Iriyāpathaṃ saṇṭhapetvāti padhānānurūpaṃ katvā. Anāgatasambandhe

analyzed: pana asati iti bhāsitaḥ bhavissati iti pāṭha sesam katvā anāgata sambandhe asati bhāsitaḥ ti

original: atītavacanaṃ kathaṃ anāgatavacanena sambandhamupagacchatīti āha lakkhaṇaṃ panātiādi.

original: 194. Vaṇṇavāti iminā abhinavuppannavaṇṇatā vuttā. Pasannamukhavaṇṇāti iminā mukhavaṇṇassa
analyzed: vaṇṇavā ti iminā abhinava uppanna vaṇṇa tā vuttā pasanna mukha vaṇṇā iti iminā mukha vaṇṇassa

analyzed: vippasanna tā vuttā yasmai indriyānam upādā rūpa ttā nissaya vasena iva pīṇanan ti āha abhiniviṭṭha ukāsassa

original: pavattanaṭṭhena iriyāpathova cakkanti vutto.
analyzed: pavattana ṭṭhena iriyāpathaḥ uva cakkan ti vutto

original: 195. Upalabbhantīti dissanti, ñāyantīti attho. Pacantoti pīḷento, gehādīni vā sayaṃ
analyzed: upalabbhanti iti dissanti ñāyanti iti attho pacantaḥ ti pīḷentaḥ geha ādīni vā sayam

original: uggatatucchamānena sahite. Capaleti pattacīvaramaṇḍanādinā cāpallena yutte. Mukhareti
analyzed: uggata tuccha mānena sahite capalā iti patta cīvara maṇḍana ādinā cāpallena yutte mukharā iti

analyzed: khara vacane pākatindriya iti a saṃvuta ttā gihi kāle ṭhiti indriye iriyāpatha saṇṭhapana ādīni iti

analyzed: janapadesu pi kattabba kicca dassana vasena vuttāni tāni ca te vatta sīsena karonti

analyzed: na lābha nimittam tena āha tanti itiādi kicchena ati imassa eva vevacanam kasirena ati tat ubhayam pi

original: Adhimānavatthuvaṇṇanā
analyzed: adhimāna vatthu vaṇṇanā

original: 196. Arahatteti aggaphale. Ñāṇacakkhunāti paccavekkhaṇañāṇasaṅkhātena cakkhunā, atha

analyzed: vā phala citta sampayuttena iva ñāṇa cakkhunā attanā sampayuttena api hi ñāṇena asammohato

original: kilesānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ, na bhavarāgādīnaṃ.
analyzed: kilesānam vasena vuttam na bhava rāga ādīnam

original: Savibhaṅgasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā
analyzed: sa vibhaṅga sikkhāpada vaṇṇanā

analyzed: pakati manussehi uttaritarānam buddha ādi uttama purisānam adhigama dhammo uttari manussa dhammo ti

analyzed: pada pūraṇa mattam adhigantabbataḥ adhigama saṅkhātassa jhāna ādino pucchā adhigama pucchā

original: sā ca jhānādīsu sāmaññato pavattāti idāni tattha paṭhamajjhānaṃ vā dutiyādīsu aññataraṃ

original: vā tatthāpi kasiṇādiārammaṇesu kataramārammaṇaṃ jhānaṃ vā lokuttaresu ca sotāpattimaggaṃ

analyzed: vā sakadāgāmi magga ādīsu aññataram vā tattha api suññata vimokkham vā appaṇihita vimokkha ādīsu

original: aññataraṃ vāti evaṃ paccekaṃ bhedaniddhāraṇavasena pucchanākāraṃ dassetuṃ pāḷiyaṃ
analyzed: aññataram vā ati evam paccekam bheda niddhāraṇa vasena pucchanā ākāram dassetum pāḷiyam

original: “puna katamesaṃ tvaṃ dhammānaṃ lābhī”ti ayaṃ pucchā dassitāti daṭṭhabbā, tenāha paṭhamamaggādīsūtiādi.
analyzed: puna katamesam tvam dhammānam lābhī iti ayam pucchā dassitā ati daṭṭhabbā tena āha paṭhama magga ādīsu utiādi

analyzed: yāya anukkama paṭipattiyā lokuttaraḥ adhigamaḥ āgacchati sā pubbabhāga paṭipatti āgamana paṭipadā

analyzed: ullapana adhippāyaḥ natthi tassa anāpatti etat ti heṭṭhā vuttam sabbam katikavattam

original: 229. Vallūravikkayenāti sukkhāpitamaṃsavikkayena. Nippakkhacammeti vigatapakkhalomacamme. Ekaṃ miganti dīpakamigaṃ. Kāraṇāhīti ghātanāhi. Ñatvāti kammaṭṭhānaṃ ñatvā.

original: 230. Maṅganavasena ulatīti maṅguli, virūpabībhacchabhāvena pavattatīti attho. Cittakeḷinti cittaruciyaṃ anācārakīḷaṃ.

original: Etadagganti eso aggo. Yadidanti yo ayaṃ.

analyzed: nigamana vaṇṇanā

original: Kiñcāpi duhetukānampi maggo nuppajjati, te pana pabbajjupasampadāsu ṭhatvā āyatiṃ

analyzed: dassanam pana sabbattha vipallattham eva dhātu kkhobha ādīsu catūsu mūla kāraṇesu dvīhi

original: tīhipi kāraṇehi kadāci supinaṃ passantīti āha “saṃsaggabhedato”ti. Supinabhedoti
analyzed: tīhi pi kāraṇehi kadāci supinam passanti iti āha saṃsagga bhedato ti supina bhedo ti

original: saccāsaccatthatābhedo.
analyzed: sacca asat cattha tā bhedaḥ

original: Rūpanimittādiārammaṇanti ettha kammanimittagatinimittato aññarūpameva viññāṇassa
analyzed: rūpa nimitta ādi ārammaṇanti ettha kamma nimitta gati nimittataḥ añña rūpam eva viññāṇassa

original: nimittanti rūpanimittaṃ, taṃ ādi yesaṃ sattanimittādīnaṃ tāni rūpanimittādīni ārammaṇāni
analyzed: rūpa nimittam tam ādi yesam satta nimitta ādīnam tāni rūpa nimitta ādīni ārammaṇāni

original: yassa bhavaṅgacittassa taṃ rūpanimittādiārammaṇaṃ. Īdisānīti rūpanimittādiārammaṇāni
analyzed: yassa bhavaṅga cittassa tam rūpa nimitta ādi ārammaṇam īdisāni iti rūpa nimitta ādi ārammaṇāni

original: rāgādisampayuttāni ca. Sabbohārikacittenāti paṭibuddhassa pakativīthicittena. Ko
analyzed: rāga ādi sampayuttāni ca sabbohārika cittena ati paṭibuddhassa pakati vīthi cittena ko

original: nāma passatīti suttapaṭibuddhabhāvaviyuttāya cittappavattiyā abhāvato supinaṃ passanto
analyzed: nāma passati iti sutta paṭibuddha bhāva viyuttāya citta ppavattiyāḥ abhāvataḥ supinam passanto

original: nāma na siyāti adhippāyo, tenāha “supinassa abhāvova āpajjatī”ti. Kapimiddhaparetoti
analyzed: nāma na siyāti adhippāyaḥ tena āha supinassa abhāvaḥ u āpajjati iti

original: iminā niddāvasena pavattamānabhavaṅgasantatibyavahitāya kusalākusalāya manodvāravīthiyā
analyzed: iminā niddā vasena pavattamāna bhavaṅga santati byavahitāya kusala akusalāya manaḥ dvāra vīthiyā

original: ca passatīti dasseti, tenāha yā niddātiādi. Dvīhi antehi muttoti kusalākusalasaṅkhātehi
analyzed: ca passati iti dasseti tena āha yā niddā tiādi dvīhi antehi muttaḥ ti kusala akusala saṅkhātehi

original: dvīhi antehi mutto. Āvajjanatadārammaṇakkhaṇeti supine pañcadvāravīthiyā abhāvato
analyzed: dvīhi antehi muttaḥ āvajjana tad ārammaṇa kkhaṇe ti supine pañca dvāra vīthiyāḥ abhāvato

original: manodvāre uppajjanārahaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ.
analyzed: manaḥ dvāre uppajjana araham gahetvā vuttam

original: Ettha ca supinantepi tadārammaṇavacanato anubhūtesu sutapubbesu vā rūpādīsu purāpattibhāvena
analyzed: ettha ca tad ārammaṇa vacanataḥ anubhūtesu suta pubbesu vā rūpa ādīsu purā āpatti bhāvena

original: parikappetvā vipallāsato pavattamānāpi kāmāvacaravipākadhammā parittadhamme nissāya
analyzed: parikappetvā vipallāsataḥ pavattamānā api kāmāvacara vipāka dhammā paritta dhamme nissāya

original: parikappetvā pavattattā parittārammaṇā vuttā, na pana sarūpato parittadhamme gahetvā
analyzed: parikappetvā pavatta ttā paritta ārammaṇā vuttā na pana sarūpataḥ paritta dhamme gahetvā

original: pavattattā evāti gahetabbaṃ. Evañca itthipurisādiākāraṃ āropetvā pavattamānānaṃ rāgādisavipākadhammānampi
analyzed: pavatta ttā eva ati gahetabbam evam ca itthi purisa ādi ākāram āropetvā pavattamānānam rāga ādi sa vipāka dhammānam pi

original: tesaṃ ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā uppannānaṃ paṭisandhādivipākānampi parittārammaṇatā kammanimittārammaṇatā
analyzed: tesam ārammaṇam gahetvā uppannānam paṭisandhā ādi vipākānam pi paritta ārammaṇa tā kamma nimitta ārammaṇa tā

original: ca upapannā eva hoti. Vatthudhammavinimuttaṃ pana sammutibhūtaṃ kasiṇādipaṭibhāgārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: ca upapannā eva hoti vatthu dhamma vinimuttam pana sammuti bhūtam kasiṇa ādi paṭibhāga ārammaṇam

original: gahetvā uppannā upacārappanādivasappavattā cittacetasikadhammā eva parittattike na
analyzed: gahetvā uppannāḥ upacāra ppanā divasa ppavattāḥ citta cetasika dhammāḥ eva paritta ttike na

original: vattabbārammaṇāti gahetabbā.
analyzed: vattabba ārammaṇā ti gahetabbā

original: Svāyanti supino. Vipallāsena parikappitaparittārammaṇattā “dubbalavatthukattā”ti vuttaṃ, avijjamānārammaṇe avasavattitoti adhippāyo, tenāha avisaye uppannattātiādi.
analyzed: su āyanti supinaḥ vipallāsena parikappita paritta ārammaṇa ttā dubbala vatthuka ttā iti vuttam avijjamāna ārammaṇe avasavattito ti adhippāyaḥ tena āha avisaye uppanna ttā atiādi

original: Āpattinikāyassāti idaṃ saṅghādisesoti pulliṅga-saddassa anurūpavasena vuttaṃ. Assāti
analyzed: āpatti nikāyassa ti idam saṅgha ādi sesaḥ ti pulliṅga saddassa anurūpa vasena vuttam assa ati

original: assa āpattinikāyassa, vuṭṭhāpetuṃ icchitassāti attho, tenāha kiṃ vuttantiādi. Ruḷhisaddenāti
analyzed: assa āpatti nikāyassa vuṭṭhāpetum icchitassa ati attho tena āha kim vutta ntiādi ruḷhi saddena ati

original: ettha samudāye nipphannassāpi saddassa tadekadesepi pasiddhi idha ruḷhī nāma, tāya
analyzed: ettha samudāye nipphannassa api saddassa tad eka dese pi idha ruḷhī nāma

original: ruḷhiyā yutto saddo ruḷhīsaddo, tena. Ruḷhiyā kāraṇamāha avayaveiccādinā.
analyzed: ruḷhiyā yuttaḥ saddaḥ ruḷhīsaddo tena ruḷhiyā kāraṇam āha

original: Kālañcāti “rāgūpatthambhe”tiādinā dassitakālañca, “rāgūpatthambhe”ti vutte rāgūpatthambhe
analyzed: kālañca ati rāga upatthambha itiādinā dassita kālañca rāga upatthambha iti vutte rāga upatthambhe

original: jāte tasmiṃ kāle mocetīti atthato kālo gammati. Navamassa adhippāyassāti vīmaṃsādhippāyassa. Vatthūti visayaṃ.
analyzed: jāte tasmin kāle moceti iti atthataḥ kālaḥ navamassa adhippāyassa ati vīmaṃsā adhippāyassa vatthu uti visayam

original: 238. Lomā etesaṃ santīti lomasā, bahulomapāṇakā.
analyzed: lomāḥ santi iti lomasā bahu loma pāṇakā

original: 239. Mocanenāti mocanappayogena. Mocanassādasampayuttāyāti ettha mocanicchāva mocanassādo,
analyzed: mocanena ati mocana ppayogena mocana ssāda sampayuttāya ati ettha mocan icchā va mocana ssādaḥ

original: tena sampayuttā cetanā mocanassādacetanāti attho, na pana mocane assādaṃ sukhaṃ patthentiyā
analyzed: tena sampayuttā cetanā mocana ssāda cetanā ti atthaḥ na pana mocane assādam sukham patthentiyā

original: cetanāyāti evaṃ attho gahetabbo, itarathā sukhatthāya mocentasseva āpatti, na ārogyādiatthāyāti
analyzed: cetanāya ati evam atthaḥ gahetabbo itarathā sukha atthāya mocentassa iva āpatti na ārogya ādi atthāya ati

original: āpajjati. Tasmā ārogyādīsu yena kenaci adhippāyena mocanicchāya cetanāyāti atthova gahetabbo.
analyzed: āpajjati tasmai ārogya ādīsu yena kenaci adhippāyena mocanicchāya cetanāya ati atthaḥ uva gahetabbo

original: 240. Vāyamatoti aṅgajāte kāyena upakkamato. Dve āpattisahassānīti khaṇḍacakkādīni
analyzed: vāyamataḥ ti aṅga jāte kāyena upakkamataḥ dve āpatti sahassāni iti khaṇḍa cakka ādīni

original: anāmasitvāva vuttaṃ, icchantena pana khaṇḍacakkādibhedenāpi gaṇanā kātabbā. Ekena
analyzed: an āmasitvā ava vuttam icchantena pana khaṇḍa cakka ādi bhedena api gaṇanā kātabbā ekena

original: padenāti gehasitapemapadena. Tathevāti mocanassādacetanāya eva gāḷhaṃ pīḷanādippayogaṃ
analyzed: padena ati geha sita pema padena tathā iva ati mocana ssāda cetanāyaḥ eva gāḷham pīḷana ādi ppayogam

original: avijahitvā supanena saṅghādisesoti vuttaṃ. Suddhacittoti mocanassādassa nimitte ūruādīhi
analyzed: a vijahitvā supanena saṅgha ādi sesaḥ ti vuttam suddha cittaḥ ti mocana ssādassa nimitte ūru ādīhi

original: kataupakkamassa vijahanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tena asubhamanasikārābhāvepi payogābhāveneva
analyzed: kata opakkamassa vijahanam sandhāya vuttam tena asubha manasikāra abhāve pi payoga abhāvena iva

original: mocanepi anāpatti dīpitāti veditabbā.
analyzed: mocane pi anāpatti dīpitā iti veditabbā

original: Tena upakkamena mutteti muccamānaṃ vinā aññasmimpi sukke ṭhānato mutte. Yadi pana
analyzed: tena upakkamena muttā iti muccamānam vinā aññasmin pi sukke ṭhānataḥ mutte yadi pana

original: upakkame katepi muccamānameva dakasotaṃ otarati, thullaccayameva payogena muttassa
analyzed: upakkame kate pi muccamānam eva daka sotam otarati thullaccayam eva payogena muttassa

original: abhāvā. Jagganatthāyāti cīvarādīsu limpanaparihārāya hatthena aṅgajātaggahaṇaṃ vaṭṭati,
analyzed: abhāvāḥ jaggana tthāya ati cīvara ādīsu limpana parihārāya hatthena aṅga jāta ggahaṇam vaṭṭati

original: tappayogo na hotīti adhippāyo. Anokāsanti aṅgajātappadesaṃ.
analyzed: tad payogaḥ na hoti iti adhippāyaḥ anokāsanti aṅga jāta ppadesam

original: 262. Supinantena kāraṇenāti supinante pavattaupakkamahetunā. Āpattiṭṭhāneyeva hi ayaṃ anāpatti avisayattā vuttā. Tenāha “sacassa visayo hoti niccalena bhavitabba”ntiādi.
analyzed: supin antena kāraṇena ati supin ante pavatta aupakkama hetunā āpatti ṭṭhāneyā iva hi ayam anāpatti avisaya ttā vuttā tena āha saca ssa visayaḥ hoti niccalena bhavitabba ntiādi

original: 263. Vinītavatthupāḷiyaṃ aṇḍakaṇḍuvanavatthusmiṃ mocanādhippāyena aṇḍacalanena aṅgajātassāpi
analyzed: vinīta vatthu pāḷiyam aṇḍa kaṇḍuvana vatthusmim mocana adhippāyena aṇḍa calanena aṅga jātassa api

original: calanato nimitte upakkamo hotīti saṅghādiseso vutto. Yathā pana aṅgajātaṃ na calati,
analyzed: calanataḥ nimitte upakkamaḥ hoti iti saṅgha ādi sesaḥ vuttaḥ yathā pana aṅga jātam na calati

original: evaṃ aṇḍameva kaṇḍuvanena phusantassa muttepi anāpatti aṇḍassa anaṅgajātattā.
analyzed: evam aṇḍam eva kaṇḍuvanena phusantassa mutte pi anāpatti aṇḍassa an aṅga jāta ttā

original: 264. Vatthinti aṅgajātasīsacchādakacammaṃ. Udaraṃ tāpentassa…pe… anāpattiyevāti udaratāpanena aṅgajātepi tatte tāvattakena nimitte upakkamo kato nāma na hotīti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: vatthinti aṅga jāta sīsa chādaka cammam udaram tāpentassa pe anāpattiyā iva ati udara tāpanena aṅga jāte pi tatte tāvattakena nimitte upakkamo kataḥ nāma na hoti iti vuttam

original: 265. Ehi me tvaṃ, āvuso, sāmaṇerāti vatthusmiṃ aññaṃ āṇāpetu, tena kariyamānassa
analyzed: ehi me tvam āvuso sāmaṇera ati vatthusmiṃ aññam tena kariyamānassa

original: aṅgajātacalanassa mocanassādena sādiyanato taṃ calanaṃ bhikkhussa sādiyanacittasamuṭṭhitampi
analyzed: aṅga jāta calanassa mocana ssādena sādiyanato tam calanam bhikkhussa sādiyana citta samuṭṭhitam pi

original: hotīti sukkavissaṭṭhipaccayassa aṅgajātacalanassa hetubhūtā assādacetanāva āpattiyā
analyzed: hoti iti sukka vissaṭṭhi paccayassa aṅga jāta calanassa hetu bhūtā āpattiyā

original: aṅgaṃ hoti, na āṇāpanavācā tassā pavattikkhaṇe saṅghādisesassa asijjhanato. Evaṃ
analyzed: aṅgam hoti na āṇāpana vācā tassā pavatti kkhaṇe saṅgha ādisesassa a sijjhanataḥ evam

original: āṇāpetvāpi yonisomanasikārena mocanassādaṃ paṭivinodentassa āpattiasambhavato idaṃ
analyzed: āṇāpetvā api yoniso manasikārena mocana ssādam paṭivinodentassa āpatti asambhavataḥ idam

original: sikkhāpadaṃ anāṇattikaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, kiriyasamuṭṭhānañca jātanti gahetabbaṃ, āṇāpanavācāya
analyzed: sikkhāpadam anāṇattikam kāya kammam kiriya samuṭṭhānam ca jātan ti gahetabbam āṇāpana vācāya

original: pana dukkaṭaṃ āpajjati. Yo pana parena anāṇattena balakkārenāpi kariyamānappayogaṃ
analyzed: pana dukkaṭam āpajjati yaḥ pana parena an āṇattena balakkārena api kariyamāna ppayogam

original: mocanassādena sādiyati, tassāpi mutte paṭhamapārājike viya saṅghādisesova, amutte
analyzed: mocana ssādena tassa api mutte paṭhama pārājike viya saṅgha ādi sesaḥ uva a mutte

original: thullaccayaṃ. Mocanassāde cetanāya pana asati kāyasaṃsaggarāgena sādiyantassāpi muttepi
analyzed: thullaccayam mocana ssāde cetanāya pana asati kāya saṃsagga rāgena mutte pi

original: saṅghādisesena anāpattīti ācariyā vadanti, tañca yuttameva.
analyzed: saṅgha ādi sesena anāpatti iti ācariyāḥ vadanti tat ca yuttam eva

original: 266. Kāyatthambhanavatthusmiṃ calanavasena yathā aṅgajāte upakkamo sambhavati, tathā vijambhitattā āpatti vuttā.
analyzed: kāya tthambhana vatthusmim calana vasena yathā aṅga jāte upakkamaḥ sambhavati tathā vijambhita ttā āpatti vuttā

original: Upanijjhāyanavatthusmiṃ aṅgajātanti jīvamānaitthīnaṃ passāvamaggova adhippeto, netaro.
analyzed: upanijjhāyana vatthusmim jīvamāna etthīnam passa avamaggaḥ uva adhippetaḥ na itaro

original: 267. Pupphāvalīti kīḷāviseso. Taṃ kira kīḷantā nadīādīsu chinnataṭaṃ udakena cikkhallaṃ
analyzed: puppha āvaliḥ iti kīḷā visesaḥ tam kira kīḍantā nadī ādīsu chinna taṭam udakena cikkhallam

original: katvā tattha ubho pāde pasāretvā nisinnā patanti, “pupphāvaliya”ntipi pāṭho. Pavesentassāti
analyzed: katvā tattha ubho pāde pasāretvā nisinnā patanti pupphāvaliyanti pi pāṭhaḥ pavesentassa ti

original: payojakattena dvikammikattā “vālikaṃ aṅgajāta”nti ubhayatthāpi upayogavacanaṃ kataṃ.
analyzed: payojaka ttena dvi kammika ttā vālikam aṅga jātan ti ubhayattha api upayoga vacanam katam

original: Cetanā, upakkamo, muccananti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni veditabbāni.
analyzed: cetanā upakkamaḥ muccananti imāni ettha tīṇi aṅgāni veditabbāni

original: Sukkavissaṭṭhisikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: sukka vissaṭṭhi sikkhāpada vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 2. Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā
analyzed: kāyasaṃsagga sikkhāpada vaṇṇanā

original: 269. Dutiye kesuci vātapānesu vivaṭesu bahipi andhakārattā āloko na pavisati, vivaṭakavāṭena
analyzed: dutiye kesucid vāta pānesu vivaṭesu andhakāra ttā ālokaḥ na pavisati vivaṭa kavāṭena

original: aññato āgacchantassa ālokassa nivāraṇato kavāṭassa piṭṭhipasse ghanandhakārova hoti,
analyzed: aññatas āgacchantassa ālokassa nivāraṇataḥ kavāṭassa piṭṭhi passe ghana ndhakāraḥ uva hoti

original: tādisāni sandhāya “yesu vivaṭesu andhakāro hotī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: tādisāni sandhāya yesu vivaṭesu andhakāraḥ hoti itiādi vuttam

original: Brāhmaṇī attano aṅgamaṅgānaṃ parāmasanakkhaṇe anācārānukūlā hutvā na kiñci vatvā
analyzed: brāhmaṇī attanaḥ aṅgam aṅgānam parāmasana khaṇe anācāra anukūlā hutvā na kiñci vatvā

original: bhikkhuno vaṇṇabhaṇanakkhaṇe vuttattā āha “pabbajitukāmo maññeti sallakkhetvā”ti,
analyzed: bhikkhuno vaṇṇa bhaṇana khaṇe vutta ttā āha pabbajitu kāmaḥ maññeti sallakkhetvā iti

original: pabbajitukāmo viyāti sallakkhetvāti attho. Kulitthīnaṃ evaṃ parehi abhibhavanaṃ nāma
analyzed: pabbajitu kāmaḥ viya iti sallakkhetvā iti attho kulitthīnam evam parehi abhibhavanam nāma

original: accantāvamānoti āha “attano vippakāra”nti.
analyzed: āha attanaḥ vippakāran ti

original: 270. Otiṇṇasaddassa kammasādhanapakkhaṃ sandhāya “yakkhādīhī”tiādi vuttaṃ, kattusādhanapakkhaṃ sandhāya “kūpādīnī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tasmiṃ vatthusminti itthisarīrasaṅkhāte vatthusmiṃ.
analyzed: otiṇṇa saddassa kamma sādhana pakkham sandhāya yakkha ādīhi itiādi vuttam kattu sādhana pakkham sandhāya kūpa ādīni itiādi vuttam tasmin vatthusmin ti itthi sarīra saṅkhāte vatthusmin

original: 271. Assāti hatthaggāhādikassa sabbassa.
analyzed: assa ati hatthaggāha ādikassa sabbassa

original: 273. Etesaṃ padānanti āmasanādipadānaṃ. Itthisaññīti manussitthisaññī. Naṃ-saddassa
analyzed: etesam padānam ti āmasana ādi padānam itthi saññī iti manussa itthi saññī naṃ saddassa

original: kāyavisesanabhāvena etaṃ kāyanti atthaṃ dassetuṃ “atha vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Omasanto…pe…
analyzed: kāya visesana bhāvena etam kāyanti attham dassetum atha vā tiādi vuttam oma santope

original: ekāva āpattīti anivatthaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na nivatthaṃ. Sanivatthāya pana matthakato
analyzed: ekā ava āpatti iti anivattham sandhāya vuttam na nivattham sa nivatthāya pana matthakato

original: paṭṭhāya hatthaṃ otārentassa nivatthasāṭakopari hatthe āruḷhe thullaccayaṃ. Sāṭakato
analyzed: paṭṭhāya hattham otārentassa nivattha sāṭaka upari hatthe āruḷhe thullaccayam sāṭakato

original: hatthaṃ otārāpetvā jaṅghato paṭṭhāya omasantassa puna saṅghādiseso.
analyzed: hattham otārāpetvā jaṅghataḥ paṭṭhāya omasantassa puna saṅgha ādiseso

original: Yathāniddiṭṭhaniddeseti yathāvuttakāyasaṃsagganiddese. Tenāti yena kāraṇena vatthusaññādayo
analyzed: yathā niddiṭṭha niddese iti yathā vutta kāya saṃsagga niddese tena ati yena kāraṇena vatthu saññā ādayaḥ

original: honti, tena kāraṇena. Yathāvuttasikkhāpadaniddese vuttaṃ garukaṃ bhikkhuno kareyya pakāseyyāti yojanā.

original: Saññāya virāgitamhīti saññāya viraddhāya. Idaṃ nāma vatthunti imasmiṃ sikkhāpade āgataṃ, anāgatañca yaṃ kiñci saviññāṇakāviññāṇakaṃ phusantassa anāpattiabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.

original: keḷāyanasadisattā. Ārakūṭalohanti suvaṇṇavaṇṇo kittimalohaviseso. Tividhañhi kittimalohaṃ
analyzed: keḷāyana sadisa ttā ārakūṭa lohanti suvaṇṇa vaṇṇaḥ kittima loha viseso tividham hi kittima loham

original: kaṃsalohaṃ vaṭṭalohaṃ hārakūṭalohanti. Tattha tiputambe missetvā kataṃ kaṃsalohaṃ
analyzed: kaṃsa loham vaṭṭa loham hārakūṭa lohanti tattha tipu tambe missetvā katam kaṃsa loham

original: nāma. Taṃ pana “jātarūpagatika”nti vuttattā uggaṇhato nissaggiyampi hotīti keci vadanti.
analyzed: nāma tam pana jātarūpa gatikan ti vutta ttā uggaṇhataḥ nissaggiyam pi hoti iti keci vadanti

original: Rūpiyesu pana agaṇitattā nissaggiyaṃ na hoti, āmasane, sampaṭicchane ca dukkaṭamevāti

original: puggalikānīti gahetabbaṃ.
analyzed: puggalikāni iti gahetabbam

original: Bhinditvāti paṭhamameva anāmasitvā pāsāṇādinā kiñcimattaṃ bhedaṃ katvā pacchā kappiyabhaṇḍatthāya

analyzed: adhiṭṭhahitvā hatthena gahetum vaṭṭati tena āha kappiya bhaṇḍam karissāmi iti sabbam pi

original: Pāḷiyaṃ paṇḍakassāti paṇḍakena. Pārājikappahonakakāleti akuthitakāle. Kāyasaṃsaggarāgādibhāve

analyzed: hasantaḥ hasantaḥ iti upalakkhaṇa mattam a hasantaḥ api yena kenaci ākārena attanaḥ vipariṇata citta tam itthiyā pakāsentaḥ vadati āpattiyā iva

original: 4. Attakāmapāricariyasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā

original: attano pāricariyanti hi vutte jānissanti paṇḍitā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti
analyzed: attanaḥ hi vutte jānissanti paṇḍita ati ādi āraddham idam vuttam hoti

original: – “attano hetu”nti vutte attano atthāyāti ayamattho viññāyati, “attano kāmaṃ attano
analyzed: attanaḥ hetunti vutte attanaḥ atthāya ati ayam atthaḥ viññāyati attanaḥ kāmam attanaḥ

original: pāricariya”nti vutte kāmena pāricariyāti ayamattho viññāyati. Tasmā imehi tīhi padehi

original: attano atthāya kāmena pāricariyā attakāmapāricariyāti imaṃ atthavikappaṃ viññū jānissanti.
analyzed: attanaḥ atthāya kāmena pāricariyā atta kāma pāricariyā ati imam attha vikappam viññū jānissanti

original: “Attano adhippāya”nti vutte pana adhippāya-saddassa kāmita-saddena samānatthabhāvato
analyzed: attanaḥ adhippāyanti vutte pana adhippāya saddassa kāmita saddena samānattha bhāvato

original: attanā adhippetakāmitaṭṭhena attakāmapāricariyāti imamatthaṃ vikappaṃ viññū jānissanti.
analyzed: attanā adhippeta kāmita ṭṭhena atta kāma pāricariyā ti imam attham vikappam viññū jānissanti

original: Etadagganti esā aggā. Duṭṭhullavācāsikkhāpadepi kāmaṃ “yācatipi āyācatipī”ti evaṃ
analyzed: etat aggam ti esā aggā duṭṭhulla vācā sikkhāpade pi kāmam yācati pi āyācati pi iti evam

original: methunayācanaṃ āgataṃ, taṃ pana duṭṭhullavācassādarāgavasena vuttaṃ, idha pana attano
analyzed: methuna yācanam āgatam tam pana duṭṭhulla vācassāda rāga vasena vuttam idha pana attano

original: methunassādarāgavasenāti ayaṃ viseso.
analyzed: methuna ssāda rāga vasena ati ayam visesaḥ

original: Vinītavatthūsu “aggadānaṃ dehī”ti idaṃ attano atthāya vuttaṃ, duṭṭhullavācāsikkhāpade
analyzed: vinīta vatthūsu agga dānam dehi iti idam attanaḥ atthāya vuttam duṭṭhulla vācā sikkhāpade

original: pana paratthāyapi vutte sīsaṃ etīti veditabbaṃ. Subhagāti issariyādīhi sundarehi
analyzed: pana vutte sīsam eti iti veditabbam subhagā ti issariya ādīhi sundarehi

original: bhagehi samannāgatā. Manussitthī, tathāsaññitā, attakāmapāricariyāya rāgo, tena kāmapāricariyayācanaṃ,
analyzed: bhagehi samannāgatā manussitthī tathāsaññitā atta kāma pāricariyāya rāgaḥ tena kāma pāricariya yācanam

original: taṅkhaṇavijānananti imānettha pañca aṅgāni.
analyzed: imāni ittha pañca aṅgāni

original: Attakāmapāricariyasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: atta kāma pāricariya sikkhāpada vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 5. Sañcarittasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā
analyzed: sañcaritta sikkhāpada vaṇṇanā

original: 296. Pañcame paṇḍiccenāti sabhāvañāṇena. Gatimantāti sabhāvañāṇagatiyuttā. Veyyattiyenāti
analyzed: pañcame paṇḍiccena ati sabhāva ñāṇena gatimantā ati sabhāva ñāṇa gati yuttā veyyattiyena ati

original: itthikattabbesu sikkhitañāṇena. Medhāyāti asikkhitesupi taṃitthikattabbesu ṭhānuppattiyā
analyzed: itthika ttabbesu sikkhita ñāṇena medhāya ati asikkhitesu pi taṃ itthika ttabbesu ṭhāna uppattiyā

original: paññāya. Chekāti kāyena pacanādikusalā.
analyzed: paññāya chekā ati kāyena pacana ādi kusalā

original: Āvahanaṃ āvāho, dārikāya gahaṇaṃ. Vidhinā parakule vahanaṃ pesanaṃ vivāho, dārikāya dānaṃ.
analyzed: āvahanam āvāhaḥ dārikāya vidhinā para kule vahanam pesanam vivāhaḥ dārikāya dānam

original: 297. Randhāpanaṃ bhattapacāpanaṃ. Byañjanādisampādanaṃ pacāpanaṃ. Na upāhaṭanti na dinnaṃ. Kayo nāma gahaṇaṃ. Vikkayo nāma dānaṃ. Tadubhayaṃ saṅgahetvā “vohāro”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: randhāpanam bhatta pacāpanam byañjana ādi sampādanam pacāpanam na na dinnam kayaḥ nāma gahaṇam vikkayaḥ nāma dānam tat ubhayam saṅgahetvā vohāraḥ ti vuttam

original: 300. “Abbhutaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti iminā dukkaṭaṃ hotīti dīpeti. “Parājitena dātabba”nti
analyzed: abbhutam kātum na vaṭṭati iti iminā dukkaṭam hoti iti dīpeti parājitena dātabbanti

original: vuttattā adento dhuranikkhepena kāretabbo. Acirakāle adhikāro etassa atthīti acirakālādhikārikaṃ,
analyzed: vutta ttā adentaḥ dhura nikkhepena kāretabbaḥ acira kāle adhikāraḥ etassa atthi iti acirakālādhikārikam

original: sañcarittaṃ. “Acirakālācārika”nti vā pāṭho. Acirakāle ācāro ajjhācāro etassāti yojanā.
analyzed: sañcarittam acirakālācārikanti vā pāṭhaḥ acira kāle ācāraḥ ajjhācāraḥ etassa ati yojanā

original: 301. Kiñcāpi ehibhikkhuādikāpi sañcarittādipaṇṇattivajjaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjanti, tesaṃ
analyzed: kiñca api ehibhikkhu ādikā api sañcaritta ādi paṇṇatti vajjam āpattim āpajjanti tesam

original: pana asabbakālikattā, appakattā ca idhāpi ñatticatuttheneva kammena upasampannaṃ
analyzed: pana asabbakālikattā appakattā ca idha api ñatti catutthena iva kammena upasampannam

original: sandhāya “yvāya”ntiādipadabhājanamāha. Sañcaraṇaṃ sañcaro, so etassa atthīti sañcarī,
analyzed: sandhāya yvāyanti ādi pada bhājanam āha sañcaraṇam sañcaro saḥ etassa atthi iti sañcarī

original: tassa bhāvo sañcarittaṃ. Tenāha “sañcaraṇabhāva”nti. Sañcaratīti sañcaraṇo, puggalo,
analyzed: tassa bhāvaḥ sañcarittam tena āha sañcaraṇa bhāvanti sañcarati iti sañcaraṇaḥ puggalo

original: tassa bhāvo sañcaraṇabhāvo, taṃ itthipurisānaṃ antare sañcaraṇabhāvanti attho.
analyzed: tassa bhāvaḥ sañcaraṇa bhāvaḥ tam itthi purisānam antare sañcaraṇa bhāvanti attho

original: Jāyābhāveti bhariyabhāvāya. Jārabhāveti sāmibhāvāya, taṃnimittanti attho. Nimittatthe
analyzed: jāyā bhāva iti bhariya bhāvāya jāra bhāva iti sāmi bhāvāya taṃnimittanti atthaḥ nimitta atthe

original: hi etaṃ bhummavacanaṃ. Kiñcāpi “jārattane”ti padassa padabhājane “jārī bhavissasī”ti
analyzed: hi etam bhumma vacanam kiñca api jārattana iti padassa pada bhājane jārī bhavissasi iti

original: itthiliṅgavasena padabhājanaṃ vuttaṃ, “sañcarittaṃ samāpajjeyyā”ti padassa pana niddese
analyzed: itthi liṅga vasena pada bhājanam vuttam sañcarittam samāpajjeyya ti padassa pana niddese

original: “itthiyā vā pahito purisassa santike gacchati, purisena vā pahito itthiyā santike
analyzed: itthiyā vā pahitaḥ purisassa santike gacchati purisena vā pahitaḥ itthiyā santike

original: gacchatī”ti vuttattā purisassāpi santike vattabbākāraṃ dassetuṃ “jārattane”ti niddesassa
analyzed: gacchati iti vuttattā purisassa api santike vattabba ākāram dassetum jārattana iti niddesassa

original: itthipurisasādhāraṇattā “itthiyā matiṃ purisassa ārocento jārattane ārocetī”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: itthi purisa sādhāraṇa ttā itthiyāḥ matim purisassa ārocentaḥ jārattane āroceti iti vuttam

original: Pāḷiyaṃ pana purisassa matiṃ itthiyā ārocanavaseneva padadvayepi yojanā katā, tadanusārena
analyzed: pāḷiyam pana purisassa matim itthiyā ārocana vasena iva pada dvaye pi yojanā katā tad anusārena

original: itthiyā matiṃ purisassa ārocanākāropi sakkā viññātunti.
analyzed: itthiyāḥ matim purisassa ārocanā kāro api sakkā viññātunti

original: Idāni pāḷiyaṃ vuttanayenāpi atthaṃ dassento “apicā”tiādimāha. “Pati bhavissasī”ti
analyzed: idāni pāḷiyam vutta nayena api attham dassentaḥ apica ati ādim āha pati bhavissasi iti

original: idaṃ jāyāsaddassa itthiliṅganiyamato purisapariyāyena vuttaṃ, nibaddhasāmiko bhavissasīti
analyzed: idam jāyā saddassa itthi liṅga niyamato purisa pariyāyena vuttam nibaddha sāmikaḥ bhavissasi iti

original: attho. Jāro bhavissasīti micchācārabhāvena upagacchanako bhavissasīti adhippāyo.
analyzed: attho jāraḥ bhavissasi iti micchācāra bhāvena upagacchanakaḥ bhavissasi iti adhippāyaḥ

original: 303. Serivihāranti sacchandacāraṃ. Attano vasanti attano āṇaṃ. Gottavantesu gotta-saddo,
analyzed: sa iri vihāranti sa chanda cāram attanaḥ vasanti attanaḥ gottavantesu gotta saddo

original: dhammacārīsu ca dhamma-saddo vattatīti āha “sagottehī”tiādi. Tattha sagottehīti samānagottehi.
analyzed: dhamma cārīsu ca dhamma saddo vattati iti āha sagottehi itiādi tattha sagottehi iti samāna gottehi

original: Sahadhammikehīti ekassa satthu sāsane sahacaritabbadhammehi, samānakuladhammehi vā.
analyzed: sahadhammikehi iti ekassa satthu sāsane sahacaritabba dhammehi samāna kula dhammehi vā

original: Tenevāha “ekaṃ satthāra”ntiādi. Ekagaṇapariyāpannehīti mālākārādiekagaṇapariyāpannehi.
analyzed: tena iva āha ekam satthāram ti ādi eka gaṇa pariyāpannehi iti mālākāra ādi eka gaṇa pariyāpannehi

original: Sassāmikā sārakkhā. Yassā gamane raññā daṇḍo ṭhapito, sā saparidaṇḍā. Pacchimānaṃ
