analyzed: natthi assāmika ttā tāsu gatānam purisānam eva micchā ācāraḥ hoti mātā ādīhi rakkhita ttā

original: Purisā hi parehi yehi kehici gopitaṃ itthiṃ gantuṃ na labhanti, itthiyo pana kenaci
analyzed: purisāḥ hi parehi yehi kehicid gopitam itthim gantum na labhanti itthiyaḥ pana kenacid

original: purisena bhariyābhāvena gahitāva purisantaraṃ gantuṃ na labhanti, na itarā attano
analyzed: purisena bhariyā bhāvena purisa antaram gantum na labhanti na itarāḥ

original: phassassa sayaṃ sāmikattā. Na hi mātādayo sayaṃ tāsaṃ phassānubhavanatthaṃ tā rakkhanti,

original: kevalaṃ purisagamanameva tāsaṃ vārenti. Tasmā kenaci apariggahitaphassattā, attano
analyzed: kevalam purisa gamanam eva tāsam vārenti tasmā kenaci a pariggahita phassa ttā attanaḥ

original: paviṭṭhattā micchācāroti veditabbo.
analyzed: paviṭṭha ttā micchā ācāraḥ iti veditabbo

original: Bhogenāti bhogahetu. Udapattaṃ āmasitvā gahitā odapattakinī. Dhaja-saddena senā eva upalakkhitāti āha “ussitaddhajāyā”tiādi.
analyzed: bhogena ati bhoga hetu uda pattam āmasitvā gahitā odapattakinī dhaja saddena senā eva upalakkhitā iti āha ussita ddhajāya atiādi

original: 305. Bahiddhā vimaṭṭhanti aññattha ārocitaṃ. Taṃ kiriyaṃ sampādessatīti tassā ārocetvā
analyzed: bahiddhā vimaṭṭhanti aññattha ārocitam tam kiriyam sampādessati iti tassai ārocetvā

analyzed: tam kiccam sampādetu vā mā vā tam kiriyam sampādane sāmatthiyam sandhāya vuttam

original: paṭiggaṇhanavīmaṃsanapaccāharaṇasaṅkhātāya tivaṅgasampattiyā saṅghādiseso hoti evāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

original: Yaṃ uddissa sāsanaṃ pesitaṃ, taṃ eva sandhāya tassā mātuādīnaṃ ārocitepi khettameva
analyzed: yam uddissa sāsanam pesitam tam eva sandhāya tassāḥ mātu ādīnam ārocite pi khettam eva

original: otiṇṇabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “buddhaṃ paccakkhāmī”tiādi udāhaṭaṃ, idañca vacanabyattayahetubyattayānaṃ

original: bhedepi byattayasāmaññato udāhaṭanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tampi udāharaṇadosaṃ pariharitvā
analyzed: bhede pi byattaya sāmaññato udāhaṭanti daṭṭhabbam tam pi udāharaṇa dosam pariharitvā

original: suttānulomataṃ dassetuṃ “taṃ panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Iminā sametīti etthāyamadhippāyo
analyzed: sutta anuloma tam dassetum tam pana atiādi vuttam iminā sameti iti ettha ayam adhippāyaḥ

original: – yathā sayaṃ anārocetvā aññesaṃ antevāsikādīnaṃ vatvā vīmaṃsāpetvā paccāharantassa
analyzed: yathā sayam an ārocetvā aññesam antevāsika ādīnam vatvā vīmaṃsāpetvā paccāharantassa

original: natthi visaṅketo, evaṃ tassā sayaṃ anārocetvā ārocanatthaṃ mātuādīnaṃ vadantassāpi
analyzed: natthi visaṅketaḥ evam tassā sayam an ārocetvā ārocana attham mātu ādīnam vadantassa api

original: mātuādayo taṃ kiriyaṃ sampādentu vā mā vā. Yadi hi tesaṃ mātuādīnaṃ tuṇhībhūtabhāvampi

original: paccāharati, visaṅketo natthīti.
analyzed: paccāharati visaṅketaḥ na atthi iti

original: Gharakiccaṃ netīti gharaṇī. Aññataraṃ vadantassa visaṅketaṃ adinnādānādīsu āṇattiyaṃ
analyzed: ghara kiccam na iti iti gharaṇī aññataram vadantassa visaṅketam adinnādāna ādīsu āṇattiyam

original: vatthusaṅketo viyāti adhippāyo. Mūlaṭṭhānañca vasenāti ettha purisassa mātuādayo
analyzed: vatthu saṅketaḥ viyā ti adhippāyaḥ mūlaṭṭhānam ca vasena ati ettha purisassa mātu ādayo

original: sāsanapesane mūlabhūtattā “mūlaṭṭhā”ti vuttā.
analyzed: sāsana pesane mūla bhūta ttā mūlaṭṭhā ati vuttā

original: 322. Pāḷiyaṃ māturakkhitāya mātā bhikkhuṃ pahiṇatīti ettha attano vā dhītu santikaṃ
analyzed: pāḷiyam mātu rakkhitāya mātā bhikkhum pahiṇati iti ettha attanaḥ vā

original: santikaṃ “mama dhītā itthannāmassa bhariyā hotū”ti pahiṇatīti gahetabbaṃ. Eseva nayo
analyzed: santikam mama dhītā itthannāmassa bhariyā hotu uti pahiṇati iti gahetabbam esa iva nayo

original: sesesupi. Pubbe vuttanayattāti paṭhamasaṅghādisese vuttanayattā.
analyzed: sesesu pi pubbe vutta naya ttā ti paṭhama saṅgha ādisese vutta naya ttā

original: 338. Ante ekenāti ekena padena. Ettova pakkamatīti apaccāharitvā tatova pakkamati.
analyzed: ante ekena ati ekena padena ettas iva pakkamati iti a paccāharitvā tatas iva pakkamati

original: “Anabhinanditvā”ti idaṃ tathā paṭipajjamānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Satipi abhinandane
analyzed: an abhinanditvā iti idam tathā paṭipajjamānam sandhāya vuttam sati pi abhinandane

original: sāsanaṃ anārocento pana na vīmaṃsati nāma. Tatiyapade vuttanayenāti “so tassā vacanaṃ
analyzed: sāsanam an ārocentaḥ pana na vīmaṃsati nāma tatiya pade vutta nayena ati saḥ tassāḥ vacanaṃ

original: anabhinanditvā”tiādinā vuttanayena. Pāḷiyaṃ antevāsiṃ vīmaṃsāpetvāti “ayaṃ tesaṃ
analyzed: an abhinanditvā ati ādinā vutta nayena pāḷiyam antevāsim vīmaṃsāpetvā ti ayam tesam

original: vattuṃ samattho”ti antevāsinā vīmaṃsāpetvā. Sace pana so antevāsiko taṃ vacanaṃ ādiyitvā

original: tuṇhī hoti, tassāpi taṃ pavattiṃ paccāharantassa ācariyassa saṅghādisesova mātuādīsu
analyzed: tuṇhī hoti tassa api tam pavattim paccāharantassa ācariyassa saṅgha ādi sesaḥ uva mātu ādīsu

original: tuṇhībhūtesu tesaṃ tuṇhibhāvaṃ paccāharantassa viyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: tuṇhībhūtesu tesam tuṇhi bhāvam paccāharantassa viya ati daṭṭhabbam

original: Pāḷiyaṃ catutthavāre asatipi gacchanto sampādeti, āgacchanto visaṃvādeti anāpattīti atthato āpannamevātikatvā vuttaṃ “catutthe anāpattī”ti.
analyzed: pāḷiyam catuttha vāre asati pi gacchantaḥ sampāde iti āgacchantaḥ visaṃvāde iti anāpatti iti atthataḥ āpannam eva atikatvā vuttam catutthe anāpatti iti

original: 340. Kārukānanti vaḍḍhakīādīnaṃ tacchakaayokāratantavāyarajakanhāpitakā pañca kāravo “kārukā”ti vuccanti. Evarūpena…pe… anāpattīti tādisaṃ gihiveyyāvaccampi na hotīti katvā vuttaṃ.
analyzed: kārukānam ti vaḍḍhakī ādīnam pañca kāravaḥ kārukā ati vuccanti anāpatti iti tādisam na hoti iti katvā vuttam

original: Kāyato samuṭṭhātīti paṇṇattiṃ vā alaṃvacanīyabhāvaṃ vā tadubhayaṃ vā ajānantassa
analyzed: kāyataḥ samuṭṭhāti iti paṇṇattim vā alaṃvacanīya bhāvam vā tat ubhayam vā a jānantassa

original: kāyato samuṭṭhāti. Esa nayo itaradvayepi. Alaṃvacanīyā hontīti itthī vā puriso vā
analyzed: kāyato samuṭṭhāti esa nayo itara dvaye pi alaṃvacanīyāḥ honti iti itthī vā purisaḥ vā

original: ubhopi vā jāyābhāve, sāmikabhāve ca nikkhittachandatāya accantaviyuttattā puna aññamaññaṃ
analyzed: ubho api vā jāyā bhāve sāmika bhāve ca nikkhitta chanda tāya accanta viyutta ttā puna aññam aññam

original: samāgamatthaṃ “mā evaṃ akaritthā”tiādinā vacanīyatāya vattabbatāya alaṃ arahāti alaṃvacanīyā,
analyzed: samāgama attham mā evam akarittha atiādinā vacanīya tāya vattabba tāya alam arahā ati alaṃvacanīyā

original: alaṃ vā kattuṃ arahaṃ sandhānavacanametesu itthipurisesūti alaṃvacanīyā, sandhānakārassa

original: vacanaṃ vinā asaṅgacchanakā pariccattāyevāti adhippāyo.
analyzed: vacanam vinā asaṅgacchanakā pariccattāya iva ati adhippāyaḥ

original: Paṇṇattiṃ pana jānitvāti ettha alaṃvacanīyabhāvaṃ vāti vattabbaṃ. Teneva mātikāṭṭhakathāyañca
analyzed: paṇṇattim pana jānitvā ti ettha alaṃvacanīya bhāvam vā iti vattabbam tena iva mātikāṭṭhakathāyam ca

original: likhitvā “imaṃ paṇṇaṃ asukassa dehī”ti dinnaṃ harantassa sañcarittaṃ na hoti. Paṇṇattialaṃvacanīyabhāvaajānanavaseneva
analyzed: likhitvā imam paṇṇam asukassa dehi iti dinnam harantassa sañcarittam na hoti paṇṇatti alaṃvacanīya bhāva a jānana vasena iva

analyzed: hi imam sikkhāpadam acittakam na sabbena sabbam sañcaraṇa bhāvam pi a jānana vasena

original: pāḷiyañca aṭṭhakathāyañca ārocanameva dassitaṃ. Tasmā sandassanatthaṃ ñatvā paṇṇasandassanavasenāpi

original: kāyena vā vācāya vā ārocentasseva āpatti hotīti gahetabbaṃ.

original: 341. Yathā yathā yesu yesu janapadesūti pariccattabhāvappakāsanatthaṃ kattabbaṃ paṇṇadānañātijanissarādijānāpanāditaṃtaṃdesaniyataṃ
analyzed: yathā yathā yesu yesu janapadesu iti pariccatta bhāva ppakāsana ttham kattabbam

original: Sañcarittasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

original: Jaggitvāti tiṇadānādīhi posetvā.

original: 344. Maṇi kaṇṭhe assāti maṇikaṇṭho. Devavaṇṇanti devattabhāvaṃ.
analyzed: maṇi kaṇṭhe assa ati maṇi kaṇṭhaḥ deva vaṇṇanti devatta bhāvam

original: 345. Pāḷiyaṃ pattena me atthoti anatthikampi pattena bhikkhuṃ evaṃ vadāpento bhagavā

original: sotthiyā mantapadavasena vadāpesi. Sopi bhikkhu bhagavatā āṇattavacanaṃ vademīti

analyzed: kate byañjanam viruddham bhaveyya tathā pana padattha vasena a dassetvā sāmatthiyato

original: siddhamevatthaṃ dassetuṃ paccattavasena “karonto vā kārāpento vā”ti padabhājanaṃ

analyzed: vuttam iti adhippāyaḥ tena āha attha mattam eva atiādi padatthataḥ sāmatthiyataḥ ca labbhamānam

analyzed: attha mattam eva ati atthaḥ yat hi kārayamānena paṭipajjitabbam tam karontena api paṭipajjitabbam eva ati

original: idamettha sāmatthiyaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: idam ettha sāmatthiyam daṭṭhabbam

original: Uddesoti sāmibhāvena uddisitabbo. Setakammanti setavaṇṇakaraṇatthaṃ setavaṇṇamattikāya
analyzed: uddesaḥ ti sāmi bhāvena uddisitabbo seta kamman ti seta vaṇṇa karaṇa attham seta vaṇṇa mattikāya

analyzed: vā tena pana saha miniyamāne pamāṇa atikkantam hoti iti saṅkā nivāraṇa ttham

analyzed: yathā vuttassa atthassa vutta nayam dassentena vuttam ha etat tiādi vuttam tattha āyāmataḥ

original: ca vitthārato cā”ti avatvā “āyāmato vā vitthārato vā”ti vikappatthassa vā-saddassa
analyzed: ca vitthārato ca ati avatvā āyāmataḥ vā vitthārataḥ vā ati vikappa atthassa vā saddassa

analyzed: mañcassa sukhena parivattanato ūnaka catu hatthā vāti idam ca pacchima ppamāṇa yuttassa

analyzed: mañcassa a parivattana araham sandhāya vuttam yadi hi pakati hatthena

analyzed: ūnataram pi idam ca vatthu desanā kātabbā na vā ati sandeha nivattana attham vuttam

analyzed: oloketvā api iti apaloketvā api apalokana kamma vasena api iti attho apa saddassa api o ādesaḥ kato ti daṭṭhabbo

original: 353. Nibaddhagocaraṭṭhānampīti ettha gocarāya pakkamantānaṃ hatthīnaṃ nibaddhagamanamaggopi
analyzed: nibaddha gocara ṭṭhānam pi iti ettha gocarāya pakkamantānam hatthīnam nibaddha gamana maggaḥ api

analyzed: etesan ti sīha ādīnam gocara bhūmi iti āmisa ggahaṇa ṭṭhānam na gahitā ati paṭikkhipitabba bhāvena

analyzed: na gahitā na vāritā iti attho sīha ādīnam hi gocara ggahaṇa ṭṭhānam hatthīnam viya nibaddham

analyzed: gaṇhanti tasmā tesam tam na vāritam nibaddha gamana maggaḥ uva vāritaḥ āsayataḥ gamana maggassa

original: vibhāvetuṃ “corānaṃ māraṇatthāya kata”nti vuttaṃ.

analyzed: catunnam rathikānam sandhi nissitam sakaṭena ati iṭṭhaka sudhā ādi bhaṇḍa āharaṇa sakaṭena

analyzed: pācinanti senāsanassa bhūmitaḥ paṭṭhāya yāva tala avasānam cinitabba vatthukam adhiṭṭhānaṃ

analyzed: yassa upari bhitti thambha ādīni ca patiṭṭhapenti tena āha tatas paṭṭhāya atiādi kiñca api

analyzed: dassanam bhinditvā vā puna kātabbā ti ettha kuṭiyāḥ bhedena pariccheda dassana attham

original: kataṃ. Tadatthāyāti tacchanatthāya. Evaṃ katanti adesitavatthukaṃ pamāṇātikkantaṃ
analyzed: katam tad atthāya ati evam katam ti a desita vatthukam pamāṇa atikkantam

analyzed: vā katam paṇṇa sālanti paṇṇa kuṭiyā tiṇa paṇṇa cuṇṇassa a paripatana tthāya antar ca bahi

analyzed: ca limpanti tam sandhāya itam vuttam tena iva vakkhati paṇṇa sālam limpati iti

original: Antolepeneva niṭṭhāpetukāmaṃ sandhāya “antolepe vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Bahilepe vāti etthāpi
analyzed: antar lepena iva niṭṭhāpetu kāmam sandhāya antar lepe vā ātiādi vuttam bahi lepe vā ti ettha api

original: eseva nayo. Tasminti dvārabandhe vā vātapāne vā ṭhapiteti yojetabbaṃ. Tassokāsanti
analyzed: esa iva nayaḥ tasmin ti dvārabandhe vā vāta pāne vā ṭhapitā iti yojetabbam

analyzed: dvārabandha vāta pānānam ṭhapanataḥ pubbe eva saṅgha ādisesaḥ

original: Lepaghaṭanenevāti iṭṭhakāhi katavātapānādīni vinā samantā lepaghaṭaneneva āpatti

analyzed: ṭhapetvā limpati iti dāru kuṭṭassa aṭṭhaṅgula mattam vivaram yāva limpati

original: 354. Āpattibhedadassanatthanti tattha “sārambhe ca aparikkamane ca dukkaṭaṃ adesitavatthukatāya, pamāṇātikkantatāya ca saṅghādiseso”ti evaṃ āpattiyeva vibhāgadassanatthaṃ.
analyzed: āpatti bheda dassana ttham tattha sa ārambhe ca aparikkamane ca dukkaṭam a desita vatthuka tāya pamāṇa atikkanta tāya ca saṅgha ādi sesaḥ iti evam āpattiyā iva vibhāga dassana ttham

original: 361. Aniṭṭhite kuṭikammeti lepapariyosāne kuṭikamme ekapiṇḍamattenapi aniṭṭhite.
analyzed: aniṭṭhite kuṭikamme iti lepa pariyosāne kuṭikamme eka piṇḍa mattena api aniṭṭhite

original: saṅghādisesassā”tiādivacanato āpattiyeva. Pubbe katakammampi laddhakālato paṭṭhāya
analyzed: saṅgha ādi sesassa ati ādi vacanataḥ āpattiyā iva pubbe kata kammam pi laddha kālataḥ paṭṭhāya

analyzed: niṭṭhāpetabbam aññassa vā ti idam anupasampannam yeva sandhāya vuttan ti gahetabbam

original: keci pana “parato laddhāya kuṭiyā niṭṭhāpane anāpattiādito paṭṭhāya attano atthāya

original: pācinatalāvasānaṃ katvā.

analyzed: leṇam ti pabbata leṇam na ha ittha lepaḥ ghaṭīyati iti chadana lepassa abhāvataḥ vuttam

analyzed: denti ullitta kuṭi saṅkhyam na gacchati vaṭṭati eva iṭṭhaka ādīhi katam catur assa kūṭāgāra saṇṭhānam

original: ekakaṇṇikābaddhaṃ nātiuccaṃ paṭissayavisesaṃ “guhā”ti vadanti, tādisaṃ mahantampi
analyzed: eka kaṇṇikā baddham na ati uccam paṭissaya visesam guhā iti vadanti tādisam mahantam pi

original: ullittāvalittaṃ karontassa anāpatti. Bhūmiguhanti umaṅgaguhaṃ.

original: Aṭṭhakathāsūti kukkuṭacchikagehantiādīsu aṭṭhakathāsu tiṇakuṭikā kukkuṭacchikagehanti

original: dassetvā “pācittiya”nti pavattassa kurundivādassa adhippāyaṃ dassetuṃ “pacchimanayepī”tiādi
analyzed: dassetvā pācittiyam ti pavattassa kurundi vādassa adhippāyam dassetum pacchima naye pi itiādi

original: vuttaṃ. Vacanappamāṇatoti visaṃvādanādhippāye samānepi anuddhaṃsanādivisese saṅghādisesādino
analyzed: vuttam vacana pamāṇato ti visaṃvādana adhippāye samāne pi an uddhaṃsana ādi visese saṅgha ādi sesa ādinaḥ

original: vidhāyakavacanabalenāti attho. Bhikkhussa pana bhikkhuniyā dukkaṭanti bhikkhuniṃ
analyzed: vidhāyaka vacana balena ati atthaḥ bhikkhussa pana bhikkhuniyā dukkaṭanti bhikkhunim

original: anuddhaṃsentassa bhikkhussa dukkaṭaṃ.
analyzed: an uddhaṃsentassa bhikkhussa dukkaṭam

original: Evaṃ dvīsupi aṭṭhakathāvacanesu adhippāyaṃ vibhāvetvā idāni pacchime pācittiyavāde
analyzed: evam dvīsu pi aṭṭhakathā vacanesu adhippāyam vibhāvetvā idāni pacchime pācittiya vāde

original: dosaṃ dassetvā purimadukkaṭavādameva patiṭṭhāpetuṃ “tatra panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha
analyzed: dosam dassetvā purima dukkaṭa vādam eva patiṭṭhāpetum tatra pana atiādi vuttam tattha

original: visunti sampajānamusāvāde pācittiyato visuṃ pācittiyaṃ vuttaṃ, tattha anantogadhabhāvāti
analyzed: visum ti sampajāna musāvāde pācittiyataḥ visum pācittiyam vuttam tattha an anta gadha bhāvā ti

original: adhippāyo. Tasmāti yasmā amūlakānuddhaṃsane visuññeva pācittiyaṃ paññattaṃ, tasmā
analyzed: adhippāyaḥ tasmā iti yasmai a mūlaka an uddhaṃsane visuññā iva pācittiyam paññattam tasmai

original: purimanayoti dukkaṭavādo. Evaṃ antarā paviṭṭhaṃ dukkaṭapācittiyavādaṃ dassetvā idāni
analyzed: dukkaṭa vādaḥ evam antarā paviṭṭham dukkaṭa pācittiya vādam dassetvā idāni

original: pākaṭameva atthaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “tathā bhikkhunī”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha tathāti yathā
analyzed: pākaṭam eva attham vibhāvetum tathā bhikkhunī iti ādi āraddham tattha tathā ati yathā

original: bhikkhussa bhikkhuṃ, bhikkhuniñca anuddhaṃsentassa saṅghādisesadukkaṭāni vuttāni,
analyzed: bhikkhussa bhikkhum bhikkhuniñca an uddhaṃsentassa saṅgha ādisesa dukkaṭāni vuttāni

original: tathāti attho. Etehi nāsanā natthīti sāmaññato vuttaṃ, dukkaṭena imissā pana nāsanā
analyzed: tathā ti attho etehi nāsanā natthi iti sāmaññataḥ vuttam dukkaṭena imissā pana nāsanā

original: natthīti adhippāyo. Dussīlāti pārājikā.
analyzed: na atthi iti adhippāyaḥ dussīlā ati pārājikā

original: 386. Ākāranānattenāti dūsitākārassa, dūsakākārassa ca nānattena. Anabhiraddhoti atuṭṭho.
analyzed: ākāra nānattena ati dūsita ākārassa dūsaka ākārassa ca nānattena an abhiraddhaḥ ti atuṭṭhaḥ

original: Tenāha “na sukhito”ti. Na pasāditoti anuppāditappasādo. Khīla-saddo thaddhabhāvavacano,
analyzed: tena āha na sukhitaḥ iti na pasāditaḥ iti an uppādita ppasādaḥ khīla saddo thaddha bhāva vacano

original: abhigato na upagato. Tenāha “na abhisaṭo”ti.
analyzed: abhigataḥ na upagataḥ tena āha na

original: Yena duṭṭhoti ca kupitoti ca vuttoti ettha yena duṭṭhoti ca vutto yena kupitoti ca

analyzed: vuttaḥ tam mātikāyam ca pada bhājane ca vuttam ubhayam petam iti yojetabbam dvīhi iti tena

original: Na cuditakavasenāti yadi cuditakavasenāpi amūlakaṃ adhippetaṃ siyā, amūlakaṃ nāma
analyzed: na cuditaka vasena ati yadi cuditaka vasena api amūlakam adhippetam siyā amūlakam nāma

original: Tathevāti pasādasotena, dibbasotena vāti imamatthaṃ atidisati. Diṭṭhānusāreneva samuppannā

original: Ariṭṭhañhi surāsadisavaṇṇagandhaṃ kappiyabhesajjaṃ.
analyzed: a riṭṭhan hi surā sadisa vaṇṇa gandham kappiya bhesajjam

original: Diṭṭhaṃ atthi samūlakantiādīsu ajjhācārassa sambhavāsambhavānaṃ mūlāmūlabhāvadassanaṃ.

original: 54. Gayāyanti gayānāmikāya nadiyā adūrabhavattā gāmo itthiliṅgavasena gayā nāma jāto, tassaṃ. Gayāsīseti evaṃnāmake piṭṭhipāsāṇe.

analyzed: bimbisāra samāgama kathā vaṇṇanā

analyzed: khandhu upadhi idha adhippeto ti āha khandhu upadhīsu malanti ñatvā ati yaññā ati yañña hetu

original: Yiṭṭheti mahāyāge. Huteti divase divase kattabbe aggiparicaraṇe. Kiṃ vakkhāmīti kathaṃ vakkhāmi.
analyzed: yiṭṭhā iti mahā yāge hutā iti divase divase kattabbe aggi paricaraṇe kim vakkhāmi iti katham vakkhāmi

original: Dveupasampadāpekkhādivatthukathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
Upasampadāvidhikathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: upasampadā vidhi kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 126. Upajjhāti upajjhāya-saddasamānattho ākāranto upajjhāsaddoti dasseti. Upajjhāya-saddo
analyzed: upajjhā ti upajjhāya sadda samāna atthaḥ ākāra antaḥ upajjhā saddaḥ iti dasseti upajjhāya saddaḥ

analyzed: upajjhā saddassa payoga abhāvā ti daṭṭhabbam pāḷiyam attanā va attānam sammannitabbanti

original: attanāva kattubhūtena karaṇabhūtena attānameva kammabhūtaṃ pati sammananakiccaṃ kātabbaṃ.

original: Attānanti vā paccatte upayogavacanaṃ, attanāva attā sammannitabboti attho. Na kevalañca
analyzed: attānanti vā paccatte upayoga vacanam attanā va attā sammannitabbaḥ iti atthaḥ na kevalam ca

analyzed: ettha iva aññatra api terasa sammuti ādīsu iminā āva lakkhaṇena attanā āva attā sammannitabbaḥ uva

original: Apica sayaṃ kammārahattā attānaṃ muñcitvā catuvaggādiko gaṇo sabbattha icchitabbo.
analyzed: apica sayam kammāra hattā attānam muñcitvā catuvagga ādikaḥ gaṇaḥ sabbattha icchitabbaḥ

original: Saccakāloti “nigūhissāmī”ti vañcanaṃ pahāya saccasseva te icchitabbakālo. Bhūtakāloti
analyzed: sacca kālo ti nigūhissāmi iti vañcanam pahāya saccassa iva te icchitabba kālaḥ bhūta kālo ti

original: vañcanāya abhāvepi manussattādivatthuno bhūtatāya avassaṃ icchitabbakālo, itarathā

original: kammakopādiantarāyo hotīti adhippāyo. Maṅkūti adhomukho. Uddharatūti anupasampannabhāvato
analyzed: kamma kopa ādi antarāyaḥ hoti iti adhippāyaḥ maṅku iti adhomukhaḥ uddharatu iti anupasampanna bhāvato

analyzed: upasampattiyam patiṭṭhapetu uti atthaḥ

analyzed: sabba kamma vācāsu attha kosalla ttham pana ittha upasampadā kamma vācāya evam atthaḥ daṭṭhabbo

original: – suṇātūti savanāṇattiyaṃ paṭhamapurisekavacanaṃ. Tañca kiñcāpi yo saṅgho savanakiriyāya
analyzed: suṇātu uti savanāṇattiyam paṭhama purisa ekavacanam tat ca kiñca api yaḥ saṅghaḥ savana kiriyāya

analyzed: saṅgha sadda sannidhāne paṭhama purisa payogaḥ uva sadda vidhūhi samāciṇṇaḥ bhagavanta āyasmanta ādi sadda sannidhānesu

original: viya “adhivāsetu me bhavaṃ gotamo. Etassa sugata kālo, yaṃ bhagavā sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: adhivāsetu me bhavam gotamaḥ etassa sugata kālaḥ yam bhagavā sāvakānam sikkhāpadaṃ

analyzed: paññapeyya suṇantu me tasmai idha paṭhama purisa payogo

original: kato. Atha vā gāravavasenevetaṃ vuttaṃ. Garuṭṭhānīyesu hi gāravavasena majjhimapurisapayoguppattiyampi
analyzed: kataḥ atha vā gārava vasena iva etam vuttam garu ṭṭhānīyesu hi gārava vasena majjhima purisa payoguppattiyam pi

analyzed: paṭhama purisa payogam payujjanti desetu sugataḥ dhamma nti ādīsu viya ati daṭṭhabbam

original: Keci pana “bhante, āvusoti sadde apekkhitvā idha paṭhamapurisapayogo”ti vadanti,
analyzed: keci pana bhante āvuso ti sadde apekkhitvā idha paṭhama purisa payogo ti vadanti

original: tappayogepi majjhimapurisapayogasseva dassanato.
analyzed: tad payoge pi majjhima purisa payogassa iva dassanato

original: Meti yo sāveti, tassa attaniddese sāmivacanaṃ. Bhanteti ālapanatthe vuḍḍhesu sagāravavacanaṃ.
analyzed: mā iti yaḥ tassa atta niddese sāmi vacanam bhante ti ālapana atthe vuḍḍhesu sagārava vacanam

original: “Āvuso”ti padaṃ pana navakesu. Tadubhayampi nipāto “tumhe bhante, tumhe āvuso”ti
analyzed: āvuso ti padam pana navakesu tat ubhayam pi tumhe bhante tumhe āvuso ti

original: bahūsupi samānarūpattā. Saṅghoti avisesato catuvaggādike pakatattapuggalasamūhe vattati.

original: Idha pana paccantimesu janapadesu pañcavaggato paṭṭhāya, majjhimesu janapadesu dasavaggato

analyzed: paṭṭhāya saṅghaḥ iti gahetabbo tatra ayam piṇḍatthaḥ bhante saṅghaḥ mama vacanam suṇātu uti

original: Idañca navakatarena vattabbavacanaṃ. Sace pana anussāvako sabbehi bhikkhūhi vuḍḍhataro
analyzed: idam ca navakatarena vattabba vacanam sace pana anussāvakaḥ sabbehi bhikkhūhi vuḍḍhataraḥ

original: hoti, “suṇātu me, āvuso, saṅgho”ti vattabbaṃ. Sopi ce “bhante”ti vadeyya, navakataro
analyzed: hoti suṇātu me āvuso saṅghaḥ iti vattabbam saḥ api ce bhante iti vadeyya navakataraḥ

original: vā “āvuso”ti, kammakopo natthi. Keci pana “ekattha ‘āvuso’ti vatvā aññattha ‘bhante’ti
analyzed: vā āvuso ti kamma kopaḥ natthi keci pana ekattha āvuso ti vatvā aññattha bhante ti

original: vuttepi natthi doso ubhayenāpi ālapanassa sijjhanato”ti vadanti.
analyzed: vutte pi natthi dosaḥ ubhayena api ālapanassa sijjhanato ti vadanti

original: Idāni yamatthaṃ ñāpetukāmo “suṇātū”ti saṅghaṃ savane niyojeti, taṃ ñāpento “ayaṃ
analyzed: idāni yam attham ñāpetu kāmaḥ suṇātu uti saṅgham savane niyojeti tam ñāpentaḥ ayam

analyzed: itthannāmā iti ādim āha tattha ayam ti upasampada apekkhassa hattha pāse sannihita bhāva dassanam

original: Tena ca hatthapāse ṭhitasseva upasampadā ruhatīti sijjhati hatthapāsato bahi ṭhitassa
analyzed: tena ca hattha pāse ṭhitassa iva upasampadā ruhati iti sijjhati hattha pāsataḥ bahi ṭhitassa

original: “aya”nti na vattabbato. Teneva anusāsakasammutiyaṃ so hatthapāsato bahi ṭhitattā
analyzed: na vattabbataḥ tena iva anusāsaka sammutiyam so hattha pāsataḥ bahi ṭhita ttā

analyzed: ayanti na vuttaḥ tasmai upasampadā apekkhaḥ anupasampannaḥ hattha pāse ṭhapetabbaḥ ayaṃ

analyzed: itthannāmā iti ayam saddo ca avassam payujjitabbo saḥ ca imasmin paṭhama nāma payoge

analyzed: itthannamassa āyasmataḥ iti vuttam etena ayam buddharakkhitaḥ āyasmataḥ dhammarakkhitassa

analyzed: saddhivihārika bhūtaḥ upasampadā apekkho ti evamādinā nayena nāmayojanāya saha attho

analyzed: dassitaḥ ti ettha ca āyasmatā iti padam avatvā api ayam buddha rakkhitaḥ dhamma rakkhitassa

analyzed: upasampadā apekkhā iti vattum vaṭṭati tena iva pāḷiyam itthannāmena upajjhāyena ati ettha

analyzed: āyasmataḥ iti padam na vuttam yat ca ittha vattabbam tat heṭṭhā vuttam eva

original: kammasiddhito “imassā”ti niddisituṃ na vaṭṭati.

original: Parisuddho antarāyikehi dhammehīti abhabbatādikehi upasampadāya avatthukarehi ceva
analyzed: parisuddhaḥ antarāyikehi dhammehi iti abhabba tā ādikehi upasampadāya a vatthu karehi ca iva

original: Evaṃ vutto eva ca āpattimattakarehi pañcābādhādīhi aparimuttassapi upasampadā ruhati,

analyzed: hi attham sandhāya anussāvanāsu so bhāseyya iti vuttam

original: Taṃ panetaṃ pattakallaṃ vatthusampadā, antarāyikehi dhammehi cassa parisuddhatā,
analyzed: tam pana itam patta kallam vatthu sampadā antarāyikehi dhammehi ca ssa parisuddha tā

original: Tattha vatthusampadā nāma yathāvuttehi ekādasahi abhabbapuggalehi ceva antimavatthuajjhāpannehi

original: disāya kiṃ nimitta”nti anukkamena kittetvā tathā dakkhiṇāya disāya uttarābhimukhena

original: ṭhatvā “uttarāya disāya kiṃ nimitta”nti tattha sabbāni nimittāni anukkamena kittetvā

original: puna pacchimāya disāya puratthābhimukhena ṭhatvā purimakittitaṃ vuttanayena puna
analyzed: puna pacchimāya disāya purattha abhimukhena ṭhatvā purima kittitam vutta nayena puna

analyzed: kittetabbam evam bahūnam pi khaṇḍa sīmānam sīmantarika pāsāṇā paccekam kittetabbā

original: Tatoti pacchā. Avasesanimittānīti mahāsīmāya bāhirantaresu avasesanimittāni. Ubhinnampi
analyzed: tato ti pacchā avasesa nimittāni iti mahāsīmāya bāhirantaresu avasesa nimittāni

analyzed: na kopenti iti ubhinnam pi kammam na kopenti

original: Kuṭigeheti bhūmiyaṃ katatiṇakuṭiyaṃ. Udukkhalanti udukkhalāvāṭasadisakhuddakāvāṭaṃ.

analyzed: nimittam na kātabbanti tam rājim vā udukkhalam vā nimittam na kātabbam idam ca yathā vuttesu

original: kareyyāti dūratopi vipattiparihāratthaṃ vuttaṃ. Evaṃ upari “bhittiṃ akittetvā”tiādīsupi

original: Evañhi gabbhapamukhānaṃ antare ṭhitakuṭṭampi upādāya anto ca bahi ca caturassasaṇṭhānāva

original: attho. Tameva anto-saddaṃ sīmāparicchedena visesetuṃ “uparimassa sīmāparicchedassa
analyzed: atthaḥ tam eva antosaddam sīmā paricchedena visesetum uparimassa sīmā paricchedassa

original: pārato”ti vuttaṃ. Pabbatapādaṃ pana apekkhitvā “orato”ti vattabbepi sīmānissayaṃ
analyzed: pāratas ti vuttam pabbata pādam pana apekkhitvā oratas ti vattabbe pi sīmānissayam

original: pabbataggaṃ sandhāya “pārato”ti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Teneva “bahileṇa”nti ettha bahi-saddaṃ
analyzed: pabbata aggam sandhāya pāratas ti vuttanti daṭṭhabbam tena iva bahi leṇam ti ettha bahi saddam

original: visesento “uparimassa sīmāparicchedassa orato”ti āha. Bahi sīmā na otaratīti ettha
analyzed: visesento uparimassa sīmā paricchedassa orato ti āha bahi sīmā na otarati iti ettha

original: bahīti pabbatapāde leṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, leṇassa bahibhūte uparisīmāparicchedassa
analyzed: bahi iti pabbata pāde leṇam sandhāya vuttam leṇassa bahi bhūte upari sīmā paricchedassa

original: heṭṭhābhāge sīmā na otaratīti attho. Anto sīmāti leṇassa ca pabbatapādassa ca anto
analyzed: heṭṭhābhāge sīmā na otarati iti attho antaḥ sīmā ati leṇassa ca pabbata pādassa ca antaḥ

original: attano otaraṇārahaṭṭhāne na otaratīti attho. “Bahi sīmā na otarati, anto sīmā na
analyzed: attanaḥ otaraṇa raha ṭṭhāne na otarati iti attho bahi sīmā na otarati anto sīmā na

original: otaratī”ti cettha attano otaraṇārahaṭṭhāne leṇābhāvena sīmāya sabbathā anotaraṇameva
analyzed: otarati iti ca ittha attano otaraṇa araha ṭṭhāne leṇa abhāvena sīmāya sabbathā anotaraṇam eva

original: dassitanti gahetabbaṃ. Tatthāpi anotarantī upari eva hotīti. “Bahi patitaṃ asīmā”tiādinā
analyzed: dassitam ti gahetabbam tattha api upari eva hoti iti bahi patitam

original: uparipāsādādīsu athiranissayesu ṭhitā sīmāpi tesaṃ vināsena vinassatīti dassitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: upari pāsāda ādīsu athira nissayesu ṭhitā sīmā api tesam vināsena vinassati iti dassitam ti daṭṭhabbam

original: Pokkharaṇiṃ khaṇanti, sīmāyevāti ettha sace heṭṭhā umaṅganadisīmappamāṇato anūnā
analyzed: pokkharaṇim khaṇanti sīmāya iva ati ettha sace heṭṭhā anūnā

original: paṭhamameva ca pavattā hoti. Sīmā ca pacchā baddhā nadito upari eva hoti, nadiṃ āhacca
analyzed: paṭhamam eva ca pavattā hoti sīmā ca pacchā baddhā naditaḥ upari eva hoti nadim āhat ca

original: pokkharaṇiyā ca khatāya sīmā vinassatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Heṭṭhāpathavitaleti antarā bhūmivivare.
analyzed: pokkharaṇiyā ca khatāya sīmā vinassati iti daṭṭhabbam heṭṭhāpatha vitalā iti antarā bhūmi vivare

original: Sīmāmāḷaketi khaṇḍasīmaṅgaṇe. “Vaṭarukkho”ti idaṃ pārohopatthambhena atidūrampi gantuṃ
analyzed: sīmāmāḷakā iti khaṇḍa sīmaṅgaṇe vaṭa rukkho ti idam pāroha upatthambhena ati dūram pi gantum

original: samatthasākhāsamaṅgitāya vuttaṃ. Sabbarukkhalatādīnampi sambandho na vaṭṭati eva.
analyzed: samattha sākhā samaṅgi tāya vuttam sabba rukkha latā ādīnam pi sambandhaḥ na vaṭṭati eva

original: Teneva nāvārajjusetusambandhopi paṭikkhitto. Tatoti sākhato. Mahāsīmāya pathavitalanti
analyzed: tena iva nāvā rajju setu sambandhaḥ pi paṭikkhittaḥ tatas ti sākhataḥ mahā sīmāya

original: ettha āsannatarampi gāmasīmaṃ aggahetvā baddhasīmāya eva gahitattā gāmasīmābaddhasīmānaṃ
analyzed: ettha āsannataram pi gāma sīmam aggahetvā baddha sīmāya eva gāma sīmā baddha sīmānam

original: aññamaññaṃ rukkhādisambandhepi sambhedadoso natthi, aññamaññaṃ nissayanissitabhāvena
analyzed: aññam aññam rukkha ādi sambandhe pi sambheda doso natthi aññam aññam nissaya nissita bhāvena

original: pavattitoti gahetabbaṃ. Yadi hi tāsampi sambandhadoso bhaveyya, kathaṃ gāmasīmāya
analyzed: pavattitaḥ ti gahetabbam yadi hi tāsam pi sambandha dosaḥ bhaveyya katham gāma sīmāya

original: baddhasīmā sammannitabbā siyā? Yassā hi sīmāya saddhiṃ sambandhe doso bhaveyya, sā
analyzed: baddha sīmā sammannitabbā siyā yassā hi sīmāya saddhim sambandhe dosaḥ bhaveyya sā

original: tattha bandhitumeva na vaṭṭati, baddhasīmāudakukkhepasīmāsu baddhasīmā viya, attano
analyzed: tattha bandhitum eva na vaṭṭati baddha sīmā udakukkhepa sīmāsu baddha sīmā viya attano

original: nissayabhūtagāmasīmādīsu udakukkhepasīmā viya ca. Teneva “sace pana rukkhassa sākhā
analyzed: nissaya bhūta gāma sīmā ādīsu udakukkhepa sīmā viya ca tena iva sace pana rukkhassa sākhā

original: vā tato nikkhantapāroho vā bahinaditīre vihārasīmāya vā gāmasīmāya vā patiṭṭhito”tiādinā
analyzed: vā tatas nikkhanta pārohaḥ vā bahinadi tīre vihāra sīmāya vā gāma sīmāya vā patiṭṭhita uti ādinā

original: udakukkhepasīmāya attano anissayabhūtagāmasīmādīhi eva sambandhadoso dassito, na
analyzed: udakukkhepa sīmāya attanaḥ anissaya bhūta gāma sīmā ādīhi eva sambandha dosaḥ dassitaḥ na

original: nadisīmāyaṃ. Evamidhāpīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ayañcattho upari pākaṭo bhavissati. Āhaccāti phusitvā.
analyzed: evam idha api iti daṭṭhabbam ayam ca atthaḥ upari pākaṭaḥ bhavissati phusitvā

original: Mahāsīmaṃ vā sodhetvāti mahāsīmāgatānaṃ sabbesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ hatthapāsānayanabahikaraṇādivasena
analyzed: mahā sīmam vā sodhetvā ati mahā sīmā gatānam sabbesam bhikkhūnam hattha pāsā nayana bahikaraṇa ādi vasena

original: sakalaṃ mahāsīmaṃ sodhetvā. Etena sabbavipattiyo mocetvā pubbe suṭṭhu baddhānampi
analyzed: sakalam mahā sīmam sodhetvā etena sabba vipattiyaḥ mocetvā pubbe suṭṭhu baddhānam pi

original: dvinnaṃ baddhasīmānaṃ pacchā rukkhādisambandhena uppajjanako īdiso pāḷimuttako sambhedadoso
analyzed: dvinnam baddha sīmānam pacchā rukkha ādi sambandhena uppajjanakaḥ īdiso pāḷimuttako sambheda doso

original: atthīti dasseti. So ca “na, bhikkhave, sīmāya sīmā sambhinditabbā”tiādinā baddhasīmānaṃ
analyzed: atthi iti dasseti saḥ ca na bhikkhave sīmāya sīmā sambhinditabbā ati ādinā baddha sīmānam

original: aññamaññaṃ sambhedajjhottharaṇaṃ paṭikkhipitvā “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, sīmaṃ sammannantena
analyzed: aññam aññam sambheda ajjhottharaṇam paṭikkhipitvā anujānāmi bhikkhave sīmam sammannantena

original: sīmantarikaṃ ṭhapetvā sīmaṃ sammannitu”nti ubhinnaṃ baddhasīmānamantarā sīmantarikaṃ
analyzed: sīmantarikam ṭhapetvā sīmam sammannitunti ubhinnam baddha sīmānam antarā sīmantarikam

original: ṭhapetvāva bandhituṃ anujānantena sambhedajjhottharaṇaṃ viya tāsaṃ aññamaññaṃ phusitvā
analyzed: ṭhapetvā ava bandhitum anujānantena sambheda ajjhottharaṇam viya tāsam aññamaññam phusitvā

original: tiṭṭhanavasena bandhanampi na vaṭṭatīti siddhattā baddhānampi tāsaṃ pacchā aññamaññaṃ
analyzed: tiṭṭhana vasena bandhanam pi na vaṭṭati iti siddha ttā baddhānam pi tāsam pacchā aññamaññam

original: ekarukkhādīhi phusitvā ṭhānampi na vaṭṭatīti bhagavato adhippāyaññūhi saṅgītikārakehi
analyzed: eka rukkha ādīhi phusitvā ṭhānam pi na vaṭṭati iti bhagavataḥ adhippāya ñūhi saṅgīti kārakehi

original: niddhārito. Bandhanakāle paṭikkhittassa sambandhadosassa anulomena akappiyānulomattā.
analyzed: niddhāritaḥ bandhana kāle paṭikkhittassa sambandha dosassa anulomena akappiya anuloma ttā

original: Ayaṃ pana sambandhadoso – pubbe suṭṭhu baddhānaṃ pacchā sañjātattā bajjhamānakkhaṇe
analyzed: ayam pana sambandha doso pubbe suṭṭhu baddhānam pacchā sañjāta ttā bajjhamāna kkhaṇe

original: viya asīmattaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti. Tasmā rukkhādisambandhe apanītamatte tā sīmā pākatikā
analyzed: viya a sīmattam kātum na sakkoti tasmā rukkha ādi sambandhe apanīta matte sīmā pākatikā

original: honti. Yathā cāyaṃ pacchā na vaṭṭati, evaṃ bajjhamānakkhaṇepi tāsaṃ rukkhādisambandhe
analyzed: honti yathā ca ayam pacchā na vaṭṭati evam bajjhamāna kkhaṇe pi tāsam rukkha ādi sambandhe

original: sati tā bandhituṃ na vaṭṭatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: sati tāḥ bandhitum na vaṭṭati iti daṭṭhabbam

original: Keci pana “mahāsīmaṃ vā sodhetvāti ettha mahāsīmāgatā bhikkhū yathā taṃ sākhaṃ vā
analyzed: keci pana mahā sīmam vā sodhetvā ati ettha mahā sīmā gatāḥ bhikkhū yathā tam sākham vā

original: pārohaṃ vā kāyapaṭibaddhehi na phusanti, evaṃ sodhanameva idhādhippetaṃ, na sakalasīmāsodhana”nti
analyzed: pāroham vā kāya paṭibaddhehi na phusanti evam sodhanam eva idha adhippetam na sakala sīmā sodhanam ti

original: vadanti, taṃ na yuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāya virujjhanato. Tathā hi “mahāsīmāya pathavitalaṃ
analyzed: vadanti tam na yuttam aṭṭhakathāya virujjhanataḥ tathā hi mahā sīmāya pathavi talam

original: vā tatthajātarukkhādīni vā āhacca tiṭṭhatī”ti evaṃ sākhāpārohānaṃ mahāsīmaṃ phusitvā
analyzed: vā tattha jāta rukkha ādīni vā āhacca tiṭṭhati iti evam sākhā pārohānam mahā sīmam phusitvā

original: ṭhānameva sambandhadose kāraṇattena vuttaṃ, na pana tattha ṭhitabhikkhūhi sākhādīnaṃ
analyzed: ṭhānam eva sambandha dose kāraṇa ttena vuttam na pana tattha ṭhita bhikkhūhi sākhā ādīnam

original: phusanaṃ. Yadi hi bhikkhūnaṃ sākhādi phusitvā ṭhānameva kāraṇaṃ siyā, tassa sākhaṃ
analyzed: phusanam yadi hi bhikkhūnam sākha ādi phusitvā ṭhānam eva kāraṇam siyā tassa sākham

original: vā tato niggatapārohaṃ vā mahāsīmāya paviṭṭhaṃ tatraṭṭho koci bhikkhu phusitvā tiṭṭhatīti
analyzed: vā tatas niggata pāroham vā mahā sīmāya paviṭṭham koci bhikkhu phusitvā tiṭṭhati iti

original: bhikkhuphusanameva vattabbaṃ siyā. Yañhi tattha mahāsīmāsodhane kāraṇaṃ, tadeva tasmiṃ
analyzed: bhikkhu phusanam eva vattabbam siyā yat hi tattha mahā sīmā sodhane kāraṇam tat eva tasmin

original: vākye padhānato dassetabbaṃ. Na hi āhacca ṭhitameva sākhādiṃ phusitvā ṭhito bhikkhu
analyzed: vākye padhānataḥ dassetabbam na hi āhacca ṭhitam eva sākhā ādim phusitvā ṭhitaḥ bhikkhu

original: sodhetabbo ākāsaṭṭhasākhādiṃ phusitvā ṭhitassāpi sodhetabbato, kiṃ niratthakena āhaccaṭṭhānavacanena.
analyzed: sodhetabbaḥ ākāsaṭṭha sākhā ādim phusitvā ṭhitassa api sodhetabbataḥ kim niratthakena āhacca ṭṭhāna vacanena

original: Ākāsaṭṭhasākhāsu ca bhikkhuno phusanameva kāraṇattena vuttaṃ, sodhanañca tasseva
analyzed: ākāsa ṭṭha sākhāsu ca bhikkhuno phusanam eva kāraṇa ttena vuttam sodhanam ca tassa iva

original: bhikkhussa hatthapāsānayanādivasena sodhanaṃ vuttaṃ. Idha pana “mahāsīmaṃ sodhetvā”ti
analyzed: bhikkhussa hattha pāsā nayana ādi vasena sodhanam vuttaṃ idha pana mahā sīmam sodhetvā ati

original: sakalasīmāsādhāraṇavacanena sodhanaṃ vuttaṃ.
analyzed: sakala sīmā sādhāraṇa vacanena sodhanam vuttam

original: Apica sākhādiṃ phusitvā ṭhitabhikkhumattasodhane abhimate “mahāsīmāya pathavitala”nti
analyzed: apica sākhādim phusitvā ṭhita bhikkhu matta sodhane abhimate mahā sīmāya

original: visesasīmopādānaṃ niratthakaṃ siyā yattha katthaci antamaso ākāsepi ṭhatvā sākhādiṃ
analyzed: visesa sīma upādānam niratthakam siyā yattha katthaci antamasaḥ ākāse pi

analyzed: phusitvā ṭhitassa visodhetabbataḥ chinditvā bahiṭṭhakā kātabbā ti tattha patiṭṭhita bhāva viyojana vacanato

original: ca visabhāgasīmānaṃ phusaneneva sakalasīmāsodhanahetuko aṭṭhakathāsiddhoyaṃ eko sambandhadoso
analyzed: ca visa bhāga sīmānam phusanena iva sakala sīmā sodhana hetukaḥ aṭṭhakathā siddhaḥ ayam ekaḥ sambandha doso

original: atthevāti gahetabbo. Teneva udakukkhepasīmākathāyampi “vihārasīmāya vā gāmasīmāya
analyzed: attha iva ati gahetabbo tena iva udakukkhepa sīmā kathāyam pi vihāra sīmāya vā gāma sīmāya

original: vā patiṭṭhito”ti ca “naditīre pana khāṇukaṃ koṭṭetvā tattha baddhanāvāya na vaṭṭatī”ti
analyzed: vā patiṭṭhitaḥ ti ca nadi tīre pana khāṇukam koṭṭetvā tattha baddha nāvāya na vaṭṭati iti

original: ca “sace pana setu vā setupādā vā bahitīre patiṭṭhitā, kammaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti
analyzed: ca sace pana setu vā setu pādāḥ vā bahi tīre patiṭṭhitā kammam kātum na vaṭṭati iti

original: ca evaṃ visabhāgāsu gāmasīmāsu sākhādīnaṃ phusanameva saṅkaradosakāraṇattena vuttaṃ,
analyzed: ca evam visabhāgāsu gāma sīmāsu sākhā ādīnam phusanam eva saṅkara dosa kāraṇa ttena vuttam

original: na bhikkhuphusanaṃ. Tathā hi “antonadiyaṃ jātarukkhe bandhitvā kammaṃ kātabba”nti
analyzed: na bhikkhu phusanam tathā hi antonadiyam jāta rukkhe bandhitvā kammam kātabbanti

original: nadiyaṃ nāvābandhanaṃ anuññātaṃ udakukkhepanissayattena nadisīmāya sabhāgattā. Yadi
analyzed: nadiyam nāvābandhanam anuññātam udakukkhepa nissaya ttena nadi sīmāya sabhā gattā yadi

original: hi bhikkhūnaṃ phusanameva paṭicca sabbattha sambandhadoso vutto siyā, nadiyampi bandhanaṃ
analyzed: hi bhikkhūnam phusanam eva paṭicca sabbattha sambandha doso vuttaḥ siyā na diyam pi bandhanam

original: paṭikkhipitabbaṃ bhaveyya. Tatthāpi hi bhikkhuphusanaṃ kammakopakāraṇaṃ hoti, tasmā
analyzed: paṭikkhipitabbam bhaveyya tattha api hi bhikkhu phusanam kamma kopa kāraṇam hoti tasmā

original: sabhāgasīmāsu pavisitvā bhūmiādiṃ phusitvā vā aphusitvā vā sākhādimhi ṭhite taṃ sākhādiṃ

original: phusantova bhikkhu sodhetabbo. Visabhāgasīmāsu pana sākhādimhi phusitvā ṭhite taṃ
analyzed: phusantaḥ iva bhikkhu sodhetabbo visabhāga sīmāsu pana sākhā ādimhi phusitvā ṭhite tam

original: phusantova bhikkhu sodhetabboti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ.
analyzed: phusantaḥ iva bhikkhu sodhetabbaḥ iti niṭṭham ettha gantabbam

original: Yaṃ panettha keci “baddhasīmānaṃ dvinnaṃ aññamaññaṃ viya baddhasīmāgāmasīmānampi
analyzed: yam pana ittha keci baddha sīmānam dvinnam aññam aññam viya baddha sīmā gāma sīmānam pi

original: tadaññāsampi sabbāsaṃ samānasaṃvāsakasīmānaṃ aññamaññaṃ rukkhādisambandhe sati tadubhayampi
analyzed: tad aññāsam pi sabbāsam samāna saṃvāsaka sīmānam aññam aññam rukkha ādi sambandhe sati tat ubhayam pi

original: ekasīmaṃ viya sodhetvā ekattheva kammaṃ kātabbaṃ, aññattha kataṃ kammaṃ vipajjati,
analyzed: eka sīmam viya sodhetvā ekattha iva kammam kātabbam aññattha katam kammam vipajjati

original: natthettha sabhāgavisabhāgabhedo”ti vadanti, taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ, sabhāgasīmānaṃ
analyzed: nattha ittha sabhāga visabhāga bhedo ti vadanti tam tesam matimattam sabhāga sīmānam

original: aññamaññaṃ sambhedadosābhāvassa visabhāgasīmānameva tabbhāvassa suttasuttānulomādivinayanayehi
analyzed: aññam aññam sambheda dosa abhāvassa visabhāga sīmānam eva tad bhāvassa sutta sutta anuloma ādi vinaya nayehi

original: siddhattā. Tathā hi “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, sīmaṃ sammannitu”nti gāmasīmāyameva baddhasīmaṃ
analyzed: siddha ttā tathā hi anujānāmi bhikkhave sīmam sammannitun ti gāma sīmāyam eva baddha sīmam

original: sammannituṃ anuññātaṃ. Tāsaṃ nissayanissitabhāvena sabhāgatā, sambhedajjhottharaṇādidosābhāvo
analyzed: sammannitum anuññātam tāsam nissaya nissita bhāvena sabhā ga tā sambheda ajjhottharaṇa ādi dosa abhāvaḥ

original: ca suttatova siddho. Bandhanakāle pana anuññātassa sambandhassa anulomato pacchā
analyzed: ca suttatas va siddhaḥ bandhana kāle pana anuññātassa sambandhassa anulomato pacchā

original: sañjātarukkhādisambandhopi tāsaṃ vaṭṭati eva. “Yaṃ, bhikkhave…pe… kappiyaṃ anulometi
analyzed: sañjāta rukkha ādi sambandhaḥ api tāsam vaṭṭati eva yam bhikkha vepe kappiyam anuloma iti

original: akappiyaṃ paṭibāhati. Taṃ vo kappatī”ti vuttattā. Evaṃ tāva baddhasīmāgāmasīmānaṃ
analyzed: akappiyam paṭibāhati tam vaḥ kappati iti vutta ttā evam tāva baddha sīmā gāma sīmānam

original: aññamaññaṃ sabhāgatā, sambhedādidosābhāvo ca suttasuttānulomato siddho. Iminā eva

original: nayena araññasīmāsattabbhantarasīmānaṃ, nadiādiudakukkhepasīmānañca suttasuttānulomato
analyzed: nayena arañña sīmā satta bbhantara sīmānam nadi ādi udakukkhepa sīmānam ca sutta sutta anulomato

original: aññamaññaṃ sabhāgatā, sambhedādidosābhāvo ca siddhoti veditabbo.

original: punappunaṃ karaṇena vaḍḍhiṃ. Vītarāgattāti maggapaṭivedhena rāgassa vigatattā eva
analyzed: punappunam karaṇena vaḍḍhim vīta rāga ttā ati magga paṭivedhena rāgassa vigata ttā eva

original: nekkhammasaṅkhātaṃ arahattaṃ paṭivijjhitvā sacchikatvā ṭhito hoti. Sesapadesupi eseva
analyzed: nekkhamma saṅkhātam arahattam paṭivijjhitvā sacchikatvā ṭhitaḥ hoti sesa padesu pi esā iva

original: nayo. Pavivekādhimuttoti “paviveke adhimutto aha”nti evaṃ arahattaṃ byākarotīti attho.
analyzed: paviveka adhimutto ti paviveke adhimuttaḥ ahanti evam arahattam byākaroti iti attho

original: Sīlabbataparāmāsanti sīlañca vatañca parāmasitvā gahitaggahaṇamattaṃ. Sārato paccāgacchantoti sārabhāvena jānanto. Abyāpajjādhimuttoti abyāpajjaṃ arahattaṃ byākaroti.
analyzed: sīla bbata parāmāsanti sīlam ca vatam ca parāmasitvā gahita ggahaṇa mattam sārato paccāgacchanto ti sāra bhāvena jānantaḥ a byāpajja adhimuttaḥ ti a byāpajjam arahattam byākaroti

original: Amissīkatanti amissakataṃ. Kilesā hi ārammaṇena saddhiṃ cittaṃ missaṃ karonti, tesaṃ abhāvā amissīkataṃ. Bhusā vātavuṭṭhīti balavavātakkhandho.
analyzed: amissīkatanti amissakatam kilesāḥ hi ārammaṇena saddhim cittam missam karonti tesam abhāvā amissīkatam bhusā vāta vuṭṭhi ti balava vāta khandho

original: Upādānakkhayassa cāti upayogatthe sāmivacanaṃ. Disvā āyatanuppādanti cakkhādiāyatanānaṃ
analyzed: upādāna kkhayassa ca ati upayoga atthe sāmi vacanam disvā āyatana uppādanti cakkha ādi āyatanānam

original: uppādañca vayañca disvā. Cittaṃ vimuccatīti imāya vipassanāpaṭipattiyā phalasamāpattivasena cittaṃ vimuccati.
analyzed: uppādañca vayañca disvā cittam vimuccati iti imāya vipassanā paṭipattiyā phala samāpatti vasena cittam vimuccati

original: Soṇakoḷivisakathādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: soṇa koḷi visa kathā ādi vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Diguṇādiupāhanapaṭikkhepakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: diguṇa ādi upāhana paṭikkhepa kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 245. Sakaṭavāheti dvīhi sakaṭehi paricchinne vāhe. “Vāhe”ti bahuvacanassa hiraññavisesanattepi sāmaññāpekkhāya “hirañña”nti ekavacanaṃ kataṃ.
analyzed: sakaṭa vāha iti dvīhi sakaṭehi paricchinne vāhe vāha iti bahuvacanassa hirañña visesana tte pi sāmañña apekkhāya hiraññan ti ekavacanam katam

original: 246. Addāriṭṭhakavaṇṇāti allāriṭṭhaphalavaṇṇā, tintakākapakkhavaṇṇātipi vadanti.
analyzed: adda ariṭṭhaka vaṇṇā ati allāriṭṭha phala vaṇṇā tinta kākapakkha vaṇṇā ati pi vadanti

original: Rajananti upalittaṃ nīlādivaṇṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tenāha “coḷakena puñchitvā”ti.
analyzed: rajanan ti upalittam nīla ādi vaṇṇam sandhāya vuttam tena āha coḷakena puñchitvā iti

original: Tañhi tathā puñchite vigacchati. Yaṃ pana cammassa duggandhāpanayanatthaṃ kāḷarattādirajanehi
analyzed: tat hi tathā puñchite vigacchati yam pana cammassa duggandha apanayana ttham kāḷaratta ādi rajanehi

original: rañjitattā kāḷarattādivaṇṇaṃ hoti, taṃ coḷādīhi apanetuṃ na sakkā cammagatikameva,
analyzed: rañjita ttā kāḷara ttā ādi vaṇṇam hoti tam coḷa ādīhi apanetum na sakkā camma gatikam eva

original: tasmā taṃ vaṭṭatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: tasmā tam vaṭṭati iti daṭṭhabbam

original: Khallakanti sabbapaṇhipidhānacammaṃ, aparigaḷanatthaṃ paṇhiuparibhāge apidhāya āropanabandhanamattaṃ
analyzed: khallakam ti sabba paṇhi pidhāna cammam a parigaḷana attham paṇhi upari bhāge apidhāya āropana bandhana mattam

original: vaṭṭati. Vicitrāti saṇṭhānato vicitrapaṭā adhippetā, na vaṇṇato sabbaso apanetabbesu
analyzed: vaṭṭati vicitrā iti saṇṭhānataḥ vicitra paṭā adhippetā na vaṇṇato sabbaso apanetabbesu

original: khallakādīsu paviṭṭhattā. Biḷālasadisamukhattā mahāulūkā “pakkhibiḷālā”ti vuccati,
analyzed: khallaka ādīsu paviṭṭha ttā biḷāla sadisa mukha ttā mahā ulūkā pakkhibiḷālā ti vuccati

original: tesaṃ cammaṃ nāma pakkhalomameva.
analyzed: tesam cammam nāma pakkha lomam eva

original: Diguṇādiupāhanapaṭikkhepakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: diguṇa ādi upāhana paṭikkhepa kathā vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Ajjhārāmeupāhanapaṭikkhepakathādivaṇṇanā
analyzed: ajjhārāme upāhana paṭikkhepa kathā ādi vaṇṇanā

original: 251. Uṇṇāhi katapādukāti ettha uṇṇāmayakambalehi katā pādukā saṅgayhanti.
analyzed: uṇṇāhi kata pādukā ati ettha uṇṇā maya kambalehi katā pādukā saṅgayhanti

original: 253. Gaṅgāmahakīḷikāyāti gaṅgāmahe kīḷikāya. Tattha hi itthipurisā yānehi udakakīḷaṃ
analyzed: gaṅgāmaha kīḷikāya ati gaṅgāmahe kīḷikāya tattha hi itthi purisāḥ yānehi udaka kīḷaṃ

original: gacchanti. Pīṭhakasivikanti phalakādinā kataṃ pīṭhakayānaṃ. Paṭapotalikaṃ andolikā.
analyzed: gacchanti phalaka ādinā katam pīṭhaka yānam paṭa potalikam andolikā

original: Sabbampi yānaṃ upāhanenapi gantuṃ asamatthassa gilānassa anuññātaṃ.
analyzed: sabbam pi yānam upāhanena api gantum asamatthassa gilānassa anuññātam

original: 254. Vāḷarūpānīti āharimāni vāḷarūpāni. Caturaṅgulādhikānīti uddalomīekantalomīhi
analyzed: vāḷarūpāni iti āha rimāni vāḷarūpāni catur aṅgula adhikāni iti

original: visesadassanaṃ. Caturaṅgulato hi ūnāni kira uddalomīādīsu pavisanti. Vānacitro uṇṇāmayattharaṇoti
analyzed: visesa dassanam catur aṅgulataḥ hi ūnāni kira uddalomī ādīsu pavisanti

original: nānāvaṇṇehi uṇṇāmayasuttehi bhitticchedādivasena vāyitvā katacittattharaṇo. Ghanapupphakoti
analyzed: nānā vaṇṇehi uṇṇa āmaya suttehi bhitti cheda ādi vasena vāyitvā kata citta tharaṇaḥ ghana pupphakaḥ ti

original: bahalarāgo. Pakatitūlikāti tūlapuṇṇā bhisi. Vikatikāti sīharūpādivasena vānacitrāva
analyzed: tūla puṇṇā bhisi vikatikā ati sīha rūpa ādi vasena

original: gayhati. Uddalomīti “ubhatodasaṃ uṇṇāmayattharaṇa”nti dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
analyzed: uddalomi iti ubhatodasam dīgha nikāya ṭṭhakathāyam vuttam

original: Koseyyakaṭṭissamayanti kosiyasuttānaṃ antarā suvaṇṇamayasuttāni pavesetvā vītaṃ.
analyzed: koseyya kaṭṭissamayanti kosiya suttānam antarā suvaṇṇa maya suttāni pavesetvā vītam

original: ācariya-dhammapālattherena vuttanti vadanti. Ratanaparisibbitanti suvaṇṇalittaṃ.
analyzed: ācariya dhammapāla therena vuttanti vadanti ratana parisibbitanti suvaṇṇa littam

original: Suddhakoseyyanti ratanaparisibbanarahitaṃ.
analyzed: suddha koseyyam ti ratana parisibbana rahitam

original: Ajinamigacammānaṃ atisukhumattā dupaṭṭatipaṭṭāni katvā sibbantīti vuttaṃ “ajinappaveṇī”ti.
analyzed: ajina miga cammānam ati sukhuma ttā du paṭṭati paṭṭāni katvā sibbanti iti vuttam ajinappaveṇī iti

original: Rattavitānenāti sabbarattena vitānena. Yaṃ pana nānāvaṇṇaṃ vānacittaṃ vā lepacittaṃ
analyzed: ratta vitānena ati sabba rattena vitānena yam pana nānā vaṇṇam vāna cittam vā lepa cittam

original: vā, taṃ vaṭṭati. Ubhatolohitakūpadhānepi eseva nayo. “Citraṃ vā”ti idaṃ pana sabbathā
analyzed: vā tam vaṭṭati ubhatas lohitakūpadhāne pi esa iva nayaḥ citram vāti idam pana sabbathā

original: kappiyattā vuttaṃ, na pana ubhatoupadhānesu akappiyattā. Na hi lohitaka-saddo citte
analyzed: kappiya ttā vuttam na pana ubhatas upadhānesu a kappiya ttā na hi lohitaka saddaḥ citte

original: vattati, paṭaliggahaṇeneva cittakassapi attharaṇassa saṅgahetabbappasaṅgato, kāsāvaṃ
analyzed: vattati paṭali ggahaṇena iva cittakassa api attharaṇassa saṅgahetabba ppasaṅgataḥ kāsāvam

original: pana lohitakavohāraṃ na gacchati. Tasmā vitānepi ubhatoupadhānepi vaṭṭati. Sace pamāṇayuttantiādi
analyzed: pana lohitaka vohāram na gacchati vitāne api ubhatas upadhāne api vaṭṭati sace

original: aññappamāṇātikkantassa bibbohanassa paṭikkhittabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ, na pana
analyzed: añña ppamāṇa atikkantassa bibbohanassa paṭikkhitta bhāva dassana ttham vuttam na pana

original: uccāsayanamahāsayanabhāvadassanatthaṃ tathā avuttattā. Taṃ pana upadhānaṃ uposathikānaṃ
analyzed: uccāsayana mahāsayana bhāva dassana attham tathā a vutta ttā tam pana upadhānam uposathikānam

original: gahaṭṭhānaṃ vaṭṭati. Uccāsayanamahāsayanameva hi tadā tesaṃ na vaṭṭati. Dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathādīsu
analyzed: gaha ṭṭhānam vaṭṭati uccāsayana mahāsayanam eva hi tadā tesam na vaṭṭati dīgha nikāya ṭṭhakathā ādīsu

original: kiñcāpi “ṭhapetvā tūlikaṃ sabbāneva gonakādīni ratanaparisibbitāni vaṭṭantī”tiādi
analyzed: kiñca api ṭhapetvā tūlikam sabbān eva gonaka ādīni ratana parisibbitāni vaṭṭanti itiādi

original: vuttaṃ, vinayaṭṭhakathāyeva kappiyākappiyabhāve pamāṇanti gahetabbaṃ.
analyzed: vuttam vinaya ṭṭhakathāya iva kappiya akappiya bhāve pamāṇam ti gahetabbam

original: Ajjhārāmeupāhanapaṭikkhepakathādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: ajjhārāme upāhana paṭikkhepa kathā ādi vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Gihivikatānuññātādikathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: gihi vikata anuññāta ādi kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 256. Abhinissāyāti apassāya. Visukāyikavipphanditānanti paṭipakkhabhūtānaṃ diṭṭhicittavipphanditānanti attho.
analyzed: abhinissāya ati a passāya visu kāyika vipphanditānam ti paṭipakkha bhūtānam diṭṭhi citta vipphanditānam ti attho

original: 257. Yatindriyanti manindriyavasena saññatindriyaṃ.
analyzed: man indriya vasena

original: 258. Pāḷiyaṃ aṭṭhakavaggikānīti suttanipāte aṭṭhakavaggabhūtāni soḷasa suttāni. Evaṃ
analyzed: pāḷiyam aṭṭhakavaggikāni iti sutta nipāte aṭṭhaka vagga bhūtāni soḷasa suttāni evam

original: ciraṃ akāsīti evaṃ cirakālaṃ pabbajjaṃ anupagantvā agāramajjhe kena kāraṇena vāsamakāsīti
analyzed: ciram akāsi iti evam cira kālam pabbajjam an upagantvā agāra majjhe kena kāraṇena vāsam akāsi iti

original: attho. So kira majjhimavaye pabbajito, tena bhagavā evamāha. Etamatthaṃ viditvāti
analyzed: attho so kira majjhima vaye pabbajitaḥ tena bhagavā evam āha etam attham viditvā iti

original: kāmesu diṭṭhādīnavā cirāyitvāpi gharāvāsena pakkhandantīti etamatthaṃ sabbākārato viditvā.
analyzed: kāmesu diṭṭha ādīnavāḥ cirāyitvā api ghara āvāsena pakkhandanti iti etam attham sabba ākārataḥ viditvā

original: Ādīnavaṃ loketi saṅkhāraloke aniccatādiādīnavaṃ. Nirupadhinti nibbānaṃ. “Ariyo na ramatī pāpe”ti imassa hetumāha “pāpe na ramatī sucī”ti. Tattha sucīti visuddhapuggalo.
analyzed: ādīnavam loke iti saṅkhāra loke anicca tā ādi ādīnavam nirupadhim nibbānam ariyaḥ na ramati pāpe iti imassa hetum āha pāpe na ramati suci iti tattha suci iti visuddha puggalo

original: 259. Kāḷasīhoti kāḷamukhavānarajāti. Cammaṃ na vaṭṭatīti nisīdanattharaṇaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati, bhūmattharaṇādivasena senāsanaparibhogo vaṭṭateva.
analyzed: kāḷasīho ti kāḷamukha vānara jāti cammam na vaṭṭati iti nisīdana tharaṇam kātum na vaṭṭati bhūma tharaṇa ādi vasena senāsana paribhogaḥ vaṭṭatā iva

original: Gihivikatānuññātādikathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: gihi vikata anuññāta ādi kathā vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Cammakkhandhakavaṇṇanānayo niṭṭhito.
analyzed: cammakkhandhaka vaṇṇanā nayaḥ niṭṭhito

original: 6. Bhesajjakkhandhako
analyzed: bhesajja khandhako

original: Pañcabhesajjādikathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: pañca bhesajja ādi kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 260. Bhesajjakkhandhake pittaṃ koṭṭhabbhantaragataṃ hotīti bahisarīre byāpetvā ṭhitaṃ abaddhapittaṃ koṭṭhabbhantaragataṃ hoti, tena pittaṃ kupitaṃ hotīti adhippāyo.
analyzed: bhesajja khandhake pittam koṭṭhabbha antara gatam hoti iti bahi sarīre byāpetvā ṭhitam abaddha pittam koṭṭhabbha antara gatam hoti tena pittam kupitam hoti iti adhippāyaḥ

original: 261-2. Pāḷiyaṃ nacchādentīti ruciṃ na uppādenti. Susukāti samudde ekā macchajāti, kumbhilātipi vadanti. Saṃsaṭṭhanti parissāvitaṃ.
analyzed: pāḷiyam na chādenti iti rucim na uppādenti susukā ati samudde ekā maccha jāti kumbhilā atipi vadanti saṃsaṭṭhanti parissāvitam

original: 263. Piṭṭhehīti pisitehi. Kasāvehīti tacādīni udake tāpetvā gahitaūsarehi. Ubbhidanti ūsarapaṃsumayaṃ. Loṇabilanti loṇaviseso.
analyzed: piṭṭhehi iti pisitehi kasāvehi iti taca ādīni udake tāpetvā gahita ūsarehi ubbhidanti ūsara paṃsu mayam loṇa bilanti loṇa visesaḥ

original: 264-5. Chakaṇanti gomayaṃ. Pākatikacuṇṇanti apakkakasāvacuṇṇaṃ, gandhacuṇṇaṃ pana
analyzed: chakaṇam ti gomayam pākatika cuṇṇam nti a pakka kasāva cuṇṇam gandha cuṇṇam pana

original: na vaṭṭati. Pāḷiyaṃ cuṇṇacālininti udukkhale koṭṭitacuṇṇaparissāvaniṃ. Suvaṇṇagerukoti
analyzed: na vaṭṭati pāḷiyam cuṇṇa cālinim ti udukkhale koṭṭita cuṇṇa parissāvanim suvaṇṇa gerukā ti

original: suvaṇṇatutthādi. Pāḷiyaṃ añjanūpapisananti añjane upanetuṃ pisitabbabhesajjaṃ.
analyzed: suvaṇṇa tuttha ādi pāḷiyam añjana upapisanan ti añjane upanetum pisitabba bhesajjam

original: 267-9. Kabaḷikāti upanāhabhesajjaṃ. Gharadinnakābādho nāma gharaṇiyā dinnavasīkaraṇabhesajjasamuṭṭhitaābādho.
analyzed: kabaḷikā ati upanāha bhesajjam gharadinnaka ābādhaḥ nāma gharaṇiyā dinna vasīkaraṇa bhesajja samuṭṭhita ābādhaḥ

original: Tāya chārikāya paggharitaṃ khārodakanti parissāvane tacchārikaṃ pakkhipitvā udake
analyzed: tāya chārikāya paggharitam khāra udakanti parissāvane tat śārikam pakkhipitvā udake

original: abhisiñcite tato chārikato heṭṭhā paggharitaṃ khārodakaṃ. Pāḷiyaṃ akaṭayūsenāti anabhisaṅkhatena
analyzed: abhisiñcite tatas chārikataḥ heṭṭhā paggharitam khārodakam pāḷiyam a kaṭayūsena ati an abhisaṅkhatena

original: muggayūsena. Kaṭākaṭenāti mugge pacitvā acāletvā parissāvitena muggayūsenāti vadanti.
analyzed: mugga yūsena kaṭākaṭena ati mugge pacitvā a cāletvā parissāvitena mugga yūsena ati vadanti

original: Pañcabhesajjādikathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: pañca bhesajja ādi kathā vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Guḷādianujānanakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: guḷa ādi anujānana kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 272-4. Guḷakaraṇanti ucchusālaṃ. Avissatthāti sāsaṅkā.
analyzed: guḷa karaṇanti ucchu sālam sa āsaṅkā

original: 276. Appamattakepi vārentīti appamattake dinne dāyakānaṃ pīḷāti paṭikkhipanti. Paṭisaṅkhāpīti ettakenapi yāpetuṃ sakkā, “avasesaṃ aññesaṃ hotū”ti sallakkhetvāpi paṭikkhipanti.
analyzed: appamattake api vārenti iti appamattake dinne dāyakānam pīḷā ati paṭikkhipanti paṭisaṅkhā api iti ettakena api yāpetum sakkā avasesam aññesam hotu uti sallakkhetvā api paṭikkhipanti

original: 279. Vatthipīḷananti yathā vatthigatatelādi antosarīre ārohanti, evaṃ hatthena vatthimaddanaṃ. Sambādhe satthakammavatthikammānameva paṭikkhittattā dahanakammaṃ vaṭṭati eva.
analyzed: vatthi pīḷanam ti yathā vatthi gata tela ādi antosarīre ārohanti evam hatthena vatthi maddanam sambādhe sattha kamma vatthi kammānam eva dahana kammam vaṭṭati eva

original: Guḷādianujānanakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: guḷa ādi anujānana kathā vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Yāgumadhugoḷakādikathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: yāgu madhu goḷaka ādi kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 282-3. Pāḷiyaṃ dasassa ṭhānānīti assa paṭiggāhakassa dasa ṭhānāni kāraṇāni dhammenāti
analyzed: pāḷiyam dasassa ṭhānāni iti assa paṭiggāhakassa dasa ṭhānāni kāraṇāni dhammena ati

original: attho. Anuppavecchatīti deti. Vātañca byapanetīti sambandho, vātañca anulometīti
analyzed: atthaḥ anuppavecchati iti deti vātam ca byapaneti iti sambandhaḥ vātam ca anulometi iti

original: attho. Saggā te āraddhāti tayā devalokā ārādhitā.
analyzed: attho saggā te āraddhā ati tayā deva lokāḥ ārādhitā

original: Yāgumadhugoḷakādikathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: yāgu madhu goḷaka ādi kathā vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Pāṭaligāmavatthukathāvaṇṇanā
286. Pāṭaligāme nagaraṃ māpentīti pāṭaligāmassa samīpe tasseva gāmakhettabhūte mahante
analyzed: pāṭaligāme nagaram māpenti iti pāṭaligāmassa samīpe tassa iva gāma khetta bhūte mahante

original: 253. Pāḷiyaṃ na acchupiyantīti na phusitāni honti. Rūpakākiṇṇānīti itthirūpādīhi ākiṇṇāni.
analyzed: pāḷiyam na acchupiyanti iti na phusitāni honti rūpaka ākiṇṇāni iti itthi rūpa ādīhi ākiṇṇāni

original: 254. Bhūmiādhāraketi dantādīhi kate valayādhārake. Etassa valayādhārakassa anuccatāya
analyzed: bhūmi ādhāraka iti danta ādīhi kate valaya ādhārake etassa valaya ādhārakassa anucca tāya

original: ṭhapitā pattā na paripatantīti “tayo patte ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ. Anuccatañhi
analyzed: ṭhapitā pattā na paripatanti iti tayo patte ṭhapetum vaṭṭati iti vuttam anuccatam hi

original: sandhāya ayaṃ “bhūmiādhārako”ti vutto. Dāruādhārakadaṇḍādhārakesūti ekadārunā kataādhārake,
analyzed: sandhāya ayam bhūmi ādhārakaḥ iti vuttaḥ dāru ādhāraka daṇḍa ādhārakesu iti eka dārunā kata ādhārake

original: bahūhi daṇḍehi kataādhārake ca. Ete ca uccatarā honti pattehi saha patanasabhāvā.
analyzed: bahūhi daṇḍehi kata ādhārake ca ete ca uccatarāḥ honti pattehi saha

original: Tena “susajjitesū”ti vuttaṃ. Bhamakoṭisadisoti yattha dhamakaraṇādiṃ pavesetvā likhanti,
analyzed: tena su sajjitesu iti vuttam bhama koṭi sadisaḥ iti yattha dhama karaṇa ādim pavesetvā likhanti

original: tassa bhamakassa koṭiyā sadiso. Tādisassa dāruādhārakassa avitthiṇṇatāya ṭhapitopi
analyzed: tassa bhamakassa koṭiyā sadisaḥ tādisassa dāru ādhārakassa a vitthiṇṇa tāya ṭhapitaḥ api

original: patto patatīti “anokāso”ti vutto.
analyzed: patto patati iti anokāsaḥ ti vutto

original: Ālindakamiḍḍhikādīnanti pamukhamiḍḍhikādīnaṃ, uccavatthukānanti attho. Bāhirapasseti
analyzed: ālindakam iḍḍhikā ādīnam ti pamukham iḍḍhikā ādīnam ucca vatthukānam ti attho bāhira passā iti

original: pāsādādīnaṃ bahikuṭṭe. Tanukamiḍḍhikāyāti vedikāya. Sabbattha pana hatthappamāṇato
analyzed: pāsāda ādīnam bahi kuṭṭe tanukam iḍḍhikāya ati vedikāya sabbattha pana hattha ppamāṇato

original: abbhantare ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati. Ādhāre pana tato bahipi vaṭṭati.
analyzed: abbhantare ṭhapetum vaṭṭati ādhāre pana tatas vaṭṭati

original: Pāḷiyaṃ oṭṭhoti mukhavaṭṭi. Pattamāḷakanti upacikānaṃ anuṭṭhahanatthāya bhūmito uccataraṃ
analyzed: pāḷiyam oṭṭhaḥ ti mukhavaṭṭi pattamāḷakam ti upacikānam anuṭṭhahana tthāya bhūmitaḥ uccataram

original: kataṃ vedikākāramāḷakaṃ. Mahāmukhakuṇḍasaṇṭhānāti mahāmukhacāṭisaṇṭhānā. Laggentassa
analyzed: katam vedikā ākāra māḷakam mahāmukha kuṇḍa saṇṭhānā ati mahāmukha cāṭi saṇṭhānā

original: dukkaṭanti kevalaṃ pattaṃ laggentassa, na thavikāya laggentassāti vadanti. Vīmaṃsitabbaṃ.
analyzed: dukkaṭanti kevalam pattam laggentassa na thavikāya laggentassa ati vadanti vīmaṃsitabbam

original: Aññena pana bhaṇḍakenāti aññena bhārabandhanena bhaṇḍakena. “Bandhitvā olambetu”nti
analyzed: aññena pana bhaṇḍakena ati aññena bhāra bandhanena bhaṇḍakena bandhitvā olambetunti

original: vuttattā pattatthavikāya aṃsabaddhako yathā laggitaṭṭhānato na parigaḷati, tathā
analyzed: pattatthavikāya aṃsabaddhakaḥ yathā laggita ṭṭhānataḥ na parigaḷati tathā

original: sabbathāpi bandhitvā ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati. Bandhitvāpi upari ṭhapetuṃ na vaṭṭatīti upari
analyzed: sabbathā api bandhitvā ṭhapetum vaṭṭati bandhitvā api upari ṭhapetum na vaṭṭati iti upari

original: nisīdantā ottharitvā bhindantīti vuttaṃ. Tattha ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭatīti nisīdanasaṅkābhāvato
analyzed: nisīdantā ottharitvā bhindanti iti vuttam tattha ṭhapetum vaṭṭati iti nisīdana saṅkā abhāvato

original: vuttaṃ. Bandhitvā vāti bandhitvā ṭhapitachatte vā. Yo kocīti bhattapūropi tucchapattopi.
analyzed: vuttam bandhitvā vā ati bandhitvā ṭhapita chatte vā yo koci iti bhatta pūraḥ api tuccha pattaḥ api

original: 255. Pariharitunti divase divase piṇḍāya caraṇatthāya ṭhapetuṃ. Pattaṃ alabhantena
analyzed: pariharitunti divase divase piṇḍāya caraṇatthāya ṭhapetum pattam a labhantena

original: pana ekadivasaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā bhuñjitvā chaḍḍetuṃ vaṭṭati. Tenāha “tāvakālikaṃ
analyzed: pana eka divasam piṇḍāya caritvā bhuñjitvā chaḍḍetum vaṭṭati tena āha tāvakālikam

original: paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. Paṇṇapuṭādīsupi eseva nayo. Abhuṃ meti abhūti mayhaṃ, vināso
analyzed: paribhuñjitum vaṭṭati iti paṇṇa puṭa ādīsu pi eṣa iva nayaḥ mā iti mayham vināsaḥ

original: mayhanti attho. Pāḷiyaṃ pisāco vatamanti pisāco vatāyaṃ, ayameva vā pāṭho. Pisācillikāti
analyzed: mayhanti attho pāḷiyam pisācaḥ pisācaḥ vatamanti pisācaḥ vata ayam ayam eva vā pāṭho pisācillikā iti

original: pisācadārakā. Chavasīsassa pattoti chavasīsamayo patto. Pakativikārasambandhe cetaṃ sāmivacanaṃ.
analyzed: pisāca dārakā chava sīsassa patto ti chava sīsa mayaḥ patto pakati vikāra sambandhe ca itam sāmi vacanam

original: Cabbetvāti niṭṭhubhitvā. “Paṭiggahaṃ katvā”ti vuttattā ucchiṭṭhahatthena udakaṃ gahetvā
analyzed: cabbetvā iti niṭṭhubhitvā paṭiggaham katvā iti vuttattā ucchiṭṭha hatthena udakam gahetvā

original: pattaṃ paripphositvā dhovanaghaṃsanavasena hatthaṃ dhovituṃ vaṭṭati, ettakena pattaṃ
analyzed: pattam paripphositvā dhovana ghaṃsana vasena hattham dhovitum vaṭṭati ettakena pattam

original: paṭiggahaṃ katvā hattho dhovito nāma na hoti. Ekaṃ udakagaṇḍusaṃ gahetvāti pattaṃ
analyzed: paṭiggaham katvā hatthaḥ dhovitaḥ nāma na hoti ekam udaka gaṇḍusam gahetvā ati pattaṃ

original: aphusitvā tattha udakameva ucchiṭṭhahatthena ukkhipitvā gaṇḍusaṃ katvā, vāmahattheneva
analyzed: a phusitvā tattha udakam eva ucchiṭṭha hatthena ukkhipitvā gaṇḍusam katvā vāma hatthena iva

original: vā pattaṃ ukkhipitvā mukhena gaṇḍusaṃ gahetumpi vaṭṭati. Bahi udakena vikkhāletvāti
analyzed: vā pattam ukkhipitvā mukhena gaṇḍusam gahetum pi vaṭṭati bahi udakena vikkhāletvā ati

original: dvīsu aṅgulīsu āmisamattaṃ vikkhāletvā bahi gahetumpi vaṭṭati. Paṭikhāditukāmoti
analyzed: dvīsu aṅgulīsu āmisa mattam vikkhāletvā bahi gahetum pi vaṭṭati paṭikhāditu kāmaḥ iti

original: ettha na sayaṃ khāditukāmopi aññesaṃ khādanārahaṃ ṭhapetuṃ labhati. Tattheva katvāti
analyzed: ettha na sayam khāditu kāmaḥ api aññesam khādana araham ṭhapetum labhati tattha iva katvā ati

original: patteyeva yathāṭhapitaṭṭhānato anuddharitvā. Luñcitvāti tato maṃsameva niravasesaṃ uppaṭṭetvā.
analyzed: yathā ṭhapita ṭṭhānataḥ an uddharitvā luñcitvā iti tatas maṃsam eva niravasesam uppaṭṭetvā

original: 256. Kiṇṇacuṇṇenāti surākiṇṇacuṇṇena. Makkhetunti sūciṃ makkhetuṃ. Nisseṇimpīti catūhi
analyzed: kiṇṇa cuṇṇena ati surā kiṇṇa cuṇṇena makkhetum ti sūcim makkhetum nisseṇim pi iti catūhi

original: daṇḍehi cīvarappamāṇena āyatacaturassaṃ katvā baddhapaṭalampi. Ettha hi cīvarakoṭiyo
analyzed: daṇḍehi cīvara ppamāṇena āyata catur assam katvā baddha paṭalam pi ettha hi cīvara koṭiyaḥ

original: samakaṃ bandhitvā cīvaraṃ yathāsukhaṃ sibbanti. Tattha attharitabbanti tassā nisseṇiyā
analyzed: samakam bandhitvā cīvaram yathāsukham sibbanti tattha attharitabbanti tassā nisseṇiyā

original: upari cīvarassa upatthambhanatthāya attharitabbaṃ. Kathinasaṅkhātāya nisseṇiyā cīvarassa
analyzed: upari cīvarassa upatthambhana tthāya attharitabbam kathina saṅkhātāya nisseṇiyā cīvarassa

original: bandhanakarajju kathinarajjūti majjhimapadalopīsamāsoti āha “yāyā”tiādi. Tattha yasmā
analyzed: bandhanaka rajju kathina rajju iti āha yāyāti ādi tattha yasmā

original: dvinnaṃ paṭalānaṃ ekasmiṃ adhike jāte tattha valiyo honti, tasmā dupaṭṭacīvarassa
analyzed: dvinnam paṭalānam ekasmin adhike jāte tattha valiyaḥ honti tasmā du paṭṭa cīvarassa

original: paṭaladvayampi samakaṃ katvā bandhanakarajju kathinarajjūti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: paṭala dvayam pi samakam katvā bandhanaka rajju kathina rajjū iti veditabbam

original: Pāḷiyaṃ kathinassa anto jīratīti kathine baddhassa cīvarassa pariyanto jīrati. Kathinanissitañhi
analyzed: pāḷiyam kathinassa antaḥ jīrati iti kathine baddhassa cīvarassa pariyantaḥ jīrati kathina nissitam hi

original: cīvaraṃ idha nissayavohārena “kathina”nti vuttaṃ “mañcā ghosantī”tiādīsu viya. Anuvātaṃ
analyzed: cīvaram idha nissaya vohārena kathinanti vuttam mañcāḥ ghosanti iti ādīsu viya

original: paribhaṇḍanti kathine bandhanarajjūhi cīvarassa samantā pariyantassa ajīraṇatthaṃ
analyzed: paribhaṇḍanti kathine bandhana rajjūhi cīvarassa samantā pariyantassa a jīraṇa attham

original: yehi kehici coḷakehi dīghato anuvātaṃ, tiriyato paribhaṇḍañca sibbitvā kātuṃ yattha
analyzed: yehi kehicid coḷakehi dīghataḥ anuvātam tiriyataḥ paribhaṇḍam ca sibbitvā kātum yattha

original: rajjuke pavesetvā daṇḍesu paliveṭhetvā cīvarasamakaṃ ākaḍḍhituṃ sakkā, tādisanti
analyzed: rajjuke pavesetvā daṇḍesu paliveṭhetvā cīvara samakam ākaḍḍhitum sakkā tādisanti

original: attho. Keci pana “kathinasaṅkhātesu kilañjādīsu eva ajīraṇatthāya anuvātaparibhaṇḍakaraṇaṃ
analyzed: keci pana kathina saṅkhātesu kilañja ādīsu eva ajīraṇa atthāya anuvāta paribhaṇḍa karaṇam

original: anuññāta”nti vadanti. Tassa majjheti purāṇakathinasseva anto. Bhikkhuno pamāṇenāti
analyzed: anuññātanti vadanti tassa majjhe ti purāṇa kathinassa iva antaḥ bhikkhunaḥ pamāṇena ati

original: bhikkhuno cīvarassa pamāṇena. Aññaṃ nisseṇinti dīghato ca tiriyato ca aññaṃ daṇḍaṃ ṭhapetvā bandhituṃ.
analyzed: bhikkhuno cīvarassa pamāṇena aññam nisseṇinti dīghataḥ ca tiriyataḥ ca aññam daṇḍam ṭhapetvā bandhitum

original: Bidalakanti diguṇakaraṇasaṅkhātakiriyāvisesassa adhivacanaṃ. Tenāha “duguṇakaraṇa”nti.
analyzed: bidalakanti diguṇa karaṇa saṅkhāta kiriyā visesassa adhivacanam tena āha duguṇa karaṇan ti

original: Pavesanasalākanti valīnaṃ aggahaṇatthāya pavesanakaveḷusalākādi. Pāḷiyaṃ paṭiggahanti aṅgulikañcukaṃ.
analyzed: pavesana salākanti valīnam aggahaṇa atthāya pavesana kaveḷu salākā ādi pāḷiyam paṭiggahanti aṅguli kañcukam

original: 257. Pāti nāma bhaṇḍaṭṭhapanako bhājanaviseso. Pāḷiyaṃ paṭiggahathavikanti pātiādibhājanatthavikaṃ.
analyzed: pāti nāma bhaṇḍa ṭhapanakaḥ bhājana viseso pāḷiyam paṭiggaha thavikan ti pāti ādi bhājana tthavikam

original: Cinitunti uccavatthupariyantassa apatanatthāya iṭṭhakādīhi cinituṃ. Ālambanabāhanti
analyzed: cinitum ti ucca vatthu pariyantassa a patana atthāya iṭṭhaka ādīhi cinitum

original: ālambanarajjudaṇḍādi. Paribhijjatīti kaṭasārādikaṃ kathinamajjhe bhaṅgaṃ hoti. Ussāpetvāti
analyzed: ālambana rajju daṇḍa ādi paribhijjati iti kaṭa sāra ādikam kathina majjhe bhaṅgam hoti ussāpetvā iti

original: daṇḍakathinaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
analyzed: daṇḍa kathinam sandhāya vuttam

original: 258-9. Udakaṃ akappiyanti sappāṇakaṃ. Upanandhīti veraṃ bandhi. Addhānamaggo paṭipajjitabboti
analyzed: udakam sappāṇakam upanandhi iti veram bandhi addhāna maggaḥ paṭipajjitabbaḥ ti

original: ettha addhayojanaṃ addhānamaggo nāma, taṃ paṭipajjitukāmassa sañcicca vihārūpacārātikkamane
analyzed: ettha addha yojanam addhānamaggaḥ nāma tam paṭipajjitu kāmassa sañcicca vihāra upacāra atikkamane

original: āpatti. Asañcicca gatassa pana yattha sarati, tattha ṭhatvā saṅghāṭikaṇṇādiṃ anadhiṭṭhahitvā
analyzed: āpatti a sañcicca gatassa pana yattha sarati tattha ṭhatvā saṅghāṭi kaṇṇa ādim an adhiṭṭhahitvā

original: gamane padavārena āpattīti veditabbaṃ. Na sammatīti na pahoti.
analyzed: gamane pada vārena āpatti iti veditabbam na sammatī iti na pahoti

original: 260. Abhisannakāyāti semhādidosasannicitakāyā. Tattha majjheti aggaḷapāsakassa majjhe.
analyzed: abhisanna kāyā ti semha ādi dosa sannicita kāyā tattha majjhe ti aggaḷa pāsakassa majjhe

original: Uparīti aggaḷapāsakassa uparibhāge. Udakaṭṭhapanaṭṭhānanti udakaṭṭhapanatthāya paricchinditvā kataṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: upari iti aggaḷa pāsakassa upari bhāge udaka ṭṭhapana ṭhānam ti udaka ṭṭhapana tthāya paricchinditvā kata ṭṭhānam

original: 261. Pāḷiyaṃ udapānanti kūpaṃ. Nīcavatthukoti kūpassa samantā kūlaṭṭhānaṃ, bhūmisamaṃ tiṭṭhatīti attho. Udakena otthariyyatīti samantā vassodakaṃ āgantvā kūpe patatīti attho.
analyzed: pāḷiyam udapānanti kūpam nīca vatthuko ti kūpassa samantā kūla ṭṭhānam bhūmi samam tiṭṭhati iti attho udakena otthariyyati iti samantā vassa udakam āgantvā kūpe patati iti attho

original: 262. Vāhentīti ussiñcanti. Arahaṭaghaṭiyantaṃ nāma cakkasaṇṭhānaṃ anekāraṃ are are ghaṭikāni bandhitvā ekena, dvīhi vā paribbhamiyamānayantaṃ.
analyzed: vāhenti iti ussiñcanti arahaṭaghaṭiyantam nāma cakka saṇṭhānam aneka aram are ghaṭikāni bandhitvā ekena dvīhi vā

original: 263. Āviddhapakkhapāsakanti kaṇṇikamaṇḍalassa samantā ṭhapitapakkhapāsakaṃ. Maṇḍaleti kaṇṇikamaṇḍale. Pakkhapāsake ṭhapetvāti samantā caturassākārena phalakādīni ṭhapetvā.
analyzed: āviddha pakkha pāsakam ti kaṇṇika maṇḍalassa samantā ṭhapita pakkha pāsakam maṇḍale iti kaṇṇika maṇḍale pakkha pāsake ṭhapetvā ati samantā caturassa ākārena phalaka ādīni ṭhapetvā

original: 264. Namatakaṃ nāma santhatasadisanti keci vadanti. Keci pana “rukkhatacamaya”nti.
analyzed: namatakam nāma santhata sadisanti keci vadanti keci pana

original: Cammakhaṇḍaparihārenāti anadhiṭṭhahitvā sayanāsanavidhināti attho. Peḷāyāti aṭṭhaṃsasoḷasaṃsādiākārena
analyzed: camma khaṇḍa parihārena ati an adhiṭṭhahitvā sayana āsana vidhinā ati attho peḷāya ati aṭṭhaṃsa soḷa saṃsa ādi ākārena

original: katāya bhājanākārāya peḷāya. Yattha uṇhapāyāsādiṃ pakkhipitvā upari bhojanapātiṃ
analyzed: katāya bhājana ākārāya peḷāya yattha uṇha pāyāsa ādim pakkhipitvā upari bhojana pātim

original: ṭhapenti bhattassa uṇhabhāvāvigamanatthaṃ, tādisassa bhājanākārassa ādhārassetaṃ
analyzed: ṭhapenti bhattassa uṇha bhāva a vigamana attham tādisassa bhājana ākārassa ādhārassa etam

original: adhivacanaṃ. Teneva pāḷiyaṃ “āsittakūpadhāna”nti vuttaṃ. Tassa ca pāyāsādīhi āsittakādhāroti
analyzed: adhivacanam tena iva pāḷiyam āsittaka upadhānan ti vuttam tassa ca pāyāsa ādīhi āsittaka ādhāraḥ ti

original: attho. Idañca āsittakūpadhānaṃ paccantesu na jānanti kātuṃ, majjhimadeseyeva karonti.
analyzed: idam ca āsittaka upadhānam paccantesu na jānanti kātum majjhima deseya iva karonti

original: Keci pana “gihiparibhogo ayomayādi sabbopi ādhāro āsittakūpadhānameva anulometī”ti
analyzed: keci pana gihi paribhogaḥ ayomaya ādi sabbaḥ api ādhāraḥ āsittaka upadhānam eva anulomā iti

original: vadanti, eke pana “kappiyalohamayo ādhāro maḷorikameva anulometī”ti. Vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbaṃ.
analyzed: vadanti eke pana kappiya loha mayaḥ ādhāraḥ maḷorikam eva anulomā iti vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbam

original: Pubbe pattaguttiyā ādhāro anuññāto. Idāni bhuñjituṃ maḷorikā anuññātā. Chiddanti
analyzed: pubbe patta guttiyā ādhāraḥ anuññātaḥ idāni bhuñjitum maḷorikā anuññātā chiddanti

original: chiddayuttaṃ. Viddhanti antovinividdhachiddaṃ. Āviddhanti samantato chiddaṃ.
analyzed: chidda yuttam viddhanti antar vinividdha chiddam āviddhanti samantataḥ chiddam

original: 265. Pattaṃ nikkujjitunti ettha kammavācāya asambhogakaraṇavaseneva nikkujjanaṃ,
analyzed: pattam nikkujjitum ti ettha kamma vācāya asambhoga karaṇa vasena iva nikkujjanam

original: na pattānaṃ adhomukhaṭṭhapanena. Tenāha “asambhogaṃ saṅghena karotū”tiādi, taṃ vaḍḍhaṃ
analyzed: na pattānam adhomukha ṭṭhapanena tena āha a sambhogam saṅghena karotu uti ādi tam vaḍḍham

original: kammavācāya saṅghena saddhiṃ asambhogaṃ saṅgho karotūti attho.
analyzed: kamma vācāya saṅghena saddhim a sambhogam saṅghaḥ karotu iti atthaḥ

original: Pattaṃ nikkujjeyyāti vaḍḍhassa pattanikkujjanadaṇḍakammaṃ kareyya. Asambhogaṃ saṅghena
analyzed: pattam nikkujjeyya ati vaḍḍhassa patta nikkujjana daṇḍa kammam kareyya a sambhogam saṅghena

original: karaṇanti saṅghena vaḍḍhassa asambhogakaraṇaṃ. Yathā asambhogo hoti, tathā karaṇanti
analyzed: karaṇam ti saṅghena vaḍḍhassa a sambhoga karaṇam yathā a sambhogaḥ hoti tathā karaṇam ti

original: 300. Upacāro na hotīti gabbhassa bahi samantā anuparigamanassa okāso nappahoti. Rukkhaṃ
analyzed: upacāraḥ na hoti iti gabbhassa bahi samantā anuparigamanassa okāsaḥ na pahoti rukkhaṃ

original: vijjhitvāti tacchitasāradāruṃ aggasamīpe vijjhitvā. Katvāti chidde katvā. Kappakataṃ

original: viya sārakhāṇuke ākoṭetvā evaṃ katameva “āharimaṃ bhittipāda”nti vuttaṃ. Upatthambhanatthaṃ

original: pidahanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
analyzed: pidahana attham vuttam

original: Ubhatokuṭṭaṃ nīharitvā katapadesassāti yathā bahi ṭhitā ujukaṃ anto nisinne na passanti,

original: 301. Pānīyaṃ otappatīti pānīyabhājanesu ṭhapitapānīyaṃ ātapena santappati.

original: 303. Tayo vāṭeti tayo parikkhepe. Veḷuvāṭanti sabbaṃ dāruparikkhepaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Kaṇṭakavāṭanti sabbasākhāparikkhepaṃ.

original: 305. Āloko antaradhāyīti yo buddhārammaṇāya pītiyā ānubhāvena mahanto obhāso ahosi,
analyzed: ālokaḥ antaradhāyi iti yaḥ buddha ārammaṇāya pītiyāḥ ānubhāvena mahantaḥ obhāsaḥ ahosi

original: duggandhaṃ bībhacchaṃ āmakasusānaṃ pattassa bhayena pītivege mandībhūte antaradhāyi.

original: Sataṃ hatthīti gāthāya hatthino satasahassānīti evaṃ paccekaṃ sahassa-saddena yojetvā

analyzed: atthaḥ ñātabbo padavī tihārassa ati buddham vandissāmi iti ratanattayam uddissa gacchataḥ

original: ekapadavītihārassa, tappaccayakusalaphalassāti attho. Tassa soḷasamo bhāgo kalaṃ

original: nāma, taṃ soḷasiṃ kalaṃ yathāvuttā hatthiādayo sabbe nāgghanti nārahanti, nidassanamattañcetaṃ.

original: Anekasatasahassabhāgampi nāgghanti.
analyzed: aneka sata sahassa bhāgam pi na agghanti

original: Andhakāro antaradhāyīti puna balavapītiyā āloke samuppanne antaradhāyi. Āsattiyoti taṇhāyo. Vayakaraṇanti deyyadhammamūlaṃ navakammaṃ.
analyzed: andhakāraḥ antaradhāyi iti puna balava pītiyā āloke samuppanne antaradhāyi āsattiyā uti deyya dhamma mūlam nava kammam

original: 309. Dadeyyāti navakammaṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ vihāre issariyaṃ dadeyyāti attho. Dinnoti navakammaṃ kātuṃ vihāro dinno, vihāre navakammaṃ dinnanti vā attho.
analyzed: dadeyya iti nava kammam adhiṭṭhātum vihāre issariyam dadeyya iti atthaḥ dinnaḥ iti nava kammam kātum vihāraḥ dinnaḥ vihāre nava kammam dinnan ti vā atthaḥ

original: 313-4. Santhāgāreti sannipātamaṇḍape. Okāseti nivāsokāse. Uddissa katanti saṅghaṃ uddissa kataṃ. Gihivikaṭanti gihīhi kataṃ paññattaṃ, gihisantakanti attho.
analyzed: santhā āgāre iti sannipāta maṇḍape okāse iti nivāsa ukāse uddissa katam nti saṅgham uddissa katam gihi vikaṭam ti gihīhi katam paññattam gihi santakam ti attho

original: Vihārānujānanakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

original: Senāsanaggāhakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: senāsana ggāha kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 318. “Chamāsaccayena chamāsaccayenā”ti idaṃ dvikkhattuṃ paccayadānakālaparicchedadassanaṃ,
analyzed: cha māsa cayena cha māsa cayena ati idam dvi kkhattum paccaya dāna kāla pariccheda dassanam

original: evarūpaṃ vitakkaṃ anuppādetvā. Bhaṇḍappaṭicchādananti paṭicchādanabhaṇḍaṃ. Sarīrappaṭicchādanacīvaranti
analyzed: evarūpam vitakkam an uppādetvā bhaṇḍa ppaṭicchādananti paṭicchādana bhaṇḍam sarīra ppaṭicchādana cīvaranti

original: Paṭijaggitabbānīti khaṇḍaphullapaṭisaṅkharaṇasammajjanādīhi paṭijaggitabbāni. Muddavedikāyāti

analyzed: cetiyassa hammiya vedikāya ghaṭa ākārassa upari caturassa vedikāya kasmā pucchitabba ntiādi

original: cā”ti vuttaṃ. Ca-kāro cettha pana-saddatthe vattati, na samuccayattheti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

analyzed: puggala vasena iva kappiya bhaṇḍa vasena ca apalokana ppakāram dassetum tam pana evam

analyzed: cīvara paccayam sallakkhetvā ati saddhā deyya tatruppāda ādi vasena tasmin vassāvāse labbhamānam

analyzed: cīvara saṅkhātam paccayam ettakam ti paricchinditvā senāsanassa ati senāsana ggāhāpanassa

original: jane sammannituṃ vaṭṭatīti ekakammavācāya sabbepi ekato sammannituṃ vaṭṭati. Niggahakammameva

analyzed: hi saṅghaḥ saṅghassa na karoti tena iva sattasatika khandhake ubbāhika kamma sammutiyam

analyzed: aṭṭha api janāḥ ekatas iva sammatā ati

original: Āsanagharanti paṭimāgharaṃ. Maggoti upacārasīmabbhantaragate gāmābhimukhamagge katasālā vuccati. Evaṃ pokkharaṇīrukkhamūlādīsupi.
analyzed: āsana gharanti paṭimā gharam maggo ti upacāra sīma abbhantara gate gāma abhimukha magge kata sālā vuccati evam pokkharaṇī rukkha mūla ādīsu pi

original: Labhantīti tatravāsino bhikkhū labhanti. Vijaṭetvāti “ekekassa pahonakappamāṇena
analyzed: labhanti iti tatravāsinaḥ bhikkhū labhanti vijaṭetvā ati ekekassa pahona kappamāṇena

original: viyojetvā. Āvāsesu pakkhipitvāti “ito uppannaṃ asukasmiṃ asukasmiñca āvāse vasantā
analyzed: viyojetvā āvāsesu pakkhipitvā ati itas uppannam asukasmin asukasmin ca āvāse vasantā

original: pāpetvā gaṇhantū”ti vācāya upasaṃharitvā. Pavisitabbanti mahālābhe pariveṇe vasitvāva

analyzed: lābhaḥ gahetabbo ti adhippāyaḥ

original: Ayampīti ettha yo paṃsukūliko paccayaṃ vissajjeti. Teneva vissaṭṭho ayaṃ cīvarapaccayopīti
analyzed: ayam pi iti ettha yaḥ paṃsukūliko paccayam vissajjeti tena iva vissaṭṭhaḥ ayam cīvara paccayaḥ api iti

original: yojanā. Pādamūle ṭhapetvā sāṭakaṃ dentīti paccayadāyakā denti. Etena gahaṭṭhehi pādamūle

original: ṭhapetvā dinnampi paṃsukūlikānampi vaṭṭatīti dasseti. Atha vassāvāsikaṃ demāti vadantīti

analyzed: ettha paṃsukūlikānam na vaṭṭati iti ajjhāharitvā yojetabbam vassaṃvuttha bhikkhūnam ti

original: Upanibandhitvā gāhāpetabbanti idha rukkhādīsu vasitvā cīvaraṃ gaṇhathāti paṭibandhaṃ katvā gāhetabbaṃ.

original: Pāṭipadaaruṇatotiādi vassūpanāyikadivasaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Antarāmuttakaṃ pana pāṭipadaṃ

analyzed: kattabbam katikavattam katvā kasāva paribhaṇḍanti kasāva rasehi bhūmi parikammam

original: Tividhampīti pariyattipaṭipattipaṭivedhavasena tividhampi. Sodhetvāti ācārādīsu upaparikkhitvā.

original: Ekacārikavattanti bhāvanākammaṃ. Tañhi gaṇasaṅgaṇikaṃ pahāya ekacārikeneva vattitabbattā
analyzed: ekacārikavattanti bhāvanā kammam tat hi gaṇa saṅgaṇikam pahāya ekacārikena iva vattitabba ttā

original: evaṃ vuttaṃ. Dasavatthukakathā nāma appicchakathā, santuṭṭhi, paviveka, asaṃsagga,
analyzed: evam vuttam dasa vatthukakathā nāma appiccha kathā

original: vīriyārambha, sīla, samādhi, paññā, vimutti, vimuttiñāṇadassanakathāti imā dasa.
