analyzed: rajana bhājanam udaka doṇīpi eka dāru nāva katam udaka bhājanam

original: Bhūmattharaṇaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti akappiyacammaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tattha bhūmattharaṇasaṅkhepena
analyzed: bhūmattharaṇam kātum vaṭṭati iti akappiya cammam sandhāya vuttam tattha bhūmattharaṇa saṅkhepena

original: sayitumpi vaṭṭatiyeva. “Paccattharaṇagatika”nti iminā mañcādīsu attharitabbaṃ mahācammaṃ
analyzed: sayitum pi vaṭṭatiyā iva paccattharaṇa gatikan ti iminā mañca ādīsu attharitabbam mahā cammam

original: eḷakacammaṃ nāmāti dasseti.
analyzed: eḷaka cammam nāma ati dasseti

original: Chattamuṭṭhipaṇṇanti tālapaṇṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Pattakaṭāhanti pattapacanakaṭāhaṃ.
analyzed: chatta muṭṭhi paṇṇam ti tāla paṇṇam sandhāya vuttam patta kaṭāham ti patta pacana kaṭāham

original: Avissajjiyavatthukathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: avissajjiya vatthu kathā vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Navakammadānakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: nava kamma dāna kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 323. Pāḷiyaṃ piṇḍanikkhepanamattenātiādīsu khaṇḍaphullaṭṭhāne mattikāpiṇḍaṭṭhapanaṃ
analyzed: pāḷiyam piṇḍa nikkhepana mattena ati ādīsu khaṇḍa phulla ṭṭhāne mattikā piṇḍa ṭṭhapanam

original: piṇḍanikkhepanaṃ nāma. Navakammanti navakammasammuti. Aggaḷavaṭṭi nāma kavāṭabandho.
analyzed: piṇḍanikkhepanam nāma nava kammanti nava kamma sammuti aggaḷavaṭṭi nāma kavāṭa bandho

original: Chādanaṃ nāma tiṇādīhi gehacchādanaṃ. Bandhanaṃ nāma daṇḍavalliādīhi chadanabandhanameva.
analyzed: chādanam nāma tiṇa ādīhi geha chādanam bandhanam nāma daṇḍa valli ādīhi chadana bandhanam eva

original: Catuhatthavihāreti vitthārappamāṇato vuttaṃ. Ubbedhato pana anekabhūmakattā vaḍḍhakīhatthena
analyzed: catu hattha vihārā iti vitthāra ppamāṇataḥ vuttam ubbedhato pana aneka bhūmaka ttā vaḍḍhakī hatthena

original: vīsatihatthopi nānāsaṇṭhānavicittopi hoti. Tenassa catuvassikaṃ navakammaṃ vuttaṃ. Evaṃ sesesupi.
analyzed: vīsati hatthaḥ api nānā saṇṭhāna vicittaḥ api hoti tena assa catu vassikam nava kammam vuttam evam sesesu pi

original: Pāḷiyaṃ sabbe vihāreti bhummatthe upayogabahuvacanaṃ. Ekassa sabbesu vihāresu navakammaṃ
analyzed: pāḷiyam sabbe vihāre iti bhumma tthe upayoga bahuvacanam ekassa sabbesu vihāresu nava kammam

original: detīti attho. Sabbakālaṃ paṭibāhantīti navakammikā attano gāhitaṃ varaseyyaṃ sampattānaṃ
analyzed: deti iti attho sabbakālam paṭibāhanti iti navakammikāḥ attanaḥ gāhitam varaseyyam sampattānam

original: yathāvuḍḍhaṃ akatvā utukālepi paṭibāhanti.
analyzed: yathāvuḍḍham a katvā utu kāle pi paṭibāhanti

original: “Sace so āvāso jīratī”tiādi pāḷimuttakavinicchayo. Mañcaṭṭhānaṃ datvāti mañcaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: sace saḥ āvāsaḥ jīrati itiādi pāḷimuttaka vinicchayaḥ mañca ṭṭhānam da tvā iti mañca ṭṭhānam

original: puggalikaṃ datvā. Tibhāganti tatiyabhāgaṃ. Evaṃ vissajjanampi thāvarena thāvaraparivattanaṭṭhāne
analyzed: puggalikam da tvā ti bhāgam ti tatiya bhāgam evam vissajjanam pi thāvarena thāvara parivattana ṭhāne

original: eva pavisati, na itarathā sabbasenāsanānaṃ vinassanato. Sace saddhivihārikānaṃ dātukāmo
analyzed: eva pavisati na itarathā sabba senāsanānam vinassanataḥ sace saddhivihārikānam dātu kāmo

original: hotīti sace so saṅghassa bhaṇḍakaṭṭhapanaṭṭhānaṃ vā aññesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: hoti iti sace so saṅghassa bhaṇḍaka ṭṭhapana ṭhānam vā aññesam bhikkhūnam vasana ṭṭhānam

original: vā dātuṃ na icchati, attano saddhivihārikānaññeva dātukāmo hoti, tādisassa tuyhaṃ
analyzed: vā dātum na icchati attanaḥ dātu kāmo hoti tādisassa tuyham

original: puggalikameva katvā jaggāti na sabbaṃ tassa dātabbanti adhippāyo. Tattha pana kattabbavidhiṃ
analyzed: puggalikam eva katvā jaggāti na sabbam tassa dātabban ti adhippāyaḥ tattha pana kattabba vidhim

original: dassento āha “kamma”ntiādi. Evañhītiādimhi vayānurūpaṃ tatiyabhāge vā upaḍḍhabhāge
analyzed: dassentaḥ āha kamma ntiādi evañhi itiādimhi tatiya bhāge vā upaḍḍha bhāge

original: vā gahite taṃ bhāgaṃ dātuṃ labhatīti attho.
analyzed: vā gahite tam bhāgam dātum labhati iti

original: Yenāti tesu dvīsu bhikkhūsu yena. So sāmīti tassā bhūmiyā vihārakaraṇe sova sāmī,
analyzed: yena iti tesu dvīsu bhikkhūsu yena so sāmī iti tassā bhūmiyā vihāra karaṇe saḥ uva sāmī

original: taṃ paṭibāhitvā itarena na kātabbanti adhippāyo. So hi paṭhamaṃ gahito. Akataṭṭhāneti
analyzed: tam paṭibāhitvā itarena na kātabbanti adhippāyaḥ saḥ hi paṭhamam gahitaḥ a kata ṭṭhāne iti

original: cayādīnaṃ akatapubbaṭṭhāne. Cayaṃ vā pamukhaṃ vāti saṅghikasenāsanaṃ nissāya tato
analyzed: caya ādīnam a kata pubbaṭṭhāne cayam vā pamukham vā ati saṅghika senāsanam nissāya tatas

original: bahi cayaṃ bandhitvā, ekaṃ senāsanaṃ vā. Bahikuṭṭeti kuṭṭato bahi, attano kataṭṭhāneti attho.
analyzed: bahi cayam bandhitvā ekam senāsanam vā bahikuṭṭā iti kuṭṭataḥ bahi kata ṭṭhānā iti attho

original: Navakammadānakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: nava kamma dāna kathā vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Aññatraparibhogapaṭikkhepādikathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: aññatra paribhoga paṭikkhepa ādi kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 324. Vaḍḍhikammatthāyāti yathā tammūlagghato na parihāyati, evaṃ kattabbassa evaṃ nipphādetabbassa mañcapīṭhādino atthāya.
analyzed: vaḍḍhi kamma atthāya ati yathā na parihāyati evam kattabbassa evam nipphādetabbassa mañca pīṭha ādinaḥ atthāya

original: Cakkalikanti pādapuñchanatthaṃ cakkākārena kataṃ. Paribhaṇḍakatabhūmi vāti kāḷavaṇṇādikatasaṇhabhūmi vā. Senāsanaṃ vāti mañcapīṭhādi vā.
analyzed: cakkalikanti pāda puñchana ttham cakka ākārena katam paribhaṇḍa kata bhūmi vāti kāḷavaṇṇa ādi kata saṇha bhūmi vā senāsanam vāti mañca pīṭha ādi vā

original: “Tatheva vaḷañjetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti iminā nevāsikehi dhotapādādīhi vaḷañjanaṭṭhāne sañcicca adhotapādādīhi vaḷañjantasseva āpatti paññattāti dasseti.
analyzed: tathā iva vaḷañjetum vaṭṭati iti iminā nevāsikehi dhota pāda ādīhi vaḷañjana ṭṭhāne sañcid ca a dhota pāda ādīhi vaḷañjantassa iva āpatti paññattā ati dasseti

original: “Dvārampī”tiādinā sāmaññato vuttattā dvāravātapānādayo aparikammakatāpi na apassayitabbā. Ajānitvā apassayantassapi idha lomagaṇanāya āpatti.
analyzed: dvāram pi itiādinā sāmaññataḥ vutta ttā dvāra vāta pāna ādayaḥ aparikammaka tā api na a passayitabbā a jānitvā a passayantassa api idha loma gaṇanāya āpatti

original: Aññatraparibhogapaṭikkhepādikathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: aññatra paribhoga paṭikkhepa ādi kathā vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Saṅghabhattādianujānanakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: saṅgha bhatta ādi anujānana kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 325. Uddesabhattaṃ nimantananti imaṃ vohāraṃ pattānīti ettha iti-saddo ādiattho, uddesabhattaṃ nimantanantiādivohāraṃ pattānīti attho. Tampīti saṅghabhattampi.
analyzed: uddesa bhattam nimantananti imam vohāram pattāni iti ettha iti saddo ādi atthaḥ uddesa bhattam nimantananti ādi vohāram pattāni iti attho tam pi iti saṅgha bhattam pi

original: Saṅghabhattādianujānanakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: saṅgha bhatta ādi anujānana kathā vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Uddesabhattakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: uddesa bhatta kathā vaṇṇanā

original: Bhojanasālāyāti bhattuddesaṭṭhānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Ekavaḷañjanti ekadvārena vaḷañjitabbaṃ. Nānānivesanesūti nānākulassa nānūpacāresu nivesanesu.
analyzed: bhojana sālāya iti bhattuddesaṭṭhānam sandhāya vuttam eka vaḷañjan ti eka dvārena vaḷañjitabbam nānā nivesanesu iti nānā kulassa nānā upacāresu nivesanesu

original: Nisinnassapi niddāyantassapīti anādare sāmivacanaṃ, vuḍḍhatare niddāyante navakassa gāhitaṃ suggahitanti attho.
analyzed: nisinnassa api niddāyantassa api iti anādare sāmi vacanam vuḍḍhatare niddāyante navakassa gāhitam suggahitanti attho

original: Vissaṭṭhadūtoti yathāruci vattuṃ labhanato nirāsaṅkadūto. Pucchāsabhāgenāti pucchāvacanapaṭibhāgena. “Ekā kūṭaṭṭhitikā nāmā”ti vuttamevatthaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “rañño vā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: vissaṭṭha dūto ti yathāruci vattum labhanataḥ nirāsaṅka dūto pucchā sabhāgena ati pucchā vacana paṭibhāgena ekā kūṭaṭṭhitikā nāma ati vuttam eva attham vibhāvetum raññaḥ vā hi itiādi vuttam

original: Sabbaṃ pattassāmikassa hotīti cīvarādikampi sabbaṃ pattassāmikasseva hoti, mayā bhattameva sandhāya vuttaṃ, na cīvarādinti vatvā gahetuṃ na vaṭṭatīti attho.
analyzed: sabbam patta sāmikassa hoti iti cīvara ādikam pi sabbam patta sāmikassa iva hoti mayā bhattam eva sandhāya vuttam na cīvara ādi ti vatvā gahetum na vaṭṭati iti attho

original: Akatabhāgonāmāti āgantukabhāgo nāma, adinnapubbabhāgoti attho.
analyzed: akata bhāgaḥ nāma ati āgantuka bhāgaḥ nāma adinna pubba bhāgaḥ ti attho

original: Kiṃ āharīyatīti avatvāti “katarabhattaṃ vā tayā āharīyatī”ti dāyakaṃ apucchitvā. Pakatiṭṭhitikāyāti uddesabhattaṭṭhitikāya.
analyzed: kim āharīyati iti avatvā ati katara bhattam vā tayā āharīyati iti dāyakam a pucchitvā pakati ṭṭhitikāya ati uddesa bhatta ṭṭhitikāya

original: Uddesabhattakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: uddesa bhatta kathā vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Nimantanabhattakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: nimantana bhatta kathā vaṇṇanā

original: Vicchinditvāti “bhattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti padaṃ avatvā. Tenevāha “bhattanti avadantenā”ti.
analyzed: vicchinditvā ati bhattam gaṇhatha iti padam avatvā tena iva āha bhatta nti a vadantena ati

original: Ālopasaṅkhepenāti ekekapiṇḍavasena, evañca bhājanaṃ uddesabhatte na vaṭṭati. Tattha hi ekassa pahonakappamāṇeneva bhājetabbaṃ.
analyzed: ālopa saṅkhepena ati ekeka piṇḍa vasena evam ca bhājanam uddesa bhatte na vaṭṭati tattha hi ekassa pahona kappamāṇena iva bhājetabbam

original: Āruḷhāyeva mātikaṃ, saṅghato aṭṭha bhikkhūti ettha ye mātikaṃ āruḷhā, te aṭṭha bhikkhūti
analyzed: āruḷhāya iva mātikam saṅghataḥ aṭṭha bhikkhū iti ettha ye mātikam āruḷhā te aṭṭha bhikkhū iti

original: yojetabbaṃ. Uddesabhattanimantanabhattādisaṅghikabhattamātikāsu nimantanabhattamātikāya
analyzed: yojetabbam uddesa bhatta nimantana bhatta ādi saṅghika bhatta mātikāsu nimantana bhatta mātikāya

original: ṭhitivasena āruḷhe bhattuddesakena vā sayaṃ vā saṅghato uddisāpetvā gahetvā gantabbaṃ,
analyzed: ṭhiti vasena āruḷhe bhattuddesakena vā sayam vā saṅghato uddisāpetvā gahetvā gantabbam

original: na attano rucite gahetvāti adhippāyo. Mātikaṃ āropetvāti “saṅghato gaṇhāmī”tiādinā
analyzed: na attanaḥ rucite gahetvā iti adhippāyaḥ mātikam āropetvā iti saṅghataḥ gaṇhāmi iti ādinā

original: vuttamātikābhedaṃ dāyakassa viññāpetvāti attho.
analyzed: vutta mātikā bhedam dāyakassa viññāpetvā ti attho

original: Paṭibaddhakālato pana paṭṭhāyāti tattheva vāsassa nibaddhakālato paṭṭhāya.
analyzed: paṭibaddha kālataḥ pana paṭṭhāya ati tattha iva vāsassa nibaddha kālataḥ paṭṭhāya

original: Nimantanabhattakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: nimantana bhatta kathā vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Salākabhattakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: salākabhatta kathā vaṇṇanā

original: Upanibandhitvāti likhitvā. Gāmavasenapīti yebhuyyena samalābhagāmavasenapi. Bahūni salākabhattānīti tiṃsaṃ vā cattārīsaṃ vā bhattāni. “Sace hontī”ti ajjhāharitvā yojetabbaṃ.
analyzed: upanibandhitvā iti likhitvā gāma vasena api iti yebhuyyena sama lābha gāma vasena api bahūni salāka bhattāni iti tiṃsam vā cattārīsam vā bhattāni sace honti iti ajjhāharitvā yojetabbam

original: Sallakkhetvāti tāni bhattāni pamāṇavasena sallakkhetvā. Niggahena datvāti dūraṃ gantuṃ
analyzed: sallakkhetvā ti tāni bhattāni pamāṇa vasena sallakkhetvā niggahena da tvā ati dūram gantum

original: anicchantassa niggahena sampaṭicchāpetvā datvā. Puna vihāraṃ āgantvāti ettha vihāraṃ
analyzed: an icchantassa niggahena sampaṭicchāpetvā da tvā puna vihāram āgantvā ati ettha vihāram

original: anāgantvā bhattaṃ gahetvā pacchā vihāre attano pāpetvā bhuñjitumpi vaṭṭati.
analyzed: an āgantvā bhattam gahetvā pacchā vihāre bhuñjitum pi vaṭṭati

original: Ekagehavasenāti vīthiyampi ekapasse gharapāḷiyā vasena. Uddisitvāpīti asukakule salākabhattāni tuyhaṃ pāpuṇantīti vatvā.
analyzed: eka geha vasena ati vīthiyam pi eka passe ghara pāḷiyā vasena uddisitvā api iti asuka kule salāka bhattāni tuyham pāpuṇanti iti vatvā

original: Vāragāmeti atidūrattā vārena gantabbagāme. Saṭṭhito vā paṇṇāsato vāti daṇḍakammatthāya
analyzed: vāragāmā iti ati dūra ttā vārena gantabba gāme saṭṭhitaḥ vā paṇṇāsataḥ vā ati daṇḍa kamma atthāya

original: udakaghaṭaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Vihāravāroti sabbabhikkhūsu bhikkhatthāya gatesu vihārarakkhaṇavāro.
analyzed: udaka ghaṭam sandhāya vuttam vihāra vāraḥ ti sabba bhikkhūsu bhikkha tthāya gatesu vihāra rakkhaṇa vāro

original: Tesanti vihāravārikānaṃ. Phātikammamevāti vihārarakkhaṇakiccassa pahonakapaṭipādanameva. Ekasseva pāpuṇantīti divase divase ekekasseva pāpitānīti attho.
analyzed: tesan ti vihāravārikānam phāti kammam eva ati vihāra rakkhaṇa kiccassa pahonaka paṭipādanam eva ekassa iva pāpuṇanti iti divase divase ekekassa iva pāpitāni iti attho

original: Rasasalākanti ucchurasasalākaṃ. “Salākavasena gāhitattā pana na sāditabbā”ti idaṃ
analyzed: rasa salākam ti ucchu rasa salākam salāka vasena gāhita ttā pana na sāditabbā iti idam

original: asāruppavasena vuttaṃ, na dhutaṅgabhedavasena. “Saṅghato nirāmisasalākā…pe… vaṭṭatiyevā”ti
analyzed: asāruppa vasena vuttam na dhutaṅga bheda vasena saṅghataḥ vaṭṭatiyā iva āti

original: hi visuddhimagge vuttaṃ. Aggabhikkhāmattanti ekakaṭacchubhikkhāmattaṃ. Laddhā vā
analyzed: hi visuddhi magge vuttam agga bhikkhā mattam ti eka kaṭacchu bhikkhā mattam laddhā vā

original: aladdhā vā svepi gaṇheyyāsīti laddhepi appamattatāya vuttaṃ. Tenāha “yāvadatthaṃ
analyzed: a laddhā vā sve api gaṇheyyāsi iti laddhe ipi appamatta tāya vuttam tena āha yāvadattham

original: labhati…pe… alabhitvā ‘sve gaṇheyyāsī’ti vattabbo”ti.
analyzed: a labhitvā sve gaṇheyyāsi iti vattabbā uti

original: Tatthāti tasmiṃ disābhāge. Taṃ gahetvāti taṃ vāragāme salākaṃ attano gahetvā. Tenāti
analyzed: tattha ati tasmin disā bhāge tam gahetvā iti tam vāragāme salākam gahetvā tena ati

original: disaṃgamikato aññena tasmiṃ disaṃgamike. Devasikaṃ pāpetabbāti upacārasīmāya ṭhitassa
analyzed: disaṃgamikataḥ aññena tasmin disaṃgamike devasikam pāpetabbā ati upacāra sīmāya ṭhitassa

original: yassa kassaci vassaggena pāpetabbā. Evaṃ etesu agatesu āsannavihāre bhikkhūnaṃ bhuñjituṃ
analyzed: yassa kassaci vassaggena pāpetabbāḥ evam etesu agatesu āsannavihāre bhikkhūnam bhuñjitum

original: vaṭṭati itarathā saṅghikato.
analyzed: vaṭṭati itarathā saṅghikataḥ

original: Amhākaṃ gocaragāmevāti salākabhattadāyakānaṃ gāmaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Vihāre therassa
analyzed: amhākam gocara gāmā iva iti salāka bhatta dāyakānam gāmam sandhāya vuttam vihāre therassa

original: pattasalākabhattanti vihāre ekekasseva ohīnattherassa sabbasalākānaṃ attano pāpanavasena pattasalākabhattaṃ.
analyzed: patta salāka bhattam ti vihāre ekekassa iva ohīna therassa sabba salākānam attanaḥ pāpana vasena patta salāka bhattam

original: Salākabhattakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: salākabhatta kathā vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Pakkhikabhattādikathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: pakkhika bhatta ādi kathā vaṇṇanā

original: “Sve pakkho”ti ajja pakkhikaṃ na gāhetabbanti aṭṭhamiyā bhuñjitabbaṃ sattamiyā bhuñjanatthāya
analyzed: sve pakkho ti ajja pakkhikam na gāhetabbam ti aṭṭhamiyā bhuñjitabbam sattamiyā bhuñjana tthāya

original: na gāhetabbaṃ, dāyakehi niyamitadivaseneva gāhetabbanti attho. Tenāha “sace panā”tiādi.
analyzed: na gāhetabbam dāyakehi niyamita divasena iva gāhetabbanti atthaḥ tena āha sace pana atiādi

original: Sve lūkhanti ajja āvāhamaṅgalādikaraṇato atipaṇītabhojanaṃ karīyati, sve tathā na

original: Tattha “vatthuvasenā”ti idaṃ “satta samathā dasa samathā hontī”ti imassa kāraṇavacanaṃ.

original: “Pariyāyenā”ti idaṃ “dasa samathā satta samathā hontī”ti imassa kāraṇavacanaṃ. Catubbidhādhikaraṇasaṅkhātavatthuvasena
analyzed: pariyāyena ati idam dasa samathā satta samathāḥ honti iti imassa kāraṇa vacanam catubbidha adhikaraṇa saṅkhāta vatthu vasena

original: ca desanākkamasaṅkhātapariyāyavasena cāti attho.
analyzed: ca desanā kkama saṅkhāta pariyāya vasena ca ati attho

original: Adhikaraṇapariyāyavāravaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: adhikaraṇa pariyāya vāra vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Sādhāraṇavārādivaṇṇanā
297. Sattame sādhāraṇavāre sādhāraṇāti vivādādhikaraṇassa vūpasamanakiccasādhāraṇā. Evaṃ sabbattha.
analyzed: sattame sādhāraṇa vāre sādhāraṇā ati vivāda adhikaraṇassa vūpasamana kicca sādhāraṇā evam sabbattha

original: 298. Aṭṭhame tabbhāgiyavāre tabbhāgiyāti vivādādhikaraṇassa vūpasamanato tappakkhikā.
analyzed: aṭṭhame tabbhāgiya vāre tabbhāgiyā ati vivāda adhikaraṇassa vūpasamanataḥ tappakkhikā

original: Sādhāraṇavārādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: sādhāraṇa vāra ādi vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Samathāsamathassasādhāraṇavāravaṇṇanā
299. Navame samathāsamathasādhāraṇavāre “sabbe samathā ekatova adhikaraṇaṃ samenti
analyzed: navame samatha asamatha sādhāraṇa vāre sabbe samathāḥ ekatas va adhikaraṇam samenti

original: udāhu nānā”ti pucchantena “samathā samathassa sādhāraṇā, samathā samathassa asādhāraṇā”ti
analyzed: udāhu nānā iti pucchantena samathā samathassa sādhāraṇā samathā samathassa asādhāraṇā iti

original: vuttaṃ. Vivādādiadhikaraṇakkamena tabbūpasamahetubhūte samathe uddharanto “yebhuyyasikā”tiādimāha.
analyzed: vuttam vivāda ādi adhikaraṇa kkamena tad būpasama hetu bhūte samathe uddharantaḥ yebhuyyasikā ati ādim āha

original: Sammukhāvinayaṃ vinā kassaci samathassa asambhavā sesā chapi samathā sammukhāvinayassa
analyzed: sammukhāvinayam vinā kassaci samathassa asambhavā sesā samathā sammukhāvinayassa

original: sādhāraṇā vuttā, tesaṃ pana channaṃ aññamaññāpekkhābhāvato te aññamaññaṃ asādhāraṇā
analyzed: sādhāraṇā vuttā tesam pana channam aññamañña apekkhā bhāvato te aññamaññam asādhāraṇā

original: vuttā. Tabbhāgiyavārepi eseva nayo.
analyzed: vuttā tad bhāgiya vāre pi esā iva nayo

original: Samathāsamathassasādhāraṇavāravaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: samatha asamathassa sādhāraṇa vāra vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Samathasammukhāvinayavārādivaṇṇanā
301-3. Ekādasamavārepi sammukhāvinayotiādi pucchā. Yebhuyyasikā sativinayotiādi visajjanaṃ. Evaṃ vinayavāre kusala-vāre tato paresupi pucchāvisajjanaparicchedo veditabbo.
analyzed: ekādasama vāre pi pucchā yebhuyyasikā sati vinaya uti ādi visajjanam evam vinaya vāre kusala vāre tatas paresu pi pucchā visajjana paricchedaḥ veditabbo

original: Tattha sammukhāvinayo siyā kusalotiādīsu tasmiṃ tasmiṃ vinayakamme, vivādādimhi ca
analyzed: tattha sammukha avinayaḥ siyā kusalaḥ ti ādīsu tasmim tasmim vinaya kamme vivāda ādimhi ca

original: niyuttapuggalānaṃ samuppajjanakakusalādīnaṃ vasena sammukhāvinayādīnaṃ, vivādādīnañca
analyzed: niyutta puggalānam samuppajjanaka kusala ādīnam vasena sammukha avinaya ādīnam vivāda ādīnam ca

original: kusalādibhāvo tena tena upacārena vutto. Yasmā panetassa sammukhāvinayo nāma saṅghasammukhatādayo
analyzed: kusala ādi bhāvaḥ tena tena upacārena vuttaḥ yasmā pana itassa sammukhāvinayaḥ nāma saṅgha sammukha tā ādayaḥ

original: honti, tesañca anavajjasabhāvattā akusale vijjamānepi akusalattūpacāro na yutto āpattādhikaraṇassa
analyzed: honti tesam ca anavajja sabhāva ttā akusale vijjamāne pi akusala ttu upacāraḥ na yuttaḥ āpatta adhikaraṇassa

original: akusalattūpacāro viya, tasmā natthi sammukhāvinayo akusaloti attho.
analyzed: akusala ttu upacāraḥ viya tasmā na atthi sammukha avinayaḥ akusalaḥ ti attho

original: 304. Tato paresu yattha yebhuyyasikā labbhati, tattha sammukhāvinayo labbhatītiādi
analyzed: tato paresu yattha yebhuyyasikā labbhati tattha sammukha avinayaḥ labbhati itiādi

original: sammukhāvinayassa itarehi samathehi niyamena saṃsaṭṭhataṃ, itaresaṃ pana channaṃ
analyzed: sammukhāvinayassa itarehi samathehi niyamena itaresam pana channam

original: aññamaññaṃ saṃsaggābhāvañca dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
analyzed: aññam aññam saṃsagga abhāvañca dassetum vuttam

original: Samathasammukhāvinayavārādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
Saṃsaṭṭhavārādivaṇṇanā
analyzed: saṃsaṭṭha vāra ādi vaṇṇanā

original: 306. Adhikaraṇanti vā samathāti vā ime dhammā saṃsaṭṭhātiādi samathānaṃ adhikaraṇesu
analyzed: adhikaraṇam ti vā samathā ati vā ime dhammā saṃsaṭṭhā ati ādi samathānam adhikaraṇesu

original: eva yathārahaṃ pavattiṃ, adhikaraṇāni vinā tesaṃ visuṃ aṭṭhānañca dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
analyzed: eva yathāraham pavattim adhikaraṇāni vinā tesam visum aṭṭhānam ca dassetum vuttam

original: Vinibbhujitvā nānākaraṇaṃ paññāpetunti adhikaraṇato samathehi viyojetvā asaṃsaṭṭhe
analyzed: vinibbhujitvā nānākaraṇam paññāpetunti adhikaraṇataḥ samathehi viyojetvā a saṃsaṭṭhe

original: katvā nānākaraṇaṃ aññamaññaṃ asaṃsaṭṭhatāya ṭhitabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ nānattaṃ paññāpetuṃ
analyzed: katvā nānākaraṇam aññamaññam a saṃsaṭṭha tāya ṭhita bhāva saṅkhātam nānattam paññāpetum

original: adhikaraṇavūpasamakkhaṇe eva tesaṃ asaṃsaggaṃ paññāpetuṃ kiṃ sakkāti pucchati.
analyzed: adhikaraṇa vūpasama khaṇe eva tesam a saṃsaggam paññāpetum kim sakkā iti pucchati

original: Adhikaraṇantiādi gārayhavādadassanaṃ. So mā hevanti yo evaṃ vadati, so “mā evaṃ vadā”ti
analyzed: adhikaraṇa ntiādi gārayha vāda dassanam saḥ mā hevanti yaḥ evam vadati saḥ mā evam vadāti

original: vacanīyo assa, na ca labbhati samathānaṃ aññatra adhikaraṇā vūpasamalakkhaṇanti pahānāvatthānasaṅkhātaṃ
analyzed: vacanīyaḥ assa na ca labbhati samathānam aññatra adhikaraṇā vūpasama lakkhaṇanti pahāna avatthāna saṅkhātam

original: nānākaraṇaṃ paṭikkhipati. Lakkhaṇato pana adhikaraṇehi samathānaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ atthevāti
analyzed: nānākaraṇam paṭikkhipati lakkhaṇato pana adhikaraṇehi samathānam nānākaraṇam attha eva ati

original: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Samathā adhikaraṇehi sammantīti apalokanādīhi catūhi kiccādhikaraṇehi
analyzed: daṭṭhabbam samathā adhikaraṇehi sammanti iti apalokana ādīhi catūhi kicca adhikaraṇehi

original: sabbepi samathā niṭṭhānaṃ gacchanti, nāññehīti imamatthaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Teneva
analyzed: sabbe api samathāḥ niṭṭhānam gacchanti na aññehi iti imam attham sandhāya vuttam tena eva

original: vakkhati “sammukhāvinayo vivādādhikaraṇena na sammati. Anuvāda…pe… āpattādhikaraṇena
analyzed: sammukha avinayaḥ vivāda adhikaraṇena na sammati anuvāda pe āpatta adhikaraṇena

original: na sammati, kiccādhikaraṇena sammatī”tiādi.
analyzed: na sammati kicca adhikaraṇena sammati itiādi

original: 307-313. Vivādādhikaraṇaṃ katihi samathehi sammatītiādiko sammativāro. Tadanantaro
analyzed: vivāda adhikaraṇam katihi samathehi sammati iti ādikaḥ sammativāraḥ tad anantaraḥ

original: sammatinasammativāro ca adhikaraṇehi samathānaṃ saṃsaṭṭhataṃ, visaṃsaṭṭhatañca dassetuṃ
analyzed: ca adhikaraṇehi samathānam saṃsaṭṭha tam visaṃsaṭṭha tañca dassetuṃ

original: vutto. Samathā samathehi sammantītiādiko samathādhikaraṇavāro samathānaṃ aññamaññaṃ,
analyzed: vutto samathā samathehi sammanti iti ādiko samatha adhikaraṇa vāro samathānam aññam aññam

original: adhikaraṇehi ca adhikaraṇānañca aññamaññaṃ, samathehi ca vūpasamāvūpasamaṃ dassetuṃ vutto.
analyzed: adhikaraṇehi ca adhikaraṇānam ca aññam aññam samathehi ca vūpasama avūpasamam dassetum vuttaḥ

original: 314. Samuṭṭhāpetivāro pana adhikaraṇehi adhikaraṇānaṃ uppattippakāradassanatthaṃ
analyzed: samuṭṭhāpetivāro pana adhikaraṇehi adhikaraṇānam uppatti ppakāra dassana attham

original: vutto. Na katamaṃ adhikaraṇanti attano sambhavamattena ekampi adhikaraṇaṃ na samuṭṭhāpetīti
analyzed: vuttaḥ na katamam adhikaraṇan ti attanaḥ sambhava mattena ekam pi adhikaraṇam na samuṭṭhāpeti iti

original: attho. Kathañcarahi samuṭṭhāpetīti āha “api cā”tiādi. Tattha jāyantīti anantarameva
analyzed: attho kathañcarahi samuṭṭhāpeti iti āha api ca atiādi tattha jāyanti iti anantaram eva

original: anuppajjitvā paramparapaccayā jāyantīti adhippāyo. “Dhammo adhammo”tiādinā ubhinnaṃ
analyzed: an uppajjitvā parampara paccayāḥ jāyanti iti adhippāyaḥ dhammo adhammo ti ādinā ubhinnam

original: puggalānaṃ vivādapaccayā aññamaññakhemabhaṅgā honti, tappaccayā tesaṃ pakkhaṃ pariyesanena
analyzed: puggalānam vivāda paccayā aññamañña khema bhaṅgāḥ honti tad paccayā tesam pakkham pariyesanena

original: kalahaṃ vaḍḍhantānaṃ vivādo kañci mahāparisaṃ saṅghapariṇāyakaṃ lajjiṃ āgamma vūpasamaṃ
analyzed: kalaham vaḍḍhantānam vivādaḥ kañci mahā parisam saṅgha pariṇāyakam lajjim āgamma vūpasamam

original: gacchati. Tathā avūpasamante pana vivādo kamena vaḍḍhitvā sakalepi saṅghe vivādaṃ
analyzed: gacchati tathā pana vivādaḥ kamena sakale api saṅghe

original: samuṭṭhāpeti, tato anuvādādīnīti evaṃ paramparakkamena vūpasamakāraṇābhāve cattāri
analyzed: samuṭṭhāpeti tatas anuvāda ādīni iti evam parampara kkamena vūpasama kāraṇa abhāve cattāri

original: adhikaraṇāni jāyanti. Taṃ sandhāyāha “saṅgho vivadati vivādādhikaraṇa”nti. Saṅghassa
analyzed: adhikaraṇāni jāyanti tam sandhāya āha saṅghaḥ vivadati vivāda adhikaraṇanti saṅghassa

original: vivadato yo vivādo, taṃ vivādādhikaraṇaṃ hotīti attho. Esa nayo sesesupi.
analyzed: vivadataḥ yaḥ vivādaḥ tam vivāda adhikaraṇam hoti iti attho esa nayo sesesu pi

original: Saṃsaṭṭhavārādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: saṃsaṭṭha vāra ādi vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Bhajativāravaṇṇanā
318. Tadanantaravāre pana vivādādhikaraṇaṃ catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānantiādi adhikaraṇānaṃ
analyzed: tad anantara vāre pana vivāda adhikaraṇam adhikaraṇa ananti ādi

original: vuttanayena aññamaññapaccayattepi saṃsaggabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Vivādādhikaraṇaṃ
analyzed: vutta nayena aññamañña paccaya tte pi saṃsagga bhāva dassana ttham vuttam vivāda adhikaraṇam

original: catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ vivādādhikaraṇaṃ bhajatītiādīsu vivādādhikaraṇaṃ catūsu adhikaraṇesu
analyzed: catunnam vivāda adhikaraṇam bhajati itiādīsu vivāda adhikaraṇam catūsu adhikaraṇesu

original: vivādādhikaraṇabhāvameva bhajati, nāññādhikaraṇabhāvaṃ, catūsu adhikaraṇesu vivādādhikaraṇattameva
analyzed: vivāda adhikaraṇa bhāvam eva bhajati na aññā adhikaraṇa bhāvam catūsu adhikaraṇesu vivāda adhikaraṇa ttam eva

original: nissitaṃ vivādādhikaraṇameva pariyāpannaṃ vivādādhikaraṇabhāveneva saṅgahitanti evamattho gahetabbo.
analyzed: nissitam vivāda adhikaraṇam eva pariyāpannam vivāda adhikaraṇa bhāvena iva saṅgahitan ti evam atthaḥ gahetabbaḥ

original: 319. Vivādādhikaraṇaṃ sattannaṃ samathānaṃ kati samathe bhajatītiādi pana catunnaṃ
analyzed: vivāda adhikaraṇam kati samathe bhajati itiādi pana

original: adhikaraṇānaṃ vūpasamane sati niyatasamathe dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Tattha kati samathe
analyzed: adhikaraṇānam vūpasamane sati niyata samathe dassetum vuttam tattha kati samathe

original: bhajatīti attano upasamatthāya kittake samathe upagacchati, kittake samathe āgamma
analyzed: bhajati iti attanaḥ upasamatthāya kittake samathe upagacchati kittake samathe āgamma

original: vūpasamaṃ gacchatīti attho. Kati samathapariyāpannanti attānaṃ vūpasametuṃ katisu
analyzed: vūpasamam gacchati iti attho kati samatha pariyāpannanti attānam vūpasametum katisu

original: samathesu tehi samānavasena paviṭṭhaṃ. Katihi samathehi saṅgahitanti vūpasamaṃ karontehi
analyzed: samathesu tehi samāna vasena paviṭṭham katihi samathehi saṅgahita nti vūpasamam karontehi

original: katihi samathehi vūpasamakaraṇatthaṃ saṅgahitaṃ.
analyzed: katihi samathehi vūpasama karaṇa attham saṅgahitam

original: Bhajativāravaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: bhajati vāra vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Khandhakapucchāvāro
analyzed: khandhaka pucchāvāro

original: Pucchāvissajjanāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: pucchā vissajjanā vaṇṇanā

original: 320. Upasampadakkhandhakanti pabbajjākhandhakaṃ. Saha niddesenāti saniddesaṃ. “Sanniddesa”nti
analyzed: upasampad akkhandhakanti pabbajjā khandhakam saha niddesena ati sa niddesam sanniddesam

original: vā pāṭho, so evattho. Nidānena ca niddesena ca saddhinti ettha paññattiṭṭhānapuggalādippakāsakaṃ
analyzed: vā pāṭhaḥ saḥ evatthaḥ nidānena ca niddesena ca saddhin ti ettha paññatti ṭṭhāna puggala ādi ppakāsakam

original: nidānavacanaṃ nidānaṃ nāma, tannidānaṃ paṭicca niddiṭṭhasikkhāpadāni niddeso nāma,
analyzed: nidāna vacanam nidānam nāma tad nidānam paṭicca niddiṭṭha sikkhāpadāni niddesaḥ nāma

original: tehi avayavabhūtehi sahitaṃ taṃsamudāyabhūtaṃ khandhakaṃ pucchāmīti attho. Uttamāni
analyzed: tehi avayava bhūtehi sahitam taṃ samudāya bhūtam khandhakam pucchāmi iti uttamāni

original: padānīti āpattipaññāpakāni vacanāni adhippetāni. Tesaṃ…pe… kati āpattiyo hontīti
analyzed: padāni iti āpatti paññāpakāni vacanāni adhippetāni tesaṃpe kati āpattiyaḥ honti iti

original: tehi vacanehi paññattā kati āpattikkhandhā hontīti attho. Nanu āpattiyo nāma puggalānaññeva
analyzed: tehi vacanehi paññattā kati āpatti kkhandhāḥ honti iti atthaḥ nanu āpattiyaḥ nāma puggalān aññā eva

original: honti, na padānaṃ, kasmā pana “samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ kati āpattiyo”ti sāmivasena niddeso
analyzed: honti na padānam kasmā pana samukkaṭṭha padānam kati āpattiyaḥ ti sāmi vasena niddeso

original: katoti āha “yena yena hi padenā”tiādi. Pāḷiyaṃ uposathantiādi uposathakkhandhakādīnaññeva gahaṇaṃ.
analyzed: kataḥ iti āha yena yena hi padena atiādi pāḷiyam uposatha ntiādi uposatha khandhaka ādīnam aññā iva gahaṇam

original: Pucchāvissajjanāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: pucchā vissajjanā vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Ekuttarikanayaṃ
analyzed: ekuttarikanayam

original: Ekakavāravaṇṇanā
321. Ekuttarikanaye pana ajānantena vītikkantāti paṇṇattiṃ vā vatthuṃ vā ajānantena
analyzed: ekuttarika naye pana a jānantena vītikkantā ati paṇṇattim vā vatthum vā a jānantena

original: vītikkantā pathavīkhaṇanasahaseyyādikā, sāpi pacchā āpannabhāvaṃ ñatvā paṭikammaṃ
analyzed: vītikkantā pathavī khaṇana sahaseyya ādikā sā api pacchā āpanna bhāvam ñatvā paṭikammam

original: akarontassa antarāyikāva hoti.
analyzed: a karontassa antarāyikā ava hoti

original: Pārivāsikādīhi pacchā āpannāti vattabhedesu dukkaṭāni sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tasmiṃ khaṇe
analyzed: pārivāsika ādīhi pacchā āpannā ati vatta bhedesu dukkaṭāni sandhāya vuttam tasmin khaṇe

original: āpajjitabbaantarāpattiyo sandhāyāti keci vadanti, tassa pubbāpattīnaṃantarāpatti-padeneva
analyzed: āpajjitabba antarāpattiyo sandhāya ati keci vadanti tassa

original: vakkhamānattā purimameva yuttataraṃ. Mūlavisuddhiyā antarāpattīti mūlāyapaṭikassanādīni
analyzed: purimam eva yuttataram mūla visuddhiyā antarāpatti iti mūlāya paṭikassana ādīni

original: akatvā sabbapaṭhamaṃ dinnaparivāsamānattavisuddhiyā caraṇakāle āpannaantarāpattisaṅkhātasaṅghādiseso.
analyzed: a katvā sabba paṭhamam dinna parivāsa mānatta visuddhiyā caraṇa kāle āpanna antarāpatti saṅkhāta saṅgha ādi seso

original: Agghavisuddhiyāti antarāpattiṃ āpannassa mūlāya paṭikassitvā odhānasamodhānavasena
analyzed: aggha visuddhiyā ti antarāpattim āpannassa mūlāya paṭikassitvā odhāna samodhāna vasena

original: odhunitvā purimāpattiyā samodhāya tadagghavasena puna dinnaparivāsādisuddhiyā caraṇakāle
analyzed: odhunitvā purima āpattiyā samodhāya tad aggha vasena puna dinna parivāsa ādi suddhiyā caraṇa kāle

original: puna āpannā antarāpatti.
analyzed: punar āpannā antarāpatti

original: Saussāhenevāti punapi taṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitukāmatācittena, evaṃ desitāpi āpatti na
analyzed: saussāhena iva ati punar api tam āpattim āpajjitu kāma tā cittena evam desitā api āpatti na

original: vuṭṭhātīti adhippāyo. Dhuranikkhepaṃ akatvā āpajjane sikhāppattadosaṃ dassento āha

original: rukkhā ca vinassanti, tādisaṃ ṭhānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, tattha saṅghassa katikā na
analyzed: rukkhā ca vinassanti tādisam ṭhānam sandhāya vuttam tattha saṅghassa katikā na

original: pavattīti adhippāyo. Ye pana rukkhā bījāni ropetvā ādito paṭṭhāya paṭijaggitā, tepi
analyzed: pavatti iti adhippāyaḥ ye pana rukkhāḥ bījāni ropetvā āditas paṭṭhāya paṭijaggitā te pi

original: dasamabhāgaṃ datvā ropakeheva paribhuñjitabbā. Tehīti jaggakehi.
analyzed: dasama bhāgam da tvā ropakehi iva paribhuñjitabbā tehi iti jaggakehi

original: Tatthāti tasmiṃ vihāre. Mūleti ādikāle, pubbeti attho. Dīghā katikāti aparicchinnakālā
analyzed: tattha ati tasmin vihāre mūla iti ādi kāle pubbā iti atthaḥ dīghā katikā ati aparicchinna kālā

original: yathāsukhaṃ paribhogatthāya katikā. Nikkukkuccenāti “abhājitamida”nti kukkuccaṃ akatvāti
analyzed: yathāsukham paribhoga tthāya katikā nikkukkuccena ati a bhājitam idam ti kukkuccam a katvā iti

original: attho. Khiyyanamattamevetanti tena khiyyanena bahuṃ khādantānaṃ doso natthi attano
analyzed: attho khiyyanam attam eva etat ti tena khiyyanena bahum khādantānam doso natthi attanaḥ

original: paribhogappamāṇasseva gahitattā, khiyyantepi attano pahonakaṃ gahetvā khāditabbanti adhippāyo.
analyzed: paribhoga ppamāṇassa iva gahita ttā khiyyante api attanaḥ pahonakam gahetvā khāditabbanti adhippāyaḥ

original: Gaṇhathāti na vattabbāti tathāvutte teneva bhikkhunā dinnaṃ viya maññeyyuṃ, taṃ nissāya
analyzed: gaṇhatha ati na vattabbā ti tathā vutte tena iva bhikkhunā dinnam viya maññeyyum tam nissāya

original: micchājīvasambhavo hotīti vuttaṃ. Tenāha “anuvicaritvā”tiādi. Upaḍḍhabhāgoti ekabhikkhuno
analyzed: micchājīva sambhavaḥ hoti iti vuttam tena āha anuvicaritvā atiādi upaḍḍha bhāgaḥ ti eka bhikkhuno

original: paṭivīsato upaḍḍhabhāgo. Dentena ca “ettakaṃ dātuṃ saṅgho anuññāsī”ti evaṃ attānaṃ
analyzed: upaḍḍha bhāgaḥ dentena ca ettakam dātum saṅghaḥ anuññāsīti evam attānam

original: parimocetvā yathā te saṅghe eva pasīdanti, evaṃ vatvā dātabbaṃ.
analyzed: parimocetvā yathā te saṅghe eva pasīdanti evam vatvā dātabbam

original: Apaccāsīsantenāti gilānagamikissarādīnaṃ anuññātapuggalānampi attano santakaṃ dentena
analyzed: a paccāsīsantena ati gilāna gami kissara ādīnam anuññāta puggalānam pi attano santakam dentena

original: apaccāsīsanteneva dātabbaṃ, ananuññātapuggalānaṃ pana apaccāsīsantenāpi dātuṃ na
analyzed: a paccāsīsantena iva dātabbam ananuññāta puggalānam pana a paccāsīsantena api dātum na

original: vaṭṭatīti. Saṅghikameva yathākatitāya dāpetabbaṃ. Attano santakampi paccayadāyakādī
analyzed: vaṭṭati iti saṅghikam eva yathā katitāya dāpetabbam attanaḥ santakam pi paccaya dāyaka ādī

original: sayameva vissāsena gaṇhanti, na vāretabbā, laddhakappiyanti tuṇhī bhavitabbaṃ. Pubbe
analyzed: sayam eva vissāsena gaṇhanti na vāretabbāḥ laddha kappiyanti tuṇhī bhavitabbam pubbe

original: vuttamevāti “kuddho hi so rukkhepi chindeyyā”tiādinā tuṇhībhāve kāraṇaṃ pubbe vuttameva.
analyzed: vuttam evā ti kuddhaḥ hi saḥ rukkhe api chindeyya āti ādinā tuṇhībhāve kāraṇam pubbe vuttam eva

original: Tehi kataanatthābhāvepi kāruññena tuṇhī bhavituṃ vaṭṭati, “gaṇhathā”tiādi pana vattuṃ na vaṭṭati.
analyzed: tehi kata anattha abhāve pi kāruññena tuṇhī bhavitum vaṭṭati gaṇhatha atiādi pana vattum na vaṭṭati

original: Garubhaṇḍattā…pe… na dātabbanti jīvarukkhānaṃ ārāmaṭṭhānīyattā, dārūnañca gehasambhārānupagatattā
analyzed: na dātabbanti jīva rukkhānaṃ ārāma ṭṭhānīya ttā dārūnaṃ ca geha sambhāra an upagata ttā

original: “sabbaṃ tvameva gaṇhā”ti dātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti vuttaṃ. Akatāvāsaṃ vā katvāti pubbe avijjamānaṃ
analyzed: sabbam tvam eva gaṇhāti dātum na vaṭṭati iti vuttam akata āvāsam vā katvā iti pubbe a vijjamānam

original: senāsanaṃ katvā jaggitakāle phalavāre sampatte.
analyzed: senāsanam katvā jaggita kāle phala vāre sampatte

original: Apalokanakammakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: apalokana kamma kathā vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Atthavasavaggādivaṇṇanā
analyzed: attha vasa vagga ādi vaṇṇanā

original: 498. Vipākadukkhasaṅkhātānaṃ samparāyikaverānanti ettha pāṇātipātādiverena nibbattattā,
analyzed: vipāka dukkha saṅkhātānam samparāyika verānam ti ettha pāṇātipāta ādi verena nibbatta ttā

original: verappattiyā hetuttā ca “vipākadukkhavedanā”ti vuttā. Pāṇātipātādipañcaveravinimuttānampi
analyzed: vera ppattiyāḥ ca vipāka dukkha vedanā ti vuttā pāṇātipāta ādi pañca vera vinimuttānam pi

original: akusalānaṃ verehi saha ekato saṅgaṇhanatthaṃ “dasaakusalakammapathappabhedāna”nti puna vuttaṃ.
analyzed: akusalānam verehi saha ekatas saṅgaṇhana attham dasa akusala kammapatha ppabhedānam ti puna vuttam

original: 499-500. Taṃ kammanti tajjanīyādikammameva, sattā āpattikkhandhā paññattaṃ nāmāti
analyzed: tam kamman ti tajjanīya ādi kammam eva sattā āpatti kkhandhāḥ paññattam nāma ati

original: sambandho. Antarā kenaci apaññatte sikkhāpadeti imasmiṃ kappe ādito paṭṭhāya yāva
analyzed: sambandhaḥ antarā kenaci a paññatte sikkhāpade iti imasmin kappe āditaḥ paṭṭhāya yāva

original: amhākaṃ bhagavato abhisambodhi, tāva antarākāle kakusandhādiṃ ṭhapetvā kenaci apaññatte
analyzed: amhākam bhagavataḥ abhisambodhi tāva antarā kāle kakusandha ādim ṭhapetvā kenacid a paññatte

original: sikkhāpadeti attho. Vinītakathā sikkhāpadanti vinītavatthūni eva. Tāni hi taṃtaṃsikkhākoṭṭhāsānaṃ
analyzed: sikkhāpadā iti atthaḥ vinīta kathā sikkhāpadanti vinīta vatthūni eva tāni hi taṃ taṃ sikkhā koṭṭhāsānam

original: pakāsanato “sikkhāpada”nti ca āpattianāpattīnaṃ anupaññāpanato “anupaññatta”nti ca vuccanti.
analyzed: pakāsanataḥ sikkhāpadanti ca āpatti anāpattīnam anupaññāpanataḥ anupaññattanti ca vuccanti

original: Atthavasavaggādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: attha vasa vagga ādi vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Saṅgahavaggavaṇṇanānayo niṭṭhito.
analyzed: saṅgaha vagga vaṇṇanā nayaḥ niṭṭhitaḥ

original: Iti mahāvaggo, paññattivaggo, saṅgahavaggoti tīhi mahāvaggehi paṭimaṇḍito parivāroti veditabbo.
analyzed: iti mahā vaggo paññatti vaggo saṅgaha vaggo ti tīhi mahā vaggehi paṭimaṇḍito parivāraḥ iti veditabbo

original: Iti samantapāsādikāya vinayaṭṭhakathāya vimativinodaniyaṃ
analyzed: iti samantapāsādikāya vinaya ṭṭhakathāya

original: Parivāravaṇṇanānayo niṭṭhito.
analyzed: parivāra vaṇṇanā nayaḥ niṭṭhitaḥ

original: Nigamanakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: nigamana kathā vaṇṇanā

original: Avasānagāthāsu ubhatovibhaṅga-khandhaka-parivārehi vibhattattā vibhāgapaṭidesanā
analyzed: avasāna gāthāsu ubhatas vibhaṅga khandhaka parivārehi vibhatta ttā vibhāga paṭidesanā

original: yasmiṃ vinayapiṭake. So ubhatovibhaṅga-khandhaka-parivāravibhattadesano āhāti yojanā.
analyzed: yasmin vinaya piṭake saḥ ubhatas vibhaṅga khandhaka parivāra vibhatta desanaḥ āha ati yojanā

original: Tassāti vinayapiṭakassa.
analyzed: tassa ati vinaya piṭakassa

original: Satthu mahābodhīti dakkhiṇasākhaṃ sandhāya vadati. Yaṃ padhānagharaṃ nāma pariveṇaṃ,
analyzed: satthu mahā bodhī iti dakkhiṇa sākham sandhāya vadati yam padhānagharam nāma pariveṇam

original: tattha cārupākārena sañcitaṃ parikkhittaṃ yaṃ pāsādaṃ kārayi, tatra tasmiṃ mahānigamasāmino
analyzed: tattha cāru pākārena sañcitam parikkhittam yam pāsādam tatra tasmin mahā nigama sāminaḥ

original: pāsāde vasatāti yojetabbā.
analyzed: pāsāde vasata iti yojetabbā

original: Buddhasiriṃ uddisitvā nissāya, tassa vā ajjhesanampi paṭicca yā iddhā paripuṇṇavinicchayatāya samiddhā vinayasaṃvaṇṇanā āraddhāti yojanā.
analyzed: buddha sirim uddisitvā nissāya tassa vā ajjhesanam pi paṭicca yā iddhā paripuṇṇa vinicchaya tāya samiddhā vinaya saṃvaṇṇanā āraddhā iti yojanā

original: Sirinivāsassāti siriyā nivāsanaṭṭhānabhūtassa siripālanāmakassa rañño. Jayasaṃvacchareti
analyzed: sirinivāsassa ati siriyāḥ nivāsana ṭṭhāna bhūtassa siripāla nāmakassa raññaḥ jaya saṃvacchara iti

original: vijayayutte saṃvacchare. Āraddhakāladassanatthaṃ puna “jayasaṃvacchare ayaṃ āraddhā”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: vijaya yutte saṃvacchare āraddha kāla dassana attham puna jaya saṃvacchare ayam āraddhā iti vuttam

original: Kāle vassanti yuttakāle vassanasīlo. Devoti megho.
analyzed: kāle vassanti yutta kāle vassana sīlaḥ devaḥ ti meghaḥ

original: Nigamanakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: nigamana kathā vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Nigamanakathā
analyzed: nigamana kathā

original: Ettāvatā ca āraddhā, vinayaṭṭhakathāya yā;
analyzed: ettāvatā ca āraddhā vinaya aṭṭhakathāya yā

original: Vaṇṇanā nātivitthiṇṇā, paripuṇṇavinicchayā.
analyzed: vaṇṇanā na ati vitthiṇṇā paripuṇṇa vinicchayā

original: Paññāsabhāṇavārāya, tantiyā parimāṇato;
analyzed: paññāsa bhāṇa vārāya tantiyā parimāṇato

original: Samijjhaniṭṭhiparamā, yā vimativinodanī.
analyzed: samijjha niṭṭhi paramā yā vimati vinodanī

original: Anantarāyena katā, ayaṃ niṭṭhamupāgatā;
analyzed: anantarāyena katā ayam niṭṭham upāgatā

original: Yaṃ taṃ niṭṭhaṃ tathā sabbe, pāṇino samanorathā.
analyzed: yam tam niṭṭham tathā sabbe pāṇinaḥ sa manorathā

original: Therehi vinayaññūhi, sucisallekhavuttihi;
analyzed: therehi vinaya ñūhi suci sallekha vuttihi

original: Avissatthātivitthiṇṇa-ganthabhīrū hipatthitaṃ.
analyzed: a vissattha ati vitthiṇṇa gantha bhīrū hi patthitam

original: Karontena mayā evaṃ, vinayaatthavaṇṇanaṃ;
analyzed: karontena mayā evam vinaya attha vaṇṇanam

original: Yaṃ pattaṃ kusalaṃ tena, patvā sambodhimuttamaṃ.
analyzed: yam pattam kusalam tena patvā sambodhim uttamam

original: Vinayatthaṃ pakāsetvā, yo sopāyena lakkhaṇaṃ;
analyzed: vinaya attham pakāsetvā yaḥ sa upāyena lakkhaṇam

original: Sopāyaṃ vimaticcheda-ñāṇacakkhupadāyakaṃ.
analyzed: sa upāyam vimati cheda ñāṇa cakkhu padāyakam

original: Viraddhatthavipallāsa-ganthavitthārahāniyā;
analyzed: viraddha ttha vipallāsa gantha vitthāra hāniyā

original: Visuddhiṃ pāpayissāmi, satte saṃsāradukkhato.
analyzed: visuddhim pāpayissāmi satte saṃsāra dukkhataḥ

original: Lokiyehi ca bhogehi, guṇehi nikhilā pajā;
analyzed: lokiyehi ca bhogehi guṇehi nikhilā pajā

original: Sabbehi sahitā hontu, ratā sambuddhasāsaneti.
analyzed: sabbehi sahitāḥ hontu ratāḥ sambuddha sāsane iti

original: Vimativinodanīṭīkā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: vimativinodanī ṭīkā niṭṭhitā
